column4: 凝血酶原消耗测试通过确定血液凝固完成后残留血清凝血酶原浓度来测量内源性凝血酶的形成。如果此过程中存在缺陷，较少的凝血酶原被转化为凝血酶（较少的凝血酶原被消耗）。该测试结果异常可见于多种异常情况，包括VIII因子或IX因子缺乏，使用循环抗凝剂，血小板减少症。
column5: The prothrombin consumption test measures the formation of intrinsic thromboplastin by determining the residual serum prothrombin after blood clotting is complete. If there is a defect in the process, less prothrombin will be converted to thrombin than normal (less prothrombin is consumed). This test may be abnormal with conditions including deficiency of factors VIII or IX, with circulating anticoagulants, thrombocytopenia.

column2: Focal necrosis of right ventricular muscle cells
column3: 右心室肌细胞局灶性坏死
column4: 右心室肌细胞局灶性坏死。
column5: Focal necrosis of right ventricular muscle cells

column3: 嘧啶应答型巨幼细胞性贫血
column4: 一型可以通过使用嘧啶补充剂（如尿苷酸和胞苷酸）改善的巨幼细胞贫血。
column5: A type of megaloblastic anemia that improves upon administration of pyrimidine supplements such as uridylic acid and cytidylic acid.

column4: 皮肤透明层断裂分离引起的大疱（水泡）形成。
column5: The formation of bullae (blisters) with cleavage in the `lamina lucida` (FMA:62921) layer of the skin.

column3: 谷胱甘肽合成酶缺乏症
尿去甲肾上腺素浓度增高
column4: `尿` (FMA:12274)中`去甲肾上腺素` (CHEBI:33569) 的浓度增加。
column5: An increased concentration of `noradrenaline` (CHEBI:33569) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).

column3: 植物血凝素淋巴细胞转化受损
column4: 在单层细胞培养时，，正常外周血淋巴细胞受植物血凝素（PHA）刺激后表现为对于同源和异源细胞的细胞毒性，但对自体细胞无效应。这种细胞毒性作用被认为可以提示淋巴细胞的免疫能力。
column5: Normal peripheral blood lymphocytes, when stimulated by phytohemagglutinin (PHA) are cytotoxic for homologous and heterologous cells but not for autologous cells in monolayer culture. The cytotoxic effect is thought to be indicative of the immunological competence of the lymphocytes.

column4: 血液中`丙氨酸 `（16449 CHEBI）的浓度增加。
column5: An increased concentration of `alanine` (CHEBI:16449) in the blood.

column4: `胆固醇酯化` 率(GO:0034435)的降低。
column5: A reduction in the rate of `cholesterol esterification` (GO:0034435).

column4: 血液循环中肾素水平异常降低。
column5: An decreased level of renin (PRO:000013883) in the "blood" (FMA:9670).

column2: Endopolyploidy on chromosome studies of bone marrow
column3: 骨髓染色体的核内多倍性检查
column4: 骨髓细胞内每个细胞中整套染色体数目的增加。
column5: An increase in the number of chromosome sets per cell in bone marrow cells.
An `abnormality of amino acid metabolism` (HP:0004337) characterized by a `decreased rate` (PATO:0000911) of `propionyl-CoA carboxylase activity` (GO:0004658).

column4: `血`（FMA：9670）中`苏氨酸 `（26986 CHEBI）的浓度增加。
column5: An increased concentration of `threonine` (CHEBI:26986) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).

column4: `尿` (FMA:12274)中`氨基酸` (CHEBI:33709 ) 浓度增加。
column5: An increased concentration of an `amino acid` (CHEBI:33709 ) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).

column4: 细胞内的`胱氨酸 `（17376 CHEBI）的浓度增加。这可表现在白细胞内，但并不特定表现在血细胞内。
column5: An increased concentration of `cystine` (CHEBI:17376) within cells. This finding can be demonstrated on leukocytes, but is not specific to blood cells.

column4: 尿液中`硫酸盐` (CHEBI:16189)浓度降低。
column5: Decreased concentration of `sulfate` (CHEBI:16189) in the urine.

column4: 尿液中`色氨酸` (CHEBI:27897) 浓度增加。
column5: An increased concentration of `tryptophan` (CHEBI:27897) in the urine.

column3: 循环系统内的极低密度脂蛋白胆固醇浓度增高
column5: An increase in the amount of `very-low-density lipoprotein cholesterol` (CHEBI:47773) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).

column4: 腹部脏器解剖位置左右反转（或镜面反射）。
column5: A left-right reversal (or "mirror reflection") of the anatomical location of the `viscera of the abdomen` (FMA:259123).

column4: 关节疼痛累及髋部。
column5: Joint pain affecting the hip.

column2: Abnormality of the femoral neck and head region

column4: 股骨颈的异常（股骨颈是股骨的突起，连接股骨头与股骨干）。
column5: An abnormality of the `femoral neck` (FMA:42385) (which is the process of bone, connecting the femoral head with the femoral shaft).

column4: 股骨头的异常。
column5: An abnormality of the `femoral head` (FMA:32851).

column4: 股骨（FMA:32841）近端骨骺的异常平坦化。
column5: An abnormal flattening of the `proximal epiphysis of the femur` (FMA:32841).

column2: Enlargement of the proximal femoral epiphysis
column4: 股骨（FMA:32841）近端骨骺的异常肿大。
column5: An abnormal enlargement of the `proximal epiphysis of the femur` (FMA:32841).
A narrowing of the sacrosciatic notch, i.e., the deep indentation in the posterior border of the hip bone at the point of union of the ilium and ischium.

column4: 一种由于胫前肌和腓骨肌下运动神经元病变导致肌无力而产生的异常步态。患者有足下垂，并且不能足不能背屈和外翻。行走时腿部高举以使脚趾离开地面，脚步落地时可能因为足部和地面碰撞而产生拍击声。
column5: An abnormal gait pattern that arises from weakness of the pretibial and peroneal muscles due to a lower motor neuron lesion. Affected patients have footdrop and are unable to dorsiflex and evert the foot. The leg is lifted high on walking so that the toes clear the ground, and there may be a slapping noise when the foot strikes the ground again.

column4: 轴索变性和轴索再生同时发生的模式（见注释）。
column5: A pattern of simultaneous degeneration and regeneration of axons (see comment).

column2: Decreased number of peripheral myelinated nerve fibers
column3: 周围有髓鞘神经纤维数量减少
column4: 周围神经系统有髓神经纤维丢失（在一般情况下，神经活检可以观察到这一改变）。
column5: A loss of myelinated nerve fibers in the peripheral nervous system (in general, this finding can be observed on nerve biopsy).

column4: 反复节段性脱髓鞘和髓鞘再生导致雪旺氏细胞轴突周围的赘生，通常累及周围神经。
column5: Repeated episodes of segmental demyelination and remyelination lead to the accumulation of supernumerary Schwann cells around axons, which is referred to as onion bulb formation. This finding affects peripheral nerves.

column4: 外周神经系统的神经轴突萎缩。
column5: Atrophic changes of `axons` (FMA:67308) of the peripheral nervous system.

column2: Decreased number of large peripheral myelinated nerve fibers
column3: 大的周围有髓鞘神经纤维数量减少
column4: 周围神经系统大的有髓鞘神经纤维数量减少。
column5: A reduced number of large myelinated nerve fibers.

column4: 容易疲劳。
column5: Increased susceptibility to fatigue.

column4: 周围性感觉神经的轴索性神经病。
column5: An axonal neuropathy of peripheral sensory nerves.

column4: 一种由于下肢近端肌肉无力导致患者如不用手部承托就不能站立的现象。
column5: A phenomenon whereby patients are not able to stand up without the use of the hands owing to weakness of the proximal muscles of the lower limbs.

column4: 一个或多个肌肉突然不自主收缩。
column5: Sudden and involuntary contractions of one or more muscles.

column4: 脊髓内扩张的胶质内衬的空腔。该空腔不与中央管交通，并且通常顺着脊髓发展，位于一侧或两侧脊髓后索之间。
column5: Dilated, glial-lined cavity in spinal cord. This cavity does not communicate with the central canal, and usually is between the dorsal columns unilaterally or bilaterally along the side of the cord.

column2: Generalized hypotonia due to defect at the neuromuscular junction
column3: 由于神经肌肉接头缺陷导致的广泛性肌张力减低

column4: 神经肌肉接头处的任何异常，神经肌肉接头是运动神经元的运动终板和骨骼肌纤维间的突触。
column5: Any abnormality of the neuromuscular junction, which is the synapse between the motor end plate of a motor neuron and the skeletal muscle fibers.

column4: 一类主要累及基底层的“洋葱头样”改变（HP:0003383）
column5: A type of `onion bulb formation` (HP:0003383) prominently affecting the area of the basal lamina.

column4: 异常感觉如刺痛，穿刺，或皮肤的麻木，没有明显的物理生理原因。
column5: Abnormal sensations such as tingling, pricking, or numbness of the skin with no apparent physical cause.

column4: 微终板电位的波幅异常降低，前者指在神经肌肉接头处由单个囊泡释放的递质所产生的突触后反应。
column5: An abnormal reduction in the amplitude of the miniature endplate potentials, i.e. the postsynaptic response to transmitter released from an individual vesicle at the neuromuscular junction.

column2: EMG: decremental response of compound muscle action potential (CMAP) to repetitive nerve stimulation
column3: 肌电图:复合肌肉动作电位对神经重复刺激的递减反应
column4: 复合肌肉动作电位（CMAP）是肌电图（EMG）的一种类型。 CMAP是指由供给运动神经刺激引起同一部位的若干个肌肉纤维几乎同时的动作电位，被记录为一个多峰累加动作电位。这种异常在检查过程中呈现大于正常的减少幅度。
column5: A compound muscle action potential (CMAP) is a type of electromyography (EMG). CMAP refers to a group of almost simultaneous action potentials from several muscle fibers in the same area evoked by stimulation of the supplying motor nerve and are recorded as one multipeaked summated action potential. This abnormality refers to a greater than normal decrease in the amplitude during the course of the investigation.

column2: Distal sensory impairment of all modalities

column3: 股骨近端干骺端不规则

column4: 寰枢关节部分脱位。
column5: Partial dislocation of the atlantoaxial joint.

column4: 椎管的异常窄小。
column5: An abnormal narrowing of the spinal canal.
Frontal schisis (cleft or cleavage) of vertebral bodies.

column3: 胸腰段脊柱后侧凸畸形
中枢神经系统髓鞘形成减少
column4: 髓鞘生成缺陷导致中枢神经系统髓鞘数量减少。
column5: Reduced amount of myelin in the central nervous system resulting from defective myelinogenesis.

column3: 运动神经传导速度降低
column4: 运动神经（FMA:83617）受累，神经传导速度减慢。
column5: A type of decreased nerve conduction velocity that affects the `motor neuron` (FMA:83617).

column3: 感觉性共济失调性神经病

column4: 微型终板电位的异常延长，即突触后响应从发射神经肌肉接头处的个人囊泡释放。
column5: An abnormal prolongation of the miniature endplate potentials, i.e. the postsynaptic response to transmitter released from an individual vesicle at the neuromuscular junction.

column4: 跟腱反射（也被称为足踝反射）消失。正常情况下，足背屈时，叩打跟腱可以引起腓肠肌收缩。
column5: Absence of the Achilles reflex (also known as the ankle jerk reflex), which can normally be elicited by tapping the tendon is tapped while the foot is dorsiflexed.

column4: 神经终板的面积减小。
column5: A reduction in the size of nerve terminals.

column3: 肌电图:慢性失神经支配的征象
column4: 慢性失神经支配的肌电图证据。
column5: Evidence of chronic denervation on electromyography.

column4: 去神经对肌电图特征性表现（纤颤，正锐波，和巨大的运动单位电位）。
column5: The presence of characteristic findings of denervation on electromyography (fibrillations, positive sharp waves, and giant motor unit potentials).

column4: 周围神经系统的轴突数量减少。
column5: A reduction in the number of axons in the peripheral nervous system.

column3: 感觉神经传导速度降低
column4: 沿着感觉神经传导的动作电位传导速度减慢。
column5: Reduced speed of conduction of the action potential along a sensory nerve.

column3: 冷刺激引起的肌肉痉挛
column4: 在低温环境下导致的一个或多个肌肉突然不自主收缩。
column5: Sudden and involuntary contractions of one or more muscles brought on by exposure to cold temperatures.

column4: 轴突病变之后出现的轴突再生。
column5: The presence of axonal regeneration following a previous axonal lesion.

column2: Increased rate of premature chromosome condensation
column3: 早熟染色体凝缩率增高
column4: `早熟 ` (PATO:0000694) `染色体凝缩 ` (GO:0030261)的增加率。
column5: An increased rate of `premature` (PATO:0000694) `chromosome condensation` (GO:0030261).

column3: 抗中性粒细胞抗体阳性
column4: 血清中存在针对嗜中性粒细胞的自身抗体。
column5: The presence of autoantibodies in the serum that react against neutrophils.

column4: 血清中存在针对血小板的自身抗体。
column5: The presence in the serum of autoantibodies directed against thrombocytes.

column4: `长链脂肪酸`（CHEBI:15904）的浓度增高。
column5: Increased concentration of `long-chain fatty acid` (CHEBI:15904).

column2: Low urinary cyclic AMP response to PTH administration
column3: 尿环腺苷酸对甲状旁腺素（PTH）治疗反应低下

column4: 肌电图（EMG）检查结果异常。
column5: Abnormal results of investigations using electromyography (EMG).

column4: 肌病肌电图异常指示，如小短多相运动单元电位。
column5: The presence of abnormal electromyographic patterns indicative of myopathy, such as small-short polyphasic motor unit potentials.

column4: 检测不到血清免疫球蛋白A，水平值<5毫克/分升（0.05克/升）。
column5: Undetectable serum immunoglobulin A level at a value < 5 mg/dL (0.05 g/L).

column4: 尿液中偶联到 `唾液酸`（CHEBI:26667）的肽排泄增加
column5: Excretion of peptides conjugated to `sialic acid` (CHEBI:26667) in the urine.

column3: 神经元外自体荧光脂褐素增加
column4: 脂褐素，自体荧光脂褐素的专业术语，是积聚在最衰老细胞的蛋白质和脂质混合物，尤其是涉及高脂质转换（例如，肾上腺髓质）或吞噬的其他类型细胞（例如视网膜色素上皮细胞或RPE；巨噬细胞）。此术语适用于神经元外脂褐素（也称为自身荧光脂蛋白）的积聚增加是否超过患者预期的年龄。
column5: Lipofuscin, a generic term applied to autofluorescent lipopigment, is a mixture of protein and lipid that accumulates in most aging cells, particularly those involved in high lipid turnover (e.g., the adrenal medulla) or phagocytosis of other cell types (e g., the retinal pigment epithelium or RPE; macrophage). This term pertains if there is an increase in the extraneuronal accumulation of lipofuscin (also known as autofluorescent lipoprotein) more than expected for the age of the patient.

column3: 胆固醇内稳态平衡异常

column2: Paradoxical increased cortisol secretion on dexamethasone suppression test
column3: 地塞米松抑制试验皮质醇分泌反常增加

column4: 一个或多个椎体的异常。
column5: An abnormality of one or more of the `vertebrae` (FMA:9914).

column4: 有缺陷的结构和髓鞘的作用。
column5: Defective structure and function of myelin sheaths.

column4: 由于一组或多组从脑发出的支配肌肉的神经纤维受损后引起骨骼随意肌收缩功能的丧失，可以是肌力部分或完全的丧失，用paralysis或plegia来表示肌力完全或严重丧失，paresis表示部分或轻微的肌力丧失。运动性瘫痪由上运动神经元损伤（皮质脊髓束、皮质延髓、或皮质脊髓下）引起。
column5: Paralysis of voluntary muscles means loss of contraction due to interruption of one or more motor pathways from the brain to the muscle fibers. Although the word paralysis is often used interchangeably to mean either complete or partial loss of muscle strength, it is preferable to use paralysis or plegia for complete or severe loss of muscle strength, and paresis for partial or slight loss. Motor paralysis results from deficits of the upper motor neurons (corticospinal, corticobulbar, or subcorticospinal).

column4: 与血液中钙水平异常减低相关的神经肌肉统过度兴奋，导致手足搐搦或广泛痉挛。
column5: Hyperexcitability of the neuromuscular system related to abnormally low level of calcium in the blood, resulting in carpopedal or generalized spasms.

column4: 肌肉运动后出现的无力感，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
column5: A type of weakness that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.

column4: 初级感觉的异常是由末梢神经（疼痛，温度，触觉，振动，关节位置）介导的。感觉减退（或hyesthesia）是指在皮肤感觉测试中某一特定感觉类型的减退。
column5: An abnormality of the primary sensation that is mediated by peripheral nerves (pain, temperature, touch, vibration, joint position). The word hypoesthesia (or hyesthesia) refers to a reduction in cutaneous sensation to a specific type of testing.

column4: 周围神经轴索正常功能受到破坏为特征的疾病。
column5: An abnormality characterized by disruption of the normal functioning of peripheral axons.

column3: 节段性神经末梢脱髓鞘/髓鞘再生
column4: 节段性的影响周围神经的髓鞘脱失和再生（髓鞘再生）。
column5: A segmental pattern of demyelination and regeneration (remyelination) affecting peripheral nerves.

column4: 肌电图（EMG）发现轴突性神经病变，神经传导速度正常或略有下降，远端潜伏期正常或稍长时间，但动作电位和感觉电位幅度显著降低。有可能是在肌电图中的自发活动，如增加插入性活动，正锐波和纤颤电位。
column5: Electromyographic (EMG) findings characteristic of axonal neuropathy, with normal or slightly decreased nerve conduction velocities, normal or slightly prolonged distal latencies, but significantly reduced motor potentials and sensory amplitudes. There may be spontaneous activity upon needle EMG studies, such as increased insertional activity, positive sharp waves and fibrillation potentials.

column4: 手臂肌肉的无力。
column5: Weakness of the muscles of the arms.

column4: 刺激足底后出现踇趾背屈（有时其余脚趾成扇形分开）的体征。如果查体出现巴彬斯基征，指示皮质脊髓束损害。
column5: Upturning of the big toe (and sometimes fanning of the other toes) in response to stimulation of the sole of the foot. If the Babinski sign is present it can indicate damage to the corticospinal tract.

column4: 急性发作的神经性症状，包括：头晕，疼痛，耳鸣，眩晕、视力障碍，神经衰弱、躯体感觉或运动障碍等。
column5: Acute onset of neurological symptoms, including: dizziness, pain, tinnitus, dizziness, visual impairment, neurasthenia, somatosensory or motor disorders

column2: Defective dehydrogenation of isovaleryl CoA and butyryl CoA
column3: 异戊酰辅酶A和丁酰辅酶A的脱氢功能缺陷

column4: `尿液` (FMA:12274)中`二磷酸盐(4-)` (CHEBI:18361) 的浓度异常升高，二磷酸盐(4-)有两个磷酸基团，又称焦磷酸盐。
column5: An abnormally increased `diphosphate(4-)` (CHEBI:18361)  concentration in the `urine` (FMA:12274). Diphosphate(4-), as ester with two phosphate groups, is also known as pyrophosphate.

column3: 高尿促性腺激素（原发性性腺功能低下）

column4: 血清中存在针对细胞核或核组分的自身抗体，。
column5: The presence of autoantibodies in the serum that react against nuclei or nuclear components.

column4: 免疫球蛋白M在血液中的异常水平升高。
column5: An abnormally increased level of immunoglobulin M in blood.

column4: `矮小`（HP:0004322）的一种，其中身体的不同区域被缩短的程度不同。
column5: A left-right reversal (or "mirror reflection") of the anatomical location of the `viscera of the abdomen` (FMA:259123).

column4: 轻微程度的身材矮小，低于该年龄和性别平均水平负2标准差以上，但不超过负3标准差。
column5: A mild degree of short stature, more than -2 SD but not more than -3 SD from mean corrected for age and sex.

column4: 矮小（HP:0004322）的一种，其中身体的不同区域被缩短的程度相当。
column5: A kind of "short stature" (HP:0004322) in which different regions of the body are shortened to a comparable extent.

column4: 严重程度身材矮小，身高位于同年龄同性别平均身高下超过负4标准差。
column5: A severe degree of short stature, more than -4 SD from the mean corrected for age and sex.

column2: Reduced ratio of renal calcium clearance to creatinine clearance
column3: 肾钙清除与肌酐清除比率降低
column4: 肾脏对钙清除与对肌酐清除的比率减少，低于0.01。
column5: A reduction of the ratio of  renal calcium clearance to creatinine clearance to below 0.01.

column2: Deficiency or absence of cytochrome b(-245)

column3: 出生身长大于97百分位数
不成比例的短躯干性矮小
column4: 一种'不相称的短躯干`（HP:0003498），以躯干短但四肢中等大小为特征。

column5: The shoulder, or pectoral, girdle is composed of the clavicles and the scapulae. Shoulder-girdle weakness refers to lack of strength of the muscles attaching to these bones, that is, lack of strength of the muscles around the shoulders.

column4: 纤维分裂或分叉是一种表现在人类和大鼠骨骼肌病理的常见现象。纤维分裂表现为完整纤维的纵向对分，而纤维分叉则是起源于坏死纤维再生末端由于肌纤维膜内陷所致。在纤维分叉中，纤维一端保持为单个整体，而另一端则有多个分叉。
column5: Fiber splitting or branching is a common finding in human and rat skeletal muscle pathology. Fiber splitting refers to longitudinal halving of the complete fiber, while branching originates from a regenerating end of a necrotic fiber as invaginations of the sarcolemma. In fiber branching, one end of the fiber remains intact as a single entity, while the other end has several branches.

column2: Increased variability in muscle fiber diameter

column3: 病毒感染诱导的横纹肌瘤

column4: 术语营养不良是指生长异常。然而，肌营养不良是用来描述原发性肌肉疾病具有遗传基础及渐进的过程，其特征为进行性骨骼肌无力，肌蛋白的缺陷，以及肌细胞的凋亡。
column5: The term dystrophy means abnormal growth. However, muscular dystrophy is used to describe primary myopathies with a genetic basis and a progressive course characterized by progressive skeletal muscle weakness, defects in muscle proteins, and the apoptosis of muscle cells.

column4: 复发的肌红蛋白尿，即尿液中反复出现肌红蛋白。这通常是横纹肌溶解症的结果，即肌肉组织的破坏。
column5: Recurring episodes of myoglobinuria, i.e., of the presence of myoglobin in the urine. This is usually a consequence of rhabdomyolysis, i.e., of the destruction of muscle tissue.

column4: 异染（也称为异染色）是颜色发生的一种特异性改变，发生在某些苯胺染料与特定的物质结合或在液体中浓缩时。例如，当碱性染料甲苯胺蓝与软骨基质结合时，颜色变成明显的粉红色。在这里特指，异染是指在正常组织中无法观察到颜色的变化，却非常规的用阳离子染料甲苯胺蓝O和阿尔新蓝染色，由于阴离子糖胺多糖糖胺过量所致的颜色改变。
column5: Metachromasia (also known as metachromacy) is a characteristic color change which certain aniline dyes exhibit when bound to particular substances or when concentrated in solution. For example, the basic dye toluidine blue becomes distinctly pink when bound to cartilage matrix. In the sense used here, the metachromasia refers to a change in color not observed with normal tissues, anomalous staining with the cationic dyes toluidine blue O and Alcian blue resulting from excessive amounts of the polyanionic glycosaminoglycans.

column5: The presence of an abnormally reduced amount of `subcutaneous adipose tissue` (FMA:74315).

column4: 淋巴管先天性发育不全。
column5: Congenital underdevelopment of lymph vessels.

column3: 扣击引起的快速滚动的肌肉收缩（PIRC）

column4: 由于钙沉积在软组织沉积。
column5: Formation of calcium deposits in any soft tissue.

column4: 一种子宫畸形，因胚胎发育过程中苗勒管融合失败形成成对的子宫。

column4: 磨牙症的特点是磨牙齿包括紧咬下颌，通常在睡眠过程中出现。

column4: 色素痣是一种错构瘤，一般局限于皮肤且较为稳定。
column5: A nevus is a type of hamartoma that is a circumscribed stable malformation of the skin.

column4: 一种以片状红斑、表皮增厚且表面覆有易脱落的银白色鳞屑为特征的皮肤疾病。
column5: A skin abnormality characterized by redness and irritation, with thick, red skin that displays flaky, silver-white patches (scales).

column4: 肌无力发作。
column5: Episodes of muscle weakness.

column4: 牙髓内多个点状钙化。

column4: 肾功能严重衰竭，需要透析或肾移植才能生存，其特征是肾小球滤过率严重降低（小于15毫升/分钟/ 1.73m平方米），还有其他临床表现，包括血清肌酐增加。
column5: A degree of kidney failure severe enough to require dialysis or kidney transplantation for survival characterized by a severe reduction in glomerular filtration rate (less than 15 ml/min/1.73 m2) and other manifestations including increased serum creatinine.

column4: Pili（来自拉丁语pilus，毛发）torti（来自拉丁语tortus，卷曲）是指显微镜下可看到的短的、脆的、卷曲的毛发。
column5: Pili (from Latin pilus, hair) torti (from Latin tortus, twisted) refers to short and brittle hairs that appear flattened and twisted when viewed through a microscope.

column5: A body habitus that is tall, slim and underweight, with long legs and long arms (i.e., arm span exceeds height by 5 cm or more).

column5: Nemaline rods are abnormal bodies that can occur in skeletal muscle fibers. The rods can be observed on histological analysis of muscle biopsy tissue or upon electron microscopy, where they appear either as extensions of sarcomeric Z-lines, in random array without obvious attachment to Z-lines (often in areas devoid of sarcomeres) or in large clusters localized at the sarcolemma or intermyofibrillar spaces.

column2: Muscle abnormality related to mitochondrial dysfunction
column3: 线粒体功能障碍引起的肌异常

column5: An abnormal predominance of type I muscle fibers (in general, this feature can only be observed on muscle biopsy).

column4: 肌纤维膜存在异常细胞液泡（膜旁细胞器）。在组织染色与HE染色，镶边空泡是爆米花样有密集蓝色边缘的清亮空泡。液泡形成与细胞质和核内偶尔出现的嗜酸性夹杂物有关。
column5: Presence of abnormal vacuoles (membrane-bound organelles) in the sarcolemma. On histological staining with hematoxylin and eosin, rimmed vacuoles are popcorn-like clear vacuoles with a densely blue rim. The vacuoles are often associated with cytoplasmic and occasionally intranuclear eosinophilic inclusions.

column4: 人体组织尤其是肌肉平衡张力的异常状态。
column5: The abnormal state of balanced tension in the tissues of the body, especially the muscles.

column3: 有代谢活性的脂肪组织（皮下、腹腔内或胸腔内）几乎完全缺如

A situation in which phenotypic abnormalities become evident with age.

Epiphyseal plates are located at the distal and proximal ends of the long bones, in this case of the radius and premature fusion will have an effect on the growth of the radial bone, inhibiting or at least disturbing the normal growth and development of the bone.

column5: Fusion of the hands and feet by a thin membrane of skin (scarring) seen in forms of dystrophic epidermolysis bullosa and leading to a "mitten" hand deformity.

column5: A hand in which the fingers are of nearly equal length and deflected at the first interphalangeal joint, so as to give a forklike shape consisting of separation of the first and second as well as the third and fourth digits.

column4: 手指偏离指手的一个或多个手指从其正常位置偏离，偏向桡侧或尺侧。手指的偏离可能由一个或多个病变手指的指骨形态异常导致，或由一个或多个指骨的偏差或位移导致。
column5: Deviated fingers is a term that should be used if one or more fingers of the hand are deviated from their normal position, either to the radial or ulnar side. A deviation of a finger can be caused by an abnormal form of one or more of the phalanges of the affected finger, or by a deviation or displacement of one or more phalanges.

column4: 相对于对侧手指（未累及的），或者相对于预期的年龄/体型，手指的大部分或全部的长度和周长显著增加。周长的增加伴随着背腹尺寸的增加和横向尺寸的增加。
column5: Significant increase in the length and girth of most or all of a digit compared to its contralateral digit (if unaffected) or compared to what would be expected for age/body build. The increased girth is accompanied by an increase in the dorso-ventral dimension AND the lateral dimension of the digit.

column4: 第二手指（也称食指）的结构或形态异常。
column5: This term means any abnormal structure or form of the phalangeal bone of the 2nd finger. also known as the index finger.

column5: Any abnormality of the `skeletal muscle cell` (FMA:9727). Muscle fibers are subdivided into two types. Type I fibers are fatigue-resistant and rich in oxidative enzymes (they stain light with the myosin ATPase reaction), and type II fibers are fast-contracting, fatigue-prone, and rich in glycolytic enzymes (these fibers stain darkly). Normal muscle tissue has a random distribution of type I and type II fibers.

Pathophysiologically, atrial flutter is a form of atrial reentry in which there is a premature electrical impulse creates a self-propagating circuit.

column4: 青少年的成年发病性糖尿病（MODY）最初是用于描述有空腹高血糖症，而且可以不用胰岛素治疗两年以上的病人，而对这些病人的最初诊断是在（低于25岁）较年轻的时候作出的。因此，MODY结合了1型糖尿病（诊断时年龄较年轻）和2型糖尿病（比1型糖尿病胰岛素依赖较少）的特点。术语MODY现在经常用来指一组具有如下特点的单基因疾病，即在年轻时确诊的高血糖症，没有胰岛素依赖或有轻微胰岛素依赖，没有胰岛素抵抗，并且缺乏β细胞自身免疫损伤的证据。
column5: The term Maturity-onset diabetes of the young (MODY) was initially used for patients diagnosed with fasting hyperglycemia that could be treated without insulin for more than two years, where the initial diagnosis was made at a young age (under 25 years). Thus, MODY combines characteristics of type 1 diabetes (young age at diagnosis) and type 2 diabetes (less insulin dependence than type 1 diabetes). The term MODY is now most often used to refer to a group of monogenic diseases with these characteristics. Here, the term is used to describe hyperglycemia diagnosed at a young age with no or minor insulin dependency, no evidence of insulin resistence, and lack of evidence of autoimmune destruction of the beta cells.

column5: Microcephaly (HP:0000252) with onset in the postnatal period, that is, the head circumference is in the normal range at birth but falls behind normal values later in development.

column4: 囟门较同龄人相对偏小。
column5: A fontanelle that is small for age.

column4: 前额中线的垂直骨嵴突出。
column5: Vertical bony ridge positioned in the midline of the forehead.

column4: 出生后长成异常大的头骨（大头畸形）。
column5: The postnatal development of an abnormally large skull (macrocephaly).

column2: Metopic suture patent to nasal root
column4: 前额缝合在婴儿期分割成前额骨两半，通常到六岁时融合。缝线从前囟（在头盖骨上位于冠状缝和矢状缝垂直相交的点）到鼻根。本术语适用于从前囟到鼻根的颅缝开大。
column5: The frontal suture divides the two halves of the frontal bone in infants and usually fuses by the age of six years. The suture runs from the bregma (the point on the skull at which the coronal suture is intersected perpendicularly by the sagittal suture) to the nasion or nasal root. This term applies if the suture is widely patent from bregma to nasal root.

column2: Midline skin dimples over anterior/posterior fontanelles
column3: 前/后囟门中线皮肤凹陷

column4: 骨髓增生性疾病，其特点的粒细胞系增殖增加但仍有分化能力。
column5: A myeloproliferative disorder characterized by increased proliferation of the granulocytic cell line without the loss of their capacity to differentiate.

column4: 正常成人血红蛋白由两个α球蛋白链和两个β球蛋白链构成。Barts血红蛋白是由四个γ球蛋白链形成的四聚体，是地中海贫血的另一种病理形式。Barts血红蛋白对氧具有非常高的亲和力，导致几乎没有氧气输送到组织。
column5: Normal adult hemoglobin is composed of two chains each of alpha and beta globin. Hb Barts (Hemoglobin Barts) is a tetramer with four gamma globin chains, and is essentially pathognomonic for one or another form of alpha thalassemia. Hb Barts has an extremely high affinity for oxygen, resulting in almost no oxygen delivery to the tissues.

column4: 一种恶性单克隆丙种球蛋白病，特征为高水平的IgM 蛋白单克隆异常增高。
column5: A malignant monoclonal gammopathy characterized by a high level of an IgM monoclonal protein.

column3: 短暂性幼红细胞减少症
column4: 血循环中幼红细胞的数量暂时性减少。
column5: A transient reduction in the number of `erythroblasts` (CL:0000765) in the circulation.

column4: 一种以细胞内由变性血红蛋白沉积形成的包涵体为特征的贫血。
column5: Anemia characterized by abnormal intracellular inclusions, composed of denatured hemoglobin, found on the membrane of red blood cells.

column3: 中性粒细胞杀伤葡萄球菌功能受损

column4: 巨核细胞（CL:0000556）的数目增加。巨核细胞是血小板的前体细胞，存在于骨髓中。
column5: Increased `megakaryocyte` (CL:0000556) number, i.e., of platelet precursor cells, present in the bone marrow.

column4: 一型T细胞淋巴瘤，其中恶性T细胞可以存在于血液中（白血病），淋巴结（淋巴瘤），皮肤或多个区域。
column5: A type of T-cell lymphoma in which cancerous T-cells may present in the blood (leukemia), lymph nodes (lymphoma), skin or in multiple areas.

column4: 比红细胞的正常体积大。
column5: Larger than normal size of erythrocytes.

column3: 慢性弥漫性血管内凝血
column4: 慢性发生的弥漫性血管内凝血（HP:0005521），存在持久但较弱或间歇激活的刺激因素，凝血因子和血小板的破坏和生产是平衡的。
column5: A chronic form of `disseminated intravascular coagulation` (HP:0005521) in which a persistent weak or intermittent activating stimulus is present and destruction and production of coagulation factors and platelets are balanced.

column4: 弥漫性血管内凝血以凝血普遍激活为特点，这导致在血管内形成血纤维蛋白和在中小型血管内最终血栓闭塞。
column5: Disseminated intravascular coagulation is characterized by the widespread activation of coagulation, which results in the intravascular formation of fibrin and ultimately thrombotic occlusion of small and midsize vessels.

column3: 吡哆醇应答型铁粒幼细胞性贫血
column4: 一种用吡哆醇（维生素B-6）治疗可缓解的铁粒幼细胞贫血（HP:0001924）。
column5: A type of `sideroblastic anemia` (HP:0001924) that is alleviated by pyridoxine (vitamin B-6) treatment.

column4: 与淋巴组织过多增生有关白血病，循环中恶性淋巴细胞和淋巴母细胞数目增加。
column5: Leukemia associated with hyperplasia of the lymphoid tissues and increased numbers of circulating malignant lymphocytes and lymphoblasts.

column4: 激肽原（内源性凝血级联中的一个辅因子）的量减少。
column5: Reduction in the amount of kininogen, which functions as a cofactor in the contact phase of the intrinsic blood coagulation cascade.

column4: 存在于骨髓的造血细胞的数目减少。
column5: A reduced number of hematopoietic cells present in the bone marrow.

column4: 一种急性白血病，以同时影响髓系和淋巴细胞系为特征。这些白血病细胞为混合细胞，又称混合型或双表型急性白血病。
column5: A type of actue leukemia with features characteristic of both the myeloid and lymphoid lineages. These leukemias are for this reason are designated mixed-lineage, hybrid or biphenotypic acute leukemias.

column3: 大细胞性红细胞生成异常性贫血
暂时性的骨髓增生综合征

column4: 溶血性贫血的`一种形式（HP:0001878），可以通过运动来触发。
column5: A form of `hemolytic anemia` (HP:0001878) that can be triggered by exertion.

column4: 平均血小板体积低于正常参考区间的下限。
column5: Average platelet volume below the lower limit of the normal reference interval.

column3: T细胞慢性淋巴细胞淋巴瘤/白血病

column4: 红细胞形态多样性的一种形式（HP:0004447），红细胞有异常形缺口和看起来像角的突起。
column5: A form of `poikilocytosis` (HP:0004447) in which the abnormally shaped erythrocytes have notches that results in projections that look like horns.

column4: 先天性发病的粒细胞（CL:0000094）的数量显著减少。
column5: Congenital onset of a marked decrease in the number of `granulocytes` (CL:0000094).

column4: 由全血到凝固为凝块所需要的时间异常延长（延迟）。
column5: An abnormal prolongation (delay) in the time required by whole blood to produce a visible clot.

column4: 与`维生素K依赖的蛋白C`（PR:000013261）的浓度（PATO:0001163）下降相关的凝血异常（HP:0001928）。凝血酶结合于血栓调节素后激活蛋白C形成活化的蛋白Ca。活化的蛋白C可以降解Ⅷa因子和Va因子。
column5: An `abnormality of coagulation` (HP:0001928) related to a `decreased concentration` (PATO:0001163) of `vitamin K-dependent protein C` (PR:000013261). Protein C is activated to protein Ca by thrombin bound to thrombomodulin. Activated protein C degrades factors VIIIa and Va.

column4: 具有胚胎造血潜力组织过度增殖（过量生产）。
column5: Proliferation (excess production) of hemopoietically active tissue or of tissue which has embryonic hemopoietic potential.

column4: 巨核细胞（CL:0000556）计数减少（0002001 PATO）。
column5: A `reduced count` (PATO:0002001) of `megakaryocytes` (CL:0000556).

column3: 先天性中性粒细胞减少症
column4: 先天性发病的中性粒细胞减少的一种形式（HP:0001875）。
column5: A form of `neutropenia` (HP:0001875) with congenital onset.

column4: 慢性淋巴细胞/淋巴性/成淋巴母细胞性白血病（CLL），是一种血液肿瘤性疾病。该疾病的特征是在血液中发现形态成熟但免疫功能失调的淋巴细胞，在骨髓和淋巴器官的增殖和积累。因为没有T细胞淋巴细胞白血病的病例报告，慢性淋巴性白血病是一个B细胞淋巴细胞性白血病。
column5: A chronic lymphocytic/lymphatic/lymphoblastic leukemia (CLL) is a neoplastic disease characterized by proliferation and accumulation (blood, marrow and lymphoid organs) of morphologically mature but immunologically dysfunctional lymphocytes. A CLL is always a B-cell lymphocytic leukemia as there are no reports of cases of T-cell lymphocytic leukemias.

column4: 前额缝把婴儿和儿童头骨的额骨平分为两部分。这两半一般到六岁完全融合。持久性前额缝隙被称为“额骨缝”。
column5: The frontal suture divides the two halves of the frontal bone of the skull in infants and children and generally undergoes fusion by the age of six. A persistent frontal suture is referred to as a "metopic suture".

column4: 颧弓的异常。颧弓也被称为颊骨。
column5: An abnormality of the `zygomatic arch` (FMA:53120), also known as the cheek bone.

column3: 激肽 - 激肽释放酶系统的异常

column4: 正常血红蛋白合成的特点是产生等量的α和β球蛋白。这一术语指α和β球蛋白比例的失衡，是各种形式地中海贫血的主要特征。
column5: Normal hemoglobin synthesis is characterized by production of equal amounts of alpha and beta globins. This term refers to a deviation from this pattern and is the main characteristic of the various forms of thalassemia.

column2: Abnormality of bone marrow cell morphology
column4: 骨髓细胞的形态或数量异常（FMA:9608）。
column5: An anomaly of the form or number of cells in the `bone marrow` (FMA:9608).

column4: 肾多个囊肿形成。
column5: The presence of many cysts in the kidney.

column4: 每个肾的肾单位计数减少。
column5: A reduction in the count of `nephrons` (FMA:17640) per kidney.

column4: 影像学诊断中肾皮质和髓质之间的分界不明显。
column5: A lack of differentiation between renal cortex and medulla on diagnostic imaging.

column4: 诊断影像学见到的肾皮质和髓质之间的分化程度减少。
column5: Reduced differentiation between renal cortex and medulla on diagnostic imaging.

column4: 尿液镁浓度增高，出现低镁血症。
column5: High urine magnesium in the presence of hypomagnesemia.

column3: 非酸中毒性近端肾小管病
column4: 一种近端肾小管病，其特点是重吸收缺陷导致糖尿、氨基酸尿、肾小管性蛋白尿、肾低磷血症，和肾小管低尿酸盐重吸收，但无碳酸氢盐的损失。
column5: A type of proximal renal tubulopathy characterized by resorption defects leading to glycosuria, aminoaciduria, tubular proteinuria, renal hypophosphatemia, and urate tubular hyporeabsorption without bicarbonate loss.

column4: 肾小管和肾间质组织纤维化。
column5: Fibrosis that involves the tubules and interstitial tissue of the kidney.

column4: 肾盂的重复。

column4: 肾脏肾小管基底膜破坏。

column4: 一种肾癌，起源于近曲肾小管的上皮细胞。
column5: A type of `carcinoma` (MPATH:549) of the `kidney` (FMA:7203) with origin in the epithelium of the `proximal convoluted renal tubule` (FMA:17693).

column4: 局灶性掌趾角化症，仅掌跖的某些部位发生角化异常。

column3: 黑素细胞中巨大黑素小体

column2: Macular hypopigmented whorls, streaks, and patches
column3: 螺纹状、线状和点状色素减退斑

column5: Loss of all scalp hair with congenital onset.

column3: 面部毛细血管蝶状扩张

column5: Telangiectases (small dilated blood vessels) located near the surface of the skin in a butterfly midface distribution.

column4: 指直径大于8厘米，颜色较深并伴有毛发生长的色素痣。往往在婴幼儿期痣较小，但其随着年龄的增长会增大。
column5: The giant congenital nevus is greater than 8 cm in size, pigmented and often hairy. A giant congenital nevus is smaller in infants and children, but it usually continues to grow with the child.

column2: Large cafe-au-lait macules with irregular margins
column3: 边缘不规则的较大咖啡牛奶斑

column3: 股骨发育不全或发育低下

column5: Absence or underdevelopment of the `femur` (FMA:9611).

column4: 骨骼成熟速率异常增高。骨骼加速成熟可在根据人体特定骨骼的放射影像估计骨龄的基础上诊断。

column5: Increased cross-section (diameter) of the long bones. Note that widening may primarily affect specific regions of long bones (e.g., diaphysis or metaphysis), but this should be coded separately.

column5: Absent ossification of the calvaria (vault of the skull).

column4: 这类短指的特点是拇指和大脚趾末端指（趾）骨短而宽。

column4: 椎体的不规则分割和结合。

column4: 中度骨质疏松症。

column4: 足部畸形产生的原因是累及肌肉和软组织的病变。与此相反，如果脚的骨骼被累及，适用术语“足畸形”。
column5: A foot deformity resulting due to an abnormality affecting the muscle and soft tissue. In contrast if the bones of the foot are affected the term structural foot deformity applies.

column5: An abnormality of the hand resulting from contracture of the palmar fascia with a fixed flexion deformity of the metacarpophalangeal (MCP) joints and the proximal interphalangeal (PIP) joints.

column3: 伴有中心孔的远端拇指指骨发育不良

column5: Abnormal reduction in length of all metacarpal bones.

column5: Avascular necrosis of the `proximal epiphysis of the femur` (FMA:32841) occurring in growing children and caused by an interruption of the blood supply to the head of the femur close to the hip joint. The necrosis is characteristically associated with flattening of the femoral head, for which reason the term coxa plana has been used to refer to this feature in the medical literature.

column4: 中央Y形掌骨是人手的两个中央掌骨（即，掌骨2-4）部分融合，Y形的两个臂向远方伸展。中央Y形掌骨可以被看作是一个中央多趾合并重复的掌骨部分融合。
column5: A central Y-shaped metacarpal is the result of a partial fusion of two central metacarpals (i.e., metacarpals 2-4) of the hand, with the two arms of the Y pointing in the distal direction. Central Y-shaped metacarpals may be seen as a result of a central polydactyly with partial fusion of the duplicated metacarpal.

column4: 天鹅颈样变形指手指PIP关节过度伸展和DIP关节弯曲。导致天鹅颈状变形最常见的原因是伸肌肌腱末端的损坏。PIP关节松弛使手指能够过伸，例如削弱掌板力量的因素都能可产生手指的天鹅颈变形。类风湿性关节炎就是一个例子。另一个原因是手和手指的小（内收）肌群挛缩，例如手外伤或神经疾病（如脑性麻痹、帕金森氏病或中风）。
column5: A swan neck deformity describes a finger with a hyperextended PIP joint and a flexed DIP joint. The most common cause for a swan neck-like deformity is a disruption of the end of the extensor tendon. Conditions that loosen the PIP joint and allow it to hyperextend, for example conditions that weaken the volar plate, can produce a swan neck deformity of the finger. One example is rheumatoid arthritis. Another cause are conditions that tighten up the small (intrinsic) muscles of the hand and fingers, for example hand trauma or nerve disorders, such as cerebral palsy, Parkinson's disease, or stroke.

column4: 术语近侧指间关节粘连指手指中间和近端指骨的骨融合，即近端指间关节（PIJ）缺失，可以通过X射线检查看到缺乏近端的指间手指折痕。
column5: The term proximal symphalangism refers to a bony fusion of the middle and proximal phalanges of the digits of the hand, in other words the proximal interphalangeal joint (PIJ) is missing which can be seen either on x-rays or as an absence of the proximal interphalangeal finger creases.

column5: A less than normal number of sternal ossification centers. The sternum is initially formed from bilateral sternal plates that chondrify and begin to fuse with ribs at 10 weeks gestational age. Ossification starts in the manubrium and upper part of the sternal body at the 6th month, in the middle of the sternal body at the 7th month, in the lower part of the body during the 1st postnatal year and in the xiphoid process between years 5 and 18. The number of ossification centers vary up to six, and it is the ossification centers that are visualized by prenatal ultrasound. This term describes a reduction in the number of ossification centers compared with age-related norms.

column4: 灰质异位的一种形式是错位的灰质物质通常位于脑室周围，有时也被称为亚底膜异位症。脑室周围是指脑室旁边。这是迄今为止异位症最常见的地方。子宫内膜异位症存在着广泛的变异。可以有一个小的单节点或大量的节点，可以在脑的任一侧或两侧存在于沿着较高脑室边缘的任何点，可以是小的或大的，单个或多个，并且可以形成小节点或一个大的波浪或弯曲的质量。
column5: A form of gray matter heterotopia were the mislocalized gray matter is typically located periventricularly, also sometimes called subependymal heterotopia. Periventricular means beside the ventricles. This is by far the most common location for heterotopia. Subependymal heterotopia present in a wide array of variations. There can be a small single node or a large number of nodes, can exist on either or both sides of the brain at any point along the higher ventricle margins, can be small or large, single or multiple, and can form a small node or a large wavy or curved mass.

column4: 异常的体感诱发电位（SSEP），即躯体对特定刺激产生的传递到脑的电信号。记录电极放置在头皮、脊柱、和外周神经刺激部位的近端。临床研究一般采用外周神经电刺激引出电位波形。SSEP检测可以确定外周感觉神经是否能够向大脑传递感觉信息如疼痛、温度和触觉。SSEPs异常可定位于不同水平，如外周神经、神经丛、神经根、脊髓、脑干、丘脑皮层投射，或初级躯体感觉皮层。
column5: An abnormality of somatosensory evoked potentials (SSEP), i.e., of the electrical signals of sensation going from the body to the brain in response to a defined stimulus. Recording electrodes are placed over the scalp, spine, and peripheral nerves proximal to the stimulation site. Clinical studies generally use electrical stimulation of peripheral nerves to elicit potentials. SSEP testing determines whether peripheral sensory nerves are able to transmit sensory information like pain, temperature, and touch to the brain. Abnormal SSEPs can result from dysfunction at the level of the peripheral nerve, plexus, spinal root, spinal cord, brain stem, thalamocortical projections, or primary somatosensory cortex.

column4: 火棉胶样婴儿指新生儿皮肤表层附着类火胶棉样物质（称火胶棉层），这只是一个描述性术语（如综合征），而非特异性的诊断或疾病。患儿出生时皮肤呈光泽蜡质外观，出生后10-14天皮肤表层大面积角化过度并发生脱落，是该病的一个特征。随着生长，皮肤脱屑主要发生在关节周围区域，如腹股沟、腋窝、肘窝、颈部。鳞屑如瓦片状覆盖皮肤，似鱼鳞样外观。
column5: The term collodion baby applies to newborns who appear to have an extra layer of skin (known as a collodion membrane) that has a collodion-like quality. It is a descriptive term, not a specific diagnosis or disorder (as such, it is a syndrome). Affected babies are born in a collodion membrane, a shiny waxy outer layer to the skin. This is shed 10-14 days after birth, revealing the main symptom of the disease, extensive scaling of the skin caused by hyperkeratosis. With increasing age, the scaling tends to be concentrated around joints in areas such as the groin, the armpits, the inside of the elbow and the neck. The scales often tile the skin and may resemble fish scales.

column5: Hyperkeratosis lenticularis perstans (HLP), also known as Flegel disease, is a keratinization abnormality characterized by small, asymptomatic erythematous papules that leave characteristic punctate bleeding when they become detached. The lesions generally occur symmetrically along the top of the foot and on the legs, appearing more rarely on the arms, forearms, palms, and soles, and even on the oral mucosa.

column4: `凝血因子X`（PR:000007294）的活性下降。外源和内源途径在凝血因子X（FX）会合。外源性途径通过D- VII因子及其辅因子（组织因子）激活X因子。内源途径由活化的血小板的表面上的tenase复合物（Ca 2+和VIIIa，Ⅸa和X因子）的共同作用激活X因子。 Xa因子此后激活凝血酶原（II因子）生成凝血酶（IIa因子）。
column5: Reduced activity of `coagulation factor X` (PR:000007294). The extrinsic and intrinsic pathways converge at factor X (fX). The extrinsic pathway activates fX by means of d factor VII with its cofactor, tissue factor. The intrinsic pathway activates fX by means of the tenase complex (Ca2+ and factors VIIIa, IXa and X) on the surface of activated platelets. Factor Xa in turn activates prothrombin (factor II) to thrombin (factor IIa).

column4: 凝血细胞粘附的异常。通常在血管内皮下膜损伤数秒以内，血小板通过由糖蛋白Ⅰa和Ⅱa和GPVI构成的受体粘附于胶原蛋白，通过GPIb/ IX / V受体粘附于vWF因子。粘附的血小板然后释放颗粒，导致血小板激活和聚集。
column5: An abnormality of adhesion of thrombocytes. Normally, platelets adhere to collagen in the vascular subendothelium within seconds of injury via a receptor made up of glycoprotein Ia and IIa and GPVI and to vWF via receptor GPIb/IX/V. The adherent platelets then release granules that lead to platelet activation and aggregation.

column4: 搏动性耳鸣通常被分类为客观性耳鸣，意味着不仅是病人可听及耳鸣声音，检查者应用听诊管或听诊器对耳道和/或其周围结构进行听诊时亦可听及。搏动性耳鸣一般为低的重击声或者隆隆声，粗糙的与呼吸一致的吹风声，或者为较高音调的有节奏感的敲击声。搏动性耳鸣可能与血管异常相关，如动静脉分流、颈静脉球体瘤，高位颈动脉（近听觉区域）相关的动脉杂音或颈动脉狭窄，或静脉异常如颈静脉球开裂或高血压。最后，在一些患者中，机械异常如咽鼓管扩张、腭肌阵挛（软腭区域肌肉小痉挛）或特发性镫骨肌痉挛也可能是搏动性耳鸣的根本原因。
column5: Pulsatile tinnitus is generally classified a kind of objective tinnitus, meaning that it is not only audible to the patient but also to the examiner on auscultation of the auditory canal and/or of surrounding structures with use of an auscultation tube or stethoscope. Usually, pulsatile tinnitus is heard as a lower pitched thumping or booming, a rougher blowing sound which is coincidental with respiration, or as a clicking, higher pitched rhythmic sensation. Pulsatile tinnitus may be associated with vascular abnormalities such as arterioevenous shunts or glomus tumors or the jugular vein, arterial bruits related to a high-riding carotid artery (close to the auditory areas) or carotid stenosis, or venous abnormalities such as a dehiscent jugular bulb or to hypertension. Finally, in some patients, mechanical abnormalities such a spatulous eustachian tubes, palatomyoclonus (small spasms of muscles in the soft palate area), or idiopathic stapedial muscle spasm may represent the underlying cause of pulsatile tinnitus.

This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.

column2: Triangular shaped middle phalanx of the 5th finger

column4: 关节运动在第五手指的慢性丧失是由于非骨组织的结构变化。如果远端和/或近端指间关节受到影响则称为第五手指先天性指屈曲。

column2: Contracture of the distal interphalangeal joint of the 5th finger

column2: Contracture of the proximal interphalangeal joint of the 5th finger
column3: 小手指的近端指间关节挛缩
column4: 小指近端指间（PIP）屈曲畸形。即，小指的PIP关节弯曲（挠曲），不能主动或被动地拉直。因此由于肌肉，肌腱，韧带，或皮肤的结构变化阻遏正常运动，发生关节运动的慢性损失，。
column5: Proximal interphalangeal (PIP) flexion deformity of the little finger. That is, the PIP joint of a little finger is bent (flexed) and cannot be straightened actively or passively. It is thus a chronic loss of joint motion due to structural changes in muscle, tendons, ligaments, or skin that prevents normal movement.

column2: Contracture of the metacarpophalangeal joint of the 5th finger
column3: 小手指的掌指关节挛缩
column5: Chronic loss of joint motion of the metacarpophalangeal joint of the 5th finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue.

column2: Bracket epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger
column3: 小手指末节指骨支架样骨骺
column4: 骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。托架骨骺指其中骨骺围绕指骨，具有托架状形态，从指骨的近端侧延伸到远端侧。
column5: The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.

column2: Pseudoepiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger
column3: 第五手指末节指骨假骺
column5: A pseudoepiphysis is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis.

column3: 无名指近节指骨骨骺缺失
column4: 无名指的近节指骨近端骨骺缺失。
column5: Absence of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger.

column2: Bracket epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger
column3: 无名指的近节指骨括号型骨骺
column4: 骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。支架型骨骺指骨骺围绕指骨，具有支架样形态，从指骨的近端侧延伸到远端。
column5: The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.

column2: Cone-shaped epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger
column3: 无名指近节指骨的锥形骨骺
column4: 无名指的近节指骨无名指中节指骨具有锥形样骨骺，表现为“球-窝'样外观。骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常情况下表现为扁平状。与此相关的'天使形“骨骺是指骨远端出现明显的锥形骨骺合并假骨骺。
column5: A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the ring finger of the hand, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.

column2: Enlarged epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger
column3: 无名指近节指骨骨骺膨大
column4: 相对于年龄依赖性标准，第4手指的近节指骨的近端骨骺异常增大。
column5: Abnormally large size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger with respect to age-dependent norms.

column2: Fragmentation of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger
column3: 无名指近节指骨骨骺碎裂

column2: Ivory epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger

column4: 无名指的末节指骨骨骺硬化，导致X片上放射不透光程度增加（白色或象牙色外观）。

column2: Contracture of the distal interphalangeal joint of the 4th finger

column2: Contracture of the proximal interphalangeal joint of the 4th finger
column3: 无名指的近端指间关节挛缩
column4: 由于在非骨组织结构变化第四手指的近端指间关节的关节运动的慢性损失。即，第四手指的近端指指关节关节弯曲（屈曲），不能被主动或被动地伸直。由于肌肉，肌腱，韧带，或皮肤的结构变化导致关节运动的慢性损失，阻遏正常运动。
column5: Chronic loss of joint motion of the proximal interphalangeal joint of the 4th finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. That is, the PIP joint of a fourth finger is bent (flexed) and cannot be straightened actively or passively. It is thus a chronic loss of joint motion due to structural changes in muscle, tendons, ligaments, or skin that prevents normal movement.

column5: A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 3rd finger of the hand, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.

column4: 手指向尺侧偏斜（即远离拇指）。偏离发生在掌-指关节，它与指弯曲不同。

column5: Bending or curvature of a finger toward the radial side (i.e., towards the thumb). The deviation is at the metacarpal-phalangeal joint, and this finding is distinct from clinodactyly.

column5: Displacement of the 2nd finger towards the radial side.

column3: 手部或者手指桡侧偏斜

column4: 手的位置异常，其中腕部朝向桡侧（即朝向拇指）偏斜。
column5: An abnormal position of the hand in which the wrist is bent toward the radius (i.e., toward the thumb).

column4: 手的纵向轴线在腕部向轴后（尺骨，即朝向小指）方向偏斜。
column5: Divergence of the longitudinal axis of the hand at the wrist in a posterior (ulnar) direction (i.e., towards the little finger).

column4: 食指骨骺缺如。
column5: Absence of the epiphyses of the 2nd finger.

column4: 支架型骨骺指骨骺围绕指骨，具有支架样形态，从指骨的近端侧延伸到远端侧。
column5: Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds a phalangeal bone, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of a phalanx to the distal side.

column4: 食指具有锥形样骨骺，表现为“球-窝'样外观。骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常情况下表现为扁平状。与此相关的'天使形“骨骺是指骨远端明显的锥形骨骺合并假骨骺。
column5: A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphyses of the 2nd finger of the hand, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of a phalanx.

column4: 相对于年龄依赖性标准，第2指骨骺异常增大。
column5: Abnormally large size of the epiphyses of the 2nd finger with respect to age-dependent norms.

column2: Fragmentation of the epiphyses of the 2nd finger
column4: 第二个手指骨骺碎片样改变。
column5: Fragmented appearance of the epiphyses of the 2nd finger.

column4: 第二个手指骨骺放射图像不透明度不规则。
column5: Irregular radiographic opacity of the epiphyses of the 2nd finger.

column4: 食指骨骺硬化，导致X片上放射不透光程度增加（白色或象牙色外观）。
column5: Sclerosis of the epiphyses of the 2nd finger, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.

column4: 假骨骺是与正常骨骺截然不同的二次骨化中心。
column5: A pseudoepiphysis is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis.

column4: 相对于年龄依赖性标准，食指骨骺尺寸异常小。
column5: Abnormally small size of the epiphyses of the 2nd finger with respect to age-dependent norms.

column5: The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphyses of the 2nd finger.

column5: A triangular appearance of the epiphyses of the 2nd finger of the hand.

column5: The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.

column2: Cone-shaped epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger

column5: A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger of the hand, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.

column5: The hairline refers to the outline of `hair of the head` (FMA:54241). An abnormality of the hairline can refer to an unusually low or high border between areas of the scalp with and without hair or to abnormal projections of scalp hair.

column2: Complete duplication of proximal phalanx of the thumb

column4: 拇指近节指骨的完全重复。 X射线显示两个独立的指骨分别出现在两侧。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
column5: Complete duplication of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. On x-ray two separate bones appear side to side. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.

column4: 拇指的远端指骨的骨密度不均匀增加。
column5: An uneven increase in bone density of the distal phalanx of the thumb.

column2: Triangular shaped distal phalanx of the thumb
column4: 拇指末节指骨呈三角形。三角形指骨是支架骨骺累及指骨后的典型结果。
column5: Triangular shaped distal phalanx of the thumb. A triangular or so called delta shaped phalanx is a typical result after a bracket epiphysis of the affected phalanx.

column2: aplasia of the distal phalanx of the thumb
column4: 拇指远端/终端指骨缺如。
column5: Absence of the distal/terminal phalanx of the thumb.

column2: Short distal phalanx of the thumb
column4: `拇指远节指骨`不发育（短）（FMA:23945）。
column5: Hypoplastic (short) `distal phalanx of the thumb` (FMA:23945).

column4: 拇指的一个或多个指骨子弹形状是指短而宽逐渐向远端变细。子弹形指骨缺乏正常的骨干狭窄。
column5: An abnormal morphology of one or more phalanges of the thumb, with a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction.

column4: 拇指的末节指骨偏离正常直线分布。
column5: A deviation from the normal straight shape of a thumb phalanx.

column4: 拇指的一个或多个指骨骨骼组织的变性或者溶解。
column5: Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of one or more phalanges of the thumb.

column4: 一个或多个拇指的指骨的骨密度不均匀增加。
column5: An uneven increase in bone density of one or more of the phalanges of the thumb.

column4: 拇指指间关节先天性融合（强直）。
column5: Congenital fusion (ankylosis) of the interphalangeal joint of the thumb.

column4: 拇指的一个或多个指骨形状异常，使得受累的指骨类似于一个三角形。
column5: Abnormal shape of one or more phalanges of the thumb such that affected phalanges resemble a triangle.

column2: aplasia/Hypoplasia of the phalanges of the thumb
column3: 拇指指骨不发育或发育低下

column4: 拇指部分指骨段缺如。
column5: The absence of a phalangeal segment of a thumb.

column4: `拇指`发育不全（短）（FMA:35477）。
column5: Hypoplastic (short) `thumb phalanx` (FMA:35477).

column2: Abnormality of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb
column3: 拇指末节指骨骨骺异常
column4: 拇指末节指骨骨骺异常，其骨骺位于指骨的近端。
column5: Abnormality of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb. This epiphysis is located on the proximal end of the phalanx.

column2: Abnormality of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb
column3: 拇指近节指骨骨骺异常
column4: 本术语适用于拇指近节指骨骨骺在X光片上出现与性别和年龄依赖性标准不同的形态异常。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其他手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
column5: This term applies if the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb, which is located at the proximal end of the phalanx, does not appear in concordance with gender and age dependant norms as seen on x-rays. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.

column2: Absent epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb
column3: 拇指近节指骨骨骺缺失
column4: 拇指近节指骨的近端骨骺缺失。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学是源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
column5: Absence of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.

column2: Bracket epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb
column3: 拇指近节指骨括号型骨骺
column4: 骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。支架型骨骺指骨骺围绕指骨，具有支架样形态，从指骨的近端侧延伸到远端。
column5: The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.

column2: Cone-shaped epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb
column3: 拇指近节指骨的锥形骨骺
column4: 拇指中节指骨具有锥形样骨骺，表现为“球-窝'样外观。骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常情况下表现为扁平状。与此相关的'天使形“骨骺是指骨远端明显的锥形骨骺合并假骨骺。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学是源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
column5: A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the thumb of the hand, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.

column2: Enlarged epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb
column3: 拇指近节指骨骨骺膨大
column4: 相对于年龄依赖性标准，拇指的近节指骨的近端骨骺异常增大。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学是源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
column5: Abnormally large size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the proximal phalanx of the thumb with respect to age-dependent norms. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.

column2: Fragmentation of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb
column3: 拇指近节指骨骨骺碎裂
column4: 拇指近节指骨骨骺具有多个骨碎片。
column5: Epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb having multiple bony fragments.

column2: Irregular epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb
column3: 拇指近节指骨不规则骨骺
column4: 拇指近节指骨骨骺放射图像不透明度不规则。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学是源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
column5: Irregular radiographic opacity of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.

column2: Ivory epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb
column3: 拇指近节指骨乳白色骨骺
column4: 拇指近节指骨骨骺硬化，导致X片上放射不透光程度增加（白色或象牙色外观）。
column5: Sclerosis of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.

column2: Pseudoepiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb
column4: 拇指近节指骨假骨骺是二次骨化中心，跟正常骨骺不同。
column5: A pseudoepiphysis (which is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis) of the proximal phalanx of the thumb.

column2: Small epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb
column4: 相对于年龄依赖的骨骺的大小标准，拇指近端指骨的近侧相骨骺异常小。
column5: Abnormally small size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the proximal phalanx of the thumb with respect to age-dependent norms.

column2: Stippling of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb
column3: 拇指近节指骨骨骺点状钙化
column4: 拇指近节指骨骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学是源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
column5: The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.

column2: Triangular epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb
column3: 拇指近节指骨三角形骨骺
column4: 拇指近节指骨骨骺的呈三角外观。此骨骺位于指骨的近端，几乎是扁平的。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学是源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
column5: A triangular appearance of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb of the hand. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.

column2: Absent epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb
column3: 拇指末节指骨骨骺缺失
column4: 拇指末节指骨的近端骨骺缺失。
column5: Absence of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the thumb.

column5: The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.

column4: 拇指末节指骨锥形样骨骺，具有“球-窝'样。这样的骨骺位于指骨的近端，接近扁平。与此相联的'天使形“骨骺是指在指骨远端明显的锥形骨骺结合一个假骨骺。

The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.

column3: 拇指末节指骨骨骺膨大
column4: 相对于年龄依赖性标准，拇指近节指骨的近端骨骺异常增大。
column5: Abnormally large size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the thumb with respect to age-dependent norms.

column4: 拇指末节指骨骺硬化，导致X片上放射不透光程度增加（白色或象牙色外观）。

column4: 拇指远端指骨假骨骺是二次骨化中心，跟正常骨骺不同。
column5: A pseudoepiphysis (which is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis) of the distal phalanx of the thumb.

column4: 相对于年龄依赖性标准，位于拇指末节指骨的近端骨骺的尺寸异常小。
column5: Abnormally small size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the thumb with respect to age-dependent norms.

column3: 拇指末节指骨三角形骨骺

column5: Absence of one or more epiphyses of the thumb.

column4: 支架型骨骺指骨骺围绕指骨，具有支架样形态，从指骨的近端侧延伸到远端。
column5: Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds a phalangeal bone, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of a phalanx to the distal side.

column4: 拇指具有锥形样骨骺，表现为“球-窝'样外观。骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常情况下表现为扁平状。与此相关的'天使形“骨骺是指骨远端明显的锥形骨骺合并假骨骺。
column5: pearance of the epiphyses of the thumb, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of a phalanx.

column4: 相对于年龄依赖性标准，拇指骨骺异常增大。
column5: Abnormally large size of the epiphyses of the thumb with respect to age-dependent norms.

column5: Epiphysis of the thumb having multiple bony fragments.

column5: A pseudoepiphysis (which is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis) of one or more phalanges of the thumb.

column4: 相对于年龄依赖的标准，拇指的一个或数个指骨骨骺异常小。
column5: Abnormally small size of one or more of the epiphyses of the thumb with respect to age-dependent norms.

column4: 拇指一个或多个指骨骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。
column5: The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in one or more of the epiphyses of the thumb.

column2: Contracture of the distal interphalangeal joints of the fingers
column3: 手指的远端指间关节挛缩
column4: 由于非骨性组织结构性的改变导致手指远端跖趾关节关节功能慢性丧失。
column5: Chronic loss of joint motion in one or more distal interphalangeal joints of the fingers.

column2: Osteolytic defects of the hand bones
column3: 手部骨骼的溶骨性缺陷

column2: Synostosis involving bones of the fingers
column4: 手指的骨骼或部分骨骼之间的不正常连合。同义词“手关节粘连”可被译为不同程度的骨性融合，至少要累及手的一个指骨。如果将骨性融合称为“关节粘连”，融合应该发生在近-远轴。发生在桡-尺轴的手指骨头融合称为并指。
column5: An abnormal union between bones or parts of bones of the fingers. The synonymous term "symphalangism of the hand" may be translated as fusions of bones of varying digree, that involve at least one phalangeal bone of the hand. If bony fusions are revered to as "Symphalangism" the fusion occurs in a proximo-distal axis. Fusions of bones of the fingers in a radio-ulnar axis are refered to as "bony" Syndactyly.

column4: 涉及两个或两个以上掌骨融合（也可以观察到第一掌骨和拇指近节指骨的骨性融合，同时注意到第一掌骨与拇指近节指骨相对应）。
column5: Fusion involving two or more metacarpal bones (A synostosis of the first metacarpal and the proximal phalanx of the thumb can also be observed, note that the first metacarpal bone corresponds to a proximal phalanx).

column4: 骨性愈合（骨性融合）涉及一个或者多个腕骨（舟骨，月骨，三角骨，大多角骨，小多角骨，钩骨，头状骨，豆状骨）。
column5: Synostosis (bony fusion) involving one or more bones of the carpus (scaphoid, lunate, triquetrum, trapezium, trapezoid, capitate, hamate, pisiform).

column4: 第一掌骨与其他骨融合。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
column5: Fusion of the 1st metacarpal with another bone. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2 to 5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.

column3: 慢性脑脊液淋巴细胞增多
column4: 慢性脑脊髓液（CSF）淋巴细胞增多被定义为在至少两次连续的脑脊液检查中，每立方毫米细胞数多于5个。
column5: Chronic cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) lymphocytosis is defined as the finding, in at least two serial CSF examinations, of more than 5 cells per cubic millimeter.

column4: 脑脊液（CSF）中干扰素α的浓度升高。
column5: Increased concentration of interferon alpha in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF).

column4: 冻疮是肢端溃疡。
column5: Chilblains are acral ulcers.

column4: 视网膜血管母细胞瘤是视网膜良性血管瘤，没有任何瘤形成特性。他们被称为“视网膜血管瘤”和“视网膜血管瘤”，但血管母细胞瘤是首选的术语，因为它们在组织学上相同的病变在中枢神经系统中。
column5: Retinal hemangioblastoma is a benign vascular tumor of the retina without any neoplastic characteristics. They have been called "retinal angiomas" and "retinal hemangiomas" but hemangioblastoma is the preferred term since they are histologically identical to lesions found in the CNS.

column4: 位于`脊髓的（FMA:7647）:血管母细胞瘤（HP:0010797）。
column5: A 'hemangioblastoma` (HP:0010797) of the `spinal cord` (FMA:7647).

column4: 附睾的异常。
column5: An abnormality of the `epididymis` (FMA:18255).

column4: 附睾形成的乳头状囊腺瘤。
column5: The presence of a `papillary cystadenoma` (MPATH:298) of the `epididymis` (FMA:18255).

column4: 小结节性肿物发源于侧脑室室管膜下区并突入脑室腔。它们可能代表结节性硬化症的室管膜下错构瘤或灰质的结节样异位。
column5: Small nodular masses which originate in the subependymal region of the lateral ventricles and protrude into the ventricular cavity. They may represent subependymal hamartomas of tuberous sclerosis or nodular heterotopia of grey matter.

column4: 大脑皮质结节是错构瘤性病变，典型病灶位于灰白质交界区，通常位于额叶和顶叶。皮质结节由异常的神经胶质和神经细胞组成，不同患者中皮质结节的大小，数量，和位置差异很大。
column5: Cortical tubers in the brain are hamartomatous lesions typically located at the gray-white matter interface, commonly in the frontal and parietal lobes. Cortical tubers are composed of abnormal glial and neural cells, and the size, number, and location vary among patients.

column4: 色素脱失斑（“灰叶斑”）是由皮肤色素减退或脱失造成的白色或浅色的斑片，可发生于全身任何部位。灰白树叶形色素脱失斑是结节性硬化症的皮损特征。
column5: Hypomelanotic macules ("ash leaf spots") are white or lighter patches of skin that may appear anywhere on the body and are caused by a lack of melanin. White ash leaf-shaped macules are considered to be characteristic of tuberous sclerosis.

column4: 存在起源于皮肤皮脂分泌细胞的皮脂腺瘤

Shagreen patches are oval-shaped and nevoid, skin-colored or occasionally pigmented, smooth or crinkled, The word shagreen refers to a type of roughened untanned leather.

column5: Cholesteatoma is a benign but potentially destructive growth consisting of keratinizing epithelium located in the middle ear and/or mastoid process. In cholesteatoma, a skin cyst grows into the middle ear and mastoid. The cyst is not cancerous but can erode tissue and cause destruction of the ear.

column3: 手的近节指骨的斑片状硬化
column4: 手的近端指骨骨密度不均匀增加。
column5: Uneven increase in bone density of the proximal phalanges of the hand.

column2: Symphalangism affecting the proximal phalanges of the hand
column3: 手指的近节指关节粘连

column2: Triangular shaped proximal phalanges of the hand
Triangular shaped distal phalanges of the hand
Cerebellar ataxia associated with quadrupedal gait
column3: 小脑性共济失调与四足步态相关
column4: 出现小脑的症状和体征，如缺乏平衡与四足步态相关（所有四肢以“熊样”步态运动，腿部保持笔直）。
column5: The presence of cerebellar signs and symptoms such as lack of balance associated with quadrupedal gait (locomotion on all four extremities with a 'bear-like' gait with the legs held straight).

column4: 大脑皮层的脑回数目和复杂性异常减少。
column5: An abnormal reduction of the number and complexity of the pattern of gyrations of the cerebral cortex.

column2: Broad distal phalanges of all fingers
column3: 所有手指远端指骨变宽
column4: 所有手指的`手指远端指骨`（FMA:75818）宽度（宽）异常。
column5: Abnormally wide (broad) `distal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75818) of all fingers.

column2: aplasia of the distal phalanges of the hand

column4: 从手指的末端到最远端指间折痕或远端指间关节屈曲点的距离短。即 `一个或多个手指远节指骨`（FMA:75818）发育不全。
column5: Short distance from the end of the finger to the most distal interphalangeal crease or the distal interphalangeal joint flexion point. That is, hypoplasia of one or more of the `distal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75818).

column2: Duplication of the distal phalanx of hand
column4: 如果手的一个或多个远端指骨部分重复或完全重复，部分重复根据其严重性可以表现为宽的或裂成两半的外观。
column5: This term applies if one or more of the distal phalanges of the hand are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.

column3: 手指的远端指骨逐渐变小
column4: 手指末节指骨的直径向远端逐渐减小。
column5: A reduction in diameter of the `distal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75818) towards the distal end.

column4: 结节性脆发症是指沿着发干形成的容易断裂的节点。它是一种局限性毛发纤维性疾病，因某些增厚或者薄弱的结节部位较为容易折断，而表现出发育异常的脆发。
column5: Trichorrhexis nodosa is the formation of nodes along the hair shaft through which breakage readily occurs. It is thus a focal defect in the hair fiber that is characterized by thickening or weak points (nodes) that cause the hair to break off easily. The result is defective, abnormally fragile hair.

column4: 毛发色素颜色的异常。
column5: An abnormality of hair pigmentation (color).

column4: 第二性征毛发的异常生长，通常在青春期出现。男性第二性征毛发通常指体毛，包括腋下、腹部、胸部的体毛和阴毛。而女性，第二性征体毛的异常程度较轻，最显著的是腋下和阴毛。
column5: Abnormality of the growth of secondary sexual hair, which normally ensues during puberty. In males, secondary sexual hair usually comprises body hair, including underarm, abdominal, chest, and pubic hair. In females, secondary sexual hair usually comprises a lesser degree of body hair, most prominently underarm and pubic hair.

column4: 局部毛发异常增多。
column5: Abnormally increased hair growth with a localized distribution.

column4: 在中线处，发际线和眉间（上额骨上方鼻根的最突出点）之间的距离比平均值高两个标准差。也可以理解为发际线和眉间之间的距离显得较宽。
column5: Distance between the hairline (trichion) and the glabella (the most prominent point on the frontal bone above the root of the nose), in the midline, more than two SD above the mean. Alternatively, an apparently increased distance between the hairline and the glabella.

column4: 额骨眼眶上部扁平。
column5: Flatness of the supraorbital portion of the frontal bones.

column4: 耳结构完全缺失。
column5: Complete absence of any auricular structures.

column4: “耳”(FMA:52780)部“毛细血管扩张”(MPATH:476)。
column5: The presence of `telangiectasia` (MPATH:476) of the `ear` (FMA:52780).

column2: Abnormality of the crus of the helix
column4: 耳轮脚的一种异常，在外耳道水平软骨将耳朵分为上下两部。
column5: An abnormality of the `crus of the helix (FMA:61024), which is the horizontal piece of cartilage located outside the ear canal that divides the upper and lower parts of the ear.

column4: 对耳屏异常，是指耳朵上出现一个小的相反的耳屏结节。对耳屏和耳屏是由耳屏间切迹分隔开的。
column5: An abnormality of the antitragus, which is a small tubercle opposite to the tragus of the ear. The antitragus and the tragus are separated by the intertragic notch.

column4: “耳轮脚”(FMA:61024)呈异常的“横向位轴”(PATO:0001855)，即耳轮脚的主轴垂直于耳朵纵轴，不是倾斜于后下方。
column5: An abnormal `horizontal` (PATO:0001855) axis orientation of the `crus of the helix (FMA:61024). That is, the main axis of the crus of the helix is perpendicular to the medial longitudinal axis of the ear, instead of sloping inferoposteriorly.

column4: “耳轮脚”(FMA:61024)的发育不全，即，较平均水平而言，耳轮脚变平及/或变短。
column5: Developmental hypoplasia of the `crus of the helix (FMA:61024). That is, flatter and/or shorter crus helix than average.

column4: 耳轮脚（FMA:61024）存在异常突出（PATO:0001482），即耳轮脚的发育与对耳轮干或耳轮的平均程度相当。
column5: The presence of an abnormally `prominent` (PATO:0001482) of the `crus of the helix (FMA:61024). That is, development of the crus helix to the same degree as an average antihelix stem or helix.
A `unilateral` (PATO:0000634) `absence` (PATO:0000462) of `sensory perception of sound` (GO:0007605).

column4: 外耳皱褶走向的异常性扭曲及额外皱褶的出现。
column5: Distortion of the course of the normal folds of the ear and the appearance of supernumerary crura and folds.

column4: 具有“切迹”（PATO: 0001495）形态的“耳轮”(FMA:60992)。即耳轮在连续性上有缺失，可发生在耳轮全长中的任何一点上。
column5: A `notched` (PATO:0001495) form of the `helix` (FMA:60992) of the ear. That is, a defect in the continuity of the helix, which may occur at any point along its length.

column4: 眼睛结膜上发生的结节样变（FMA:59011）。
column5: Presence of nodules in the  `conjunctiva` (FMA:59011) of the eye.

column4: 耳轮异常突出。
column5: Abnormally prominent ear helix.
`Decreased thickness` (PATO:0000592) of the`helix` (FMA:60992) of the ear.

column4: 耳垂的缺如或发育不全。
column5: Absence or underdevelopment of the ear lobes.

column4: 耳垂的最低点与耳垂颜面交接处未形成向上弯曲。
column5: Attachment of the lobe to the side of the face at the lowest point of the lobe without curving upward.

column4: 在凹口耳垂的外表面边界清晰，典型的直线和近似水平线。
column5: Sharply demarcated, typically linear and approximately horizontal, indentations in the outer surface of the ear lobe.

column4: 耳垂走向异常性向外上方，使耳垂平面朝向发生改变。
column5: An abnormal orientation of the earlobes such that they point out- and upward. That is, the lateral surface of ear lobe faces superiorly.

column2: aplasia of the middle ear ossicles
column4: 中耳听小骨缺失，中耳听小骨指锤骨，砧骨，镫骨。，
column5: Absence of the middle ear ossicles, `malleus` (FMA:52753), `incus` (FMA:52752), and `stapes` (FMA:52751).

column4: 在`耳屏`上的异常（FMA: 60998）。
column5: An abnormality of the `tragus` (FMA:60998).

column4: 耳屏发育缺陷或进展性发育不良。
column5: `Aplasia` (MPATH:58) or developmental hypoplasia of the tragus.

column4: 独眼是只有一个眼睛的先天性异常。该眼位于正中通常由鼻根占据的区域。
column5: Cyclopia is a congenital abnormality in which there is only one eye. That eye is centrally placed in the area normally occupied by the root of the nose.

column4: 左侧和右侧角膜大小不一。
column5: The presence of a size difference between the left and right cornea.

column4: 瞳孔不等，或瞳孔大小不等，可以是一种良性的生理异形或是一种疾病的表现。
column5: Anisocoria, or unequal pupil size, may represent a benign physiologic variant or a manifestation of disease.
The presence of remnants of a fetal membrane that persist as strands of tissue crossing the pupil.
A malposition of the `pupil` (FMA:58252) owing to a developmental defect of the iris.

column4: 眼睛的视网膜细胞起源的肿瘤。
column5: A tumor of the eye originating from cells of the retina.

column3: 上腭部褐青色痣、眼皮肤黑素细胞增生病
column4: 呈面部一侧的色素性损害，可累及结膜、眼睑以及邻近的皮肤、巩膜、眼球运动肌和鼻口腔的粘膜，组织学特征表现各异，可同蒙古斑到蓝痣不等。
column5: A macular lesion on the side of the face, involving the conjunctiva and eyelids, as well as the adjacent facial skin, sclera, oculomotor muscles, and perisoteum. Histological features vary from those of a Mongoloian spot to those of a blue nevus.

column4: 杜安异常是一种遗传性眼球运动障碍，表现为眼球内收受限。当患者的眼睛内收时（向鼻子方向内移），眼球后缩及睑裂变窄。
column5: Duane anomaly is a congenital eye movement impairment with limitation of the ability to adduct or abduct the eye. When affected eyes are adducted (moved inwards towards the nose), the eyeball retracts and the palpebral fissure narrows.

column4: 玻璃体动脉持续存在，这是一个从视盘至晶状体后囊的胚胎期动脉，该动脉是眼动脉的分支，通常在出生前完全消退。出生后若存在该动脉，连接部位可能不透明。
column5: Persistence of the hyaloid artery, which is the embryonic artery that runs from the optic disk to the posterior lens capsule may persist; the site of attachment may form an opacity. The hyaloid artery is a branch of the ophthalmic artery, and usually regresses completely before birth.

column4: 发育不全或不存在的鼻子或其部分。
column5: Underdevelopment or absence of the nose or parts thereof.

column4: 泪液分泌异常增加，即过度流泪（浇水眼）。
column5: Abnormally increased lacrimation, that is, excessive tearing (watering eye).

column4: 完全没有全部鼻结构。
column5: Complete absence of all nasal structures.

column4: 鼻翼的体积明显增加。
column5: Increase in bulk of the ala nasi.

column4: 鼻小柱的异常。
column5: An abnormality of the `columella` (FMA:59725).

column4: 左和右鼻孔之间不对称或大小不同。
column5: Asymmetry or size difference between the left and right nostril.

column4: 鼻孔变大。
column5: Increased aperture of the `nostril` (FMA:59645).

column4: 只有一个单一的前鼻孔。
column5: The presence of only a single `nostril` (FMA:59645).

column4: 鼻孔开口细窄，像缝隙。
column5: Slender, slit-like aperture of the `nostril` (FMA:59645).

column4: 多于两个鼻孔的存在。
column5: The presence of more than two nostrils.

column3: 鼻中隔发育不全／未发育
column4: 没有或发育不全的鼻鼻中隔。
column5: Absence or underdevelopment of the nasal septum.

column4: 异常狭窄的鼻中隔。
column5: Abnormally narrow nasal septum.

column4: 面部毛发生长过多，超过正常生理范围。
column5: Excess facial hair.

column4: 颧骨和颌骨之间的软组织减少或缺失。
column5: Lack or loss of the soft tissues between the zygomata and mandible.

column4: 没有下颌骨。
column5: Absence of the mandible.

column4: 左右下颌骨之间缺乏对称性。
column5: Lack of symmetry between the left and right `mandible` (FMA:52748).

column4: 有一个不对称的嘴。
column5: The presence of an `asymmetric` (PATO:0000616) `mouth` (FMA:49184).

column4: 拇指末节指骨完全或部分重复。根据不同的严重程度，在X射线可表现为一个指骨分叉（重复的骨几乎与指骨融合），两个指骨的部分融合，或两个单独的骨骼分别出现在两侧，或者完全重复（近端和远端拇指指骨和/或第1掌骨）。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
column5: Complete or partial duplication of the phalanges of the thumb. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx), a partially fused appearance of the two bones (bifid), two separate bones appearing side to side, or completely duplicated phalanges (proximal and distal phalanx of the thumb and/or 1st metacarpal). In contrast to the phalanges of the digits 2-5 (proximal, middle and distal), the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.

column4: 拇指一个或以上指骨完全重复。相对于有不同融合程度的部分骨重复来说，完全重复指X-射线两边（桡尺轴）分别出现两个单独的重复骨。重复骨在X-线近-远端轴上表现为额外的骨头，完全是另一个整体，称为假骨骺，有时也称多指。
column5: A complete duplication affecting one or more of the phalanges of the thumb. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accesory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, this is actually a different entity called a Pseudoepiphyses (see according terms) sometimes also refered to as Hyperphalangism.

column4: 部分重复根据病情轻重，可能导致广泛或双裂外观，可影响拇指的一个或多个指骨。相对于完整重复来说，部分重复指骨可能存在不同程度的融合。
column5: A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the phalanges of the thumb. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.

column4: 该术语适用于一个或多个的食指指骨的部分重复或者完全重复，部分重复根据视病情轻重，导致广泛或双裂外观。
column5: This term applies if one or more of the phalanges of the 2nd finger are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.

column4: 食指近节指骨`的'部分或完全复制（FMA:23919）。
column5: Partial or complete duplication of the `second proximal phalanx of hand` (FMA:23919).

column4: `食指末节指骨`部分或全部重复(FMA:23946)。
column5: Partial or complete duplication of the `distal phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23946).

column4: 食指中节指骨`的'部分或全部重复(FMA:23933)。
column5: Partial or complete duplication of the `middle phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23933).

column4: `食指末节指骨`完全重复(FMA:23946)。
column5: Complete duplication of the `distal phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23946).

column5: Partial duplication of the `distal phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23946), seen on x-rays as a broad and/or bifid phalanx.

column5: Complete duplication of the `middle phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23933).

column2: Partial duplication of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger

column4: `第2指末节指骨`部分重复在X光片上显示为一个广泛和/或双裂指骨(FMA:23933)。
column5: Partial duplication of the `middle phalanx of index finger` (FMA:23933), seen on x-rays as a broad and/or bifid phalanx.
