column5: Complete duplication of the `Second proximal phalanx of hand` (FMA:23919).

column2: Partial duplication of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger
column3: 第2手指的近节指骨部分重复
column4: `第2指末节指骨`(FMA:23919)部分重复在X光片上显示为一个广泛和/或双裂指骨。
column5: Partial duplication of the `Second proximal phalanx of hand` (FMA:23919), seen on x-rays as a broad and/or bifid phalanx.

column2: Partial duplication of the phalanges of the 2nd finger
column3: 第2手指的指骨部分重复
column4: 第2手指的指骨部分重复，根据其严重性，导致宽的或双裂外观，影响一个第二手指的指骨或更多。相对于完整重复来说，部分重复指骨可能存在不同程度的融合。
column5: A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the phalanges of the 2nd finger. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.

column2: Complete duplication of the phalanges of the 2nd finger
column4: 完全重复影响一个或以上食指的指骨。相对于有不同融合程度的部分重复来说，完全重复在X-射线两边（桡尺轴）分别出现两个单独的重复骨。重复骨在X-线近-远端轴上表现为额外的骨头，完全是另一个整体，称为假骨骺，有时也称多指。
column5: A complete duplication affecting one or more of the phalanges of the 2nd finger. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accesory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, is a different entity called a Pseudoepiphyses (see according terms) sometimes also refered to as Hyperphalangism.

column4: 如果一个或多个中指指骨部分重复或完全重复，部分重复根据其严重性可以表现为宽的或双裂外观。
column5: This term applies if one or more of the phalanges of the 3rd finger are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.

column5: A complete duplication affecting one or more of the phalanges of the 3rd finger. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accesory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, this is actually a different entity called a Pseudoepiphyses (see according terms) sometimes also refered to as Hyperphalangism.

column5: Partial or complete duplication of the `distal phalanx of middle finger` (FMA:23947).

column5: Partial duplication of the `distal phalanx of middle finger` (FMA:23947), seen on x-rays as a broad and/or bifid phalanx.

column4: 手近端指骨完全重复影响一个或以上手近端指骨。相对于有不同融合程度的部分重复来说，完全重复在X-射线两边（桡尺轴）分别出现两个单独的重复骨。重复骨在X-线近-远端轴上表现为额外的骨头，完全是另一个整体，称为假骨骺，有时也称多指。

As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accesory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, this is actually a different entity called a Pseudoepiphyses (see according terms) sometimes also refered to as Hyperphalangism.

As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accessory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, this is actually a different entity called a pseudoepiphysis (see corresponding terms) sometimes also referred to as hyperphalangism.

column5: A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the proximal phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.

column4: 该术语适用于如果一个或多个手近端指骨部分重复或完全重复，部分重复根据其严重性可以表现为宽的或双裂外观。

column2: Duplication of the middle phalanx of hand

column5: This term applies if one or more of the middle phalanges of the hand are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.

column4: 第一掌骨的结构异常。
column5: A structural anomaly of the first metacarpal.

column4: 第二掌骨的结构或形态异常。
column5: Any abnormal structure or form of the second metacarpal bone.

column4: 第三掌骨的任何结构或形态异常。
column5: This term means any abnormal structure or form of the third metacarpal bone.

column4: 第四掌骨任何结构或形态异常。
column5: Any abnormal structure or form of the fourth metacarpal bone.

column4: 第五掌骨的任何结构或形态异常。
column5: Any abnormal structure or form of the firth metacarpal bone.

column2: Abnormality of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal
column4: 跟第2-5掌骨相比，第一掌胚胎学上来源于指骨，相当于第2-5手指的近端指骨（而拇指的近端指骨相当于其它手指的中间指骨）。第一掌骨骨骺位于掌骨近端（如同其它手指的近端指骨所见），而其他掌骨的骨骺位于远端。本术语适用于X光片上第一掌骨骨骺的任何形态异常，其形态标准因年龄和性别不同而异。
column5: In contrast to the metacarpals 2-5, the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5 (whereas the proximal phalanx of the thumb is equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits). The epiphysis of the first metacarpal is localized at the proximal end (as seen in the proximal phalanges of the other digits), whereas the epiphyses of the other metacarpal bones are located at the distal end. This term applies if the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal is in any way abnormal, referring to age and gender depending norms, as seen on x-rays.

column4: 骨骺曲线围绕指骨，从横向起始到沿着单侧从近端到远端的纵向围绕，类似字母“C”和形成围绕骨干的支架。形成delta指骨，以三角形或梯形形状的骨骼伴C形骺板为特征。
column5: An epiphysis that curves around from its transverse orientation to a longitudinal one from proximal to distal along one side of the phalanx, thus resembling the letter 'C' and forming a bracket around the diaphysis. This results in a so called delta phalanx characterized by a triangular or trapezoidal shaped bone with a C-shaped epiphyseal plate.

column4: 第一掌骨具有锥形样骨骺，表现为“球-窝'样外观。
column5: A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance.

column4: 相对于年龄依赖性标准，第一掌骨骨骺异常增大。
column5: Abnormally large size of the epiphyses of the 1st metacarpal with respect to age-dependent norms.

column2: Fragmentation of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal
column4: 第一掌骨骨骺具有多个骨碎片。
column5: Epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal having multiple bony fragments.

column4: 第1掌骨骨骺影像学不透明度不均匀。
column5: Uneven radiographic opacity of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal.

column4: 第1掌骨骨骺硬而致密，像象牙一样。这样的骨骺在X光片具有均匀高密度。
column5: The epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal are hard and dense like ivory. Such an epiphysis has a uniformly dense appearance on radiographs.

column4: 第一掌骨骨骺在掌骨的近端，尽管额外骨骺可能位于掌骨的远端。
column5: The epiphysis of the first metacarpal is localized at the proximal end of the metacarpal bone although an accessory epiphysis may be located at the distal end of the metacarpal.

column4: 相对于年龄依赖性标准，第一掌骨骨骺尺寸异常小。
column5: Abnormally small size of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal with respect to age-dependent norms.

column2: Epiphyseal stippling of the first metacarpal
column3: 第一掌骨骨骺点状钙化
column4: 第一掌骨骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。
column5: The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphyses of the `first metacarpal bone` (FMA:23899).

column3: 第一掌骨不发育或发育低下
column4: 第一掌骨发育或发育不全。跟第2-5掌骨相比，第一掌骨胚胎学上来源于指骨，相当于第2-5手指的近端指骨（而拇指的近端指骨相当于其它手指的中间指骨） 。
column5: Aplasia or Hypoplasia affecting the 1st metacarpal. In contrast to the metacarpals 2-5, the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5 (whereas the proximal phalanx of the thumb is equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits).

column4: 第一掌骨宽度增加。跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其他手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
column5: Increased width of the 1st metacarapal. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.

column4: 第一掌骨短而宽并逐渐向远端变小（“子弹形”）。
column5: The presence of short and wide 1st metacarpal which tapers distally ("bullet shaped").

column4: 第一掌骨偏离正常直线形分布。
column5: A deviation from the normal straight shape of the first metacarpal.

column4: 第一掌骨骨组织的退化或者溶解。
column5: Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the 1st metacarpal.

column4: 第一掌骨骨密度不均匀增加。
column5: Uneven increase in bone density within the 1st metacarpal.

column4: 第一掌骨呈三角形。
column5: This term applies to a triangular shaped 1st metacarpal.

column4: 跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其他手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。
column5: In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.

column4: 跟第2-5近端指骨相比，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其他手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨在胚胎学上源自于指骨，相当于其它手指的近节指骨。

column4: 跟第2-5跖骨相比，第一跖骨胚胎学上来源于趾骨，相当于第2-5趾指的近端趾骨，而拇趾的近端指骨相当于其它趾指的中间趾骨。本术语适用于第一跖骨的骨骺发育异常。
column5: In contrast to the metatarsals 2-5, the first metatarsal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, whereas the proximal phalanx of the big toe is equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits. This term applies to abnormalities of the epiphysis of the first metatarsal bone.

column5: One or more bent (flexed) joints of the first (big) toe that cannot be straightened actively or passively.

column2: Contracture of the tarsometatarsal joint of the hallux
column4: 拇趾的跖跗关节由于非骨组织结构变化的关节运动慢性损失。脚的跗跖关节也叫Lisfranc关节。
column5: Chronic loss of joint motion in the tarsometatarsal joint of the hallux due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. The tarsometatarsal joints of the feet are also called Lisfranc's joints.

column2: Contracture of the interphalangeal joint of the hallux
column4: 大脚趾的趾间关节不能主动或被动伸直。
column5: The interphalangeal joint of the big toe cannot be straightened actively or passively.

column2: Contractures of the metatarsophalangeal joint of the hallux
column4: 第一跖骨和第一（大）趾的近端指骨之间的关节不能被主动或被动地伸直。
column5: The joint between the first metatarsal and the proximal phalanx of the first (big) toe cannot be straightened actively or passively.

column4: 足部变畸形源自于某种影响了足的骨骼（以及肌肉和软组织）的异常。与此相反，如果仅是受肌肉和软组织影响，则使用足的位置性变形这个术语描述。
column5: A foot deformity resulting due to an abnormality affecting the bones of the foot (as well as muscle and soft tissue). In contrast if only the muscle and soft tissue are affected the term positional foot deformity applies.

column2: Abnormality of the epiphysis of the 2nd metacarpal
column4: 第二掌骨骨骺的任何异常。
column5: Any abnormality of the epiphysis of the second metacarpal bone.

column4: 第二掌骨的正常骨骺位于掌骨的前端。这一术语用于副骨骺（如果存在）位于掌骨近端时。
column5: The normal epiphysis of the second metacarpal is localised at the distal end of the metacarpal bone. This term aplies if an accesory epiphysis, located at the proximal end of the metacarpal bone, is present.

column2: Abnormality of the epiphysis of the 3rd metacarpal
column4: 第三掌骨骨骺的任何异常。
column5: Any abnormality of the epiphysis of the third metacarpal bone.

column4: 第三掌骨的正常骨骺位于掌骨的前端。这一术语用于副骨骺（如果存在）位于掌骨近端时。
column5: The normal epiphysis of the third metacarpal is localised at the distal end of the metacarpal bone. This term aplies if an accesory epiphysis, located at the proximal end of the metacarpal bone, is present.

column2: Abnormality of the epiphysis of the 4th metacarpal
column4: 第四掌骨骨骺的任何异常。
column5: Any abnormality of the epiphysis of the 4th metacarpal bone.

column4: 第四掌骨的正常骨骺位于掌骨的前端。这一术语用于副骨骺（如果存在）位于掌骨近端时。
column5: The normal epiphysis of the fourth metacarpal is localised at the distal end of the metacarpal bone. This term aplies if an accesory epiphysis, located at the proximal end of the metacarpal bone, is present.

column2: Abnormality of the epiphysis of the 5th metacarpal
column4: 第五掌骨骨骺的任何异常。
column5: Any abnormality of the epiphysis of the fifth metacarpal bone.

column4: 第五掌骨的正常骨骺位于掌骨的前端。这一术语用于副骨骺（如果存在）位于掌骨近端时。
column5: The normal epiphysis of the fifth metacarpal is localised at the distal end of the metacarpal bone. This term aplies if an accesory epiphysis, located at the proximal end of the metacarpal bone, is present.

column2: Absent epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand
column4: 一个或多个手指骨骺缺失。
column5: Absence of one or more epiphyses of the phalanges fingers.

column2: Bracket epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand
column4: 括号骨骺指其中骨骺包围指骨，具有括号状形态和一个指骨的近端侧延伸到前端侧的异常。
column5: Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds a phalangeal bone, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of a phalanx to the distal side.

column2: Cone-shaped epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand
column4: 手指骨骺呈锥形外观，产生一个“球窝'的外观。在相关的实体'天使形骨骺是指一种明显的锥形骨骺在指骨的前端结合一个假骨骺。
column5: A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphyses of the fingers of the hand, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. The related entity angel-shaped epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of a phalanx.

column2: Enlarged epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand
column4: 手指的指骨骨骺的相对于年龄相关的规范尺寸异常大。
column5: Abnormally large size of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the fingers with respect to age-dependent norms.

column2: Fragmentation of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand
column4: 手指指骨的骨骺呈零散外观。
column5: Fragmented appearance of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the fingers.

column2: Irregular epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand
column4: 手指的指骨的骨骺在放射线下呈现不透明性。
column5: Irregular radiographic opacity of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the fingers.

column2: Ivory epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand
column4: 手指指骨的骨骺硬化，导致X射线下不透性（白色或者象牙色外观）的程度增加。
column5: Sclerosis of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the fingers, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.

column2: Pseudoepiphyses of the phalanges of the hand
column4: 一个假骨骺是与正常骨骺截然不同的次级骨化中心。
column5: A pseudoepiphysis is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis.

column4: 相对于年龄依赖性的标准，手指的指骨的骨骺尺寸异常小。
column5: Abnormally small size of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the fingers with respect to age-dependent norms.

column4: 手指指骨骨骺存在点状异常（有斑点，斑点等）钙化。
column5: The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphyses of phalanges of the fingers.

column2: Triangular epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand

column4: 任何部位的口腔粘膜炎症。
column5: Stomatitis is an inflammation of the mucous membranes of any of the structures in the mouth.

column4: 下唇有间隙。
column5: A gap in the lower lip.

column4: 下唇中线唇红的高度小于平均值-2SD（标准差），或者，从正面看（主观），下唇唇红的高度明显变短。
column5: Height of the vermilion of the medial part of the lower lip more than 2 SD below the mean. Alternatively, an apparently reduced height of the vermilion of the lower lip in the frontal view (subjective).

column4: 在口腔黏膜处局部或普遍的色素沉着增加。
column5: Increased pigmentation, either focal or generalized, of the `mucosa of the mouth` (FMA:59660).

column4: 上下牙槽脊粘膜表面之间的纤维带。
column5: Fibrous band between the mucosal surfaces of the upper and lower alveolar ridges.

column4: 唾液腺的任何异常。唾液腺是产生唾液的外分泌腺。
column5: Any abnormality of the salivary glands, the exocrine glands that produce saliva.

column4: 颌下腺的任何异常。颌下腺是唾液腺，位于口腔底部，二腹肌之上。
column5: Any abnormality of the submandibular glands, which are the salivary glands that are located beneath the floor of the mouth, superior to the digastric muscles.

column4: 舌下腺的任何异常。舌下腺是唾液腺，位于口腔底部颌下腺前。
column5: Any abnormality of the sublingual glands, which are the salivary glands that are located beneath the floor of the mouth anterior to the submandibular glands.

column4: 某一牙槽嵴有间隙（裂）。
column5: A gap (cleft) affecting one of the alveolar ridges.

column4: 切牙至软硬腭相交处的距离缩短，小于平均值超过两个标准偏差（客观）；或硬腭长度显得缩短（主观）。
column5: Distance between the labial point of the incisive papilla to the midline junction of the hard and soft palate more than 2 SD below the mean (objective) or apparently decreased length of the hard palate (subjective).

column4: 上颌骨牙槽嵴两侧的软组织体积和/或数量增加。
column5: Increased size and/or number of soft tissue folds on the palatal side of the maxillary alveolar ridge.

column4: 缺少悬雍垂。
column5: Lack of the `uvula` (FMA:55022).

column3: 悬雍垂发育不全／未发育
column4: 没有或发育不全的悬雍垂。
column5: Underdevelopment or absence of the `uvula` (FMA:55022).

column4: 连接口腔和咽部区域经由软腭部分的瘘管。
column5: A fistula which connects the oral cavity and the pharyngeal area via the aspects of the soft palate.

column4: 没有或发育不全的舌头。
column5: Absence or underdevelopment of the `tongue` (FMA:54640).

column4: 舌下语言系带缩短或向前侧粘连，并伴有舌头活动受限。

column4: 舌中间表面有压痕或分叉。
column5: `Tongue` (FMA:54640) with a median apical indentation or fork.

column4: 整个舌头表面光滑。
column5: Glossy appearance of the entire tongue surface.

column4: 任何牙本质的异常。
column5: Any abnormality of `dentin` (FMA:55628).

column4: 异常低音调或者说低频率的嗓音。
column5: An abnormally low-pitched voice.

column4: 一组由胎儿早期神经管闭合不全导致的一组异质性的先天性脊柱畸形。
column5: A heterogeneous group of congenital spinal anomalies that result from defective closure of the neural tube early in fetal life.

column4: 一个影响脊髓（FMA:7647）的新生物`（MPATH:218）。

column5: Any abnormality of the spinal meninges, the system of membranes (dura mater, the arachnoid mater, and the pia mater) which envelops the spinal cord.

column4: 脊髓脊膜的外突。
column5: An outpouching of the spinal meninges.

column5: The congenital absence of the sternum.

column5: Accumulation of excessive amounts of lymphatic fluid (chyle) in the pleural cavity.

column4: 无乳房或乳房欠发达。
column5: Absence or underdevelopment of the breasts.

column4: 乳房过早发育。
column5: Premature development of the breasts.

column4: 埃布斯坦畸形是指三尖瓣的位置异常与变形，特征是间隔和后三尖瓣瓣膜小叶的心尖部位移，可导致右心室心房化伴不同程度的前叶变形与移位。
column5: Ebstein's anomaly refers to an abnormally placed and deformed tricuspid valve characterized by apical displacement of the septal and posterior tricuspid valve leaflets, leading to atrialization of the right ventricle with a variable degree of malformation and displacement of the anterior leaflet.

column4: 心脏室间隔的异常（FMA:7133）。
column5: An abnormality of the `interventricular septum` (FMA:7133).

column4: 多趾畸形具有多种形态，即多余的趾（可以是正常或者退化的趾）既可以是轴后位（足的腓骨侧，靠近小脚趾的顶端），轴前位（足的胫骨侧，靠近大脚趾）或者轴内位（中间的某处，在大脚趾和小脚趾之间）。与此不同，多余的趾也可以是异位的，即除了轴后、前、内位的其他位置。 在文献中被称为杂乱无章样综合征，即Disorganisation-like Syndrome（OMIM223200）。
column5: In contrast to forms of polydactyly where the supernumerary digit (this can either be a rudimentary or a completely 'normal' digit) is either located postaxial (on the fibular side of the foot, next top the little toe), preaxial (on the tibial side of the foot, next to the big toe) or mesoaxial (somewhere central, between big and little toe), a supernumerary digit may also be placed ectopically, meaning anywhere else except post-,meso- or preaxial. In the literature this is sometimes refered to as Disorganisation-like Syndrome (OMIM223200).

column4: 多指畸形具有多种形态，即多余的指（可以是正常或者退化的指）既可以是轴后位（手的尺侧，靠近小指），轴前位（手的桡侧，靠近大拇指）或者轴内位（中间的某处，在大拇指和小指之间）。与此不同，多余的指也可以是异位的，也就是说除了轴后、前、内位的其他位置。 在文献中被称为杂乱无章样综合征，即Disorganisation-like Syndrome（OMIM223200）。
column5: In contrast to forms of polydactyly where the supernumerary digit (this can either be a rudimentary or a completely 'normal' digit) is either located postaxial (on the ulnar side of the hand, next to the little finger), preaxial (on the radial side of the hand, next to the thumb) or mesoaxial (somewhere central, between thumb and little finger), a supernumerary digit may also be placed ectopically, meaning anywhere else except post-,meso- or preaxial. In the literature this is sometimes refered to as Disorganisation-like Syndrome (OMIM223200).

column4: 以存在多余的手指或脚趾为特征的先天性畸形。
column5: A congenital anomaly characterized by the presence of supernumerary fingers or toes.

column4: X射线上表现为股骨的骨裂或分叉形态（FMA:9611），可能出现大腿或多或少的严重弯曲，该表现可能与患侧髋关节发育不良有关。
column5: A bifid or bifurcated appearance of the `femur` (FMA:9611) as seen on x-rays, possible appearing as a more or less severe bowing of the upper leg. Might be associated with hip dysplasia on the affected side.

column4: 由于肺动脉瓣功能不全使得在心脏舒张期间血流逆行通过肺动脉瓣进入右心室。
column5: Backflow of blood from the pulmonary artery into the right ventricle,owing to imperfect functioning of the pulmonary valve.

column4: 由于在胚胎发育时期心内膜垫与第一房间隔或第二房间隔融合失败所导致的房室间隔缺损。
column5: Defects in the septum between the atria of the heart, due to failure of fusion between either the septum secundum or the septum primum and the endocardial cushions embryologic time.

column4: 心脏的三尖瓣口变狭窄。
column5: A narrowing of the orifice of the tricuspid valve of the heart.

column4: 肛管上皮表面和肛周皮肤之间的异常连接。
column5: An abnormal connection between the epithelialised surface of the anal canal and the perianal skin.

column4: 一种导致结肠腔完全消失的发育缺陷。即，结肠的管状结构有一个异常的闭合，或“闭锁”。
column5: A developmental defect resulting in complete obliteration of the lumen of the colon. That is, there is an abnormal closure, or `atresia` (PATO:0001819) of the tubular structure of the `colon` (FMA:14543).

column4: 食管腔的异常变窄。
column5: An abnormal narrowing of the lumen of the esophagus.

column4: 脾的缺失或发育不全。
column5: Absence or underdevelopment of the `spleen` (FMA:7196).

column4: 脾的一种异常（非解剖）定位。
column5: An abnormal (non-anatomic) location of the `spleen` (FMA:7196).

column4: 骨盆不对称是指对骨盆的两侧地标定位不对称，可能是结构或功能性的病因。
column5: Pelvic asymmetry refers to asymmetric positioning of landmarks on the two sides of the pelvis and may have a structural or functional etiology.

column4: 存在骨赘（骨刺），例如，起源于髋臼的骨的突出。
column5: The presence of osteophytes (bone spurs), i.e., of bony projections originating from the acetabulum.

column2: Abnormality of the greater sacrosciatic notch
column4: 坐骨的切迹异常，即在髋骨的后缘在髂骨和坐骨的联合点凹陷的异常。
column5: An abnormality of the sacrosciatic notch, i.e., the deep indentation in the posterior border of the hip bone at the point of union of the ilium and ischium.

column4: 坐骨大切迹宽度异常增大。
column5: Abnormally increased width of the greater sacrosciatic notch.

column4: 两性畸形是指性腺和外生殖器之间不吻合。女性假两性畸形指基因型是雌性（XX）和性腺是卵巢，但外生殖器男性化。
column5: Hermaphroditism refers to a discrepancy between the morphology of the gonads and that of the external genitalia. In female pseudohermaphroditism, the genotype is female (XX) and the gonads are ovaries, but the external genitalia are virilized.

column4: 在个体的同一侧或对侧性腺里同时存在卵巢和睾丸组织。受累个体外生殖器不能辨别性别，染色体核型可能为46,XX、46,XY或46,XX/XY嵌合体。
column5: The presence of both ovarian and testicular tissues either in the same or in opposite gonads. Affected persons have ambiguous genitalia and may have 46,XX or 46,XY karyotypes or 46,XX/XY mosaicism.

column4: 女性生殖系统的异常。
column5: Abnormality of the `female genital system` (FMA:45663).

column4: 男性生殖系统异常。
column5: Abnormality of the `male genital system` (FMA:45664).

column3: 卵巢发育不全/发育不良
column4: 卵巢发育不全或发育不良。
column5: `Aplasia` (MPATH:58) or developmental hypoplasia of the `ovary` (FMA:7209).

column4: 卵巢发育不全是指卵巢未发育。
column5: `Aplasia` (MPATH:58), that is failure to develop, of the `ovary` (FMA:7209).

column4: 一种发育缺陷病，其特点是在胚胎期卵巢发育过程中原始生殖细胞逐渐丢失，导致卵巢发育不全，只有断断续续的（wavy）结缔组织，偶尔有颗粒细胞团块，常常见到中肾或卵巢门细胞（间质细胞）。
column5: A developmental disorder characterized by the progressive loss of primordial germ cells in the developing ovaries of an embryo, leading to hypoplastic ovaries composed of wavy connective tissue with occasional clumps of granulosa cells, and frequently mesonephric or hilar cells.

column4: 女孩8岁之前开始青春期发育。
column5: The onset of puberty before the age of 8 years in girls.

column3: 睾丸发育不全/发育不良
column4: 睾丸发育不全或发育不良。
column5: Absence or underdevelopment of the testes.

column4: 无睾丸。
column5: Absence of the testes.

column4: 两个以上的睾丸。
column5: The presence of more than two testes.

column4: 的`oligosaccharides`（CHEBI:50699）增加尿中排泄量（至少三个单糖亚单位组成的低分子量的碳水化合物链），从糖蛋白的部分降解衍生。
column5: Increased urinary excretion of `oligosaccharides` (CHEBI:50699) (low molecular weight carbohydrate chains composed of at least three monosaccharide subunits), derived from a partial degradation of glycoproteins.

column2: Abnormality of the heme biosynthetic pathway
column3: 血红素生物合成途径异常
column4: 血红素的合成或降解的异常。血红素是由亚铁和原卟啉IX组成的,作为血红素蛋白,例如血红蛋白，肌红蛋白，线粒体和微粒体细胞色素的辅基成分,是一个重要的组分分子。
column5: An abnormality in the synthesis or catabolism of heme. Heme is composed of ferrous iron and protoporphyrin IX and is an essential molecule as the prosthetic group of hemeproteins such as hemoglobin, myoglobin, mitochondrial and microsomal cytochromes.

column4: 尿液中的:异常增加`porphyrins`（26214 CHEBI）的排泄。
column5: Abnormally increased excretion of `porphyrins` (CHEBI:26214) in the urine.

column4: 膀胱内矿物质累积形成结石。
column5: Buildups of minerals that form in the urinary bladder.

column4: 泄殖腔外翻是一种严重的前腹壁缺损，可见两个被中线肠板分开的半膀胱，脐膨出和肛门闭锁。
column5: Cloacal exstrophy is a severe anterior abdominal wall defect in which the two hemibladders are visible and are separated by a midline intestinal plate, an omphalocele, and an imperforate anus.

column3: 膀胱发育不全/发育不良
column4: 无膀胱或膀胱发育低下。
column5: Absence or underdevelopment of the `urinary bladder` (FMA:15900).

column4: 膀胱发育不全（无膀胱）。
column5: Aplasia (absence) of the `urinary bladder` (FMA:15900).

column4: 脐尿管异常。
column5: Abnormality of the `urachus` (FMA:70343).

column4: 脐膀胱通道持续性遗存，在膀胱和肚脐之间存在一个通道。
column5: Persistence of the urachal canal resulting in a canal between the bladder and the umbilicus.

column4: 尿道与另一个器官或皮肤之间存在的异常通道。
column5: The presence of an abnormal connection between the urethra and another organ or the skin.

column4: 尿道内形成异常膜阻碍尿流。
column5: The presence of an abnormal membrane obstructing the `urethra` (FMA:19667).

column4: 相对上段和中段，肢体的缩短显著地影响了肢体的末端部。
column5: Shortening of the arms predominantly affecting terminal parts of the arm in relation to the upper and middle limb segments.

column4: 羊膜收缩环影响的怀抱。
column5: Amniotic constriction rings affecting the arms.

column4: 上肢的大小（由于细胞大小的增加）异常增加。
column5: Abnormal increase in size of the upper limbs (due to an increase of the size of cells).

column4: 肘关节的运动能力超越正常范围。
column5: The ability of the elbow joint to move beyond its normal range of motion.

column4: 小鱼际的异常，即手掌尺侧（在小指一侧）肌肉的异常。
column5: An abnormality of the `hypothenar eminence`(FMA:61523), i.e., of the muscles on the ulnar side of the palm of the hand (i.e., on the side of the little finger).

column4: 手掌尺侧肌肉量减少，也就是小鱼际小。
column5: Reduced muscle mass on the ulnar side of the palm, that is, reduction in size of the `hypothenar eminence`(FMA:61523).

column4: 手掌掌纹的缺如或者发育不全。
column5: Absence or underdevelopment of the palmar creases.

column4: 手掌的主要掌纹的缺如（远端横向折痕，近端横向折缝，或鱼际折痕）。
column5: The absence of the major creases of the palm (distal transverse crease, proximal transverse crease, or thenar crease).

column4: 手掌侧的皮肤皱褶的异常。
column5: An abnormality of the creases of the `skin of palm of hand` (FMA:38301).

column4: 羊膜缠绕胎儿手指、足趾，由羊膜带引起的局部缩窄环。
column5: A narrow segment of significantly reduced circumference of a digit.

column4: 织带或融合性手指，涉及柔软组织和指骨的融合。如果融合位于桡尺轴线的骨性融合被称为并指畸形，如果融合位于近端到远端轴线上，称为指关节粘连。
column5: Webbing or fusion of the fingers, involving soft parts and including fusion of individual finger bones. Bony fusions are revered to as "bony" Syndactyly if the fusion occurs in a radio-ulnar axis. Fusions of bones of the fingers in a proximo-distal axis are refered to as "Symphalangism".

column4: 掌骨长度的异常增加。
column5: An abnormally increased length of the metacarpal bones.

column4: 相对上段和中段，肢体的缩短显著地影响了腿的末端部。
column5: Shortening of the legs predominantly affecting terminal parts of the leg in relation to the upper and middle arm segments.

column4: 羊膜收缩环的影响腿部。
column5: Amniotic constriction rings affecting the legs.

column4: 下肢大小（由于细胞大小增加）异常升高。
column5: Abnormal increase in size of the lower limbs (due to an increase of the size of cells).

column3: 美人鱼综合症（并腿畸形）
column4: 一种以腿融合在一起为特征的发育缺陷。
column5: A developmental defect in which the legs are fused together.

column4: 髌骨的两半未能在儿童早期融合导致的一种发育缺陷。
column5: A developmental defect that occurs if the two halves of the patella fail to fuse in early childhood.

column4: 膝盖骨通常位于股骨远端的滑车沟内，并且可以在其内进行上下滑动。髌骨半脱位是指不能处于沟内正中滑动的不稳定膝盖骨，即髌骨的半脱位。
column5: The kneecap normally is located within the groove termed trochlea on the distal femur and can slide up and down in it. Patellar subluxation refers to an unstable kneecap that does not slide centrally within its groove, i.e., a partial dislocation of the patella.

column4: 膝关节的活动能力超过了正常的运动范围。
column5: The ability of the knee joint to move beyond its normal range of motion.

column4: 膝关节运动异常受限。
column5: An abnormal limitation of knee joint mobility.

column4: 腓骨弯曲或存在异常曲度。
column5: A bending or abnormal curvature of the `fibula` (FMA:24479).

column4: 腓骨重复。这可能是复足畸胎的一部分（多余的跗骨或跖骨）。 有双腓骨的复足畸胎是极为罕见的。
column5: Duplication of the fibula. This may occur as a part of diplopodia (accessory tarsal or metatarsal bone). Diplopodia with double fibula is an extremely rare condition.

column4: 胫骨长度的异常增加。
column5: An abnormal increase in the length of the tibia.

column4: 踝关节的移动性异常受限。
column5: An abnormal limitation of the mobility of the ankle joint.

column4: 脚趾和跖部的异常皮纹，例如，跖部皮肤的皮脊图案的异常。
column5: An abnormality of dermatoglyphs on the toes and soles, i.e., an abnormality of the patterns of ridges of the `skin of sole of foot` (FMA:37849).

column4: 在左和右脚之间尺寸或形状的差异。
column5: A difference in size or shape between the left and right foot.

column4: 脚的前段处于外旋状态，且偏离身体的中线，而足跟仍然呈直线状态的一种情况。
column5: A condition in which the anterior part of the foot rotates outward away from the midline of the body and the heel remains straight.

column4: 跗骨的缺如。
column5: Absence of the tarsal bones.

column4: 趾关节的活动能力超越其正常的运动范围。
column5: An ability of the toe joints to move beyond their normal range of motion.

column4: 出现与脚不成比例的过长的足趾。
column5: Digits that appear disproportionately long compared to the foot.

column4: 肾上腺内的钙化
column5: Calcification within the `adrenal glands` (FMA:9604).

column4: 脑垂体的钙盐沉积。
column5: Deposition of calcium salts in the pituitary gland.

column4: 一种或多种垂体激素分泌过多。这可能由于靶器官缺陷导致激素反馈减少，或者是由垂体腺瘤引起的垂体原发性病症。
column5: Hypersecretion of one or more pituitary hormones. This can occur in conditions in which deficiency in the target organ leads to decreased hormonal feedback, or as a primary condition most usually in connection with a pituitary adenoma.

column4: 胸腺不发育、发育缺陷或不全（FMA:9607）。
column5: Absence or underdevelopment of the "thymus" (FMA:9607).

column4: 胸腺的增生肿大（FMA:9607）。
column5: Enlargement of the "thymus" (FMA:9607).

The presence of ectopic "thymus" (FMA:9607) tissue. Normally, cells of the ventral bud of the third pharyngeal pouch detach and migrate in the eighth gestational week caudally and medially towards the location of the mature thyroid. They migrate further retrosternally into the superior mediastinum. There are two main ways ectopic thymus tissue can develop. Either cells detach along the descensus path and proliferate, thereby forming accessory thymus tissue, or the entire gland fails to descend.

column4: 一种甲状腺（HP:0000820）的异常，由于甲状舌管不闭合导致的囊肿引起的。
column5: An "abnormality of the thyroid gland" (HP:0000820) owing to the presence of a fibrous "cyst" (MPATH:62) resulting from the persistence of the "thyroglossal duct" (FMA:77274).

column4: 胎动次数或强度异常增加。
column5: An abnormal increase in quantity or strength of fetal movements.

column4: 步态失用指指挥腿行走的能力受损。
column5: Gait apraxia affecting the ability to make walking movements with the legs.

column4: 学习障碍的一种类型，主要表现为阅读和拼写困难。失读症的儿童还存在从右向左阅读单词的倾向，比如b和d的正确识别取决于阅读方向。并且可能存在音位能力受损（将视觉符号和其所代表的声音联系起来的能力）。
column5: A learning disorder characterized primarily by difficulties in learning to read and spell. Dyslectic children also exhibit a tendency to read words from right to left and to confuse letters such as b and d whose orientation is important for their identification. Children with dyslexia appear to be impaired in phonemic skills (the ability to associate visual symbols with the sounds they represent).

column4: 获得性的感觉性失语的一种类型，由于大脑的损伤导致了阅读能力的丧失。
column5: An acquired type of sensory aphasia where damage to the brain leads to the loss of the ability to read.

column4: 没有认识物体、对象的能力，这种能力缺乏不是由于感觉障碍，而是因为无法把感官印象的组件组合成一个完整的模式。因此，失认是一种神经源性的没有能力理解、命名、识别、以及从视觉、听觉或触觉印象提取其意义的状态。
column5: Inability to recognize objects not because of sensory deficit but because of the inability to combine components of sensory impressions into a complete pattern. Thus, agnosia is a neurological condition which results in an inability to know, to name, to identify, and to extract meaning from visual, auditory, or tactile impressions.

column4: 对自己或他人的手指辨别不能或困难。
column5: An inability or difficulty differentiating among the fingers of either hand as well as the hands of others.

column4: 双上肢无运动或感觉障碍时，存在的与阅读能力不匹配的书写困难，且与智力无关。
column5: A writing disability in the absence of motor or sensory deficits of the upper extremities, resulting in an impairment in the ability to write regardless of the ability to read and not due to intellectual impairment.

column4: 在没有视觉输入的情况下不能通过触摸识别物体的形式。也就是说，在没有任何主要的体感缺陷情况下，仅基于物体的纹理、尺寸、重量和三维形状对物体的识别能力的损害。
column5: Inability to recognize the form of objects by touch without visual input. That is, an impairment in the recognition of objects based only on based on the texture, size, weight and three-dimensional form of the object in the absence of any major somatosensory deficit.

column4: 不能识别家人的面孔。
column5: Inability to recognize faces of familair persons.

column4: 有重复他人发声的倾向。
column5: The tendency to repeat vocalizations made by another person.

column4: 腭肌阵挛的特点是软腭的肌阵挛（节奏不自主跳动）动作。
column5: Palatal myoclonus is characterized by myoclonic (rhythmic involuntary jerky) movements of the soft palate.

column4: 脊肌阵挛通常是由于一个肿瘤，感染，损伤，或脊髓变性过程，其特征是节律不自主的肌肉收缩，通常在一个以上的每秒的速率。同步发生肌阵挛在几个肌肉和所用的严重程度和频率由疲劳或应力增加，但通常是不受感官刺激。睡眠或麻醉期间脊髓性肌阵挛停止。
column5: Spinal myoclonus is generally due to a tumor, infection, injury, or degenerative process of the spinal cord, and is characterized by involuntary rhythmic muscle contractions, usually at a rate of more than one per second. Myoclonus occurs synchronously in several muscles and can be increased in severity and frequency by fatigue or stress, but is usually unaffected by sensory stimuli. Spinal myoclonus ceases during sleep or anesthesia.
Paroxysmal episodes of vertigo.
The combination of pendular nystagmus, head nodding, and torticollis.

column4: 一种阵发性、短暂性记忆功能丧失，即时回忆和远期记忆保存，但是近事记忆和储存新信息的能力严重受损。
column5: A paroxysmal, transient loss of memory function with preservation of immediate recall and remote memory but with a severe impairment of memory for recent events and ability to retain new information.

column4: 睡眠时口鼻气流间歇性停止。呼吸暂停10秒以上的被认为是重要的，但睡眠呼吸暂停的人呼吸暂停可以有20秒以上甚至达到2或3分钟。患者每小时睡眠可能有高达15次呼吸暂停事件。
column5: An intermittent cessation of airflow at the mouth and nose during sleep. Apneas of at least 10 seconds are considered important, but persons with sleep apnea may have apneas of 20 seconds to up to 2 or 3 minutes. Patients may have up to 15 events per hour of sleep.

column4: 是由于控制呼吸通气肌肉的大脑中枢短暂功能失调导致的睡眠呼吸暂停。
column5: Sleep apnea resulting from a transient abolition of the central drive to the ventilatory muscles.

column4: 颅缝的距离增大，考虑到年龄-相关等因素（通常由颅缝延迟闭合所引起）。
column5: An abnormally increased width of the cranial sutures for age-related norms (generally resulting from delayed closure).

column4: 异常小的蝶鞍。
column5: An abnormally small sella turcica.

column4: 颅骨异常的薄。
column5: The presence of an abnormally thin calvarium.

column4: 气化程度比同龄正常值增加。
column5: A degree of pneumatization that is increased compared to age-related norms.

column4: 由于头皮增厚而形成的类似大脑沟回的复杂褶皱和回纹。头皮表现为复杂和升高的折叠，厚度为1〜2厘米。复杂折叠通常不能被牵引拉平。
column5: The presence of convoluted folds and furrows formed from thickened skin of the `scalp` (FMA:46494), resembling cerebriform pattern. The scalp has convoluted and elevated folds, 1 to 2 cm in thickness. The convolutions generally cannot be flattened by traction.

column4: 眼球震颤由于前庭系统的干扰;眼球运动的节奏，用慢速和快速的组件。
column5: Nystagmus due to disturbance of the vestibular system; eye movements are rhythmic, with slow and fast components.

column4: 自发的，无节奏的，多方位的，混乱的眼神动作，呈现躁动的外观。可能出现不同方向和不同幅度的共轭眼球运动。
column5: Spontaneous, non-rhythmic, multi-directional, chaotic movements of the eyes, giving the appearance of agitation. There may be bursts of conjugate movement of the eyes in varying directions and of varying amplitude.

column4: 垂直眼球震颤可出现向上跳动或向下跳动或两者兼有的眼球运动。当出现在凝视的正前方位置它被称为向上震颤或向下眼球震颤。
column5: Vertical nystagmus may present with either up-beating or down-beating eye movements or both. When present in the straight-ahead position of gaze it is referred to as upbeat nystagmus or downbeat nystagmus.

column4: 下击型眼球震颤是指向下方的快相跳动的眼球震颤。向侧面看、向下看或躺下时症状加重。
column5: Downbeat nystagmus is a type of fixation nystagmus with the fast phase beating in a downward direction. It generally increases when looking to the side and down and when lying prone.

column4: 不会引起肌肉动作的单个肌纤维精细的、快速的抽动。如果一个运动神经元或轴突被损害，则它支配的肌纤维会出现去神经萎缩。
column5: Fine, rapid twitching of individual muscle fibers with little or no movement of the muscle as a whole. If a motor neuron or its axon is destroyed, the muscle fibers it innervates undergo denervation atrophy. This leads to hypersensitivity of individual muscle fibers to acetyl choline so that they may contract spontaneously. Isolated activity of individual muscle fibers is generally so fine it cannot be seen through the intact skin, although it can be recorded as a short-duration spike in the EMG.

column4: 一种肌肉麻痹，表现为肌肉柔软松弛无法被动伸展，是由于部分或全部的支配肌肉的外周运动神经功能丧失所致。在丧失神经支配的数月内会出现肌张力减退和受累肌肉严重萎缩。
column5: A type of paralysis in which a muscle becomes soft and yields to passive stretching, which results from loss of all or practically all peripheral motor nerves that innervated the muscle. Muscle tone is reduced and the affected muscles undergo extreme atrophy within months of the loss of innervation.

column4: 敲击肌肉时局限性强直性收缩反应（用检查者的手指、橡胶锤或类似的对象敲击）。
column5: A localized myotonic contraction in a muscle in reaction to percussion (tapping with the examiner's finger, a rubber percussion hammer, or a similar object).

column2: Weakness due to upper motor neuron dysfunction
column3: 上运动神经元功能障碍导致的无力
column4: 自主肌肉的麻痹意味着由于从脑到肌肉纤维的一个或多个运动途径的中断而导致的收缩丧失。尽管词语“瘫痪”通常意味着完全或部分丧失肌肉力量，但对于全部或严重丧失肌肉力量的患者，常用“麻痹”描述，对肌肉力量轻微损失的患者，常用“局部麻痹”描述。主要运动区病变引起的麻痹与皮质脊髓，皮质支原体或脑干下降（下皮质脊髓）神经元中的病变有关。
column5: Paralysis of voluntary muscles means loss of contraction due to interruption of one or more motor pathways from the brain to the muscle fibers. Although the word paralysis is often used interchangeably to mean either complete or partial loss of muscle strength, it is preferable to use paralysis or plegia for complete or severe loss of muscle strength, and paresis for partial or slight loss. Paralysis due to lesions of the principle motor tracts is related to a lesion in the corticospinal, corticobulbar or brainstem descending (subcorticospinal) neurons.

column4: 双下肢严重或完全瘫痪，上肢保留
column5: Severe or complete weakness of both lower extremities with sparing of the upper extremities.

column4: 上肢保留的双下肢严重或完全瘫痪为截瘫而力量相对保留的为轻瘫。
column5: Weakness of both lower extremities with sparing of the upper extremities. Paraplegia refers to a severe or complete loss of strength, whereas paraparesis refers to a relatively mild loss of strength.

column4: 眼睑痉挛，眶周抽搐，和长期固定注视的一种急性肌张力障碍，可能伴有持续的眼球最大向上运动的偏差。动眼神经危象可被很多种因素包括镇静药物所诱发。
column5: An acute dystonic reaction with blepharospasm, periorbital twitches, and protracted fixed staring episodes. There may be a maximal upward deviation of the eyes in the sustained fashion. Oculogyric crisis can be triggered by a number of factors including neuroleptic medications.

column4: 在两个手指之间的前后轴线上，软组织的连续性从远端向近端延伸，至少延伸到指间关节水平上；或在两个手指之间的前后轴线上，软组织的连续性从远端向相邻手指的掌指关节的屈褶纹延伸。
column5: A soft tissue continuity in the A/P axis between two fingers that extends distally to at least the level of the proximal interphalangeal joints, or a soft tissue continuity in the A/P axis between two fingers that lies significantly distal to the flexion crease that overlies the metacarpophalangeal joint of the adjacent fingers.

column4: 当手处于静止状态时，一个手指处在相邻位手指的背侧面。
column5: A finger resting on the dorsal surface of an adjacent digit when the hand is at rest.

column4: 斜坡的异常。斜坡指位于蝶鞍和枕骨大孔的后颅窝的倾斜骨区域。
column5: An abnormality of the clivus, which is the inclined bony region of the posterior cranial fossa located between the sella turcica and the foramen magnum.

column4: 斜坡（通常从蝶鞍倾斜至枕骨大孔区）异常垂直。
column5: An abnormal vertical orientation of the clivus (which normally forms a kind of slope from the sella turcica down to the region of the foramen magnum).

column4: 锁骨表面或边缘异常起伏。
column5: An abnormally wavy surface or edge of the clavicles.

column4: 肋骨表面或边缘异常起伏。
column5: An abnormally wavy surface or edge of the ribs.

column4: 瘢痕疙瘩可单发或多发，具有高出皮面、形状不规则、持续增生等特点，是皮肤在结缔组织修复过程中，真皮层胶原蛋白过度合成所致。
column5: Presence of one or more keloids. A keloid is a sharply elevated, irregularly shaped, progressively enlarging scar resulting from formation of excessive amounts of collagen in the dermis during connective tissue repair.

column4: `会厌`（55130 FMA）沿中线前后裂开累及至少前三分之二的会厌叶。这个定义对于临床诊断非常有帮助，因为它似乎在比帕里斯特-霍尔综合征中非常罕见，即使是作为一个孤立的畸形也非常罕见。
column5: A midline anterior-posterior cleft of the `epiglottis` (FMA:55130) that involves at least two-thirds of the epiglottic leaf. It is a useful feature for clinical diagnosis because it appears to be very rare in syndromes other than Pallister-Hall-Syndrome and is also rare as an isolated malformation.

column4: 本术语指会厌缺失或发育不全。
column5: This term applies if the Epiglottis is absent or hypoplastic.

column4: 错构瘤是'起源于器官的正常成熟组织的无序增殖，例如，外生骨疣，痣和软组织错构瘤。虽然大多数错构瘤是良性的，但一些组织学亚型的错构瘤，如神经肌肉的错构瘤、间充质囊性错构瘤、硬化性上皮错构瘤、硬化性肾错构瘤，可产生侵袭性增殖。
column5: A disordered proliferation of mature tissues that is native to the site of origin - eg, exostoses, nevi and soft tissue hamartomas. Although most hamartomas are benign, some histologic subtypes - eg, neuromuscular hamartoma, may proliferate aggressively such as mesenchymal cystic hamartoma, Sclerosing epithelial hamartoma, Sclerosing metanephric hamartoma.

column4: Y形跖骨是两个跖骨近端部分融合的结果，Y的两臂指向远端。 Y形跖骨可以与多趾伴随出现。
column5: Y-shaped metatarsals are the result of a partial fusion of two metatarsal bones, with the two arms of the Y pointing in the distal direction. Y-shaped metatarsals may be seen in combination with polydactyly.

column4: 错构瘤（成熟组织的无序增殖），它可以从眼睛中的任何组织起源。
column5: A hamartoma (disordered proliferation of mature tissues) which can originate from any tissue of the eye.

column4: 高架`7 dehydrocholesterol`（CHEBI:17759）的水平。
column5: Elevated `7-dehydrocholesterol` (CHEBI:17759) levels.

column3: 母体血清甲胎蛋白浓度降低
column4: 与相同胎龄的正常值相比，异常降低的母体血清甲胎蛋白浓度。
column5: An abnormally low concentration of serum alpha-fetoprotein as compared to normal values for gestational-age.

column4: 的'植烷acid`的异常升高（CHEBI:16285）。
column5: An abnormal elevation of `phytanic acid` (CHEBI:16285).

column2: Abnormality of the epiphysis of the femoral head
column4: 股骨近端骨骺的任何异常。
column5: Any abnormality of the `proximal epiphysis of the femur` (FMA:32841).

column4: 股骨头存在发育不良。
column5: The presence of `developmental dysplasia` (MPATH:64) of the `femoral head` (FMA:32851).

column4: 起源于脑内的囊性病灶。
column5: A cystic lesion originating within the brain.

column4: 锥形骨骺（也称为锥骨骺）是内陷成杯状的干骺端。即，具有锥形远端延伸的骨骺，是相对于其周边骨骺的中心部分的增生的结果。
column5: Cone-shaped epiphyses (also known as coned epiphyses) are epiphyses that invaginate into cupped metaphyses. That is, the epiphysis has a cone-shaped distal extension resulting from increased growth of the central portion of the epiphysis relative to its periphery.

column4: 骨骺尺寸增大。
column5: Increased size of epiphyses.

column4: 导致通常轮廓光滑的骨骺的不规则外观的改变。
column5: An alteration of the normally smooth contour of the epiphysis leading to an irregular appearance.

column5: Sclerosis of the epiphyses, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.

column4: 2型肌纤维的异常优势（在一般情况下，该特征只能在肌肉活组织检查观察到）。
column5: An abnormal predominance of type II muscle fibers (in general, this feature can only be observed on muscle biopsy).

column4: 良性的单或多囊性的牙源骨内肿瘤，其特征为有类角化的复层鳞状上皮作衬里，且具有攻击性浸润性举动的潜力。
column5: A benign uni- or multicystic, intraosseous tumor of odontogenic origin, with a characteristic lining of parakeratinized stratified squamous epithelium and potential for aggressive, infiltrative behaviour.

column4: 由睑板腺堵塞发炎引起的慢性睑板腺上皮样细胞肉芽肿性炎症。 睑板腺囊肿也称霰粒肿，主要表现为上眼睑无痛性肿胀结节伴睫毛不脱落。
column5: A chronic epithelioid cell granulomatous inflammation of the meibomian gland caused by inflammation of a blocked meibomian gland. A chalazion or meibomian cyst appears as a painless tuberous swelling in the upper lid without loss of eyelashes.

column4: 在睫毛根部的蔡斯氏皮脂腺、莫尔氏大汗腺或睑板皮脂腺的急性化脓性感染，常常由金黄色葡萄球菌感染引起。麦粒肿既可以是影响蔡斯氏皮脂腺或莫尔氏大汗腺的外麦粒肿，也可以是影响睑板皮脂腺的内麦粒肿。相对于霰粒肿而言，麦粒肿极其疼痛且可造成局部极度肿胀。
column5: An acute purulent infection of the sebaceous glands of Zeis at the base of the eyelashes, of the apocrine sweat glands of Moll or the meibomian sebacious glands often caused by staphylococcus infections. Hordeola can either occur as Hordeola externa affecting the sebaceous glands of Zeis or the apocrine sweat glands of Moll or as Hordeola interna affecting the meibomian sebacious glands. In contrast to chalazia, hordeola are extremely painful and can cause extreme local swelling.

column4: 外麦粒肿是影响蔡斯氏皮脂腺或莫尔氏大汗腺的急性化脓性感染，常由金黄色葡萄球菌感染引起。相对于霰粒肿而言，麦粒肿极其疼痛且可造成局部极度肿胀。
column5: Hordeola externa are acute purulent infections affecting the sebaceous glands of Zeis or the apocrine sweat glands of Moll, often caused by staphylococcus infections. In contrast to chalazia, hordeola are extremely painful and can cause extreme local swelling.

column4: 内麦粒肿是影响睑板皮脂腺的急性化脓性感染，常由金黄色葡萄球菌感染引起。相对于霰粒肿（引起堵塞睑板腺发炎的睑板腺慢性上皮样细胞肉芽肿性炎症）而言，麦粒肿极其疼痛且可造成局部极度肿胀。
column5: Hordeola interna are acute purulent infections affecting the meibomian sebacious glands, often caused by staphylococcus infections. In contrast to chalazia (chronic epithelioid cell granulomatous inflammation of the meibomian gland caused by inflammation of a blocked meibomian gland), hordeola are extremely painfull and can cause extreme local swelling.

column4: 皮赘也被称为软垂疣或纤维上皮息肉，是较小的良性肿瘤，可继发于颈部、腋窝或腹股沟等易形成褶皱的部位，也可于出生就存在，通常发生于耳廓周围。
column5: Cutaneous skin tags also known as acrochorda or fibroepithelial polyps are small benign tumours that may either form secondarily over time primarily in areas where the skin forms creases, such as the neck, armpit or groin or may also be present at birth, in which case they usually occur in the periauricular region.

column4: 存在于足底皮肤的许多凹点（位于皮肤表面、针尖样大小的凹点）。
column5: The presence of multiple pits (small, pinpoint-large indentations on the surface of the skin) located on the `skin of sole of foot` (FMA:37849).

column4: 由纤维或结缔组织构成的良性肿瘤。它们是间质组织来源，可发生于机体的任何器官，术语“成纤维细胞”或“纤维瘤”用以描述纤维结缔组织肿瘤。通常 纤维瘤 一词指良性肿瘤，而纤维肉瘤一词是指恶性肿瘤。
column5: Benign tumors that are composed of fibrous or connective tissue. They can grow in all organs, arising from mesenchyme tissue. The term "fibroblastic" or "fibromatous" is used to describe tumors of the fibrous connective tissue. When the term fibroma is used without modifier, it is usually considered benign, with the term fibrosarcoma reserved for malignant tumors.

column4: 血管纤维瘤由许多扩张的血管组成。
column5: Angiofibroma consist of many often dilated vessels.

column4: 肺纤维瘤为一种良性的肿瘤，可表现为大块病变引起气道阻塞、咳嗽、咯血或没有症状的孤立性肺结节。
column5: The presence of a lung fibroma, a benign neoplasm that can present as a mass causing airway obstruction, cough, and hemoptysis, or present without symptoms as a solitary pulmonary nodule.

column4: 心脏中形成的纤维瘤（FMA:7088）。
column5: A `fibroma` (MPATH:407) of the `heart` (FMA:7088).

column4: 卵巢中存在纤维瘤。
column5: The presence of a `fibroma` (MPATH:407) of the `ovary` (FMA:7209).

column4: 发生在乳房（FMA:9601）的纤维瘤（MPATH：407）。
column5: The presence of a `fibroma` (MPATH:407) of the `breast` (FMA:9601).

column4: 上颌骨和眼眶下区形成的颧骨突出，通过侧面和正面可以识别。
column5: Prominence of the malar process of the maxilla and infraorbital area appreciated in profile and from in front of the face.

column4: 在两个相邻脚趾之间的前后轴线上，软组织的连续性从远端向近端延伸，至少延伸到指间关节水平上；或者不满足先前客观条件评价标准、存在于两个脚趾之间前后轴线上的软组织连续性。
column5: A soft tissue continuity in the anteroposterior axis between adjacent foot digits that involves at least half of the proximodistal length of one of the two involved digits; or, a soft tissue continuity in the A/P axis between two digits of the foot that does not meet the prior objective criteria.

column4: 原发于`骨骼`良性或恶性`新生物`(MPATH:218)（肿瘤）（FMA:23875）。
column5: A benign or malignant `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) (tumour) originating in the `skeleton` (FMA:23875).

column4: 趾甲发育不全或者不发育。
column5: Absence or underdevelopment of the `toenail`(FMA:54328).

column4: 垂体前叶发育不全。
column5: Underdevelopment of the anterior pituitary gland.

column4: 面部神经麻痹是第VII颅神经（面神经）的机能障碍，可导致受累侧的面部肌肉无法控制，并伴有面部表情与闭眼肌肉无力。可出现在单侧或双侧。
column5: Facial nerve palsy is a dysfunction of cranial nerve VII (the facial nerve) that results in inability to control facial muscles on the affected side with weakness of the muscles of facial expression and eye closure. This can either be present in unilateral or bilateral form.

column4: 无法检测任何嗅觉。

column4: 无法感知某些气味物质（意味着保持对其他种类气味物质的嗅觉）。
column5: Inability to perceive certain odorants (implies that the sense of smell is maintained for other classes of odorants).

column4: 嗅觉定性功能减退。

column5: Reduced ability to perceive certain odorants (implies that the sense of smell is maintained for other classes of odorants).

column5: The presence of a cleft in the cerebral cortex unilaterally or bilaterally, usually located in the frontal area.

column4: 结膜上发生的淀粉样变性（HP:0011034）`（FMA:59011）。

column5: An abnormal degree of flatness of the `Ala of nose` (FMA:59519), which can be defined as a reduced nasal elevation index (lateral depth of the nose from the tip of the nose to the insertion of the nasal ala in the cheek x 100 divided by the side-to-side breadth of the nasal alae).

column5: An abnormality of the `Meninges` (FMA:231572), including any abnormality of the `Dura mater` (FMA:9592), the `Arachnoid mater` (FMA:9591), and the `Pia mater` (FMA:9590).

column4: 在`硬膜`的异常（FMA:9592）。

column5: The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in one or more epiphyses (FMA:24012).

column5: An abnormal formation and mineralization of an`epiphysis.

column2: Patchy reduction of bone mineral density
column4: 骨密度片状（不规则）增加。这可能根据X射线上其严重性和分布许多形式而呈现多种形式。
column5: Patchy (irregular) reduction in bone density. This can take on many forms depending on severity and distribution as can be seen on x-rays.

column2: Patchy changes of bone mineral density
column4: 骨密度片状（不规则）的变化。这些变化可以是X射线下的片状减少或矿物质密度的增加。根据不同的病理机制和潜在的疾病，这些减少或增加的变化可以出现单独出现或合并出现（一些骨表现出密度增加，而其他骨密度降低）。
column5: Patchy (irregular) changes in bone mineral density. These changes can either be patchy reduction or increase of mineral density as seen on x-rays. Depending on the pathomechanism and the underlying disease, these changes can either appear solely as reduction or increase or as a combination of both (patches of bone showing an increased density while others are affected by reduction of mineral density).

column2: Patchy variation in bone mineral density
column4: 骨密度斑块状改变，骨的密度增加，伴有密度下降的片状区域。这有时被称为X射线下的虫蚀样外观。
column5: Patchy (irregular) changes in bone mineral density with patches of bone showing an increased density side to side with patches that are affected by reduction of mineral density. This is sometimes referred to as a moth-eaten appearance on x-rays.

column4: 手骨的骨形成和矿化异常。
column5: An abnormal formation and mineralization of any bone of the`skeleton of hand.

column5: A developmental defect characterized by the absence of the `Third ventricle` (FMA:78454).

column5: An abnormality of the `Diencephalon` (FMA:62001), which together with the cerebrum (telencephalon) makes up the forebrain.

column4: 在`丘脑`的异常（FMA:62007）。
column5: An abnormality of the `thalamus` (FMA:62007).

The presence of bilateral `coxa_valga` (HP:0002673).
