column3: 胎盘内碱性磷酸酶偏低
column4: （:000003969 PRO）在血液的`碱性磷酸酶，胎盘type`异常降低的水平。
column5: An abnormally reduced level of `alkaline phosphatase, placental type` (PRO:000003969) in the blood.

column4: 一只手或脚有多于五个的指或趾，在前后轴线上对称。轴线可以位于正常形成或者部分重复的、类似于中指，食指，拇指，脚趾，或者大脚趾的指或趾内。或者轴线位于一对类似于一个中指，食指，拇指，脚趾或大脚趾的指间或趾间内。在手上的每一侧的最外侧的趾通常类似于第五手指/脚趾。
column5: A hand or foot with more than five digits that has a recognizable A/P axis of symmetry. The axis can lie within a normally formed or partially duplicated digit resembling a middle finger, index finger, thumb, toe, or hallux. Alternatively, the axis can be in an interdigital space with a flanking pair of digits that resemble a middle finger, index finger, thumb, toe or hallux. The most lateral digits on each side of the hand typically resemble fifth fingers/toes.

column4: 仅累及手的镜像重复多指（HP:0010689）。
column5: `Mirror image duplication of digits` (HP:0010689) affecting the hands only.

column4: 累及脚的镜像多趾（HP:0010689）。
column5: `Mirror image duplication of digits` (HP:0010689) affecting the feet.

column4: 食指至小指融合型并指。
column5: 2-5 toe syndactyly means the fusion of 2nd to 5th finger.

column4: 先天性白内障（HP:0000519）的一种，其特征为晶状体胎儿核点状混浊，并且通常发生在双侧。
column5: A kind of `congenital cataract` (HP:0000519) that is characterized by a hollow sphere of punctate opacities involving the fetal nucleus and that usually occurs bilaterally.

column4: 白内障的一种（HP:0007971），晶体中有粉状（点状，“粉尘状”浑浊）的浑浊。
column5: A `Lamellar cataract` (HP:0007971) with a pulverulent (punctate, "dust-like" opacities) appearance.

column4: 先天性白内障的一种（HP:0000519），晶体的浑浊位于前缝或后缝。
column5: A type of `congenital cataract` (HP:0000519) in which the opacity follows the anterior or posterior Y suture.

column4: 先天性白内障`（HP:0000519）的一种，其中混浊主要累及晶状体前极或后极的囊下皮质。
column5: A type of `Congenital cataract` (HP:0000519) in which the opacities occupy the subcapsular cortex at the anterior or posterior pole of the lens.

column4: 前极性白内障的一种`（HP:0001134），晶体前表面呈圆锥形凸入前房。
column5: A type of `anterior polar cataract` (HP:0001134) which projects as a conical opacity into the anterior chamber.

column4: 核性白内障的一种，涉及胚胎和胎儿晶状体核的先天性粉尘样圆盘状的混浊。
column5: A type of `nuclear cataract` (HP:0008024) involving congenital pulverulent disc-like opacity of the embryonal and fetal nucleus.
A `nuclear cataract` (HP:0008024) with a triangular form.

column4: 先天性白内障`（HP:0000519）的一种，其特征为晶状体所有纤维的浑浊。
column5: A `Congenital cataract` (HP:0000519) characterized by an opacity of all the fibers of a lens.

column4: 血液中免疫球蛋白含量异常。
column5: An abnormal deviation from normal levels of immunoglobulins in blood.

column4: 丙种球蛋白（免疫球蛋白）在血液中的水平增加。
column5: An increased level of gamma globulin (immunoglobulin) in the blood.

column3: 第一至第二指并指畸形
column4: 第一至第二指融合形成并指畸形
column5: Syndactyly with fusion of fingers one and two.

column4: 无名指与小手指融合型并指。
column5: 4-5 finger syndactyly means the fusion of 4th and 5th finger.

column4: 拇指至中指融合型并指。
column5: 1-3 finger syndactyly means the fusion of 1st to 3rd finger.

column4: `第一至四手指融合型并指。
column5: `1-4 finger syndactyly means the fusion of 1st to 4th finger.

column4: `全部手指融合型并指（所有手指完全并指）。
column5: 1-5 finger syndactyly means the fusion of 1st to 5th finger (complete syndactyly of all fingers of the hand).

column4: 第二至四手指融合型并指。
column5: 2-4 finger syndactyly means the fusion of 2nd to 4th finger.

column4: 中指至小手指融合型并指。
column5: 3-5 finger syndactyly means the fusion of 3rd to 5th finger.

column4: `第一、二脚趾融合型并趾。
column5: 1-2 finger syndactyly means the fusion of 1st to 2nd finger

column4: `第一至四脚趾融合型并趾。
column5: 1-4 toe syndactyly means the fusion of 1st to 4th finger.

column4: 全部脚趾融合型并趾（所有脚趾完全并趾）。
column5: 1-5 toe syndactyly means the fusion of 1st to 5th toe (complete syndactyly of all toes of the foot).

column4: 第二至四脚趾融合型并趾。
column5: 2-4 toe syndactyly means the fusion of 2nd to 4th toe.

column4: 第二至五脚趾融合型并趾。
column5: 2-5 toe syndactyly means the fusion of 2nd to 5th toe.

column3: 第三至第五脚趾指畸形
column4: 第三至五脚趾融合型并趾。
column5: 3-5 toe syndactyly means the fusion of 3rd to 5th toe.

column4: 脚趾间的蹼或融合，仅涉及软组织或也包括骨结构。如果融合发生在胫腓骨轴线，骨性融合被称为“骨”性并趾。脚趾在近-远轴的骨头融合称为“关节粘连”。
column5: Webbing or fusion of the toes, involving soft parts and including fusion of individual bones of the toes. Bony fusions are revered to as "bony" Syndactyly if the fusion occurs in a tibial-fibular axis. Fusions of bones of the toes in a proximo-distal axis are referred to as "Symphalangism".

column4: 毛发质地的异常。
column5: An abnormality of the texture of the `hair` (FMA:53667).

column4: 毛发生长呈异常分布。
column5: An abnormality of the distribution of hair growth.

column4: 毛发异常螺纹（一部分毛发向其余部分的相反方向生长）。
column5: An abnormal hair whorl (that is, a patch of hair growing in the opposite direction of the rest of the hair).

column4: 耳朵`不对称`（PATO: 0000616），即左右耳（FMA: 52780）在大小或形态上存在差异。
column5: An `asymmetriy` (PATO:0000616), i.e., difference in size or shape between the left and right `ear` (FMA:52780 ).

column2: Advanced pneumatization of the mastoid process
column4: 乳突气化（形成气室）的程度异常，比同龄正常值增加。
column5: An abnormally advanced degree of pneumatization (i.e., formation of air cells) in the `mastoid process` (FMA:52872) with respect to age-dependent norms.

column4: 角膜神经纤维的异常突出。
column5: Abnormal prominence of the corneal nerve fibers.

column4: 不是外伤导致的眼球破裂。
column5: Rupture of the eyeball not due to trauma.

column4: 发育缺陷的一种，其特征为视网膜（FMA:58301）缺失。
column5: A developmental defect characterized by absence of the `retina` (FMA:58301).

column2: Cherry red spot of the macula
column4: 苍白的视网膜与黄斑区相对红的圆形区。
column5: Pallor of the perifoveal macula of the retina with appearance of a small circular reddish choroid shape as seen through the fovea centralis due to relative transparancy of the macula.

column4: 这可以表现为部分或全部眉毛的重复出现。
column5: This may present as a partial or complete duplication of the eyebrows.

column2: Extension of eyebrows towards upper eyelid
column4: 眉毛伸向，甚至一直覆盖到上眼睑的边缘。
column5: The eyebrows extend towards - or even all the way down to - the margin of the upper eyelid.

column4: 眼睑的结节样改变可能有很多不同的原因，如囊性病变（霰粒肿，麦粒肿）、脂肪肉芽肿、黑素瘤以及感染性疾病（如传染性软疣）等。
column5: Nodular changes affecting the eyelids may have many different causes such as cystic lesions (chalaziae, hordeolae), lipogranulomas, melanomas, infectious diseases (Molluscum contagiosum) and many more.

column4: 位于眼睑皮上的“鲜红斑痣”（HP:0001052）。
column5: `Naevus flammeus` (HP:0001052) localised in the skin of the eyelid.

column4: 瘤样生长包括更换髓骨纤维组织，造成骨所涉及的领域的扩大和弱化。特别是涉及颅骨或面部骨骼时，病变可引起外部可见的畸形。颅骨通常（但不绝对）受影响的，任何其它的骨也可能设计。纤维异常增殖症可以影响孤立的骨骼（单骨纤维结构发育异常），而且也泛指全身（多骨纤维性发育异常）的所有骨骼。
column5: Tumor-like growths that consist of replacement of the medullary bone with fibrous tissue, causing the expansion and weakening of the areas of bone involved. Especially when involving the skull or facial bones, the lesions can cause externally visible deformities. The skull is often, but not necessarily, affected, and any other bone or bones may be involved. Fibrous dysplasia can either effect isolated bones (Monostotic fibrous dysplasia) or also generalized all bones of the body (Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia).

column4: 病变累及全身多块骨头的`纤维性骨发育不良`（HP:0010734）。多骨纤维异常增殖症是McCune - Albright综合征的一个重要特征。
column5: `Fibrous dysplasia of the bones` (HP:0010734) were lesions are localized in many bones throughout of the body. Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia is a cardinal feature of McCune-Albright syndrome.

column4: 病变局限在一块骨`纤维性骨发育不良`（HP:0010734）。
column5: `Fibrous dysplasia of the bones` (HP:0010734) were lesions are localized in only one bone.

column4: 骨斑点症是良性的，无症状的骨硬化发育不良。它影响男性和女性，可见于任何年龄。 放射影响可见硬化圆形或卵圆形病灶，通常对称地分布在关节周围的位置。病变可以在一系列X光片中增加或减少甚至消失，无放射性摄取增加。
column5: Osteopoikilosis is a benign, asymptomatic sclerotic dysplasia of the bones. It affects both male and female and may be seen at any age. Radiographically sclerotic circular or ovoid lesions are usually symmetrically distributed in a periarticular location. Lesions can increase or decrease in size and number in serial radiographs or even disappear and do not have increased bone radiotracer uptake.

column4: 在X光片上可见层状结构，主要位于长管状骨的干骺端。病理解剖研究显示，这些在X射线上的良性征象是青少年干骺端骨坏死导致的。坏死骨髓中的钙化导致这种层状或格子状的外观出现。
column5: A lamellar pattern visible on radiographs and mainly localized at the metaphyses of the long tubular bones. Pathologic-anatomical studies revealed that these benign signs on x-rays are the result of a juvenile metaphyseal bone necrosis. Calcifications in the necrotic marrow lead to this lamellar or lattice-like appearance.

column4: 腿部皮肤下的液体异常的聚积。
column5: An abnormal accumulation of fluid beneath the skin of the legs.

column4: 手臂皮肤下液体的异常聚积。
column5: An abnormal accumulation of fluid beneath the skin of the arms.

column4: 跖骨长度的减少（FMA:24492），相关脚趾近端取代的结果。
column5: Diminished length of a `metatarsal bone`(FMA:24492), with resultant proximal displacement of the associated toe.

column4: 以跖骨缺失（发育不全）为特征的一种发育缺陷（FMA:24492）。
column5: A developmental abnormality characterized by the absence (aplasia) of a `metatarsal bone` (FMA:24492).

column2: aplasia of the phalanges of the toes
column4: 脚趾的一个或多个趾的缺如。
column5: Absence of a digit or of one or more phalanges of a toe.

column2: Hypoplasia of the phalanges of the toes

column4: 眉毛中部异常生长分布。
column5: An abnormal distribution of eyebrow hair growth in the medial direction.

column4: 泪点在眼睑的位置发生异常。
column5: Positioning of a lacrimal punctum other than at the medial margins of the eyelid.

column4: 眼皮松弛的特征是复发性、非疼痛、非红肿的眼睑水肿发作。它被分成肥厚型和萎缩型。肥厚型反复水肿导致眼眶脂肪疝压迫穿透弱化的眶隔。大多数萎缩型眼皮松弛患者有萎缩的冗余眼睑皮肤和上鼻脂肪垫。
column5: Blepharochalasis is characterized by recurrent, non-painful, nonerythematous episodes of eyelid edema. It has been divided into hypertrophic and atrophic forms. In the hypertrophic form recurrent edema results in orbital fat herniation through a weakened orbital septum. Most patients who have blepharochalasis present in an atrophic condition with atrophy of redundant eyelid skin and superior nasal fat pads.

column4: 上下眼睑缺乏弹性，进而导致皮肤下垂和隆起。
column5: Loss of elasticity of the upper and lower eyelids causing the skin to sag and bulge.

column4: 长期存在位于下巴中线脂肪垫上皮肤的凹陷。
column5: A persistent midline depression of the skin over the fat pad of the `chin` (FMA:46495).

column4: 下颌骨及部分或全部覆盖组织的在中线不足
column5: Midline deficiency of the mandible and some or all overlying tissues.

column4: 颞下颌关节的异常
column5: An anomaly of the `temporomandibular joint` (FMA:54832).

column4: 上颌骨的左右部分之间的不对称性。
column5: Asymmetry between the left and right portions of the maxilla.

column4: 前颌骨未发育或发育不全
column5: Absence or underdevelopment of the `premaxilla` (FMA:76869).

column4: 前颌骨（形成上颌骨前部的胚胎结构）缺如
column5: Absence of the `Premaxilla` (FMA:76869), which is the embryonic structure that forms the anterior part of the maxilla.

column4: 前颌骨的异常
column5: An abnormality of the `premaxilla` (FMA:76869).

column4: 前颌骨突出
column5: Prominent aspect of the `premaxilla` (FMA:76869).

column4: 一个脚趾的发育不全（FMA:25046）。也就是说，非大拇趾趾骨及相关软组织的缺如。
column5: Aplasia of a `toe` (FMA:25046). That is, absence of all phalanges of a non-hallux digit of the foot and the associated soft tissues.

column4: 鼻小柱宽度增加。
column5: Increased width of the columella.

column4: 脊索瘤是产生于'脊索`（FMA:85521）的肿瘤，沿神经轴分布。脊索瘤一般发生在骶骨，颅内的斜坡，或沿着脊柱轴线。
column5: A chordoma is a tumors that arises from embryonic remnants of the `notochord` (FMA:85521) along the length of the neuraxis. Chordomas generally occur in the sacrum, intracranially at the clivus, or along the spinal axis.

column4: 鼻小柱后部在鼻基下方插入。
column5: Insertion of the posterior columella below the nasal base.

column4: 睫毛的长度减少。
column5: Decreased length of the eyelashes.

column4: 掌部的角化过度。
column5: `Hyperkeratosis` (HP:0000962) affecting the palm of the hand.

column4: 钙盐在组织或位置的沉积，其中钙化一般不会发生。
column5: Deposition of calcium salts in a tissue or location in which calcification does not normally occur.

column4: 骶尾部（臀部皱折）的存在特征伴有头发和皮肤皱褶的囊肿，瘘，脓肿。
column5: The presence of a cyst, fistula, or abscess in the sacrococcygeal region (gluteal crease) characteristically accompanied by hair and skin folds.

column4: 在尾骨区窦（在intergluteal裂的区域）。一个藏毛窦常含有头发和皮肤碎屑。
column5: A sinus in the coccygeal region (the region of the intergluteal cleft). A pilonidal sinus often contains hair and skin debris.

column4: 含毛囊肿或鼻窦，通常在尾骨区域。
column5: A hair-containing cyst or sinus usually in the coccygeal region.

column4: 肺静脉与上、下腔静脉、右心房或者冠状窦连接异常，导致氧合血从左到右的分流。
column5: A developmental defect characterized by abnormal connection of or more pulmonary veins to the superior or inferior vena cava, the right atrium, or the coronary sinus, resulting in a left-to-right shunt of oxygenated blood.

column4: 部分肺静脉（一条或两条肺静脉）回流异常。
column5: A form of `anomalous pulmonary venous return` (HP:0010772) in which not all pulmonary veins drain abnormally. Partial anomalous pulmonary venous return frequently involves one or both of the veins from one lung.

column4: 左心房或右心房形成一个额外的膜，导致受影响心房的一分为二（因此共有三个心房）。
column5: The presence of an additional membrane in the left or right cardiac atrium which results in the subdivision of the affected atrium (and thus in total three atria, whence the name).

column4: 主动脉弓系统发育缺陷，其中气管和食管完全由主动脉弓及其分支连接段包围。
column5: A developmental defect of the aortic arch system in which the trachea and esophagus are completely encircled by connected segments of the aortic arch and its branches.

column4: 气管和主支气管显著增宽，可能易患慢性呼吸道感染。
column5: Marked widening of the trachea and major bronchi that may be predispose to chronic respiratory tract infection.

column4: 大气道显著扩大，可能诱发慢性呼吸道感染。
column5: Marked widening of the major bronchi that may be predispose to chronic respiratory tract infection.

column4: 气管显著扩大。
column5: Marked widening of the trachea.

column4: 异常大骨盆的存在。
column5: The presence of an abnormally large pelvis.

column4: 对一定频率范围内的声音过度敏感。
column5: Over-sensitivity to certain frequency ranges of sound.

column4: 皮肤酒窝征是指皮肤的凹痕，常由皮肤基底层结构（骨）牵拉引起的。
column5: Skin dimples are cutaneous indentations that are the result of tethering of the skin to underlying structures (bone) causing an indentation.

column4: 皮肤酒窝征的亚型，发生在肩部。
column5: A subtype of `skin dimples` (HP:0010781) occurring in the shoulder region.

column4: 皮下毛细血管充血引起的皮肤发红。
column5: Redness of the skin, caused by hyperemia of the capillaries in the lower layers of the skin.

column4: 子宫发生肿瘤。
column5: A `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the `uterus` (FMA:17558).

column4: 性腺内发生的肿瘤。
column5: The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of a `gonad` (FMA:18250).

column4: 尿路系统形成肿瘤。
column5: The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the `urinary system` (FMA:7159).

column4: 生殖系统出现的肿瘤。
column5: The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the `genital system` (7160).

column4: 睾丸形成肿瘤。
column5: The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the `testis` (FMA:7210).

column3: 睾丸间质细胞发育不全
column4: 睾丸的间质细胞发育低下，这些细胞产生睾酮。
column5: Underdevelopment of the interstitial (Leydig) cells of the testis. These cells produce testosterone.

column4: 睾丸的间质细胞（Leydig细胞）肥大或过度发育，这些细胞产生睾酮。
column5: Hypertrophy or overdevelopment of the interstitial (Leydig) cells of the testis. These cells produce testosterone.

column4: 指（趾）甲表现为双层，其间有软组织相连。
column5: A digit with two nails, with at least some soft tissue between them.

column4: 主要累及视空间认知的能力下降，视空间认知通过结构模式检测（例如，通过差别能力量表评价一个人在一系列智力能力的优缺点）。
column5: Reduced ability affecting mainly  visuospatial cognition which may be tested using pattern construction (for example by Differential Ability Scales, which test a person's strengths and weaknesses across a range of intellectual abilities).

column4: 累及小脑（FMA:67944）的胶质瘤（HP:0009733）。
column5: A `glioma` (HP:0009733) affecting the `cerebellum` (FMA:67944).

column4: 累及脑干（FMA:79876）的胶质瘤（HP:0009733）。
column5: A `glioma` (HP:0009733) affecting the `brainstem` (FMA:79876).

column4: 血管母细胞瘤（MPATH:238）是一种良性的、主要源于中枢神经系统的血管瘤。血管母细胞瘤由一群紧密排列的小血管形成的直径可达1或2厘米的肿物。
column5: A `hemangioblastoma` (MPATH:238) is a benign vascular neoplasm that arises almost exclusively in the central nervous system. Hemangioblastomas consist of a tightly packed cluster of small blood vessels forming a mass of up to 1 or 2 cm in diameter.

column4: 嘴唇唇红局部色素沉着增加。
column5: Increased focal pigmentation of the vermilion of the lips.

column4: 在`松果体腺`（FMA:62033）:的一个`异常新生物`（MPATH:218）。
column5: A `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the `pineal gland` (FMA:62033).

column4: 缺乏唇正中峰和上唇唇红正中沟。
column5: Lack of paramedian peaks and median notch of the upper lip vermilion.

column4: 从鼻基到嘴角处两侧的皮肤所形成的皱褶缩小。
column5: Reduced bulkiness of the crease or fold of skin running from the lateral margin of the nose, where nasal base meets the skin of the face, to a point just lateral to the corner of the mouth (cheilion or commissure).

column4: 唇红周围皮肤局限性或广泛性色素沉着增加。
column5: Increased pigmentation, either focal or generalized, of the skin surrounding the vermilion of the lips.

column4: 从正面可见上唇唇红的内部，即上唇外翻。
column5: Inner aspect of the upper lip vermilion (normally apposing the teeth) visible in a frontal view, i.e., the presence of an `everted` (PATO:0001597) `upper lip` (FMA:59817).

column4: 口呈三角形，尖位于上唇正中，底位于下唇。
column5: Triangular appearance of the oral aperture with the apex in the midpoint of the upper vermilion and the lower vermilion forming the base.

column4: 两侧口角高于唇中线。
column5: Oral commissures positioned superior to the midline labial fissure.

column4: 唇角略微向上弯曲，高于上唇联合处。
column5: Gentle upward curve of the upper lip vermilion such that the center is placed well superior to the commissures.

column4: 牙咬合时牙弓之间可见空间。
column5: Visible space between the dental arches in occlusion.

column4: 舌在休息位时超出牙槽脊或牙齿。
column5: Tongue extending beyond the alveolar ridges or teeth at rest.

column4: 悬雍垂宽度增加（主观发现）
column5: Increased width of the `uvula` (FMA:55022) (subjective finding).

column4: 悬雍垂的长度增加。
column5: Increased length of the `uvula` (FMA:55022).

column4: 悬雍垂宽度减少。
column5: Decreased width of the `uvula` (FMA:55022).

column4: 悬雍垂长度减少。
column5: Decreased length of the uvula.

column4: 两个以上呈顺时针分布的发旋。
column5: More than two clockwise hair whorls.

column4: 头发从头皮的任意一个部位生长，而不仅仅是从头皮中线和颅骨顶点的附近。
column5: Hair growth from a single point on the scalp in any location other than lateral to the midline and close to the vertex of the skull.

column4: 皮脂腺痣是先天性的表面光滑无毛发的隆起性斑块，由增生的表皮、皮脂腺、毛囊、汗腺腺体和结缔组织构成，是表皮痣的一个变种，常发生在头皮、面、颈部及前额。出生时，多为孤立光滑、无毛发的橙黄色斑点。在青春期，皮损更加明显，呈乳头瘤样、疣状或鳞片状。
column5: A congenital, hairless plaque consisting of overgrown epidermis, sebaceous glands, hair follicles, apocrine glands and connective tissue. They are a variant of epidermal naevi. Sebaceous naevi most often appear on the scalp, but they may also arise on the face, neck or forehead. At birth, a sevaceous nevus typically appears as a solitary, smooth, yellow-orange hairless patch. Sebaceous naevi become more pronounced around adolescence, often appearing bumpy, warty or scaly.

column4: 表皮痣是因表皮过度增生所致，可在出生时即有（50%）或在幼儿期出现。
column5: Epidermal naevi are due to an overgrowth of the epidermis and may be present at birth (50%) or develop during childhood.

column4: 皮脂腺痣的一种，呈线型，外观淡黄色，边缘隆起。
column5: A type of `nevus sebaceous` (HP:0010815) with a linear form, raised borders and yellowish color.

column4: 全身性发作，肌肉收缩持续增强持续几秒钟到几分钟。
column5: Generalized seizures with sustained increase in muscle contraction lasting a few seconds to minutes.

column4: 一种癫痫发作，其特征在于突然丧失肌肉张力，可以是局部的张力减低，局限在一个节段（肢，颚，头），或块状，导致患者下滑到地面。
column5: Seizures characterized by a sudden loss or diminution of muscle tone, which may be fragmentary, confined to a segment (limb, jaw, head), or massive, leading to a slumping to the ground .

column4: 以哭或哭泣发作为特征的癫痫(HP:0001250)。
column5: A type of `seizure` (HP:0001250) characterized by crying or an outburst of crying as a major feature.

column4: 癫痫发作（0001250 HP）的一种类型，表现为大笑或主要特点是爆发性大笑。
column5: A type of `seizure` (HP:0001250) characterized by laughing or an outburst of laughing as a major feature.

column4: 闪烁的暗点是一种常见的视觉先兆，可以是偏头痛的先兆，其中闪烁的灯光在视野中心点附近出现。盲点可延伸进入白色或有色闪灯的一个或多个波光弧。
column5: A scintillating scotoma is a common visual aura that can preced a migraine, whereby a spot of flickering light near the center of the visual fields occurs. The spot prevents vision, and is thus termed scotoma. The scotoma can extend into one or more shimmering arcs of white or colored flashing lights.

column4: 婴儿颅骨骨板的重叠，伴或不伴早闭。
column5: An overlap of the bony plates of the skull in an infant, with or without early closure.

column2: Abnormality of the fifth cranial nerve
column4: 在`第五对颅神经`的异常（FMA:50866）。
column5: An abormality of the `fifth cranial nerve` (FMA:50866).

column2: Abnormality of the eleventh cranial nerve
column4: 在'十一对颅神经`异常（FMA:6720）。
column5: Abnormality of the `eleventh cranial nerve` (FMA:6720).

column2: Abnormality of the twelfth cranial nerve
column4: 在'第十二颅神经`异常（FMA:50871）。
column5: Abnormality of the `twelfth cranial nerve` (FMA:50871).

column2: Abnormality of the seventh cranial nerve
column4: 在`第七颅神经`异常（FMA:50868），也被称为面神经。
column5: Abnormality of the `seventh cranial nerve` (FMA:50868) sometimes also referred to as the facial nerve.

column4: 面神经支配肌肉的节段性肌阵挛。
column5: A segmental myoclonus of muscles innervated by the facial nerve.

column4: 辨别不同温度的能力下降。
column5: A reduced ability to discriminate between different temperatures.

column4: 触摸（触觉）感觉减退。通常使用棉毛或细驼绒毛刷进行测试，要求病人每次感觉到刺激时说“现在”。
column5: A reduced sense of touch (tactile sensation). This is usually tested with a wisp of cotton or a fine camel's hair brush, by asking patients to say 'now' each time they feel the stimulus.

column4: 身体相应的位置和关节位置感觉的损害或缺失。
column5: A loss or impairment of the sensation of the relative position of parts of the body and joint position.

column4: 疼痛是一种不愉快的感觉，其程度从轻微、局部的不适感、到痛苦，由此物理性的疼痛来源于神经刺激，并经常伴随情绪性因素。痛觉异常，推测是由于的向大脑传递痛觉冲动的特定神经纤维异常所导致的。
column5: Pain is an unpleasant sensation that can range from mild, localized discomfort to agony, whereby the physical part of pain results from nerve stimulation and is often accompanied by an emotional component. This term groups abnormalities in pain sensation presumed to result from abnormalities related to the specific nerve fibers that carry the pain impulses to the brain.

column4: 自发痛是一种神经性疼痛其发生没有明确的诱发因素。
column5: Spontaneous pain is a kind of neuropathic pain which occurs without an identifiable trigger.

column3: 与疼痛相关的营养改变
column4: 营养改变是用于描述疼痛区域的异常包括主要消瘦的皮肤、组织或肌肉，变薄的骨头，头发或指甲生长方式的改变，包括增稠或头发稀疏或指甲变脆。
column5: Trophic changes is a term used to describe abnormalities in the area of pain that include primarily wasting away of the skin, tissues, or muscle, thinning of the bones, and changes in how the hair or nails grow, including thickening or thinning of hair or brittle nails.

column4: 一种感觉障碍，特点是选择性的触觉和本体感觉缺失，而痛温觉正常，反之亦然。
column5: A pattern of sensory loss with selective loss of touch sensation and proprioception without loss of pain and temperature, or vice-versa.
An `abnormal` ( PATO:0000460) `concentration` (PATO:0000033) of `copper` (CHEBI:28694).

column4: 一种'铜homeostasis`异常（HP:0010836）中的`blood`（FMA:9670）:对`ceruloplasmin`（000005794 PR）相关的`下降concentration`（0001163 PATO）。
column5: A kind of `Abnormality of copper homeostasis` (HP:0010836) related to a `decreased concentration` (PATO:0001163) of `ceruloplasmin` (PR:000005794) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).

column3: 高浓度非铜蓝蛋白结合型血清铜离子
column4: 非`ceruloplasmin`（PR:000005794）的约束`copper`（CHEBI:28694）在`blood`（FMA:9670）:一个`增加concentration`（0001162 PATO）。
column5: An `increased concentration` (PATO:0001162) of non `ceruloplasmin` (PR:000005794) bound `copper` (CHEBI:28694) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).

column4: 的`copper`（CHEBI:28694）:一个`增加concentration`（0001162 PATO）在`urine`（FMA:12274）。
column5: An `increased concentration` (PATO:0001162) of `copper` (CHEBI:28694) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).

column4: 由脑电图记录到的多灶的大脑异常放电活动。
column5: A abnormality in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG) and being identified at multiple locations (foci).

column4: 局灶（局部）慢活动反映局灶脑功能障碍，而不是弥散脑功能障碍（即脑病）。
column5: Focal (localized) slow activity reflects focal dysfunction, not diffuse dysfunction (i.e., encephalopathy).

column4: 通过头皮脑电图（EEG）记录的多灶性慢的脑电活动。
column5: Multifocal slowing of cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).

column4: 通过头皮脑电图（EEG）记录的弥漫性慢的脑电活动。
column5: Diffuse slowing of cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).

column2: EEG with persistent abnormal rhythmic activity
column3: 脑电图，异常的持续性节律活动
column4: 脑电图中出现异常的，持续性节律活动。
column5: The presence of abnormal persistent rhythmic activity in electroencephalogram

column3: 脑电图，（慢）棘慢复合波（<2.5赫兹）
column4: 脑电图存在棘慢复合波（<2.5赫兹）。
column5: The presence of complexes of slow spikes and slow waves (<2.5 Hz) in electroencephalography (EEG).

column3: 脑电图，棘慢复合波（2.5-3.5赫兹）
column4: 脑电图存在棘慢复合波（2.5-3.5赫兹）。
column5: The presence of complexes of spikes and waves (2.5-3.5 Hz) in electroencephalography (EEG).

column3: 脑电图，（快）棘慢复合波（> 3.5赫兹）
column4: 脑电图存在棘慢复合波（> 3.5赫兹）。
column5: The presence of complexes of spikes and waves (>3.5 Hz) in electroencephalography (EEG).

column4: 通过头皮脑电图记录的脑电活动:棘波（<70毫秒）和尖波（70-200毫秒）的复合波，这是与癫痫密切相关的短暂尖波。
column5: Complexes of spikes (<70 ms) and sharp waves (70-200 ms), which are sharp transient waves that have a strong association with epilepsy, in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).

column4: 在脑电图中爆发抑制模式指的是低电压（<10微伏）抑制背景和相对较短模式的较高波幅慢波，尖波，和棘波交替反复出现的波形。
column5: The burst suppression pattern in electroencephalography refers to a characteristic periodic pattern of low voltage (<10 microvolts) suppressed background and a relatively shorter pattern of higher amplitude slow, sharp, and spiking complexes.

column4: 脑电图异常（癫痫样放电）由闪光刺激或黑色和白色条纹的图案诱发。
column5: EEG abnormalities (epileptiform discharges) evoked by flashing lights or black and white striped patterns.

column2: EEG with periodic lateralized epileptiform discharges
column3: 脑电图，周期性一侧癫痫样放电
column4: 周期性一侧性癫痫样放电（PLEDs）是指癫痫样波在单侧周期性出现 PLEDs显示放电以相对恒定的时间间隔（0.5至3秒）出现。
column5: Periodic lateralized epileptiform discharges (PLEDs)are periodic, lateralized, and epileptiform. PLEDs show a relatively constant interval between discharges (0.5 to 3 seconds).

column2: EEG with generalized low amplitude activity
column3: 脑电图，广泛性低波幅活动
column4: 通过头皮脑电图（EEG）记录的脑电活动，波幅普遍异常降低。
column5: An abnormal generalized reduction in amplitude of the cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).

column2: EEG with localized low amplitude activity
column3: 脑电图，局部低波幅活动
column4: 通过头皮脑电图（EEG）记录的局部异常波幅降低脑电活动。
column5: An abnormal localized reduction in amplitude of the cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).

column4: 周期性出现的广泛性周期复合波。
column5: Periodically occurring generalized periodic complexes.

column4: 周期性重复的脑电图异常。
column5: Periodically recurring abnormalities in the EEG.

column3: 脑电图，过度换气诱发的癫痫样放电
column4: 通过头皮脑电图记录的脑电活动中，由过度换气诱发的癫痫样放电。
column5: Epileptiform discharges induced by hyperventilation (overbreathing) in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).

column4: “臀先露”(HP:0001623)的一种，胎儿双髋关节屈曲,双膝关节直伸。
column5: A kind of `breech presentation` (HP:0001623) in which the hips are flexed and the knees are extended.

column4: “臀先露”的一种（HP:0001623），胎儿髋关节及膝关节均屈曲。
column5: A kind of `breech presentation` (HP:0001623) in which the hips are flexed and the knees are flexed.

column4: “臀先露”(HP:0001623)的一种，胎儿单侧或双侧髋关节直伸，胎儿一足或双足向下先进入产道。
column5: A kind of `breech presentation` (HP:0001623) in which one or both hips are extended and one or both of the fetus' feet are pointing down and entering the birth canal.

column4: 以习得控制手指和手的能力延迟为特点的运动发育迟缓（HP:0001270）。
column5: A type of `motor delay` (HP:0001270) characterized by an delay in acquiring the ability to control the fingers and hands.

column4: 理解他人语言能力的发育迟缓
column5: A delay in the acquisition of the ability to understand the speech of others.

column4: 重度精神发育迟滞定义为智商（IQ）在20-34的范围内。
column5: Severe mental retardation is defined as an intelligence quotient (IQ) in the range of 20-34.

column4: 一种不合作，挑衅和敌对权威人物的持久的模式，但不包括严重的反社会行为。此行为不能被儿童的发育阶段所解释，可导致严重的功能受损。但在儿童和青少年中一定程度的反抗行为是正常。
column5: An enduring pattern of uncooperative, defiant, and hostile behavior toward authority figures that does not involve major antisocial violations, is not accounted for by the child's developmental stage, and results in significant functional impairment. A certain level of oppositional behavior is common in children and adolescents.

column4: 腹壁的不完全闭合。
column5: An `incomplete closure` (PATO:0000609) of the `abdominal wall` (FMA:259054).

column4: `共济失调`(HP:0001251)的一种，表现为按照适当的顺序和速度进行的随意运动能力受损。协调失调时，随意运动表现为它的组成部分的分解动作。
column5: A type of `ataxia` (HP:0001251) characterized by the impairment of the ability to smoothly perform the elements of a voluntary movement in the appropriate order and speed. With dyssynergia, a voluntary movement appears broken down into its component parts.

column4: 一种影响眼球运动的以无法流畅的在视野中追踪物体为特征的眼协同失调
column5: A type of `dyssynergia` (HP:0010867) affecting eye movements and characterized by the inability to smoothly follow a visual target across the visual field.

column4: 一种类型的`协调障碍`（HP:0010867），特点是缺乏以适当的顺序和速度平稳进行随意运动的能力。
column5: A type of `dyssynergy` (HP:0010867) characterized by the lack of the ability to smoothly perform the elements of a voluntary movement in the appropriate order and speed.

column4: 由于感觉神经系统功能障碍导致的运动不协调。可以通过让患者闭眼区分感觉性共济失调和小脑性共济失调。小脑性共济失调的人只显示轻微的症状恶化，而感觉性共济失调的人显示出显著的症状恶化。
column5: Incoordination of movement caused by a deficit in the sensory nervous system. Sensory ataxia can be distinguished from cerebellar ataxia by asking the patient to close his or her eyes. Persons with cerebellar ataxia show only a minimal worsening of symptoms, whereas persons with sensory ataxia show a marked worsening of symptoms.

column4: T波的倒置（通常是正的）。
column5: An inversion of the T-wave (which is normally positive).

column4: 脊髓的颈段萎缩。
column5: Atrophy of the cervical segment of the spinal cord.

column4: 在伸肌腱（通常在指关节、跟腱、膝和肘关节处皮肤）出现黄色瘤（胞内外的胆固醇聚集）。
column5: The presence of xanthomas (intra-and extra-cellular accumulations of cholesterol) extensor tendons (typically over knuckles, Achilles tendon, knee, and elbows).

column4: 刺激外踝下方足背外缘的皮肤引出的一种诊断性反射。如果刺激下踝外侧皮肤时出现一个、多个或所有脚趾背伸（伴或不伴扇形展开）为查多克反射阳性。查多克征与巴宾斯基征类似，被视为皮质脊髓（锥体）束受损的体征。
column5: A diagnostic reflex elicited by stimulation of the skin over the surface of the lateral malleolus of the foot. The Chaddock reflex is present if there is extension of one or more or all of the toes with or without fanning of them when the external inframalleolar skin is stimulated. The Chaddock sign, similar to the Babinski sign, is taken to be an indication of disease of the spinocortical (pyramidal) tract.

column3: 循环系统内的蛋白水平异常
column4: `血液 `（FMA:9670）中循环`蛋白`(CHEBI:16541)的水平异常。
column5: An abnormal level of a circulating `protein` (CHEBI:16541) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).

column4: 单眼斜视的一种，只有一只眼睛受到影响。单侧斜视需要与交替斜视区分开，后者为双眼在不同时间点交替发生“斜视”。
column5: A type of strabismus`(HP:0000486) in which only one eye is affected. Unilateral strabismus is to be distinguished from alternating strabismus, in which either of the eyes 'squints' at different times.

column4: 产前期间出现，颈部后方附近的囊性包块，由多个隔片及多个不对称的薄壁包囊组成。胎囊状水瘤可以被定义为有或没有分隔的长度大于3毫米的颈部半透明物。
column5: The presence during the prenatal period of a cystic mass with multiple septa with multiple, asymmetric, thin-walled cysts near the posterior aspect of the neck. Fetal cystic hygroma can be defined as nuchal translucency with or without septations measuring greater than 3.0 mm.

column4: 胎儿颈后皮下组织内的低回声层异常增厚（通常为产前超声检查项目）。
column5: The presence of an abnormally large hypoechoic space in the posterior fetal neck (usually detected on prenatal ultrasound examination).

column4: 胚胎或胎儿与胎盘间的纽带的异常。
column5: An abnormality of the `umbilical cord` (FMA:85541), which is the cord connecting the developing embryo or fetus to the placenta.

column4: 肺动脉瓣的先天疾病，其中该瓣膜的节流孔发育不良。
column5: A congenital disorder of the pulmonary valve in which the orifice of the valve fails to develop.

column4: 主动脉瓣的先天性疾病，瓣膜口发育缺陷。
column5: A congenital disorder of the aortic valve in which the orifice of the valve fails to develop.

column4: 相对于肢体的其他节段，主要影响影响四肢远端部分（手和脚）的肢端短缩。
column5: Shortening of the extremities affecting primarily the distal parts of the limbs (hands and feet) in relation to the other segments of the limbs.

column4: 疾病处有由于血液供应中断引起的骨成分坏死。
column5: A disease where there is cellular death (necrosis) of bone components due to interruption of the blood supply.

column4: 由软骨下骨供血不足引起软骨下骨坏死引起的关节疾病，称为股骨头缺血性坏死。骨随后由身体再吸收，而使它支持的关节软骨容易损坏。其结果是软骨和骨碎片化，且这些骨软骨碎片在关节间隙内自由运动，引起疼痛和进一步的损害。
column5: A joint disorder caused by blood deprivation in the subchondral bone causing the subchondral bone to die in a process called avascular necrosis. The bone is then reabsorbed by the body, leaving the articular cartilage it supported prone to damage. The result is fragmentation (dissection) of both cartilage and bone, and the free movement of these osteochondral fragments within the joint space, causing pain and further damage.

column4: 克勒病是一种青少年型累及舟状骨的无菌坏死（HP:0100323）。
column5: Morbus Koehler is a `Juvenile aseptic necrosis` (HP:0100323) affecting the Os naviculare pedis.

column4: 金伯克病是一种青少年型累及月状骨的无菌坏死（HP:0100323）。
column5: Morbus Kienboeck is a `Juvenile aseptic necrosis` (HP:0100323) affecting the Os lunatum.

column3: 奥斯古德 - 施拉特病
column4: 奥斯古德 - 施拉特是一种青少年型累及胫骨粗隆的无菌坏死（HP:0100323）。
column5: Morbus Osgood-Schlatter is a `Juvenile aseptic necrosis` (HP:0100323) affecting the Tuberositas tibiae.

column4: 椎骨端板可能导致椎骨端板的二次破坏和髓核到椎体的突起的发育生长迟缓（所以在X射线下称为Schmorl的节点）。
column5: A developmental growth retardation of the vertebral end plates that may lead to secondary destruction of the vertebral end plates and protrusion of the nucleus pulposus into the vertebral body (so called Schmorl's nodes as seen on x-rays).

column2: Abnormality of branched chain family amino acid metabolism
column3: 支链族氨基酸代谢异常
column4: 支链族氨基酸代谢异常。
column5: Abnormality of a `branched chain family amino acid metabolic process` (GO:0009081).

column4: ``左旋-苯丙氨酸代谢过程`（GO:0006558）的异常。
column5: An abnormality of `L-phenylalanine metabolic process` (GO:0006558).

column2: Abnormality of serine family amino acid metabolism
column3: 丝氨酸族氨基酸代谢异常
column4: `丝氨酸族氨基酸代谢过程`（GO:0009069）的异常。
column5: An abnormality of a `serine family amino acid metabolic process` (GO:0009069).

column4: `甘氨酸代谢过程`（GO:0006544）的异常。

column4: 心室强光点是因产前超声检查关注于胎儿超声回声增强而发现的。强光点可出现在一个或两个心室内。心室强光点是指胎儿心室内的、与邻近肋骨回声相似的超声现象，这种回声光点一般出现于一个或两个心室的乳突肌内。
column5: A finding of a focus of increased echogenicity upon prenatal ultrasound examination of the fetus. The foci may be present in one or both ventricles. Echogenic intracardiac focus (EICF) is defined as a focus of echogenicity comparable to bone, in the region of the papillary muscle in either or both ventricles of the fetal heart.

column4: 肠管回声增强是指胎儿肠管回声强度接近或高于其周围骨骼回声的强度。
column5: Echogenic bowel is defined as fetal bowel with homogenous areas of echogenicity that are equal to or greater than that of surrounding bone.

column4: 肾盂的异常。

column4: 轻度肾盂扩张被定义为超声检查时低回声球形或椭圆形的肾盂扩大，起码是5毫米以上但不超过10毫米。测量时取横截面，通过胎儿肾盂，采集最大前后径。
column5: Mild pyelectasis is defined as a hypoechoic spherical or elliptical space within the renal pelvis that measures at least 5mm and not more than 10 mm. The measurement is taken on a transverse section through the fetal renal pelvis using the maximum anterior-to-posterior measurement.

column4: 肾盂呈扩张状态。

column4: 发生于胎儿期的脑室扩大（HP:0002119）的一种类型，通常利用产前超声诊断。脑室扩大定义为是体径10mm以上。轻度脑室扩大（MVM）定义为10至15毫米之间。从丘脑核团水平的轴位完成测量，刚好低于测量BPD（PMID:16100637）的标准图像。
column5: A kind of `ventriculomegaly` (HP:0002119) occurring in the fetal period and usually diagnosed by prenatal ultrasound. Cerebral ventriculomegaly is defined by atrial measurements 10 mm or more. Mild ventriculomegaly (MVM) is defined as measurements between 10 and 15 mm. Measurements are obtained from an axial plane at the level of the thalamic nuclei just below the standard image to measure the BPD (pmid:16100637).

column5: Fetal megacystis is an abnormally enlarged bladder identified at any gestational age.

column4: 先天性囊性腺瘤样畸形（CCAM）可以在产前诊断，超声可显示囊性或实性肺癌。CCAM不具有系统性动脉血液供应（与支气管肺隔离症相反），它是源自胚胎发育畸形的肺内的囊性区域。
column5: Congenital cystic adenomatoid malformation (CCAM) can be diagnosed prenatally if ultrasound shows a cystic or solid lung tumor. A CCAM does not have systemic arterial blood supply (in contrast to bronchopulmonary sequenstration). It is a cystic area within the lung that originates from abnormal embryogenesis.

column4: 视束指视交叉与外侧膝状体之间的结构。每一侧视束包括来自同侧视网膜不交叉纤维和对侧视网膜鼻侧的交叉纤维,由于各种先天或后天因素引起视束发育缺陷或不全而引起不同程度视力受损。
column5: The optic tract refers to a segment between the optic chiasm and the lateral geniculate body. Each side bundle includes cross fibers from the ipsilateral retinal non-crossing fibers and the contralateral nasal retina，due to a variety of congenital or acquired factors caused visual developmental defects or incomplete caused by varying degrees of visual impairment

column5: An abnormal increase of bone mineral density, that is, of the amount of matter per cubic centimeter of bones which is often refered to as osteosclerosis. Osteosclerosis can be detected on radiological examination as an increased whiteness (density) of affected bones.

column5: Abnormally increased formation of dense trabecular bone tissue. Despite the increased density of bone tissue, osteopetrotic bones tend to be more fracture-prone than normal.

column4: 淡红色稍隆起的丘疹，直径0.5-3厘米，不伴有瘙痒。
column5: Pale reddish slightly elevated papules and plaques of 0.5-3 cm in diameter and not accompanied by pruritus.

column4: 皮肤附属器（皮肤附件），是位于真皮和皮下脂肪组织的特殊皮肤结构，其异常包括三个不同的组织学结构的异常：（1）毛皮脂单位（毛囊和皮脂腺）；（2）小汗腺； （3）大汗腺。
column5: An abnormality of the skin adnexa (skin appendages), which are specialized skin structures located within the dermis and focally within the subcutaneous fatty tissue, comprising three histologically distinct structures: (1) the pilosebaceous unit (hair follicle and sebaceous glands); (2) the eccrine sweat glands; and (3) the apocrine glands.

column4: 胃重复通常是胃肠道的囊状畸形，一般附着于胃的大弯侧，但与胃不相通。
column5: Gastric duplication is a usually cystic malformation of gastrointestinal tract, usually attached to the greater curvature of the stomach and has no communication with the stomach.

column4: 一个具有平滑肌外壳的中空球形结构，通过粘膜连接到胃肠道的任何部位（从舌的基部到肛门）。
column5: A spherical hollow structure with a smooth muscle coat, lined by a mucous membrane, and attached to any part of the gastrointestinal tract, from the base of the tongue to the anus.

column4: 白内障的一种，（晶状体的混浊）在老化的过程中形成。
column5: A type of cataract (opacification of the lens) that forms during the course of aging.

column3: 年龄相关的核性白内障
column4: 年龄相关性白内障，主要是晶状体核的浑浊。
column5: A type of age-related cataract that primarily affects the nucleus of the lens.

column3: 年龄相关性皮质白内障
column4: 一种年龄相关性白内障，主要影响晶状体的皮质。
column5: A type of age-related cataract that primarily affects the cortex of the lens.

column3: 年龄相关后囊下型白内障
column4: 一种年龄相关性白内障，主要发生于中央后囊下的皮质颗粒混浊。
column5: A type of age-related cataract consisting of granular opacities occurring mainly in the central posterior cortex just under the posterior capsule.

column4: 在脑损伤（全身，有毒，或代谢）的基础上发生的癫痫发作，当去除潜在的病因或急性期过去后可能不会再发。
column5: A seizure that occurs in the context of a brain insult (systemic, toxic, or metabolic) and may not recur when the underlying cause has been removed or the acute phase has elapsed.

column4: 以意识障碍为特征的癫痫发作。
column5: Seizures characterized by impaired consciousness.

column4: 典型的失神是短至数秒的全面性癫痫发作，突发突止并伴意识受损。
column5: Typical absences are brief for seconds generalized epileptic seizures of abrupt onset and abrupt termination with impairment of consciousness.

column4: 伴随额外运动现象的失神发作，如眼睑肌阵挛或上肢肌阵挛发作。
column5: Absence seizures that are characterized by additional motor phenomena such as eyelid myoclonias or myoclonic seizure of the upper limbs.

column3: 失神发作伴眼睑肌阵挛
column4: 失神发作伴随眼睑肌阵挛。
column5: Absence seizures that are additionally characterized by eyelid myoclonia.

column4: 具有双侧手臂和肩膀节律性肌阵挛可在脑电图记录到异常放电的失神发作，同时可伴有手臂强直发作。
column5: Absence seizures that are additionally characterized by rhythmic bilateral myoclonias of the arms and shoulders synchronous with EEG discharges, with additional tonic components of the arms.

column4: 不典型失神持续超过30分钟。
column5: Atypical absence lasting for more than 30 minutes.

column4: 4岁之前开始的典型失神发作。
column5: Typical absence seizures starting before the age of 4 years.

column3: 局灶性运动性癫痫发作
column4: 任何形式累及肌肉组织的局灶性癫痫发作。
column5: Focal seizures involving musculature in any form.

column3: 局灶性自主神经癫痫发作
column4: 涉及心脑血管，瞳孔，胃肠道，泌汗，血管舒缩和体温调节功能等自主神经系统功能特定改变的客观可记录到的局灶性发作。
column5: Focal seizures with an objectively documented and distinct alteration of autonomic nervous system function involving cardiovascular, pupillary, gastrointestinal, sudomotor, vasomotor and thermoregularity functions.

column2: Focal autonomic seizures with altered responsiveness
column3: 局灶性自主神经癫痫发作伴反应改变
column4: 自主神经发作伴反应的改变。
column5: An autonomic seizure with altered responsiveness.

column2: Focal autonomic seizures without altered responsiveness
column3: 局灶性自主神经癫痫发作不伴反应改变
column4: 植物神经发作不伴反应的改变。
column5: An autonomic seizure without altered responsiveness.

column4: 主观突发现象，在有些特定患者中，可能出现于可观察到的癫痫发作之前;如果单独出现，构成单纯部分性发作。
column5: Subjective ictal phenomena that, in a given patient, may precede observable seizures; if alone, constitute a if alone, constitute a simple partial seizure.

column4: 听到耳朵里有嗡嗡声、击鼓声或单一响声的感觉。
column5: Auras with sensations of buzzing, drumming sounds or single tones.

column4: 腹部不适的先兆，包括恶心、空虚、发紧、翻腾、翻动、不舒服、疼痛和饥饿；感觉可能上升到胸部或喉部。可能反应了发作性自主神经功能障碍的一些现象。
column5: Auras with abdominal discomfort including nausea, emptiness, tightness, churning, butterflies, malaise, pain, and hunger; sensation may rise to chest or throat. Some phenomena may reflect ictal autonomic dysfunction.

column4: 味觉的先兆，包括酸，苦，咸，甜或金属的味道。
column5: Auras with taste sensations including acidic, bitter, salty , sweet or metallic tastes.

column4: 伴有异常气味的、不愉快的先兆
column5: Auras with sensation of odor, usually disagreeable.

column4: 与情感，记忆或复合知觉现象，包括虚幻的或复合幻觉事件相关的先兆
column5: Auras with affective, mnemonic or composite perceptual phenomena including illusory or composite hallucinatory events.

column4: 先兆伴随刺痛感，麻木，触电的感觉，疼痛，运动感，或想要活动。
column5: Auras with sensation of tingling, numbness, electric shock sensations, pain, sense of movement, or desire to move.

column4: 一种与自主神经系统受累相一致的感觉，包括心血管，胃肠，排汗，血管舒缩和体温调节功能。
column5: A sensation consistent with involvement of the autonomic nervous system, including cardiovascular, gastrointestinal, sudomotor, vasomotor and thermoregulatory functions.

column4: 先兆伴有与闪烁感或闪烁的灯光、点、单一相、暗点、或黑蒙。
column5: Auras with sensation of flashing or flickering lights, spots, simple patterns, scotomata, or amaurosis.

column4: 肌阵挛性发作是癫痫的一个临床发作类型。表现为某个肌肉或肌群的突然收缩，引起面、躯干或肢体突然快速的抽动。
column5: Focal myoclonic seizures are a type of seizure. The clinical performance is a sudden contraction of the muscles or muscle caused  face, trunk or limbs suddenly fast twitch.

column4: 癫痫发作，身体局部肌肉收缩持续增强，持续几秒钟到几分钟。
column5: Seizures with sustained increase in muscle contraction in parts of the body lasting a few seconds to minutes.

column4: 表现为眼睑肌阵挛的局灶性癫痫发作，不是失神发作情况下的眼睑肌阵挛。
column5: Focal seizure with eyelid myoclonia, not eyelid myoclonias in the context of absence seizures.

column4: 癫痫发作，表现为累及同一肌群的规律重复的肌阵挛，频率约为2-3次/秒。
column5: Seizures with regularly repetitive myoclonus, involving the same muscle groups, at a frequency of about 2-3 c/sec.

column4: 癫痫发作突然丢失或肌张力的缩小与前面的肌阵挛或强直性事件一至两秒以上，涉及头部，躯干，下颌或肢体肌肉组织。
column5: Seizures with sudden loss or diminution of muscle tone with a preceding myoclonic or tonic event lasting one to two seconds or more, involving head, trunk, jaw or limb musculature.

column4: 热性惊厥表现为全身强直 - 阵挛症状，持续时间不超过15分钟，且接下来的24小时之内无复发。
column5: Febrile seizures with generalized tonic-clonic semiology, duration less than 15 minutes, and without recurrence within the next 24 hours.

column4: 有局灶性症状的高热惊厥，持续时间超过15分钟，或在24小时内连续惊厥发作2次以上。
column5: Febrile seizures with focal semiology, duration of more than 15 minutes, or occurring in a cluster of 2 or more convulsions within 24 hours.

column4: 伴随正进行地活动停止和/或幅度减低的癫痫发作。
column5: Seizures with a decrease in amplitude and/or rate or arrest of ongoing motor activity.

column4: 持续的运动或不适当的快速运动加重的一种癫痫发作，主要累及近端肢体或中轴的肌肉产生不规则的序列的投射样运动，如蹬踏，骨盆抖动，摇摆样运动。
column5: Seizures with increase in rate of ongoing movements or inappropriately rapid performance of a movement involving predominantly proximal limb or axial muscles producing irregular sequential ballistic movements, such as pedaling, pelvic thrashing, rocking movements.

column4: 强直性发作伴持续的、强迫性眼部共轭运动，头部和/或躯干旋转或向一侧歪斜。
column5: Tonic seizures with a sustained, forced conjugate ocular, cephalic and/or truncal rotation or lateral deviation from the midline.

column4: 脑电图固有变异指包含一些罕见或不寻常的波形，但通常不是病理性的。
column5: An EEG with constitutional variants contains waves that are rare or unusual but not generally pathologic.

column4: 脑电图背景活动为4-5次 /秒。
column5: EEG background activity at 4-5/second.

column4: 弥漫性alpha波（8-13Hz）为主的脑电图。
column5: EEG dominated by diffuse alpha-waves (8-13Hz).

column4: 弥漫性β波（＞13Hz）为主导的脑电图。
column5: EEG dominated by diffuse beta-waves (>13 Hz).

column4: 脑电图主要由弥漫性β波（＞13赫兹）与枕区α波（8-13赫兹）组成。
column5: EEG dominated by diffuse beta waves (>13 Hz) with occipitally localized alpha waves (8-13 Hz).

column4: 脑电图波幅低于30微伏且没有明显的枕区阿尔法节律（8-13赫兹）。
column5: Set definition of ID:0000013 to "EEG with an amplitude less than 30 microvolts without observable occipital alpha rhythm (8-13 Hz).

column4: 显示癫痫源异常的脑电图模式。
column5: Electroencephalographic patterns that resemble epileptogenic abnormalities.

column2: EEG with hyperventilation-induced focal epileptiform discharges
column3: 脑电图，过度换气诱发的局灶癫痫样放电
column4: 通过头皮脑电图记录的脑电活动中，由过度换气诱发的局灶癫痫样放电。
column5: Focal epileptiform discharges induced by hyperventilation (overbreathing) in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).

column2: EEG with hyperventilation-induced generalized epileptiform discharges
column3: 脑电图，过度换气诱发的全面性癫痫样放电
column4: 通过头皮脑电图记录的脑电活动中，由过度换气诱发的全面性癫痫样放电。
column5: Generalized epileptiform discharges induced by hyperventilation (overbreathing) in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).

column3: 脑电图局灶性癫痫样放电
column4: 通过头皮脑电图（EEG）记录的脑电活动中，在一个局部（局灶）特定区域异的EEG放电。
column5: EEG discharges recorded in particular areas of the A localized (focal) abnormality in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).

column2: Focal epileptiform discharges with limited propagation to contralateral hemisphere
column3: 局灶性癫痫样放电，有限传播到对侧半球
column4: 局灶性癫痫样放电扩散到对侧大脑半球，但没有继发全面化。
column5: Focal epileptiform discharges with spreading to contralateral hemisphere but without secondary generalization.

column2: Focal EEG discharges with propagation to ipsilateral hemisphere
column3: 脑电图局灶性放电，传播到同侧半球
column4: 局灶性癫痫样放电，扩散到同一侧大脑半球。
column5: Focal epileptiform discharges with spreading to the hemisphere on the same side of the brain.

column2: Focal EEG discharges with secondary generalization
column3: 局灶性脑放电继发泛化
column4: 脑电图局灶性放电，随后扩散至双侧大脑半球，可在整个头皮记录到。
column5: Focal EEG discharges that secondarily spread to both hemispheres and can then be recorded over the entire scalp.

column4: 定位于两侧半球多个位置的癫痫样放电。
column5: Epileptiform discharges being identified at multiple locations in both hemispheres.

column2: Uni- and bilateral multifocal epileptiform discharges
column3: 单侧和双侧多灶性痫样放电
column4: 在一侧半球或两侧半球多个位置确定的癫痫样放电。
column5: Epileptiform discharges identified at multiple locations temporarily in both hemispheres and temporarily in one hemisphere.

column3: 单侧多灶性癫痫样放电
column4: 一个半球的多个部位出现癫痫样放电。
column5: Epileptiform discharges being identified at multiple locations in one hemisphere.

column3: 多态局灶性癫痫样放电
column4: 不同的形状和频率的焦点痫样放电。
column5: Focal epileptiform discharges of different shapes and frequencies.

column4: 脑电图持续时间小于80毫秒的短暂局灶尖波。
column5: EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration less than 80 msec.

column2: EEG with series of focal spikes
column4: 几秒钟内出现的多个局灶棘波。
column5: Focal spikes occurring for several seconds.

column2: EEG with focal sharp slow waves
column4: 脑电图时限80至200毫秒之间的短暂局灶尖波紧随一个慢波。
column5: EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec followed by a slow wave.

column4: 脑电图时限80至200毫秒之间短暂局灶尖波。
column5: EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec.

column4: 脑电图持续时间小于80毫秒的短暂局灶尖波紧随一个慢波。
column5: EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration less than 80 msec followed by a slow wave.

column3: 脑电图，伴广泛性癫痫样放电
column4: 整个头皮脑电图记录到癫痫样放电，通常见于癫痫病人。

column2: EEG with generalized sharp slow waves
column3: 脑电图，伴广泛性尖慢波

column5: EEG with generalized sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec followed by a slow wave.

column2: EEG with generalized polymorphic epileptiform discharges
column3: 脑电图，伴广泛性多态癫痫样放电
column4: 不同形状和频率的广泛性癫痫样放电。
column5: Generalized epileptiform discharges of different shapes and frequencies.

column4: 脑电图波幅异常。
column5: EEG with abnormal amplitude.

column4: 脑电图频率异常增加。
column5: EEG frequency is abnormally increased.

column3: 伴异常缓慢频率的脑电图
column4: 脑电图中伴有异常缓慢的频率。
column5: EEG with abnormally slow frequencies.

column4: 脑电图显示弥漫性不间断慢活动。
column5: EEG showing diffuse slowing without interruption.

column4: 非连续性弥漫性慢波的脑电图模式。
column5: Non-continuous diffuse slowing of electroencephalographic patterns.

column2: EEG with generalized slow activity grade 1
column3: 脑电图，广泛性慢活动1级
column4: 频率在7.5和8.5赫兹之间的慢活动。
column5: Slowing at frequencies between 7.5 and 8.5 Hz.

column2: EEG with generalized slow activity grade 2
column3: 脑电图，广泛性慢活动2级

column2: EEG with generalized slow activity grade 3
column3: 脑电图，广泛性慢活动3级

column2: EEG with generalized slow activity grade 4
column3: 脑电图，广泛性慢活动4级
column4: 脑电图无脑电活动。

column4: 头皮脑电图枕区慢波。

column2: EEG with photoparoxysmal response grade I
column3: 脑电图，光阵发性反应I级
column4: 闪光刺激过程中癫痫样放电出现在枕部区域。
column5: Occurrence of epileptiform discharges in occipital regions during photic stimulation.

column2: EEG with photoparoxysmal response grade II
column3: 脑电图，光阵发性反应 II级

column5: Occurence of epileptiform discharges in occipital and central regions during photic stimulation.

column2: EEG with photoparoxysmal response grade III
column3: 脑电图，光阵发性反应III级
column4: 闪光刺激过程中癫痫样放电出现在枕区、中央区、颞区和顶区。
column5: Occurrence of epileptiform discharges in occipital, central, temporal and parietal regions during photic stimulation.

column2: EEG with photoparoxysmal response grade IV
column3: 脑电图，光阵发性反应Ⅳ级
column4: 闪光刺激过程中出现全面性癫痫样放电。
column5: Occurrence of generalized epileptiform discharges during photic stimulation.

column4: 发生在一侧半球的高度失律。
column5: Hypsarrhythmia occurring in one hemisphere.

column4: 枕部形状异常
column5: An `abnormal` (PATO:0000460) `shape` (PATO:0000052) of `occiput` (FMA:49187).

column2: Abnormal shape of the frontal region
column4: 头的前额部位形状异常
column5: An `abnormal` `shape` of the `frontal part of the head`

column4: 面部高度（长度）低于平均值大于两个标准偏差（客观）；或面部的高度/长度显著减少（主观）。
column5: Facial height (length) is more than two standard deviations below the mean (objective); or an apparent decrease in the height (length) of the face (subjective).

column4: 由于额骨凸起导致整个前额的向前突出。
column5: Forward prominence of the entire forehead, due to protrusion of the frontal bone.

column4: 额部中线软组织皱褶呈纵行，通常由发际延伸至眉弓，可见于面部表情活动或处于静止状态时。
column5: Vertical soft tissue creases in the midline of the forehead, often extending from the hairline to the brow, and seen with facial expression or when the face is at rest.

column4: 印堂即眼眶上脊之间的额头中线处下陷。
column5: Posterior positioning of the `glabella` (FMA:52851), i.e., of the midline forehead between the supraorbital ridges.

column4: 在额头中线存在线性纵沟，可从发际线伸展到眉间。
column5: Linear vertical groove in the midline of the forehead, extending from hairline to glabella.

column4: 没有眼皮。
column5: Absent `eyelids`

column4: 将睫毛压在角膜和/或结膜的冗余眼睑皮肤。
column5: Redundant eyelid skin pressing the eyelashes against the cornea and/or conjunctiva.

column4: 没有或发育不全的眼睑。
column5: Absence or underdevelopment of the eyelid.

column4: 在血清中的C反应蛋白水平的异常升高。
column5: An abnormal elevation of the C-reactive protein level in serum.

column4: 眉毛沿着眉骨水平伸展，没有弯曲。
column5: An eyebrow that extends straight across the brow, without curve.

column4: 眉的宽度（高度）区域性增加。
column5: Regional increase in the width (height) of the eyebrow.

column4: 眉毛横向延伸超出眼眶缘，而不是在该位置稍微向下弯曲。
column5: An eyebrow that extends laterally beyond the orbital rim rather than turning gently downward at that location.

column4: 由于增加的密度和/或长度和/或卷曲而引人注目的睫毛，但尚不满足多毛症的标准。
column5: Eyelashes that draw the attention of the viewer due to increased density and/or length and/or curl without meeting the criteria of trichomegaly.

column4: 皮肤脊的起始高度开始远低于下眼睑的内侧，向上和/或穿过鼻梁逐渐向上弯曲。
column5: Elevated ridge(s) of skin starting well below the medial aspect of the lower lid that curves gradually upward toward and/or across the nasal bridge.

column4: 耳轮突起指向比横向更靠前，形成一个隔覆盖后外耳。
column5: Antihelix protrusion directed more anteriorly than laterally, forming a shelf overlying the posterior concha.

column4: 外耳、三角窝、耳轮之间没有明显的棱线。
column5: No discernible ridge between concha and triangular fossa and helix.

column4: 对轮脚延伸出多余的脊或凸起。
column5: Supernumerary ridge or crus of the ear arising from the antihelix.

column4: 对耳轮脊在对耳屏及其分叉（干）之间形成锐角，而不是一个平缓弯曲的弧线。
column5: Antihelical ridge that forms an acute angle between the antitragus and its bifurcation (stem) instead of a gently curving arc.

column4: 下角横截面宽度增加。
column5: Increased width of the inferred cross-section of the inferior crus.

column4: 与对耳轮干的突出相比，对耳轮下脚的突出增加。
column5: Increased protrusion of the inferior crus relative to the prominence of the antihelix stem.

column4: 与对耳轮干的突出相比，对耳轮下脚的突出减少。
column5: Decreased protrusion of the inferior crus relative to the prominence of the antihelix stem.

column4: 与耳轮的突出相比，接近分叉处的对耳轮脊的突出增加。
column5: Increased protrusion of the antihelical ridge, proximal to its bifurcation, relative to the prominence of the helix.

column4: 对耳轮后侧弯曲边缘从对耳屏开始延伸，最初几乎垂直于下降的螺旋，遮挡部分外耳结构。
column5: Posterior curving of the antihelix from its origin at the antitragus, traveling initially almost perpendicular to the descending helix and obscuring some of the concha.

column4: 与正常耳轮的突出相比，接近分叉处的对耳轮脊的突出减少。
column5: Decreased protrusion of the antihelical ridge, proximal to its bifurcation, relative to the prominence of a normal helix.

column2: Abnormality of inferior crus of antihelix
column4: 软骨脊在对耳轮脚分叉处产生，分叉在对耳轮脚上升螺旋的皱襞下方结束，至外耳三角窝处分离出对耳轮脚。
column5: An abnormality of the inferior crus of the antihelix is the lower cartilaginous ridge arising at the bifurcation of the antihelix that ends beneath the fold of the ascending helix, and separates the concha from the triangular fossa.

column4: 对耳轮干的异常，指对耳轮分叉为上、下脚的分叉下方的干部出现异常。
column5: An abnormality of the stem of the antihelix, which is the part below the bifurcation of the antihelix into the inferior and superior crura.

column2: Abnormality of superior crus of antihelix
column4: 软骨脊在对耳轮脚分叉处产生，分叉在对耳轮脚上升螺旋的皱襞上方结束，至外耳三角窝处分离出对耳轮脚。
column5: An abnormality of the superior crus of the antihelix is the upper cartilaginous ridge arising at the bifurcation of the antihelix that ends beneath the fold of the ascending helix, and separates the concha from the triangular fossa.

column4: 与正常对耳轮干的突出相比，对耳轮上脚的突出减少。
column5: Decreased protrusion of the superior crus relative to the prominence of a normal antihelix stem.

column4: 与正常对耳轮干的突出相比，对耳轮上脚的突出增加。
column5: Increased protrusion of the superior crus relative to the prominence of a normal antihelix stem.

column4: 对耳屏在垂直于耳的平面的角度定位（从耳的平面取向的距离）。对耳屏与耳朵平面垂直成角（方向是远离耳朵平面）
column5: Positioning of the antitragus at an angle perpendicular to the plane of the ear (oriented away from the plane of the ear).

column4: 切迹的底部和对耳轮的内缘之间的区域的向前上方突出的部分缺失。
column5: Absence of the anterosuperior prominence of the area between the bottom of the incisura and the inner margin of the antihelix.

column4: 对耳屏出现双峰，而不是单峰。
column5: Double rather than single peak of the antitragus.

column4: 切迹底部和对耳轮内缘之间区域向前上部分突出减少。
column5: Reduction in the anterosuperior prominence of the area between the bottom of the incisura and the inner margin of the antihelix.

column4: 耳廓软骨上端的突起隐入颞部头皮的皱襞皮下。
column5: Invagination of the superior part of the auricle under a fold of temporal skin.

column4: 与对耳轮和其上脚大小缩小相关的隐耳类型。
column5: A type of cryptotia associated with reduction in size of the antihelix and superior crus.

column4: 与对耳轮和其下脚大小缩小相关的隐耳类型。
column5: A type of cryptotia associated with reduction in size of the antihelix and inferior crus that are affected.

column4: 耳屏和上升耳轮之间连续，没有一个朝向外耳的后伸的结构（小腿状结构）。
column5: Continuum between the tragus and ascending helix, without any evidence of a posterior extension (crus) towards the concha.

column2: Crus of helix connected to antihelix
column4: 耳轮脚脊延伸与对耳轮脚连接。
column5: Extension of the ridge of the crus helix across the ear and connection of the crus to the antihelix.

column4: 耳轮脚曲线轮廓接近或结合到对耳屏。
column5: Curving course of the crus of the helix, approaching or joining the antitragus.

column2: Tragal bridge of crus of helix
column4: 耳轮脚前侧起点位于耳屏的上缘，覆盖耳甲腔的上部并止于对耳轮。
column5: The anterior origin of the crus encompasses the superior margin of the tragus, the crus overrides the upper portion of the conchal cavum and ends at the antihelix.

column2: Expanded terminal portion of crus of helix
column4: 靠近对耳轮处的耳轮脚后缘渐增宽，而非逐渐变细。
column5: Widening, rather than tapering, of the crus at its posterior border near the antihelix.

column4: 位于耳轮后部和上部交接处的耳轮结节性小缺损。
column5: Small defect of the helical fold that lies at the junction of the superior and descending portions of the helix.

column4: 位于耳轮后上部交接处的耳轮结节性小膨大。
column5: Small expansion of the helical fold at the junction of the superior and descending portions of the helix.

column4: 耳轮外表面凸面的线性环状切记。
column5: Linear, circumferential indentation in the convexity of the outer surface of the helix.

column4: 耳垂的前表面比耳朵的其它部分更接近冠状平面。
column5: Positioning of the anterior surface of the ear lobe in a more coronal plane than the remainder of the ear.

column3: 耳轮根部上升段不连续

column4: 耳垂下缘在凸起处中断不连续。
column5: Discontinuity in the convexity of the inferior margin of the lobe.

column4: 耳廓包含所有正常的耳组分，平均纵向长度低于平均值两个以上的标准偏差。
column5: Presence of all the normal ear components and the median longitudinal length more than two standard deviations below the mean.

column4: 存在一些耳廓的结构，但这些结构与公认的耳廓正常标志不符。
column5: Presence of some auricular structures, but none of these structures conform to recognized ear components.

column4: 上升的耳轮与耳轮脚汇合处和切迹底部之间没有凸起或者耳轮廓脊凸。
column5: Lack of convexity or prominence of the contour of the ridge between the bottom of the incisura and the confluence of the ascending helix and crus helix.

column4: 在顶端的浅凹槽使得耳屏脊的高度增加，给人一种双峰的外观。
column5: Increased height of the tragal ridge with a shallow indentation at the apex, giving the appearance of a double peak.

column4: 耳屏完全或者部分的重复，部分位于正常耳屏的前方。
column5: A complete or partial duplication of the tragus; expected to lie anterior to the normal tragus.

column4: 耳屏后外侧突起增加。
column5: Increase posterolateral protrusion of the tragus.

column4: 耳屏后外侧突起的减少。
column5: Decreased posterolateral protrusion of the tragus.

column4: 红细胞的大小变异度增加。
column5: Abnormally increased variability in the size of erythrocytes.

column4: 分枝杆菌感染的易感性增加，表现为反复发作的分枝杆菌感染。
column5: Increased susceptibility to mycobacterial infections, as manifested by recurrent episodes of mycobacterial infection.

column3: 反复鸟分枝杆菌复合菌感染
column4: 鸟分枝杆菌复合菌感染的易感性增加，表现为反复发作的鸟分枝杆菌复合菌感染。
column5: Increased susceptibility to mycobacterial avium complex infections, as manifested by recurrent episodes of mycobacterial infection.

column2: Abnormality of the urinary system physiology

column4: 发生正常肺组织的脏层胸膜内的，一般不与气管支气管树相通一种肺隔离症。
column5: A type of pulmonary sequestration that occurs within the visceral pleura of normal lung tissue, usually without communication with the tracheobronchial tree.

column3: 尿中碳酸氢盐浓度异常
column4: 尿液中碳酸氢盐的浓度异常。
column5: An abnormality of the concentration of `hydrogencarbonate` (CHEBI:17544) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).

column4: 尿中钙离子浓度的异常。
column5: An abnormality of `calcium` (CHEBI:29108) concentration in the urine (FMA:12274).

column4: 尿儿茶酚胺的浓度异常。
column5: An abnormal level of urinary `catecholamine` (CHEBI:33567) concentration.

column4: 在`后脑`（FMA:67687）的异常时，也被称为菱脑。
column5: An abnormality of the `hindbrain` (FMA:67687), also known as the rhombencephalon.

column4: 在`后脑`的异常（FMA:62003）。后脑是由脑桥和小脑组成。
column5: An abnormality of the `metencephalon` (FMA:62003). The metencephalon is the part of the hindbrain that consists of the pons and the cerebellum.

column4: 一种无神经节巨结肠，其中的无神经节节段不超出上段乙状结肠。
column5: A type of aganglionic megacolon in which the aganglionic segment does not extend beyond the upper sigmoid.

column3: 长节段无神经节巨结肠
column4: 一种无神经节的巨结肠，从近端延伸到乙状结肠。
column5: A type of aganglionic megacolon in which the aganglionic segment extends proximal to the sigmoid.

column4: 一种无神经节性巨结肠，其无神经节细胞节段包括整个结肠。
column5: A type of aganglionic megacolon in which the aganglionic segment comprises the entire colon.

column2: EEG with occipital sharp slow waves
column4: 脑电图，枕部局灶尖慢波。尖慢波是时限80至200毫秒之间的短暂尖波紧随一个慢波。
column5: EEG with sharp slow waves in the occipital region. Sharp slow waves are focal sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec followed by a slow wave.

column2: EEG with parietal sharp slow waves
column4: 脑电图，在顶部区域的尖慢波。尖慢波是时限80至200毫秒之间的局灶短暂尖波紧随一个慢波。
column5: EEG with sharp slow waves in the parietal region. Sharp slow waves are focal sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec followed by a slow wave.

column2: EEG with temporal sharp slow waves
column4: 脑电图，在颞区的尖慢波。尖慢波是时限80至200毫秒的局灶短暂尖波紧随一个慢波。
column5: EEG with sharp slow waves in the temporal region. Sharp slow waves are focal sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec followed by a slow wave.

column2: EEG with frontal sharp slow waves
column4: 脑电图额部尖慢波。尖慢波是时限80至200毫秒之间的短暂局灶尖波紧随一个慢波。
column5: EEG with sharp slow waves in the frontal region. Sharp slow waves are focal sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec followed by a slow wave.

column2: EEG with central sharp slow waves
column3: 脑电图，伴中央区尖慢波
column4: 脑电图尖慢波位于中央区。尖慢波是时限80-200毫秒的局灶尖波之后紧随一个慢波。
column5: EEG with sharp slow waves in the central region. Sharp slow waves are focal sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec followed by a slow wave.

column4: 脑电图，在枕区时限80至200毫秒之间的短暂尖波。
column5: EEG with sharp waves in the occipital region, i.e., sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec.

column4: 脑电图尖波位于中央区，即时限80-200毫秒的短暂尖峰样波
column5: EEG with sharp waves in the central region, i.e., sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec.

column4: 脑电图额部尖波，即时限80至200毫秒之间的短暂尖波。
column5: EEG with sharp waves in the frontal region, i.e., sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec.

column4: 脑电图在顶区的尖波，即时限80至200毫秒之间的短暂尖波。
column5: EEG with sharp waves in the parietal region, i.e., sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec.

column4: 脑电图，在颞区的尖波，5373时限80至200毫秒之间的短暂尖波。
column5: EEG with sharp waves in the temporal region, i.e., sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec.

column4: 任何手指或脚趾的形态异常。
column5: A morphological abnormality of any finger or toe.

column4: 指（趾）腹的软组织隆起。
column5: A soft tissue prominence of the ventral aspects of the fingertips or toe tips.

column4: 手指单个指骨节段的缺如。
column5: The absence of a phalangeal segment of a finger.

column4: 手指远端增宽。
column5: Increased width of the distal segment of a finger.

column4: 足的完全缺如，在胫骨或腓骨的远端没有骨的结构。
column5: The total absence of the foot, with no bony elements distal to the tibia or fibula.

column4: 对于从出生到16岁的孩子，手掌的长度超过第97百分位数；或者手掌的长度相对手指长度或肢体长度显得相对较长。
column5: For children from birth to 16 years of age the length of the palm is more than the 97th centile; or, the length of the palm appears relatively long compared to the finger length or the limb length.

column4: 足底侧缘有一处凸起。
column5: The contour of the foot in lateral profile has a convex shape.

column4: 拇指宽度增加而背腹方向的宽度不增加。
column5: Increased thumb width without increased dorso-ventral dimension.

column4: 脚趾或者拇趾单个趾骨的缺失。
column5: The absence of a phalangeal segment of a toe or hallux.

column4: 脚趾沿前后轴（在脚掌的平面上）的偏离。
column5: Divergence of digits along the anteroposterior axis (in the plane of the sole).

column4: 相对手/脚或个人体型不成比例的趾变窄（周长减少）。
column5: Digits are disproportionately narrow (reduced girth) for the hand/foot size or build of the individual.

column4: 脚趾从近端向远端逐渐变小。
column5: The gradual reduction in girth of the digit from proximal to distal.

column4: 连接近端和远端手掌横纹的纹路。
column5: A crease that connects the proximal and distal transverse palmar creases.

column4: 近端横纹（五指折痕）外延到手掌尺侧缘。
column5: Extension of the proximal transverse crease (five finger crease) to the ulnar edge of the palm.

column4: 甲板将部分分离的甲纵向分隔，每一个甲都具单独的横向曲率半径。
column5: A nail plate that has a longitudinal separation with partially separated nails, each with a separate lateral radius of curvature.

column4: 甲宽度异常变窄。
column5: Decreased width of nail.

column4: 长骨的结构或形状异常。
column5: An abnormal structure or shape of the long bones.

column4: 只有单侧冠状缝骨性愈合。
column5: Synostosis affecting only one of the coronal sutures.

column4: 只有左侧冠状缝骨性愈合。
column5: Synostosis affecting only the left coronal suture.

column4: 只有右冠状缝骨性融合。
column5: Unicoronal synostosis affecting only the right coronal suture.

column4: 右侧和左侧冠状缝骨性愈合。
column5: Synostosis affecting the right and the left coronal suture.

column4: 两侧人字骨缝过早闭合。
column5: Premature synostosis of both lambdoid sutures.

column4: 单侧人字缝过早骨性愈合。
column5: Premature synostosis of only one lambdoid suture.

column4: 左侧人字缝过早的骨性愈合。
column5: Premature synostosis of only the left lambdoid suture.

column4: 右侧人字缝过早融合。
column5: Premature synostosis of only the right lambdoid suture.

column4: 不完全融合的下巴，由发育缺陷造成而表现为下巴的中线裂或缝。
column5: Incomplete fusion of the chin, resulting from a developmental defect and manifesting as a midline cleft or fissure of the chin.

column4: 涉及至少2处头盖骨缝过早闭合，而颅缝融合的确切模式还未能精确识别。
column5: Craniosynostosis involving at least 2 cranial sutures, where the exact pattern of sutures fused has not been precisely specified.

column4: 所有颅骨颅缝早闭。
column5: Craniosynostosis of all calvarial sutures.

column4: 头骨前部不对称
column5: Asymmetry of the anterior part of the skull.

column4: 头骨后部不对称。
column5: Asymmetry of the posterior part of the skull.

column4: 囟门的异常
column5: An abnormality of the `fontanelle` (FMA:75438).

column4: 任何颅骨缝异常，即在胎儿或新生儿不完全骨化的头骨间隙的六个由膜覆盖的开口之中任何一个的异常。
column5: Any anomaly of a cranial suture, that is one of the six membrane-covered openings in the incompletely ossified skull of the fetus or newborn infant.

column4: 额骨缝过早融合。
column5: Premature fusion of the metopic suture.

column4: 单侧面部组织包括肌肉、骨骼和皮肤的萎缩。
column5: Unilateral atrophy of facial tissues, including muscles, bones and skin.

column4: 单侧面部组织包括肌肉和骨骼的发育不全。
column5: Unilateral underdevelopment of the  facial tissues, including muscles and bones.

column4: 在平时脸面对称的新生儿或婴儿哭泣时观察到脸面部不对称，表现为嘴一侧向下拉而另一侧不动。
column5: Asymmetry observed in the face of a neonate or infant whose face appears symmetric at rest and asymmetric during crying as the mouth is pulled downward on one side while not moving on the other side.

column4: 前额发量过多。
column5: Excessive amount of hair growth on forehead.

column4: 双侧颞伤痕般缺陷，类似钳子夹过的痕迹。
column5: Bilateral temporal scarlike defects, which are said to resemble forceps marks.

column4: 嘴巴轮廓的异常。
column5: An abnormality of the outline, configuration, or contour of the mouth.

column4: 上唇红唇缘的异常。上唇红色唇缘指和相邻正常皮肤清晰分界。
column5: An abnormality of the vermilion border, the sharp demarcation between the lip (red colored) and the adjacent normal skin.

column2: Incomplete cleft of the upper lip
column4: 上唇的微小单侧唇裂，可能会表现为一个小缺口。
column5: A subtle unilateral cleft of the upper lip, which may appear as a small indentation.

column4: 上唇的宽度增加。
column5: Increased width of the `upper lip` (FMA:59817).

column4: 儿童达到运动或精神领域发育里程碑的轻度延迟。
column5: A mild delay in the achievement of motor or mental milestones in the domains of development of a child.

column4: 儿童达到运动或精神领域发育里程碑的中度延迟。
column5: A moderate delay in the achievement of motor or mental milestones in the domains of development of a child.

column3: 严重的全面性发育迟缓
column4: 小孩发育领域中的，达到某些运动或精神发育的里程碑严重延迟。
column5: A severe delay in the achievement of motor or mental milestones in the domains of development of a child.

column3: 语言表达中度发育延迟
column4: 获取根据需求、愿望或想法运用语言进行交流的能力中度延迟。
column5: A moderate delay in the acquisition of the ability to use language to communicate needs, wishes, or thoughts.

column3: 语言表达轻度发育延迟
column4: 获取根据需求、愿望或想法运用语言进行交流的能力轻度延迟。
column5: A mild delay in the acquisition of the ability to use language to communicate needs, wishes, or thoughts.

column4: 涉及眼睛外展运动的异常。
column5: An abnormality involving the movement of the eye outwards.

column2: Abnormality of the sixth cranial nerve
column4: 在'外展神经`的异常（FMA:50867）。
column5: An abnormality of the `abducens nerve` (FMA:50867).

column4: 由于外展神经功能异常引起受累眼球转向外侧的运动障碍。
column5: Malfunction of the abducens nerve as manifested by impairment of the ability of the affected eye to be moved outward.

column3: 语言理解轻度发育延迟
column4: 获取理解他人言语能力的轻度延迟。
column5: A mild delay in the acquisition of the ability to understand the speech of others.

column3: 语言理解中度发育延迟
column4: 获取理解他人言语能力的中度延迟。
column5: A moderate delay in the acquisition of the ability to understand the speech of others.

column3: 严重的理解性语言发育延迟
column4: 获得理解他人语言的能力的严重延迟。
column5: A severe delay in the acquisition of the ability to understand the speech of others.

column4: 动脉内膜过度形成纤维结缔组织。
column5: Formation of excess fibrous connective tissue in the tunica intima (innermost layer) of arteries.

column4: 全身泛发性的皮肤异常。
column5: An abnormality of the skin that is not localized to any one particular region.

column4: 皮损局限在特定的部位，没有泛发。
column5: A lesion of the skin that is located in a specific region rather than being generalized.

column4: 局限于特殊部位的皮肤异常。
column5: An abnormality of the skin that is restricted to a particular body region.

column4: 毛发密度的异常。
column5: An abnormality of the density of hair growth.

column4: 泛发性的毛发色素减退。
column5: Reduced pigmentation of hair diffusely.

column4: 毛发缺乏正常的光泽、亮度。
column5: Hair that lacks the lustre (shine or gleam) of normal hair.

column4: 后天形成的毛发分布的异常。
column5: An abnormality of the distribution of hair growth that is acquired during the course of life.

column4: 一种先天性的毛发分布异常。
column5: A congenital abnormality of the distribution of hair growth.

column4: 毛发数目的异常。
column5: An abnormal amount of hair.

column4: 毛发的生长速度偏离常态。
column5: Hair whose growth rate deviates from the norm.

column4: 色素减退引起的毛发变白。
column5: Hypopigmented hair that appears white.

column4: 毛发的色素减退呈斑片状。
column5: Reduced pigmentation of hair in patches.

column4: 指甲黄染。
column5: Yellowish discoloration of the nails.

column4: 皮肤表皮层的增厚。
column5: Thickening of the epidermal layer of the skin.

column4: 先天性骶尾部真皮深层色素沉着。
column5: Congenital deep dermal melanosis in the sacral area.

column4: 由于发育缺陷导致内耳缺失。
column5: Absence of the inner ear due to a developmental defect.

column4: 耳蜗分隔不完全。正常情况下前庭阶与鼓阶由蜗间隔分离；在顶转前庭阶与鼓阶经蜗孔相通。

column5: Increased size of the `cochlear duct` (FMA:61119), i.e., of a duct that communicates between the perilymphatic space and the subarachnoid space, and transmits a vein from the cochlea to join the internal jugular.

column5: Underdevelopment of the vestibular nerve.

column5: An abnormality of the dorsal columns, i.e., of the dorsal portion of the gray substance of the spinal cord. The dorsal column consists of the fasciculus gracilis and fasciculus cuneatus and itself is part of the dorsal funiculus.

column4: 继发于中枢神经系统异常的肌张力减低。
column5: Reduced muscle tone secondary to an abnormality of the central nervous system.

column5: Atrophy of the tibialis muscle.

column5: An abnormality of `myelination` (GO:0042552) of nerves in the central nervous system.

column5: `Delayed` (PATO:0000502) `myelination` (GO:0042552) in the peripheral nervous system.

column4: 周围感觉神经脱髓鞘。
column5: Demyelination of peripheral sensory nerves.

column4: 一种不相称的短小体型（HP:0003498），特点是短小躯干，但四肢是平均尺寸，出生时即为致死性的。
column5: A type of `disproportionate short stature` (HP:0003498) characterized by a short trunk but a average-sized limbs that is lethal at birth.

column3: 儿童期发病的短肢型矮小
婴儿发病的短躯干矮小症
column4: 一种不相称的短小体型（HP:0003498），特点是短小躯干，但四肢是平均尺寸，婴儿时期发病。
column5: A type of `disproportionate short stature` (HP:0003498) characterized by a short trunk but a average-sized limbs with onset in infancy.

column3: 中度胎儿宫内发育迟缓
column4: 宫内发育迟缓程度大于同性别同胎龄至少3个标准偏差，但不到4个标准差。
column5: Intrauterine growth retardation that is at least 3 standard deviations (SD) below average, but not as low as 4 SD, corrected for sex and gestational age.

column4: 当第二产程进展延长时，应用一个真空设备的吸引装置辅助胎儿分娩。
column5: Delivery of newborn by means of a ventouse, a vacuum device used to assist the delivery of a baby when the second stage of labour has not progressed adequately.

column4: 胎头娩出后，胎儿前肩被嵌顿在耻骨联合上方，用常规助产方法不能娩出胎儿双肩。
column5: Shoulder dystocia occurs when the fetal anterior shoulder impacts against the maternal symphysis following delivery of the vertex.

column4: 胎盘异常的一种，胎盘内有众多囊腔合并胎盘增大。
column5: An abnormality of the placenta in which there are numerous cystic spaces within the placenta as well as placental enlargement.

column4: 胎盘钙化指胎盘上存在钙质沉积。
column5: Calcification placenta refers to the placenta with calcium deposits on .

column4: 胎盘梗死是肉眼可见的局灶性损伤，显微镜下表现为绒毛膜坏死样病变，病因为绒毛膜螺旋动脉痉挛或物理性梗阻。胎盘梗死与死胎。胎儿窘迫和成熟障碍有明确关系。
column5: Placental infarcts are macroscopically-evident focal parenchymal lesions in which microscopy shows necrosis and approximation of villi. The pathogenesis are that the infarctions are to be attributed to spastic or organic obliteration of the spiral arteries. Placental infarctions are significantly associated with fetal mortality, dysmaturity, and fetal distress.

column4: 胎盘早剥是指妊娠20周后或分娩期，正常位置的胎盘在胎儿娩出前从子宫壁剥离，是一种妊娠期重症。
column5: Placental abruption is a serious condition in which the separation of the placenta from its site of implatation after 20 weeks of gestain or during the delivery before birth
The age group when the cessation of life happens.
Death during adolescence, the period between childhood and adulthood (roughly between the ages of 10 and 19 years).

column4: 体内`氯`(CHEBI:17996) 平衡稳态或或浓度的异常。
column5: An abnormality of `chloride` (CHEBI:17996 homeostasis or concentration in the body.

column4: 异常增加`chloride`（CHEBI:17996）的浓度在血液中。
column5: An abnormally increased `chloride` (CHEBI:17996) concentration in the blood.

column4: 锌在`blood`增加consentration（FMA:9670）。
column5: An increased consentration of zinc in the `blood` (FMA:9670).

column4: 胎脉络丛囊肿是发育中的胎儿的侧脑室的脉络丛中发现的内超声离散的小囊肿（3mm以上），一般出现于14至24周妊娠。胎儿脉络丛囊肿的成像需要在胎头的横向平面，在检测侧脑室相同的水平。应双边检查脉络丛是否有包囊的存在。胎儿脉络丛囊肿的大小与临床无关（PMID:16100637）。
column5: Fetal choroid plexus cysts (CPCs) are sonographically discrete, small cysts (3 mm or more) found in the choroid plexus within the lateral cerebral ventricles of the developing fetus at 14 to 24 weeks gestation. Imaging of the choroid plexus is performed in the transverse plane of the fetal head at the same level that the lateral cerebral ventricle is evaluated. The choroid plexus should be inspected bilaterally for the presence of cysts. The size of CPCs is not of clinical relevance (pmid:16100637).

column4: 小脑延髓池测量胎头角度15度尾椎canthomeatal线的横断视图。的前/后直径取小脑vemis的劣/后表面之间的颅骨的内表面上。的放大脑池蚤是由10mm以上（:16100637 PMID）前/后面直径限定。
column5: The cisterna magna is measured on a transaxial view of the fetal head angled 15 degrees caudal to the canthomeatal line. The anterior/posterior diameter is taken between the inferior/posterior surface of the vemis of the cerebellum to the inner surface of the cranium. An enlarged cisternal magna is defined by an anterior/posterior diameter of 10 mm or more (pmid:16100637).

column4: 胎儿股骨短小定义为股骨长度测值小于同孕龄第2.5百分位、或小于以双顶径为标准计算孕龄的第10百分位以下。测量时股骨应与超声波束垂直，并可见骨骺软骨，但其不包含在测量范围内。
column5: A short femur length is defined as either a measurement below the 2.5th percentile for gestational age or a measurement that is less than 0.9 of that predicted by the measured biparietal diameter. The femur should be measured with the bone perpendicular to the ultrasound beam and with epiphyseal cartilages visible but not included in the measurement (pmid:16100637).

column4: 胎儿肱骨短小定义为肱骨长度测值小于同孕龄第2.5百分位、或小于以双顶径为标准计算孕龄的第10百分位以下。测量时肱骨应与超声波束垂直，并可见骨骺软骨，但其不包含在测量范围内。
column5: A short humerus length is defined as a length below the 2.5th percentile for gestational age or as a measurement less than 0.9 of that predicted by the measured biparietal diameter. The humerus should be measured with the bone perpendicular to the ultrasound beam and with epiphyseal cartilages visible but not included in the measurement (pmid:16100637).

column4: 产前超声，鼻骨是胎儿鼻梁内的薄回声带。胎儿面部面对探头，成像面在颜面部正中矢状切面，超声声束与鼻骨长轴成90°，测量两端鼻骨边界的距离。鼻骨缺失，或其长度小于同孕周正常值的第2.5百分位数是有显著差异的。
column5: On prenatal ultrasound, the nasal bone is a thin echogenic line within the bridge of the fetal nose. The fetus is imaged facing the transducer with the fetal face strictly in the midline. The angle of insonation is 90 degrees, with the longitudinal axis of the nasal bone as the reference line. Calibres are placed at each end of the nasal bone. Absence of the nasal bone or measurements below 2.5th percentile are considered significant (pmid:16100637).

column4: 第五手指五指由发育不全或不存在中间指骨的第五位的定义。超声波鉴定胎儿的手必须首先进行，然后适当的放大倍率来实现。这种评价需要伸缩5个手指的。 （:16100637 PMID）当第五手指的中间指骨明显高于正常或不存在，这往往使手指被向内弯曲越小诊断确立。
column5: Fifth finger clinodactyly is defined by a hypoplastic or absent mid-phalanx of the fifth digit. Ultrasound identification of the fetal hand must first be undertaken and then appropriate magnification accomplished. The evaluation requires stretching of the 5 fingers. The diagnosis is established when the middle phalanx of the fifth finger is markedly smaller than normal or absent, which often causes the finger to be curved inward  (pmid:16100637).

column3: 母体血清甲胎蛋白浓度增高
column4: 与相同胎龄的正常值相比，异常升高的母体血清甲胎蛋白浓度。
column5: An abnormally high concentration of serum alpha-fetoprotein as compared to normal values for gestational-age.

column3: 母体血清绒毛膜促性腺激素浓度增高
column4: 与相同胎龄的正常值相比，异常升高的母体血清人绒毛膜促性腺激素浓度。
column5: An abnormally high concentration of maternal serum human chorionic gonadotropin as compared to normal values for gestational-age.

column3: 母体血清绒毛膜促性腺激素浓度降低

column4: 与相同胎龄的正常值相比，异常降低的母体血清PAPP-A浓度（妊娠相关血浆蛋白A）。
column5: An abnormally low concentration of serum PAPP-A (pregnancy associated plasma protein A), as compared to normal values for gestational-age.

column4: 非整倍体筛查中，母体血清学标记物水平异常增高或降低。
