column4: 孕妇自身免疫性疾病与胎儿流产及胎死宫内相关。常见的病种包括系统性红斑狼疮，类风湿关节炎，以及血管炎综合征等。
column5: Maternal autoimmune diseases are associated with increased rates of fetal wastage.The most common maternal autoimmune diseases are systemic lupus erythematosus(SLE),rheumatoid arthritis,and a host of vasculitis syndromes and so on.

column4: 孕期母体接触过可能对胎儿发育有影响的药物、化学制剂、感染源、物理因子等,可能会导致胎儿形体和/或神经系统发育异常，甚至死亡。
column5: Matenal has been exposured  to  teratogenic substance for example drugs、 chemicals、 source of infection and other physical factors,during pregnancy,which  may cause fetal morphological abnormalities、neurological abnormalities or death.

column4: 麻醉诱导的“横纹肌溶解”。
column5: `Rhabdomyolysis` (HP:0003201) induced by anesthesia.

column4: 酒精摄入诱导的“横纹肌溶解”。
column5: `Rhabdomyolysis` (HP:0003201) induced by intake of alcohol.

column4: 在`延髓`的异常（FMA:62004），延髓是脑干的下半部。
column5: An abnormality of the `medulla oblongata` (FMA:62004), the lower half of the brainstem.

column4: 在中枢神经系统中运动的控制或生产的异常。
column5: An anomaly of the control or production of movement in the central nervous system.

column4: 上肢屈曲内收、下肢伸直的一种强直类型。这标志着脑白质，内囊，或丘脑病变。
column5: A type of rigidity in which the arms are in flexion and adduction and the legs are extended. This signifies a lesion in the cerebral white matter, internal capsules, or thalamus.

column4: 一种类型的脑瘫，其特点是缓慢的、不自主的肌肉运动和肌张力忽高忽低。
column5: A type of cerebral palsy characterized by slow, involuntary muscle movement and mixed muscle tone.

column4: 认知，精神或记忆异常。
column5: Cognitive, psychiatric or memory anomaly.

column4: 低分化的（低分叶的）或双叶中性粒细胞的细胞核。
column5: Hyposegmented (hypolob化ulated) or bilobed neutrophil nuclei.

column4: 踝阵挛是引起足部反复屈伸运动的无意识腱反射。踝阵挛通过快速向上弯曲足部进行检查。
column5: Clonus is an involuntary tendon reflex that causes repeated flexion and extension of the foot. Ankle clonus is tested by rapidly flexing the foot upward.

column4: 阵挛是一种不自主腱反射，导致反复地屈伸脚。膝阵挛可通过朝向足趾快速推髌骨进行检查。
column5: Clonus is an involuntary tendon reflex that causes repeated flexion and extension of the foot. Knee clonus can be tested by rapidly pushing the patella towards the toes.

column4: 出生时已存在的小头畸形（HP:0000252）
column5: Microcephaly (HP:0000252) that is present already at the time of birth.

column2: Functional abnormality of the middle ear
column4: 中耳功能的异常。

column4: 在“锤骨”（FMA: 52753）的异常，锤骨是位于中耳的听小骨之一。
column5: An abnormality of the `malleus* (FMA:52753), an ossicle in the middle ear.

column4: 锤骨不发育（FMA: 52753）。
column5: Aplasia of the `malleus` (FMA:52753).

column4: 镫骨不发育（FMA: 52751）。
column5: Aplasia of the `stapes` (FMA:52751).

column4: 指睫毛最初存在，后来消退至无。
column5: This term refers to the loss of eyelashes that were previously present.

column4: 发生于食管的癌。
column5: The presence of a `carcinoma` (MPATH:549) of the `esophagus` (FMA:7131).
Onset of disease at up to 8 weeks of gestation.
Onset prior to birth but after 8 weeks of gestation.
Onset of disease at the age of between 16 and 40 years.
Onset of disease at the age of between 1 and 5 years.

column3: 小肠神经节细胞缺乏症

column5: A lack of intestinal ganglion cells (i.e., an aganglionic section of bowel) affecting the small intestine.

column3: 十二指肠神经节细胞缺乏症

column4: 胆囊的缺失或发育不全。

column5: A developmental defect in which the `gallbladder` (FMA:7202) fails to form.

column4: 眼睛和面部肌肉的突然，重复，无节奏的活动（痉挛）。

column4: （婴儿）经由鼻腔吐奶。
column5: Regurgitation of milk through the nose.

column4: （婴儿期）由于喂养问题需要行鼻胃管饲。
column5: Feeding problem necessitating nasogastric tube feeding.

column4: （婴儿期）由于喂养问题需要进行胃造口管饲。
column5: Feeding problem necessitating gastrostomy tube feeding.

column2: Abnormality of small intestinal villus morphology

column4: 肠绒毛萎缩或缺失。
column5: The enteric villi are atrophic or absent.

column5: Aplasia of the `stapes` (FMA:52751).

column3: 极重度感音神经性听力损失

column4: 此型眼球震颤呈眼球跳动上升。震动幻视通常非常严重，但是症状通常是短暂的。
column5: In primary position the Upbeat nystagmus beats upward. The associated oscillopsias are often very irritating, but the symptoms are usually transient.

column4: 眼球、视神经、视交叉及视束缺失。 MRI扫描或体格检查眼部无内容物。
column5: Absence of globe, optic nerve, chiasm and optic tracts.  No evidence of ocular tissue on MRI scan or examination.

column4: 在泪点的异常（FMA:59365），泪点在下眼睑靠近内侧眼角部位，主要作用是吸收结膜囊中的泪液，引流到泪道中。
column5: An abnormality of the `lacrimal punctum` (FMA:59365), an opening on the eyelid close to the medial canthus that drains tears from the conjunctival sac into the lacrimal duct in the same eyelid.

column4: 一种单侧眼睛发育过小的生长畸形。
column5: A developmental anomaly characterized by abnormal smallness of one eye.

column4: 在`泪道（FMA:61063）的异常，泪道是泪液排出的通道，眼泪从泪小点进入泪囊。
column5: An abnormality of the ` lacrimal duct` (FMA:61063), a duct that drain tears from the conjunctiva, via the lacrimal puncta, into the lacrimal sac.

column4: 在泪腺上的异常（FMA:59101）泪腺是杏核状的腺体，分泌的液体是泪膜的水层。
column5: Abnormality of the `lacrimal gland` (FMA:59101), i.e., of the almond-shaped gland that secretes the aqueous layer of the tear film for each eye.

column2: Anterior synechiae of the anterior chamber
column4: 虹膜和角膜之间的粘连。
column5: Adhesions between the iris and the cornea.

column2: Posterior synechiae of the anterior chamber
column4: 虹膜和晶状体之间的粘连。

column4: 晶状体和角膜没有分开的发育异常。

column4: 角膜的前后厚度不正常。

column4: 角膜的前后厚度增加。
column5: A increased anteroposterior thickness of the cornea.

column4: 角膜内皮细胞异常（FMA:63882），即，角膜内皮细胞是角膜内表面上的单层细胞。

column3: 角膜内皮细胞异常迁移

column4: Descemet膜异常，Descemet膜是角膜内皮的基底膜。
column5: Abnormality of Descemet's membrane, which is the basement membrane of the corneal endothelium.

column2: Reduced number of corneal endothelial cells
column3: 角膜内皮细胞的数目减少
column4: 角膜内皮细胞数量的减少。
column5: A reduction in the number of corneal endothelial cells.

column4: 角膜基质（FMA:58306）异常，也被称为角膜的固有层异常。
column5: An abnormality of the `stroma of cornea` (FMA:58306), also known as the substantia propria of cornea.

column4: 角膜基质层中央部位的透明度下降。
column5: Reduced transparency of the central portion of the corneal stroma.

column4: 角膜基质的透明度降低。
column5: Generalized reduced transparency of the stroma of the cornea.

column4: 角膜上皮的异常（FMA:58263），角膜上皮是指覆盖在角膜前部的上皮组织。
column5: Abnormality of the `corneal epithelium` (FMA:58263), that is of the epithelial tissue that covers the front of the cornea.

column4: 新生血管向内生长进入角膜。
column5: Ingrowth of new blood vessels into the cornea.

column4: 虹膜表面的新生血管。
column5: New growth of vessels on the surface of the iris.

column4: 部分虹膜发育不全。
column5: Sectoral aplasia of the iris.

column4: 虹膜的异常扩大。
column5: Abnormal dilatation of the iris.

column4: 多个瞳孔。
column5: Multiple pupils.

column4: 晶状体前表面的锥形突起异常，是一种发育异常。
column5: A conical projection of the anterior surface of the lens, occurring as a developmental anomaly.

column4: 晶状体后表面的锥形突起，是一个发育异常。
column5: A conical projection of the posterior surface of the lens, occurring as a developmental anomaly.

column3: 黄斑中心凹的发育缺陷
column4: 先天性黄斑中心凹缺失。
column5: Congenital absence of the fovea.

column4: 渐进性的黄斑病变，其特征为黄斑区高荧光和低荧光呈同心圆形式。
column5: Progressive maculopathy characterized by concentric regions of hyper- and hypo-pigmentation.

column4: 黄斑囊样水肿（CME）是任何类型的黄斑水肿，涉及囊肿形成。
column5: Cystoid macular edema (CME) is any type of macular edema that involves cyst formation.

column4: 脉络膜新生血管（CNV）是眼睛脉络膜层的新生血管。
column5: Choroidal neovascularization (CNV) is the creation of new blood vessels in the choroid layer of the eye.

column4: 黄斑区的灰色病变，常常没有明确的界限。
column5: Pale often indistinct lesions of the macula.

column4: 黄斑裂孔是黄斑区的小孔，位于视网膜的中央。
column5: A macular hole is a small break in the macula, located in the center of the retina.

column4: 黄斑中心凹（FMA:58637）的色素沉着增加。
column5: Increased amount of pigmentation in the `macula lutea` (FMA:58637).

column4: 玻璃膜疣是细胞外物质（脂褐素）在眼睛Bruch膜上聚集形成的细小黄色或白色物质沉积。
column5: Drusen (singular, 'druse') are tiny yellow or white accumulations of extracellular material (lipofuscin) that build up in Bruch's membrane of the eye.

column4: 黄斑区的视网膜劈裂。
column5: Splitting of the retina in the macular region.

column4: 视网膜的色素沉着量增加。
column5: Increased amount of pigmentation of the retina.

column4: 显示为血液填充的视网膜内层内或视盘的表面上的一种视网膜良性肿瘤。视网膜海绵状血管瘤被描述为具有“葡萄串状”外观。
column5: A benign tumor of the retina that appears as a grouping of blood-filled saccules within the inner retinal layers or on the surface of the optic disc. Retinal cavernous angioma are described as having a 'cluster of grapes' appearance.

column4: 双眼视觉的异常。双眼视觉是指双眼看到的景物合成为一个单一的图像，并有感知深度的能力。
column5: An abnormality of binocular vision, that is of the ability to synthesize the visual inputs from both eyes to a single image with perception of depth.

column4: 立体视觉异常。立体视觉是指双眼观察景物时能通过双眼视察和头的不同位置，分辨物体远近距离的能力。
column5: Inability to make fine depth discriminations from parallax provided by the two eyes' different positions on the head.

column4: 视网膜包含无功能的视锥细胞，所以，除了没有颜色辨别能力，正常光照下视力很差。
column5: A condition where the retina contains no functional cone cells, so that in addition to the absence of color discrimination, vision in lights of normal intensity is difficult.

column4: 具有视杆和视锥细胞，但只有单一种类的视锥。患者在明亮的日光下视力好，但无法区分颜色。
column5: The condition of having both rods and cones, but only a single kind of cone.  Affected individuals have good pattern vision in daylight, but cannot distinguish between colors.

column4: 患者只有两种类型的视锥细胞，而不是通常的三种。
column5: Individuals affected by dichromacy possess only two types of cones, instead of three.

column4: 三色视异常的患者具有三种类型的视锥细胞，但三种视锥细胞中的一种相对于正常视锥细胞光谱灵敏度异常。
column5: Individuals with anomalous trichromacy possess three types of cones, but one of the three types of cones has an abnormal spectral sensitivity compared to normal cones.

column4: 异常三色视的一种，M波长感光色素异常，使得吸收光谱移向L波长，患者的红绿色觉异常。
column5: A type of anomalous trichromacy associated with abnormal M photopigment, such that the absorption spectrum is shifted toward L wavelengths. Affected individuals have difficulties distinguishing between red and green.

column4: 完全缺乏M波长感光色素，由L感光色素替代。患者分辨不出红色和绿色。
column5: Complete lack of the M photopigment, which is replaced with the L photopigment.  Affected individuals tend to confuse red and green.

column4: 只有蓝色和绿色锥体;无功能性红色视锥细胞。
column5: Blue and green cones only; no functional red cones.

column4: 虹膜囊肿由单层的上皮细胞组成，且其中充满液体。
column5: An iris cyst is composed of a single cell layer of epithelium and is filled with fluid.

column4: 虹膜黑色素细胞的恶性肿瘤。
column5: Malignant tumor of melanocytes affecting the iris.

column4: 虹膜上良性的褐色色素沉着，由虹膜的基质层黑色素细胞增殖形成。虹膜痣可以是扁平的或偶有轻度升高。
column5: A benign brown pigmented area over the iris representing proliferation of melanocyte cells in the stromal layer of the iris. An iris nevus can be flat or occasionally slightly elevated.

column4: 晶状体的形态异常（FMA:58241）。
column5: An abnormal shape of the `lens` (FMA:58241).

column4: 晶状体的曲率增大，导致前或后球形膨出。
column5: Exaggerated curvature of the lens of the eye, producing an anterior or posterior spherical bulging.

column2: Single isolated congenital hypertrophy of retinal pigment epithelium
column3: 视网膜色素上皮孤立性先天性肥厚
column4: RPE细胞上出现的界限清晰的色素沉着过多，是先天性疾病，在人群中发病率为3-5％，没有功能障碍。
column5: Sharply demarcated hyperpigmentation which is congenital found in around 3-5% of the population and of no functional significance.

column2: Multiple bilateral congenital hypertrophy of retinal pigment epithelium
column3: 视网膜色素上皮多重双边先天性肥厚
column4: 界限清晰的先天性色素沉着过多。
column5: Sharply demarcated hyperpigmentation which is congenital.

column4: 视网膜内的裂孔。
column5: A small break in the retina.

column4: 玻璃体的炎症。
column5: Inflammation of the vitreous body.

column4: 位于神经视网膜和视网膜色素上皮细胞之间的视网膜下腔内的视网膜渗出。
column5: A type of retinal exudate located in the subretinal space between the sensory retina and the retinal pigment epithelium.

column4: 玻璃体和视网膜周边部的黄/白色结晶状（因此而得名）斑点的变性。
column5: The appearance of yellow/white crystalline-like (hence the name) spots in the retina and thickening of the peripheral part of the vitreous.

column2: Abnormal spatial orientation of the cardiac segments
column3: 心脏节段空间排布异常
column4: 心脏不同节段在空间位置上的排布异常。
column5: An abnormality of the cardiac segments locations in space.

column4: 心房与心脏其它部位间空间关系的异常。
column5: Abnormality of the spatial relationship of the atria to other components of the heart.

column4: 右心房异构的特征是有双三角瓣，右心房样形态，有附属物，连接心房腔前部和顶部终端。
column5: Right atrial isomerism is characterized by bilateral triangular, morphologically right atrial, appendages, both joining the atrial chamber along a broad front with internal terminal crest.

column4: 两侧心房均为形态学左心房的先天性心脏异常，常伴多脾征，双侧肺均为两叶。
column5: In left atrial isomerism there is a bilateral small finger-shaped morphologically left atrial appendage joining the atrial chamber along a narrow front without an internal terminal crest.

column4: 形态学右心房在左手边，形态学左心房在右手边的镜像心房排列。
column5: Mirror image atrial arrangement, with morphologic right atrium on the left hand side and morphologic left atrium on the right hand side.

column4: 没有固定形态学特征的心房。
column5: Common atrium without defining morphologic features.

column2: Congenitally corrected transposition of the great arteries
column3: 先天矫正型大动脉转位
column4: 病变的本质为房室以及房室动脉的连接不协调。因此，形态学右心房跨二尖瓣连接到形态左心室，然后左心室连接到肺动脉。形态学左心房跨三尖瓣连接到形态右心室，形态右心室连接到主动脉。
column5: The essence of the lesion is the combination of discordant atrioventricular and ventriculo-arterial connections. Thus, the morphologically right atrium is connected to a morphologically left ventricle across the mitral valve, with the left ventricle then connected to the pulmonary trunk. The morphologically left atrium is connected to the morphologically right ventricle across the tricuspid valve, with the morphologically right ventricle connected to the aorta.

column4: 由于心脏长轴的明显扭曲，导致双心室的流入流的交叉。
column5: Crossing of the inflow streams of the two ventricles, due to an apparent twisting of the heart about its long axis.

column2: Criss-cross atrioventricular valves with superior-inferior ventricles
column3: 十字形房室瓣伴上下排列心室
column4: 伴随上下心室排列的十字型房室瓣。
column5: Criss-cross atrioventricular valves occurs with superior-inferior ventricles.

column2: Superior-inferior ventricles without criss-cross atrioventricular valves
column3: 无十字房室瓣型上下排列心室
column4: 一种心室呈上下排列样疾病，但无十字型房室瓣。
column5: A type of superior-inferior ventricles which presents no criss-cross atrioventricular valves.

column4: 右心室异常地位于左心室的左侧，即右心室左袢。
column5: The right ventricle is abnormally positioned on the left side of the left ventricle.

column2: Abnormal connection of the cardiac segments
column4: 心脏节段间连接异常，导致心肌运动异常。
column5: Abnormal connection between the cardiac segments，leading to abnormal  myocardial movement.

column4: 心房与心室之间循环连接的异常。
column5: An abnormality of the circulatory connection between atria and ventricles.

column4: 左侧房室连接的缺失。
column5: Absence of left sided atrioventricular connection.

column4: 右侧房室连接的缺失。
column5: Absence of right sided atrioventricular connection.

column2: Univentricular heart with absent left sided atrioventricular connection
column3: 左房室连接缺失致单心室心脏
column4: 左房室连接缺失导致的单心室心脏。
column5: Univentricular heart with absent left sided atrioventricular connection.

column2: Biventricular heart with straddling right sided atrioventricular valve and absent left sided atrioventricular connection
column3: 双心室心脏伴右房室瓣骑跨及左房室连接缺失
column4: 心脏有双心室但右侧房室瓣膜的张力部位与室间隔的左右两侧均相连，同时左侧房室瓣缺失。
column5: A heart with two ventricles while the tension apparatus of its right sided atrioventricular valve is attached to both sides of the ventricular septum, and the left sided atrioventricular valve is absent.

column2: Right sided atrium to left ventricle and absent left sided atrioventricular connection
column3: 右房左室连接伴左房室连接缺失。

column4: 心脏异构形成左或右双心室，房室连接呈现分歧，其中一个的连接是一致的（例如，右侧的形态学右心房连接到形态学右心室）及一个的连接是不一致的（例如，左侧的形态学右心房连接到形态左心室）。
column5: With left or right cardiac isomerism in a biventricular, the atrioventricular connections are perforce ambiguous, in that one of the connections is concordant (e.g., right-sided morphologic right atrium connected to a morphologic right ventricle) and one of the connections is discordant (e.g., left-sided morphologic right atrium connected to a  morphologic left ventricle).

column4: 双心室心脏中右心房连接左心室或左心房连接右心室。
column5: Connection of the right atrium to the left ventricle and of the left atrium to the right ventricle in a biventricular heart.

column4: 两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接同一个心室。
column5: The condition in which both atria are joined to a single ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve.

column4: 两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接左心室，通常心脏另一侧的右心室发育不良。
column5: The condition in which both atria are joined to the left ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve. Usually there is a hypoplastic right ventricle, which may be on the opposite side of the heart as usual.

column4: 两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接右心室，通常心脏另一侧的左心室发育不良。
column5: The condition in which both atria are joined to the right ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve. Usually, the left ventricle is hypoplastic.

column2: Double inlet to single ventricle of indeterminate morphology
column4: 两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接至同一个心室，该心室形态不足以确定是左心室或右心室。
column5: The condition in which both atria are joined to a single ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve. The morphology of this ventricle does not allow one to determine if it corresponds to the left or right ventricle.

column2: Double inlet to single ventricle with common atrioventricular orifice
column3: 单室双入口伴共同房室口
column4: 两个心房通过同一个房室口连接至同一个心室。
column5: The condition in which both atria are joined to a single ventricle each by common atrioventricular orifice.

column2: Double inlet to single ventricle with two atrioventricular valves
column3: 单室双入口伴双房室瓣
column4: 两个心房通过各自的房室瓣连接至同一个心室。
column5: The condition in which both atria are joined to a single ventricle each by its own atrioventricular valve.

column4: 一种先天性缺陷，二尖瓣口不能打开。
column5: A congenital defect with failure to open of the mitral valve orifice.

column4: 房室瓣汇入到两个心室。瓣膜骑跨于缺损的室间隔上。
column5: An atrioventricular valve that empties into both ventricles. The valve overrides the interventricular septum above a ventricular septum defect.

column4: 腱索和乳头肌异常插入室间隔缺损的对侧心室。
column5: Anomalous insertion of the chordae tendinae or papillary muscles into the contralateral ventricle in the presence of a ventricular septum defect.

column4: 脑室与动脉之间的连接出现异常
column5: Abnormality of the connection of ventriculo and arterial.

column4: 二尖瓣弓形异常诊断基于以下特点（1）足够大的二尖瓣口; （2）短、厚、低分化腱索与乳头肌的前叶直接结合; （3）异常腱索之间的空间狭窄或几乎不存在的空间（4）较大的分化腱索附连到后乳头肌。
column5: Anomalous mitral valve arcade is diagnosed b ased on the following features (1) An adequately sized mitral valve orifice; (2) short, thick, and poorly differentiated chordae with direct union of the papillary muscles to the anterior leaflet; (3) narrow or nearly nonexistent spaces between the abnormal chordae; and (4) greater differentiation of the chordae attached to the posterior papillary muscle.

column4: 房间隔缺损，同时房室瓣和两个房室连接正常。
column5: Complete absence of the interatrial septum with common atrioventricular valve and two atrioventricular connections.

column4: 由于静脉窦右阀持续性存在导致右心房先天性被分隔，形成三个心房。通常，畸形的胎儿咽鼓管和冠状窦瓣在心房下部形成一个不完成的隔膜，引起右心房分区。这种隔膜既有网状组织也有实体组织。
column5: A congenital anomaly with partitioning of the right atrium to form a triatrial heart caused by persistence of the right valve of the sinus venosus. Typically, the right atrial partition is due to exaggerated fetal eustachian and thebesian valves, which together form an incomplete septum across the lower part of the atrium. This septum may range from a reticulum to a substantial sheet of tissue.

column4: 一个由上腔静脉（SVC）和右肺静脉之间的公共壁的缺陷导致的心房间通讯。静脉窦型房间隔缺损通常与一些全部或部分肺静脉异常连接有关，产生额外的左向右分流。
column5: An interatrial communication caused by a deficiency of the common wall between the superior vena cava (SVC) and the right-sided pulmonary veins. SVASD is commonly associated with anomalous pulmonary venous connection (APVC) of some or all of the pulmonary veins, which produces additional left-to-right shunting.

column4: 左房室连接的部分主要附属纤维组织分开的两个不同的解剖口。
column5: The left atrio-ventricular connection consists of two anatomically distinct orifices separated by accessory fibrous tissue.

column4: 二尖瓣前叶裂与房室管缺陷无关。
column5: Cleft in the anterior mitral valve leaflet not associated with an atrioventricular canal defect.

column4: 先天性的二尖瓣狭窄。
column5: Mitral stenosis with congenital onset.

column4: 异常的二尖瓣结构，腱索连接到单一的乳头肌或发育不全的乳头肌上。
column5: Abnormality of the mitral valve apparatus, whereby chordae attach to a single papillary muscle or hypoplastic papillary muscles.

column4: 一种二尖瓣先天性狭窄，二尖瓣上部有环状组织。
column5: A congenital stenotic mitral valvular anomaly with a ring of tissue above the mitral valve.

column4: 三尖瓣先天性发育不全。
column5: Congenital defect characterized by underdevelopment of the tricuspid valve.

column4: 房室瓣无法打开（闭锁）。
column5: An atrioventricular valve that has failed to open (atretic).

column4: 三尖瓣无法打开（闭锁）。
column5: An tricuspid valve that has failed to open (atretic).

column4: 一种心脏缺陷，包括第一房间隔缺损，二尖瓣前叶裂口，心室入口缺损。患者有一个瓣膜环和两个瓣口。
column5: A specific combination of heart defects with a primum atrial septal defect, cleft anterior mitral valve leaflet, and inlet ventricular defect. There is one valve annulus and two valve orifices.

column4: 心脏缺陷的特定组合，包括第一房间隔缺损和二尖瓣前叶裂口。不存在心室入口缺损。患者有两个瓣膜环和两个瓣口。
column5: A specific combination of heart defects including a primum atrial septal defect and cleft anterior mitral valve leaflet. There is not an inlet ventricular septal defect present. There are two valve annuluses and two valve orifices.

column4: 一个原发孔房间隔缺损伴随裂二尖瓣前瓣叶和入口室间隔缺损的一种特殊组合的心脏缺陷，有两个瓣膜环和两个瓣膜孔存在。
column5: A specific combination of heart defects with a primum atrial septal defect, cleft anterior mitral valve leaflet, and an inlet ventricular septal defect. There are two valve annuli and two valve orifices.

column4: 不平衡型房室管缺损（AVSD）解剖学特征包括不同等级的的心室发育不全，以及房室结的排列不齐。
column5: Anatomic features of unbalanced atrioventricular septal defect (AVSD) include varying amounts of ventricular hypoplasia, as well as malalignment of the atrioventricular junction.

column2: Short chordae tendineae of the mitral valve
column4: 二尖瓣腱索的异常短小。
column5: Abnormally short `chordae tendineae` (FMA:76527) of the mitral valve.

column4: 一种先天性心脏发育缺陷，特点是肺动脉和主动脉均从左心室发出。
column5: A congenital defect of heart development characterized by origin of both pulmonary artery and aorta from the morphological left ventricle.

column4: 心脏在胸腔之外，异常地位于腹腔。
column5: Displacement of the heart outside the thoracic cavity and into the abdomen.

column4: 一种颈部心脏异位，而无胸骨受损。
column5: A type of ectopia cordis with the heart partially in the cervical region and withouta defect of the sternum.

column4: 一种的心脏异位，心脏部分位于颈部区域，同时胸骨上部异常。
column5: A type of ectopia cordis with the heart partially in the cervical region with a defect of the superior portion of the sternum.

column4: 胸腔壁的先天畸形，心脏部分或全部置换到胸腔外。患者伴有胸骨裂或胸骨缺失。
column5: Congenital malformation of the thoracic wall with partial or total displacement of the heart outside the thoracic cavity. This feature is associated with sternal cleft or absence of the sternum.

column4: 腹壁先天性畸形，心脏的部分或全部胸腔外并部分进入腹腔。
column5: Congenital malformation of the ventral wall with partial or total evisceration of the heart outside the thoracic cavity and displacement partially into the abdominal cavity.

column2: Abnormal branching pattern of the aortic arch
column4: 右头臂动脉，左颈总动脉，左锁骨下动脉或近端椎动脉的起源异常。
column5: A deviance from the norm of the origin or course of the right brachiocephalic artery, the left common carotid artery, the left subclavian artery or the  proximal vertebral arteries.

column4: 主动脉弓延伸到颈部软组织内，再转成降主动脉。
column5: The aortic arch extends into the soft tissues of the neck before turning down into to become the descending aorta.

column2: Common origin of the right brachiocephalic artery and left common carotid artery
column3: 右头臂干及左颈总动脉共同起源
column4: 左颈总动脉与无名动脉有一个共同的起源。
column5: The left common carotid artery has a common origin with the innominate artery.

column4: 一种先天性的主动脉弓异常，双主动脉弓形成血管环围绕气管或食管形成降主动脉。双主动脉弓由于压迫食管和气管会引起相应症状，包括吞咽困难，紫绀，哮喘。
column5: A conenital abnormality of the aortic arch in which the two embryonic aortc arches form a vascular ring that surrounds the trachea or esophagus and then join to form the descending aorta. Double aortic arch can cause symptoms because of compression of the esophagus (dysphagia, cyanosis while eating) or trachea (stridor).

column2: Left aortic arch with cervical origin of the right subclavian artery
column3: 左位主动脉弓伴颈总动脉源型右锁骨下动脉
column4: 主动脉弓跨过左主支气管。右锁骨下动脉异常起源于颈总动脉上靠近颈内和颈外动脉分叉处。
column5: The aortic arch crosses the left main bronchus while the right subclavian artery originates abnormally high from the common carotid artery close to the bifurcation of the internal and external carotid arteries.

column2: Left aortic arch with isolated subclavian artery
column3: 左位主动脉弓伴孤立型锁骨下动脉
column4: 锁骨下动脉起源于动脉导管。当动脉导管未闭，血液来自动脉导管，因此也来自肺动脉。当它关闭后，血供应从椎动脉通过Willis循环逆行。
column5: The subclavian artery arises from ductus arteriosus. While the ductus arteriosus is patent its blood supply comes from the ductus, hence from the pulmonary artery. After it closes, the blood supply is retrogradely from the vertebral artery via the circle of Willis.

column2: Left aortic arch with retroesophageal diverticulum of Kommerell
column3: 左位主动脉弓伴食管后科默雷尔憩室
column4: 动脉导管未闭或导管韧带成环。
column5: A patent ductus arteriosus or ductal ligament completes the ring.

column2: Right aortic arch with retroesophageal diverticulum of Kommerell
column3: 右主动脉弓伴食管后科默雷尔憩室
column4: 主动脉弓跨越右主支气管。左侧颈动脉是第一分支，右颈总动脉第二分支和右锁骨下动脉是第三分支。
column5: Aortic arch crosses the right mainstem bronchus. The left carotid artery is the first branch,  right carotid artery the second branch and right subclavian artery as the third branch.

column2: Left aortic arch with retroesophageal right subclavian artery
column3: 左位主动脉弓伴食管后右锁骨下动脉
column4: 主动脉弓跨左主支气管。第一分支是右颈动脉，第二分支是左侧颈动脉中，第三分支是锁骨下动脉，第四分支是右锁骨下动脉，起于远侧主动脉弓的后中方位接着经食道到达身体的右手侧。
column5: Aortic arch crosses the left mainstem bronchus. The first branch is the right carotid artery, the second branch is the left carotid artery, the third branch is the subclavian artery, the fourth branch is the right subclavian artery arising from the posteromedial aspect of the distal aortic arch and continuing posterior to the esophagus to the right hand side of the body.

column2: Left aortic arch with right descending aorta and right ductus arteriosus
column3: 左位主动脉弓伴右位降主动脉及右动脉导管未闭
column4: 主动脉弓位于食管和气管的左侧，绕经食管后方向脊柱右侧延续为降主动脉，经动脉导管连接形成血管环，产生对气管、食管的压迫症状。
column5: The aortic arch is positioned on the left side of oesophagus and trachea, and continued behind oesophagus to form the descending aorta. The two parts are connected by the ductal ligament and form a ring, which may cause trachea or oesophagus compression symptoms.

column2: Right aortic arch with left descending aorta and left ductus arteriosus
column3: 右位主动脉弓伴左位降主动脉及左动脉导管未闭
column4: 右位主动脉弓伴左位降主动脉及左动脉导管未闭。
column5: Right aortic arch with left descending aorta and left ductus arteriosus

column2: Right aortic arch with retroesophageal left subclavian artery
column3: 右位主动脉弓伴食管后左锁骨下动脉
column4: 右位主动脉弓伴食管后左锁骨下动脉。
column5: Right aortic arch with retroesophageal left subclavian artery

column4: 中位心是一种心脏位置异常，心脏位于身体中线位置且心脏的纵轴位于正中矢状面。
column5: Mesocardia is a abnormal location of the heart in which the heart is in a midline position and the longitudinal axis of the heart lies in the mid-sagittal plane.

column4: 心脏从基部到顶点所指方向的异常。心尖向左是正常的。
column5: Abnormal plane of direction of the heart from the base to the apex. Left sided is normal.

column4: 从心脏基底部到尖部的指向异常地朝向中线方向。正常应该朝左。
column5: Abnormal plane of direction of the heart from the base to the apex in the midline. Left sided is normal.

column2: Congenital malformation of the great arteries
column4: 先天性发病的大动脉畸形。
column5: A developmental malformation of the great arteries with congenital onset.

column4: 主动脉与主肺动脉之间先天性的异常连接，导致主-肺动脉分流。
column5: A congenital anomaly with an abnormal connection between the aorta and the main pulmonary artery resulting in an aortopulmonary shunt.

column2: Congenitally corrected transposition of the great arteries with ventricular septal defect
column3: 先天矫正型大动脉转位伴室间隔缺损
column4: 与室间隔缺损并发的先天性矫正型大动脉转位。
column5: Congenitally corrected transposition of the great arteries occurs with ventricular septal defect.

column2: Transposition of the great arteries with intact ventricular septum
column3: 室间隔完整型大动脉转位
column4: 大动脉转位不伴有室间隔缺损。
column5: Transposition of the great arteries without ventricular septal defects

column2: Transposition of the great arteries with ventricular septal defect
column3: 室间隔缺损型大动脉转位
column4: 室间隔缺损型大动脉转位。
column5: Transposition of the great arteries with ventricular septal defect

column4: II型动脉干（起源于心脏的单大动脉，产生冠脉，肺动脉和全身动脉）两支肺动脉与分别从它的前后侧起源。
column5: Truncus arteriosus (single great artery leaving the base of the heart, giving rise to the coronary, pulmonary, and systemic arteries) with each pulmonary artery arising separate from each other on the posterior or lateral aspect of the truncus.

column4: III型永存动脉干（起源于心脏的单大动脉，产生冠脉，肺动脉和全身动脉），其中的一个个肺动脉分支不是从常见的肺动脉主干发出而是是从动脉管或直接从主动脉发出。
column5: Truncus arteriosus (single great artery leaving the base of the heart, giving rise to the coronary, pulmonary, and systemic arteries) whereby one of the two pulmonary artery branched does not arise from the common pulmonary trunk, but instead from the ductus arteriosus or directly from the aorta.

column4: IV型动脉干（起源于心脏的单大动脉，产生冠脉，肺动脉和全身动脉），由此主动脉弓发育不良或被受阻，出现一个大型动脉导管未闭。
column5: Truncus arteriosus (single great artery leaving the base of the heart, giving rise to the coronary, pulmonary, and systemic arteries) whereby the aortic arch is hypoplastic or interrupted, and a large patent ductus arteriosus is present.

column4: 非连续性“动脉弓”（FMA:3768），呈点状或节段性缺失。
column5: Non-continuity of the `arch of aorta`(FMA:3768) with an atretic point or absent segment.

column4: 主动脉弓峡部出现的点状或节段性缺失，引起非连续性“动脉弓”。
column5: Non-continuity of the aortic arch with an atretic point or absent segment at the level of the isthmus.

column4: 左侧颈动脉和锁骨下动脉之间发生主动脉弓点状或节段性缺失，引起的非连续性主动脉弓。
column5: Non-continuity of the aortic arch with an atretic point or absent segment between the left carotid and subclavian arteries.

column4: 无名动脉和左颈动脉间发生主动脉弓点状或节段性缺失，引起的非连续性主动脉弓。
column5: Non-continuity of the aortic arch with an atretic point or absent segment between the innominate and left carotid arteries.

column4: 肺异常，例如左右肺的分叶异常，由每侧肺的分叶数量、及肺动脉与其所属支气管的对应关系异常等确定。
column5: An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, which is defined by characteristics such as the number of lobes per lung and the relationship of the pulmonary arteries to their bronchi.

column4: 主支气管的位置镜像，右肺动脉位于右上叶支气管后方，左肺动脉位于左侧上叶支气管前方。
column5: Mirror image arrangement of the mainstem bronchi with the right pulmonary artery posterior to the right upper lobe bronchus and the left pulmonary artery anterior to the left upper lobe bronchus.

column4: 肺形态定位的异常，如左右肺单侧性形态异常，体现为左侧和右侧肺有着相同的形态。
column5: An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, in which the morphology of both left and right lungs is the same.

column2: Pulmonary situs ambiguus with bilateral morphologic right lungs
column4: 肺形态定位的异常，即左右肺单侧性形态异常，左侧和右侧肺的形态均为右肺。
column5: An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, in which both lungs have the morphology of a right lungs.

column2: Pulmonary situs ambiguus with bilateral morphologic left lungs
column4: 肺形态定位的异常，即左右肺单侧性形态异常，左侧和右侧肺的形态均为左肺。
column5: An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, in which both lungs have the morphology of a left lung.

column4: 腹部位置的异常，即，腹部及其脏器的边界异常。
column5: An abnormality of the abdominal situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the abdomin and its organs.

column4: 一类直接连通左心室和右心房之间的室间隔缺损。这在解剖学上可能是因为正常的三尖瓣比二尖瓣顶部移位更多。
column5: A type of ventricular septal defect communicating directly between the left ventricle and right atrium. This is anatomically possible because the normal tricuspid valve is more apically displaced than the mitral valve.

column4: 位于房室瓣膜下的右室间隔入口处发生的室间隔缺损。
column5: A ventricular septal defect that involves the inlet of the right ventricular septum immediately inferior to the AV valve apparatus.

column4: 小梁隔膜是室间隔最大的部分。从膜隔到尖部伸展优于到漏斗隔膜。小梁隔的缺陷如果完全由肌肉镶边被称为肌部室间隔缺损。
column5: The trabecular septum is the largest part of the interventricular septum. It extends from the membranous septum to the apex and superiorly to the infundibular septum. A defect in the trabecular septum is called muscular VSD if the defect is completely rimmed by muscle.

column3: 心尖肌部型室间隔缺损
column4: 一种位于心脏顶端的肌部室间隔缺损。
column5: A muscular ventricular septal defect located at the apex of the heart.

column3: 多发肌部型室间隔缺损
column4: 室间隔肌部出现多处缺损可伴／不伴有其他部位室间隔缺损或心内／心外畸形。
column5: The presence of more than one VSD in the muscular septum, with or without other VSD located in the peri-membranous or outlet septum, with or without associated intra-cardiac or extra-cardiac malformations.

column4: 部分血液从右肺动脉异常回流至下腔静脉从而导致左向右分流的一种罕见先天性心脏缺陷。
column5: A rare congenital heart defect characterized by partial anomalous pulmonary venous return from the right lung to the inferior vena cava which leads to the creation of a left-to-right shunt.

column4: 主动脉-左室隧道是一种先天性的心外通道，将升主动脉与左心室（少量右心室）腔连接。
column5: Aorto-ventricular tunnel is a congenital, extracardiac channel which connects the ascending aorta above the sinutubular junction to the cavity of the left, or (less commonly) right ventricle.

column4: 先天性发病的心包发育缺陷。
column5: A developmental defect of the `pericardium` (FMA:9869) with congenital onset.

column4: 心脏周围没有心包膜，是先天性缺陷的一种，而不是由心包切除术所致。
column5: No pericardium around the heart, occurring as a congenital defect, not the result of a surgical pericardectomy.

column4: 隔面心包完全缺失。它是一种先天性缺陷，而不是心包切除术的结果。心包在心脏的其他部分正常存在。
column5: No pericardium over the diaphragmatic surface of the heart. It is a congenital defect, not the result of a pericardectomy. Pericardium is present on other parts of the heart.

column2: Complete right sided absence of pericardium
column4: 心脏右侧心包完全缺失，属于先天性无心包而非心包切除术的结果。
column5: No pericardium is present on the righthand side of the heart. It is a congenital absence of pericardium rather than the result of a pericardectomy.

column2: Partial right sided absence of pericardium
column4: 右侧心包部分缺失。
column5: A congenital anomaly with lack of part of the pericardium on the righthand side of the heart.

column2: Complete left sided absence of pericardium
column4: 心脏左侧心包的先天性完全缺失。
column5: A congenital anomaly with complete lack of the pericardium on the lefthand side of the heart.

column2: Partial left sided absence of pericardium
column4: 左侧心包部分缺失。
column5: A congenital anomaly with lack of part of the pericardium on the lefthand side of the heart.

column4: 心脏膈面的部分心包缺失。是一种先天性缺陷，而不是心包切除术的结果。心包存在于心脏的其他部分。
column5: Lack of a part of the pericardium over the diaphragmatic surface of the heart. It is a congenital defect, not the result of a pericardectomy. Pericardium is present on other parts of the heart.

column2: Abnormal origin of the coronary arteries
column4: 单纯的冠状动脉起源异常。这可能与其它心脏结构畸形有关，但并不是复杂的心脏结构畸形导致的冠状动脉走行异常。
column5: Isolated abnormalities of the coronary artery origins. This may be in associated with other structural heart malformations but not the patterns of complex structural heart malformations which result in abnormal course of the coronary arteries.

column2: Anomalous origin of coronary artery from the pulmonary artery
column3: 肺动脉源性冠状动脉起源异常
column4: 冠状动脉起源于肺动脉而不是主动脉根部。
column5: A coronary artery begins (branches off from) the pulmonary artery rather than as normal from the root of the aorta.

column2: Anomalous origin of left coronary artery from the pulmonary artery
column3: 肺动脉源性左冠状动脉起源异常
column4: 左冠状动脉起源于肺动脉而不是主动脉根部。
column5: Left main coronary artery begins (branches off from) the pulmonary artery rather than as normal from the root of the aorta, above the left cusp of the aortic valve.

column2: Anomalous origin of right coronary artery from the pulmonary artery
column3: 肺动脉源性右冠状动脉起源异常
column4: 右冠状动脉起源于肺动脉而不是主动脉根部。
column5: Right coronary artery begins (branches off from) the pulmonary artery rather than as normal from the root of the aorta, above the right cusp of the aortic valve.

column4: 两个冠状动脉发出位置只有单个冠状动脉孔的存在。
column5: The presence of a single coronary artery ostium from which both coronary arteries arise.

column4: 冠状动脉与心腔或其他血管之间的先天性连接异常。
column5: A congenital malformation with abnormal connection between one of the coronary arteries and a heart chamber or another blood vessel.

column4: 冠状窦的异常。冠状窦是由心大静脉和左缘静脉汇合而成并终止在右心房的大血管样结构。
column5: An abnormality of the `coronary sinus` (FMA:4706). The coronary sinus is formed by the union of the great cardiac vein and the left marginal vein and terminates in the right atrium.

column3: 冠状静脉窦型房间隔缺损
column4: 伴随冠状静脉窦与左心房连接的组织缺损的房间隔缺损。这将导致冠状窦的部分或全部去顶，引起通过冠状窦的左向右分流（左心房流向冠状动脉窦然后到右心房（RA））。由于血流量增大，窦孔逐渐变大。右心房的缺损主要存在于冠状窦口，也包括窦口周围的心房组织缺损。左心房缺损的大小依赖于冠状窦去顶的程度。
column5: An atrial septal defect characterized by a deficiency in the tissue separating the coronary sinus from the left atrium (LA). This results in partial or complete unroofing of the coronary sinus leading to a predominantly left-to-right shunt through the coronary sinus (LA to coronary sinus to right atrium [RA]). The orifice of the ostium is frequently large because of the increased flow. From the RA side, the defect is located at the level of the coronary sinus ostium and may also include some deficiency in atrial tissue around the ostium. From the LA side, the size can be variable depending on the degree of unroofing of the coronary sinus.

column4: 左心室壁内的静脉袋，具有一颈口进入冠状静脉窦。
column5: A venous pouch within the left ventricular wall, with a neck opening into the coronary sinus.

column4: 主动脉瓣尖后的主动脉壁扩张。
column5: The dilatation of the aortic wall behind each of the cusps of the aortic valve.

column4: 位于动脉导管接入处（如主动脉弓管旁区，FMA:3778）的主动脉缩窄。
column5: Narrowing or constriction of the aorta localized at the insertion of the ductus arteriosus, i.e., to the `juxtaductal region of aortic arch` (FMA:3778).

column4: 动脉导管远端的主动脉狭窄或缩窄（FMA:3776）。
column5: Narrowing or constriction of the aorta localized distal to the ductus arteriosus, i.e., to the `postductal region of aortic arch` (FMA:3776).

column2: Patent ductus arteriosus after birth at term
column4: 足月出生（妊娠37周或更长时间）的婴儿，动脉导管异常地持续开放。
column5: Abnormal persistent patency of the ductus arteriosus in postnatal life when birth was at 37 completed weeks of gestation or greater.

column2: Patent ductus arteriosus after premature birth
column4: 婴儿在少于完整的37周妊娠期出生时，动脉导管异常地持续开放。
column5: Abnormal persistent patency of the ductus arteriosus when birth was at less than 37 weeks completed gestation.

column4: 含有左、右两个动脉导管。
column5: The presence of both a left and a right ductus arteriosus.

column2: Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis
column3: 右室双出口伴双交通室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄
column4: 右室双出口伴双交通室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄。双交通室间隔缺损（double committed ventricular septal defect）:此型缺损在右心室双出口罕见，约占3%～4%。两大动脉多为并列关系。由于此缺损位于室间隔上方和漏斗隔严重发育不全或缺如，所以缺损则位于两大动脉环的下方。两大动脉瓣环为缺损后上缘，缺损的前下缘为隔缘束的上支，后下缘为隔缘束下支。往往无主动脉下圆锥或仅在室间隔缺损和两大动脉瓣环之间有一窄条肌肉束，可伴有主动脉与二尖瓣或肺动脉与三尖瓣纤维连续。心脏传导束离开缺损边缘较远，很少因手术产生心脏传导阻滞。
column5: Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis

column2: Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis
column3: 右室双出口伴双交通室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄
column4: 右室双出口伴双交通室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄。
column5: Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis

column2: Double outlet right ventricle with non-committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis
column3: 右室双出口伴非交通型室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄
column4: 右室双出口伴非交通型室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄。非交通型室间隔缺损（noncommitted或remote ventricular septal defect）:此缺损比较少见，在右心室双出口中占5%～8%。两大动脉多呈并列关系，右侧大动脉异位少见。远离两大动脉室间隔缺损合并Rastelli的C型完全性房室隔缺损比较多见，往往有脾脏异常、单心房或内脏异位。不合并完全性房室隔缺损者，两大动脉开口与室间隔缺损之间有3～5个三尖瓣乳头肌及其腱索，缺损位于隔瓣后，属于流入部室间隔缺损，房室结位置正常，希氏束和左束支走行于缺损后上缘室间隔左心室面；缺损位于三尖瓣前瓣和隔瓣之间，属于围膜部缺损，心脏传导束走行于缺损后下缘室间隔左心室面。此型室间隔缺损可有心房反位或合并左心室发育不全。
column5: Double outlet right ventricle with non-committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis

column2: Double outlet right ventricle with non-committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis
column3: 右室双出口伴非交通型室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄
column4: 右室双出口伴非交通型室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄。
column5: Double outlet right ventricle with non-committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis

column2: Double outlet right ventricle with subaortic ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis
column3: 右室双出口伴主动脉下室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄
column4: 右室双出口伴主动脉下室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄。
column5: Double outlet right ventricle with subaortic ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis

column2: Double outlet right ventricle with subaortic ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis
column3: 右室双出口伴主动脉下室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄
column4: 右室双出口伴主动脉下室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄。
column5: Double outlet right ventricle with subaortic ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis

column2: Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis
column3: 右室双出口伴肺动脉下室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄
column4: 右室双出口伴肺动脉下室间隔缺损及肺动脉狭窄。肺动脉下室间隔缺损（subpulmonary ventricular septal defect）:右心室双出口伴有肺动脉下室间隔缺损又称Taussig-Bing心脏畸形（Taussig-Bing malformation）。右心室双出口中占20%～30%，多为两大动脉并列，占73%。在此心脏畸形中，均有漏斗隔对位异常。室间隔缺损位于室间隔前上方。如有肺动脉下圆锥，圆锥肌肉构成室间隔缺损上缘，其后下缘可延伸至三尖瓣环；如无肺动脉下圆锥，则缺损侧位于肺动脉瓣环下方。根据肺动脉横跨程度，缺损后上缘为肺动脉瓣与二尖瓣或三尖瓣纤维连续或肺动脉瓣环，其后下缘为肌肉室间隔。
column5: Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis

column2: Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis
column3: 右室双出口伴肺动脉下室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄
column4: 右室双出口伴肺动脉下室间隔缺损无肺动脉狭窄。
column5: Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis

column2: Tetralogy of Fallot with absent pulmonary valve
column3: 法洛四联症伴肺动脉瓣缺失
column4: 以脊部发育不全或完全没有肺动脉瓣组织为特点的法洛四联症。
column5: Features of tetralogy of Fallot with either rudimentary ridges or the complete absence of pulmonic valve tissue.

column2: Anomalous origin of one pulmonary artery from ascending aorta
column3: 一侧肺动脉异常起源于升主动脉
column4: 一侧肺动脉异常起源于升主动脉，而对侧肺动脉起源于右心室。
column5: Anomalous origin of one pulmonary artery from the ascending aorta with the contralateral pulmonary artery arising from the right ventricle.

column2: Anomalous origin of left pulmonary artery from ascending aorta
column3: 左肺动脉异常起源于升主动脉
column4: 在肺动脉瓣和肺主动脉存在的情况下，左肺动脉异常起源于升主动脉。
column5: The left pulmonary artery originates from the ascending aorta in the presence of a pulmonary valve and main pulmonary artery.

column4: 三尖瓣发育障碍导致右心房和右心室之间无法正常连接。
column5: Failure to develop of the tricuspid valve and thus lack of the normal connection between the right atrium and the right ventricle.

column4: 右心功能不全（全部或部分）与功能和形态右心室发育异常，伴或不伴有左心室疾病。
column5: Right ventricular dysfunction (global or regional) with functional and morphological right ventricular abnormalities, with or without left ventricular disease.

column3: 左室致密化不全心肌病
column4: 左室致密化不全性心肌病（LVNC）的特征是有显着的左心室小梁和深间小梁壁凹。心肌壁往往增厚，伴随薄且致密的心外膜层和增厚的心内膜层。在一些患者中，LVNC与左心室扩张和收缩功能障碍有关，在新生儿种可能只是瞬时的现象。
column5: Left ventricular non-compaction (LVNC) is characterized by prominent left ventricular trabeculae and deep inter-trabecular recesses. The myocardial wall is often thickened with a thin, compacted epicardial layer and a thickened endocardial layer. In some patients, LVNC is associated with left ventricular dilatation and systolic dysfunction, which can be transient in neonates.

column4: 应激性心肌病的特征是通过血管造影术并未发现冠脉阻滞症状但却出现了涉及左心室心尖和/或中心室的短暂局部收缩功能障碍。患者表现为突发性的胸绞痛和弥漫性T波倒置，有时会有ST段抬高和轻度心肌酶升高。
column5: takotsubo cardiomyopathy is characterized by transient regional systolic dysfunction involving the left ventricular apex and/or mid-ventricle in the absence of obstructive coronary disease on coronary angiography. Patients present with an abrupt onset of angina-like chest pain, and have diffuse T-wave inversion, sometimes preceded by ST-segment elevation.

column4: 右上腔静脉（RSVC）的缺失。右上腔静脉的缺失常与永存左上腔静脉（PLSVC）有关。胎儿正常发育过程中，左侧前静脉离开冠状窦（CS）和Marshall韧带后，系统性退化。左侧前静脉的关闭不全导致右上腔静脉的缺失。在一般情况下，PLSVC与右上腔静脉（RSVC）连接，通过扩张的CS汇入RA。在较早阶段发育停滞时，CS缺失，PLSVC汇入进入左心房。
column5: Absence of the right superior vena cava (RSVC). An absent RSVC is always associated with a persistent left superior vena cava (PLSVC). During normal fetal development, the left-sided anterior venous cardinal system regresses, leaving the coronary sinus (CS) and the ligament of Marshall. Failure of the closure of the left anterior cardinal vein results in PLSVC. In general, PLSVC is associated with the right superior vena cava (RSVC) and drains into the RA via a dilated CS. When developmental arrest occurs at an earlier stage, the CS is absent and the PLSVC drains into the left atrium.

column2: Bilateral superior vena cava with bridging vein
column3: 双侧上腔静脉伴桥静脉
column4: 双侧上腔静脉与桥静脉同时存在。
column5: The presence of bilateral superior vena cava and bridging vein.

column2: Bilateral superior vena cava with no bridging vein
column3: 双侧上腔静脉不伴桥静脉
column4: 只存在双侧上腔静脉，不含有桥静脉。
column5: The presence of bilateral superior vena cava without bridging vein.

column2: Left superior vena cava draining directly to the left atrium
column4: 左上腔静脉直接将血液输送至左心房，正常应该至右心房。
column5: Left superior vena cava draining directly to the left atrium

column2: Left superior vena cava draining to coronary sinus
column4: 左上腔静脉引流至冠状窦，正常应该至右心房。
column5: Left superior vena cava draining to coronary sinus

column2: Interrupted inferior vena cava with azygous continuation
column3: 下腔静脉中断伴奇静脉延续
column4: 中断下腔静脉伴奇静脉延续是右下主静脉和右卵黄静脉之间的连接失败的结果。因此，从机体的尾部静脉血液经由奇静脉和上腔静脉到达心脏。
column5: Interrupted inferior vena cava with azygous continuation is the result of connection failure between the right subcardinal vein and the right vitelline vein. Consequently, venous blood from the caudal part of the body reaches the heart via the azygous vein and superior vena cava.

column4: 心脏的粘液瘤（原生结缔组织肿瘤）。心脏粘液瘤由存在于粘液样基质中的星形、丰满的、表面光滑的细胞构成。心脏粘液瘤是由心内膜起源，由心内膜扩散到心腔。
column5: A myxoma (tumor of primitive connective tissue) of the heart. Cardiac myxomas consist of stellate to plump, cytologically bland mesenchymal cells set in a myxoid stroma. Cardiac myxomas are of endocardial origina and general project from the endocardium into a cardiac chamber.

column4: 连接心腔与心内膜血管的异常增生。
column5: Abnormal proliferation of blood vessels within the cardiac cavities attached to the endocardium.

column4: 在心脏内的畸胎瘤，一般，存在于与肺动脉和主动脉相连的心包腔内，直径大约2至9厘米，已报道的最大肿瘤15cm。心内的肿瘤起源于心房或心室壁的结节状肿块，扩散到心腔。由于其异质性以及包裹性囊性肿块，心脏和心包中的畸胎瘤很容易通过胎儿和新生儿的二维超声心动图检测到。组织学上，心脏畸胎瘤包含多个组分，包括上皮细胞、神经胶质组织、甲状腺、胰腺、平滑肌、横纹肌、软骨和骨。
column5: A teratoma within the heart. Most commonly, these tumors are detected in the pericardial cavity attached to the pulmonary artery and aorta. The tumour size within the heart varies from 2 to 9 cm in diameter, and intrapericardial tumors as large as 15 cm have been reported. Intracardiac tumors arise from the atrial or ventricular wall as nodular masses protruding into the cardiac chambers. Cardiac and pericardial teratomas are easily detected in the fetus and neonate by two-dimensional echocardiography as heterogeneous and encapsulated cystic masses. Histologically, cardiac teratomas contain multiple immature elements including epithelium, neuroglial tissue, thyroid, pancreas, smooth and skeletal muscle, cartilage and bone.

column4: 非正常窦性心律的其他心律。这样的心律可能是窦或异位的起源，有的规律有的不规律。心律失常由心脏搏动的起源或传导紊乱引起。
column5: Any cardiac rhythm other than the normal sinus rhythm. Such a rhythm may be either of sinus or ectopic origin and either regular or irregular. An arrhythmia may be due to a disturbance in impulse formation or conduction or both.

column2: Tetralogy of Fallot with absent subarterial conus
column3: 法洛四联症伴瓣下圆锥缺失
column4: 法洛四联症的一种形式，表现为瓣下圆锥的缺失。
column5: A form of tetralogy of Fallot characterized by no subarterial conus.

column2: Tetralogy of Fallot with atrioventricular canal defect
column3: 法洛四联症伴房室管缺陷
column4: 法洛四联症的一种形式，表现为房室管存在缺陷。
column5: An form of tetralogy of Fallot characterized by defect of atrioventricular canal.

column2: Tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary atresia and major aortopulmonary collateral arteries
column3: 法洛四联症伴肺动脉闭锁及主肺动脉侧支动脉
column4: 法洛四联症合并肺动脉闭锁的一种，患者肺部的血液主要从体肺侧支动脉（MAPCA）流入。
column5: A type of tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary atresia in which all pulmonary blood flow is derived from major aortopulmonary collateral arteries (MAPCA).

column2: Tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary stenosis
column3: 法洛四联症伴肺动脉瓣狭窄
column4: 法洛四联症伴肺动脉瓣狭窄是法洛四联症的一种最常见的形式，主要特征为肺动脉狭窄，主动脉骑跨，室间隔缺损，右心室肥大，无肺动脉闭锁，肺动脉瓣缺如，房室管缺陷或缺失下动脉圆锥。
column5: The commonest form of tetralogy of Fallot characterized by pulmonary stenosis, overriding aorta, ventricular septum defect, and right ventricular hypertrophy, without pulmonary atresia, absent pulmonary valve, atrioventricular canal defect or absent subarterial conus.

column4: 一种罕见的先天性心脏畸形，人体只有一个形态不确定的心室，同时具有三尖瓣和二尖瓣，或一个形态不确定的共同房室瓣。
column5: A rare congenital heart defect characterized by one ventricle with indeterminate morphology and receiving both tricuspid and mitral valves or a common AV valve with indeterminate morphology.

column4: 动脉下室间隔缺损是一种在半月瓣之下或隔膜外发生的室间隔缺损。
column5: A ventricular septal defect that lies beneath the semilunar valve(s) in the conal or outlet septum.

column4: 膜周型室间隔缺损是与膜性中隔汇合、涉及膜性中隔、以房室瓣为界、不包括3型房室间隔缺损的一类房室间隔缺损。
column5: A ventricular septal defect that is confluent with and involves the membranous septum and is bordered by an atrioventricular valve, not including the type 3 VSDs.

column4: 室间隔缺损（VSD），是室间隔太小使得两侧之间存在压力梯度，限制了通过的血流量。
column5: Ventricular septal defect (VSD) that is small enough to restrict flow across it such that a pressure gradient exists between the two sides of the VSD.

column4: 不限制血流经过，但足以在室间隔两侧产生压力梯度的室间隔缺损。
column5: Any ventricular septal defect (VSD) that does not restrict flow across it sufficiently to generate a pressure gradient between the two sides of the VSD.

column4: 上腔静脉从主动脉弓下方通过。
column5: The superior vena cava passes below the aortic arch.

column4: 冠状动脉血管走向的异常。
column5: An abnormal path of a coronary artery.

column4: 一种起源于房室结的室上性心动过速。
column5: A type of supraventricular tachycardia that originates in the atrioventricular node.

column2: Supraventricular tachycardia with an accessory connection mediated pathway
column3: 室上性心动过速伴旁路连接

column2: Supraventricular tachycardia with a concealed accessory connection
column3: 室上性心动过速伴隐匿性旁路
持续性交界处反复性心动过速
column4: 这是一类心脏非正常电活动引起的异常心脏节律，电波在房室交界处往复传递。
column5: It is an abnormal heart rhythm arising from improper electrical activity of the heart that happens reciprocately in the junction of ventricle and atrial.

column2: Supraventricular tachycardia with a concealed accessory pathway on the left free wall
column3: 室上性心动过速伴左侧游离壁隐匿性旁路

column2: Supraventricular tachycardia with a concealed accessory pathway on the right free wall
column3: 室上性心动过速伴右侧游离壁隐匿性旁路

column2: Supraventricular tachycardia with a concealed accessory pathway on the septum
column3: 室上性心动过速伴间隔隐匿性旁路

column2: Supraventricular tachycardia with a manifest accessory pathway
column3: 室上性心动过速伴显性旁路

column4: 小脑实质内的出血(MPATH:119)。
column5: `Hemorrhage` (MPATH:119) into the parenchyma of the cerebellum.

column2: Supraventricular tachycardia with a manifest accessory pathway on the left free wall
column3: 室上性心动过速伴左侧游离壁显性旁路

column2: Supraventricular tachycardia with a manifest accessory pathway on the right free wall
column3: 室上性心动过速伴右侧游离壁显性旁路

column2: Supraventricular tachycardia with a manifest accessory pathway on the septum
column3: 室上性心动过速伴间隔显性旁路

column4: 心房折返性心动过速是由于折返机制引起的一种房性心动过速。
column5: Atrial tachycardia (IART) is a kind of atrial tachycardia caused by reentry mechanism.

column4: 自律性房性心动过速（AAT）是指心房内异位起搏点自律性强度增高，发放激动的频率加快所引起的房性心动过速。
column5: Automatic atrial tachycardia refers to a kind of tachycardia ，because of the automaticity intensity of ectopic pacemaker in atrial increased，speed up the frequency of excited release.

column4: 是由于心房内多个异位起搏点交替发放冲动形成的房性心动过速。
column5: A type of tachycardia,which is resulted from alternating impulse origined from multiple ectopic pacemaker in the atrial.

column2: Abnormal electrophysiology of sinoatrial node origin
column3: 窦房结源性电生理异常
column4: 位于右心房的窦房结（SA）的异常。窦房结起着心脏起搏器的作用。
column5: An abnormality of the sinoatrial (SA) node in the right atrium. THe SA node acts as the pacemaker of the heart.

column4: 一种单纯的心动过速，起源于窦房结，启动和终止都比较缓慢。
column5: A simple tachycardia with origin in the sinus node with gradual onset and termination.

column4: 窦房结功能障碍表现为持续性窦性心律过缓，窦性停搏，窦房输出阻滞，慢性房颤和房颤电复律后心动无力。
column5: Dysfunction of the sinoatrial node manifested by persistent sinus bradycardia,sinus arrest,sinoatrial exit block,chronic atrial fibrillation and inability of the heart to resume sinus rhythm following cardioversion for atrial fibrillation.

column4: 通过房室结点的传导迟滞，这表现为在心电图（EKG）中的PR间隔延长。所有的心房冲动到达心室。
column5: Delay of conduction through the atrioventricular node, which is manifested as prolongation of the PR interval in the electrocardiogram (EKG). All atrial impulses reach the ventricles.

column4: 一种脉冲不能正常的从心房传导至心室的间歇性房室传导阻滞，也就是说，有一些但不是所有的心房冲动能通过房室结传导进而触发心室收缩。
column5: An intermittent  atrioventricular block with failure of some atrial impulses to conduct to the ventricles, i.e., some but not all atrial impulses are conducted through the atrioventricular node and trigger ventricular contraction.

column3: 默比茨I型房室传导阻滞
column4: 心电图表现为PR间期逐渐延长直至QRS波群脱落（P波不能下传），RR间期逐渐缩短直至一个P波不能下传，包含受阻P波在内的RR间期小于正常窦性PP间期的两倍。
column5: Progressive PR interval prolongation with the subsequent occurrence of a single nonconducted P wave that results in a pause. The pause that follows the nonconducted impulse is less than fully compensatory (less than the sum of two normal sinus intervals).

column3: 默比茨II型房室传导阻滞
column4: 心电图表现为PR间期固定，每隔一个或数个心动周期出现一个或数个心室漏搏，下传心动周期的PR间期可正常或延长。
column5: A type of second degree atrioventricular (AV) block characterized by sudden failure to conduct an impulse through the AV node without a preceding change in the PR interval.

column4: 房室（AV）分离是指心房和心室分别由两个单独的起搏器的控制，一般由一级房室传导受阻导致。
column5: Atrioventricular (AV) dissociation is present if the atria and the ventricles are under the control of two separate pacemakers.  AV dissociation can occur is the absence of a primary AV conduction disturbance.

column4: 房室束或其分支的电流传导阻滞。
column5: Block of conduction of electrical impulses along the Bundle of His or along one of its bundle branches.

column4: 在希氏束左束支的前分支传导阻滞。
column5: Conduction block in the anterior division of the left bundle branch of the bundle of His.

column4: 希氏束的右支的传导阻滞。这表现为QRS波群（大于0.12s）的延长同时伴有右心室激活延迟和EKG的终端延迟。
column5: A conduction block of the right branch of the bundle of His. This manifests as a prolongation of the QRS complex (greater than 0.12 s) with delayed activation of the right ventricle and terminal delay on the EKG.

column4: 希氏束左支传导阻滞。这表现为心电图上QRS波形态受到广泛干扰。
column5: A conduction block of the left branch of the bundle of His. This manifests as a generalized disturbance of QRS morphology on EKG.

column4: 利布曼-萨克斯瓣膜病变是非细菌性纤维素赘生物，好发于左侧心脏瓣膜，通常在二尖瓣的心室表面形成。
column5: Libman-Sacks valvular lesions are sterile fibrofibrinous vegetations that favor the left-sided heart valves and usually form on the ventricular surface of the mitral valve.

column4: 心室内传导组织的三个分支全部异常传导。
column5: Abnormal conduction in all three divisions of the intraventricular conducting tissue.

column4: 起源于房室结附近传导组织的心动过速。通常发生于心脏手术后或洋地黄中度引起的心肌梗死。心率可能在140-250/分。
column5: A tachycardia arising in the conduction tissues surrounding the atrioventricular node. It usually occurs during myocardial infarction,after heart surgery,or in digitalis intoxication. The rate may range from 140 to 250 beats per minute.

column3: 房室结折返性心动过速
column4: 房室结处形成的额外电连接，引起异常的心动过速。
column5: An unusually fast heart rate caused by an extra electrical connection that forms through the AV node

column4: 肺静脉的异常（FMA:70827）。
column5: An abnormality of the `pulmonary veins` (FMA:70827).

column2: Supracardiac total anomalous pulmonary venous connection
column3: 心上型完全性肺静脉连接异常
column4: 1型完全性肺静脉异位连接。
column5: Type 1 total anomalous pulmonary venous connection.

column2: Cardiac total anomalous pulmonary venous connection
column3: 心型完全性肺静脉连接异常
column4: 2型完全性肺静脉异常连接。
column5: Type 2 total anomalous pulmonary venous connection.

column2: Infracardiac total anomalous pulmonary venous connection
column3: 心下型完全性肺静脉连接异常
column4: 3型完全性肺静脉异常连接。
column5: Type 3 total anomalous pulmonary venous connection.

column2: Mixed total anomalous pulmonary venous connection
column3: 混合型完全性肺静脉连接异常
column4: 4型完全性肺静脉异常连接。
column5: Type 4 total anomalous pulmonary venous connection.

column2: Congenital malformation of the right heart
column4: 先天性发病的右心畸形。
column5: A developmental malformation of the right heart with congenital onset.

column4: 是一类罕见的先天性心脏病，表现为右心室心肌的完全缺失。
column5: It is a very rare congenital heart disease with a partial or total loss of the myocardial muscle in the right ventricle.

column3: 紊乱性多源性房性心动过速
column4: 紊乱性房性心动过速是一种少见的独特的房性心律失常。
column5: Chaotic multifocal atrial tachycardia is a kind of rare and unique atrial arrhythmia.

column4: 指出生时动脉导管和卵圆孔未闭,当肺动脉压及肺血管阻力升高,导致右向左分流而引起新生儿青紫。
column5: A syndrome of persistent pulmonary hypertension in the newborn infant,without demonstrable cardiac disease. It is characterized by cyanosis and acidosis,severe pulmonary vasoconstriction, hypertrophy of pulmonary arterial muscle,and elevated pulmonary vascular resistance,with resultant right-to-left shunting of blood through a patent ductus arteriosus and at times a patent foramen ovale.

column4: 无力的腓骨肌。
column5: Weakness of the peroneal muscles.

column4: 在肘关节发生的阵挛，例如出现夸张的牵张反射，表现为肘部重复的，有节奏的收缩，通常是快速的被动牵拉肘关节产生的。
column5: Clonus at the elbow joint, i.e., an  exaggerated phasic stretch reflex characterized by repetitive, rhythmic contractions at the elbow, generated by rapid passive stretch at the elbow joint.

column4: 关节活动范围和灵活度的异常。
column5: An abnormality in the range and ease of motion of joints across their normal range.

column4: 皮质性感觉的异常。假设初级感觉形态完好，且患者处于觉醒和协作状态，感觉功能异常的存在通常表明的丘脑突起到顶叶皮质的病变。
column5: An abnormality of cortical sensation. Assuming the primary sensory modalities are intact and the patient is alert and cooperative, the presence of an abnormality of sensory function usually indicates a lesion of a parietal cortex or of the thalamocortical projections to the parietal cortex.

column4: 血液循环中皮质醇浓度异常。
column5: An abnormality of the concentration of "cortisol" (CHEBI:17650) in the blood.

column4: 肾上腺的任何结构异常。
column5: Any structural anomaly of the "adrenal glands" (FMA:9604).

column4: 肾上腺的功能异常（FMA:9604）。
column5: A functional abnormality of the "adrenal glands" (FMA:9604).

column3: 中枢性肾上腺功能不全
column4: 由于促肾上腺皮质激素缺乏, 导致皮质醇产生减少引起的肾上腺功能不全。醛固酮的产生通常不受影响。
column5: A form of adrenal insufficiency related to a lack of ACTH, which leads to a decrease in the production of cortisol by the adrenal glands. Aldosterone production is not usually affected.

column3: 促肾上腺皮质激素（ACTH）缺乏性肾上腺功能不全
column4: 促肾上腺皮质激素的产生缺陷导致的肾上腺功能不全。
column5: Adrenal insufficiency secondary to a defect in ACTH production.

column4: 由于肾上腺缺陷而引起的醛固酮过多症。
column5: A form of hyperaldosteronism caused by a defect within the adrenal gland.

column3: 促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素（CRH）缺陷引起的肾上腺功能不全
column4: 促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素产生缺陷引起的继发性肾上腺功能不全。
column5: Adrenal insufficiency secondary to a defect in corticotropin-releasing hormone production.

column3: 促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素受体（CRHR）缺陷
column4: 促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素受体缺陷引起的继发性肾上腺功能不全。
column5: Adrenal insufficiency secondary to a defect in the corticotropin-releasing hormone receptor.

column3: 地塞米松可抑制性原发性醛固酮增多症
column4: 原发性醛固酮增多症的一种形式，该病通过使用地塞米松来抑制产生过多的醛固酮。
column5: A form of primary hyperaldosteronism in which the overproduction of aldosterone can be suppressed by the administration of dexamethasone.

column3: 糖皮质激素不敏感的原发性醛固酮增多症
column4: 原发性醛固酮增多症的一种形式，其醛固酮的过量产生无法用地塞米松或类似的糖皮质激素抑制。
column5: A form of primary hyperaldosteronism in which the overproduction of aldosterone cannot be suppressed by the administration of dexamethasone or similar glucocorticoids.

column4: 一种由于肾素异常增加而导致的醛固酮增多症。
column5: A form of hyperaldosteronism caused by abnormally increased renin levels.

column4: 肾上腺的解剖位置异常。
column5: Abnormal anatomical location of the adrenal gland.

column4: 肾上腺未发育。
column5: Absent development of the adrenal gland.

column4: 由于促肾上腺皮质激素（往往来自肿瘤）产生过量，而导致继发性过度产生皮质醇。
column5: Hypercortisolemia associated with a overproduction of ACTH (often from a tumor), leading secondarily to overproduction of cortisol.

column3: 非分泌性肾上腺皮质腺瘤
column4: 一个激素不活跃的肾上腺皮质腺瘤，也就是说，不过量分泌肾上腺激素的腺瘤。
column5: An hormonally inactive adrenocortical adenoma, that is, an adenoma that does not secrete excessive amounts of adrenal hormones.

column3: 分泌型肾上腺皮质腺瘤
column4: 一种仍具激素分泌活性的肾上腺皮质腺瘤，这种腺瘤分泌过量的肾上腺皮质激素。
column5: An hormonally active adrenocortical adenoma, that is, an adenoma that secretes excessive amounts of adrenal hormones.

column4: 腺垂体,又被称为垂体前叶的异常。
column5: An abnormality of the `adenohypophysis` (FMA:74627), which is also known as the anterior lobe of the pituitary gland.

column3: 促肾上腺皮质激素不足
column4: 分泌促肾上腺皮质激素(ACTH)的能力下降，ACTH是刺激肾上腺皮质分泌糖皮质激素，如皮质醇的一种激素。
column5: A reduced ability to secrete adrenocorticotropic hormone (ACTH), a hormone that stimulates the adrenal cortex to secrete of glucocorticoids such as cortisol.

column3: 促肾上腺皮质激素过多
column4: 促肾上腺皮质激素（ACTH）产生过多，通常导致继发的肾上腺皮质产生过多皮质醇。
column5: Overproduction of adrenocorticotropic hormone (ACTH), which generally leads secondarily to overproduction of cortisol by the adrenal cortex.

column4: 腺垂体，也被称为脑垂体的前叶的肿瘤。
column5: The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) (tumour) in the `adenohypophysis` (FMA:74627), which is also known as the anterior lobe of the pituitary gland.

column4: 神经垂体的异常，神经垂体又被称为垂体后叶。
column5: An abnormality of the `neurohypophysis` (FMA:74628), which is also known as the posterior lobe of the hypophysis.

column4: 神经垂体，也被称为垂体后叶的肿瘤。
column5: The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) (tumour) in the `neurohypophysis` (FMA:74628), which is also known as the posterior lobe of the hypophysis.

column4: 胚胎期时垂体后叶的异常发育。
column5: Abnormal development of the `neurohypophysis` (FMA:74628) during embryonic growth and development.

column4: 成人的一种实体性的，低分级的，梭形细胞神经胶质肿瘤，起源于神经垂体或垂体漏斗部。临床症状包括视力障碍，头痛和垂体功能低下的特点。 垂体细胞瘤是边界清楚的实体性肿块，直径可达数厘米。组织学上表现为拉长的双极梭形细胞以交错束状或席纹状图案排列的紧凑结构。
column5: A solid, low grade, spindle cell, glial neoplasm of adults that originates in the neurohypophysis or infundibulum. Clinical signs and symptoms include visual disturbance, headache and features of hypopituitarism. Pituicytomas are well-circumscribed, solid masses that can measure up to several centimeters. Histologically, they show a compact architecture consisting of elongate, bipolar spindle cells arranged in interlacing fascicles or assuming a storiform pattern.

column4: 垂体后叶，即神经垂体的解剖位置异常。垂体后叶通常位于蝶鞍背部，但是发生异位时通常接近正中隆起。这种缺陷可能是由于胚胎发育过程中的异常迁移。
column5: An abnormal anatomical location of the posterior lobe of the hypophysis, also known as the `neurohypophysis` (FMA:74628). The posterior pituitary is normally present in the dorsal portion of the sella turcica, but when ectopic is usually near the median eminence. This defect is likely to be due to abnormal migration during embryogenesis.

column4: 由于发育缺陷而导致的缺少垂体后叶。
column5: Absence of the `neurohypophysis` (FMA:74628) owing to a developmental defect.

column4: 垂体后叶发育不全。
column5: Underdevelopment of the `neurohypophysis` (FMA:74628).

column3: 垂体嗜酸性干细胞腺瘤

column4: 一种能产生促性腺激素的垂体腺瘤。
column5: A type of pituitary adenoma that produces gonadotropins.

column4: 一种产生生长激素的垂体腺瘤。
column5: A type of pituitary adenoma that produces growth hormone.

column4: 一种未知细胞来源和缺乏免疫细胞化学或精细结构标记的垂体腺瘤。这种垂体腺瘤不伴随激素的过多分泌。
column5: A type of pituitary adenoma that is of unknown cellular origin and that lacks immunocytochemical or fine structural markers.  Null cell adenomas are not associated with hormone excess.

column4: 一种分泌促甲状腺激素（TSH）的垂体腺瘤
column5: A type of pituitary adenoma that produces thyroid stimulating hormone (TSH).

column4: 一种伴蛛网膜下腔，脑或全身转移的垂体肿瘤。垂体腺癌的诊断需要肿瘤转移的证据，或者是转移到中枢神经系统（CNS）之外，或者是中枢神经系统内的单独的非连续的癌症。
column5: A pituitary tumor with subarachnoid, brain, or systemic metastasis. The diagnosis of a pituitary carcinoma requires evidence of metastatic disease, either outside the central nervous system (CNS) or as separate noncontiguous foci within the CNS.

column3: 垂体梭形细胞嗜酸细胞瘤
column4: 垂体前叶的一种梭形至上皮样的嗜酸性非内分泌肿瘤，发生于成人，临床表现良性。 垂体梭形细胞嗜酸细胞瘤质地致密，纤维化，并附着到周围的结构且血管富集。
column5: A spindled-to-epithelioid, oncocytic, nonendocrine neoplasm of the anterior hypophysis that manifests in adults and follows a benign clinical course. Pituitary spindle cell oncocytomas are firm, fibrous, and adherent to surrounding structures and are highly vascular.

column4: 垂体前叶即腺垂体的解剖位置异常
column5: An abnormal anatomical location of the anterior lobe of the hypophysis, also known as the `adenohypophysis` (FMA:74627).

column4: 甲状旁腺结构异常。
column5: A structural abnormality of the "parathyroid gland" (FMA:13890).

column4: 甲状旁腺功能异常。
column5: A functional abnormality of the "parathyroid gland" (FMA:13890).

column4: 甲状旁腺胚胎发育异常。
column5: Abnormal embryonic development of the "parathyroid gland" (FMA:13890).

column4: 甲状旁腺的解剖位置异常。
column5: An abnormal anatomical location of the "parathyroid gland" (FMA:13890).

column3: 三发性甲状旁腺功能亢进症
column4: 一种肾脏移植手术后出现的甲状旁腺功能亢进症。肾移植可以缓解继发性甲状旁腺功能亢进，大多数病人的血钙和甲状旁腺激素会趋向正常化，如果仍持续存在高血钙和甲状旁腺功能亢进则称为三发性甲状旁腺功能亢进。
column5: A type of hyperparathyroidism that occurs following kidney transplantation, which is a treatment for secondary hyperparathyroidism. Although kidney transplantation leads to a normalization of serum calcium and parathyroid hormone in most patients. The state of persistent hypercalcemia and hyperparathyroidism is referred to as tertiary hyperparathyroidism.

column3: 自身免疫性甲状旁腺功能减退症
column4: 甲状旁腺功能低下的一种，血液循环中有抗甲状旁腺抗体或抗钙敏感受体抗体，提示自身免疫参与其中。
column5: A type of hypoparathyroidism with circulating antiparathyroid or anti-calcium sensing receptor antibodies indicative of autoimmunity.

column4: 甲状腺的结构异常。
column5: A structural abnormality of the "thyroid gland" (FMA:9603).

column4: 只有一个结节的甲状腺肿大。
column5: Enlargement of the thyroid gland related to a singular nodule in the thyroid gland.

column4: 甲状腺出现单叶缺如，与腺体胚胎期发育异常有关
column5: Absence of a  lobe of the thyroid gland related to a failure of its embryologic development.

column4: 甲状腺滤泡旁细胞（C细胞）的异常生长。
column5: An abnormal growth of parafollicular (C-cells) cells.

column3: 异位甲状腺组织的甲状腺毒症
甲状腺毒症伴弥漫性甲状腺肿

column2: Thyrotoxicosis with toxic single thyroid nodule

column3: 中枢性甲状腺功能减退症
column4: 由于中枢的刺激不足，引起原本正常的甲状腺功能减退。中枢性甲减由垂体（继发性甲减）或下丘脑（三发性甲减）的缺陷引起。
column5: A type of hypothyroidism due to an insufficient stimulation of an otherwise normal thyroid gland. Central hypothyroidism is caused by either pituitary (secondary hypothyroidism) or hypothalamic (tertiary hypothyroidism) defects.

column3: 血清游离三碘甲状腺原氨酸（fT3）升高
column4: 血液中3,3'，5-三碘左旋甲状腺原氨酸浓度升高。
column5: An elevated concentration of "3,3',5-triiodo-L-thyronine" (CHEBI:18258) in the blood.

column3: 促甲状腺激素受体（TSHR）缺陷
促甲状腺激素受体（TSHR）激活性缺陷
column4: 功能获得性的促甲状腺激素受体（TSHR）缺陷。
column5: Gain-of-function thyroid-stimulating hormone receptor (TSHR) defect.

column3: 促甲状腺激素受体（TSHR）失活性缺陷
column4: 促甲状腺激素受体（TSHR）功能丧失性缺陷。
column5: Loss-of-function thyroid-stimulating hormone receptor (TSHR) defect.

column4: 根据肿瘤组织学异常的类型分类。
column5: Neoplasm categorized according to type of histological abnormality.

column4: 肿瘤根据肿瘤的起源的解剖学部位分类。
column5: Neoplasm categorized according to the anatomical site of origin of the neoplasm.

column4: 主要在儿童期发病的肾脏胚胎肿瘤。
column5: The presence of an embryonal neoplasm of the `kidney` (FMA:7203) that primarily affects children.

column4: 婴儿肾小叶中存在肾母细胞瘤小岛，可以在肾小叶（肾锥体和肾皮质的一部分）的任何位置。
column5: Presence of persistent islands of renal blastema in the postnatal kidney, anywhere within a renal lobe (a portion of a kidney consisting of a renal pyramid and the renal cortex above it).

column3: 小叶周围性肾母细胞瘤
column4: 在肾浅表皮层区域（小叶周围）异常持续存在的胚胎未成熟胚基灶。
column5: Abnormally persistent foci of embryonal immature blastema located in the superficial cortical region (perilobar).

column4: 一种乳头状肾细胞癌，其特点是以小立方细胞覆盖薄乳头，细胞为单一细胞系，有均一的核和小核仁。
column5: A type of papillary renal cell carcinoma that is characterized by small cuboidal cells covering thin papillae with a single line of uniform nuclei and small nucleoli.

column4: 一种肾肿瘤，起源于嗜酸粒细胞，它是一种上皮瘤细胞，其特征为过量的线粒体，产生丰富的嗜酸、粒状的细胞质。
column5: A renal tumor originating from an oncocyte, which  is an epithelial cell characterized by an excessive amount of mitochondria, resulting in an abundant acidophilic, granular cytoplasm.

column4: 眼眶下和／或鼻翼旁部位后置或者垂直长度缩短，或者脸部凹陷加剧和／或鼻唇角减小。
column5: Posterior positions and/or vertical shortening of the infraorbital and perialar regions, or increased concavity of the face and/or reduced nasolabial angle.

column4: 腮腺变大。
column5: Increased size of the parotid gland.

column4: 目视可见的垂直压痕，裂开，或凹陷的鼻梁，鼻脊和鼻尖。
column5: Visually assessable vertical indentation, cleft, or depression of the nasal bridge, ridge and tip.

column4: 骨骼肌的功能异常。
column5: A functional abnormality of a skeletal muscle.

column4: 骨骼肌的结构异常。
column5: A structural abnormality of a skeletal muscle.

column4: 受累的1型肌肉纤维萎缩（消瘦）。一般该特征只能在肌肉活检中观察到。
column5: Atrophy (wasting) affecting primary type 1 muscle fibers. This feature in general can only be observed on muscle biopsy.

column4: 膝反射（又称膝跳反射）强度减弱。
column5: Decreased intensity of the patellar reflex (also known as the knee jerk reflex).

column4: 一种加重型肌强直，伴随肌肉的反复收缩。
column5: A type of myotonia that worsens with repeated muscle contractions.

column4: 区别相互靠近的两点触觉的能力下降。测验使用特殊的卡尺，其两点可设置为2毫米到几厘米。
column5: A reduced ability to distinguish tactile sensations at points that are very close to one another. This can be tested by using special calipers whose points can be set from 2mm to several centimeters apart.

column4: 准确地识别触摸部位的能力下降。测试要求病人闭眼或盖住眼睛，用指尖触摸同一部位。
column5: A reduced ability to identify precisely the site of a touch. This test is usually carried out by asking a patient, whose eyes are closed or covered, to touch the same site with a fingertip.

column4: 辨认病检查者用指尖在病人皮肤上绘制的字母或数字的能力的损坏（检查过程中患者闭眼或视线被阻挡）。
column5: Impaired ability to recognize letters or numbers drawn by an examiner's fingertip on the patient's skin (the patients eyes are closed or covered throughout this examination).

column4: 脂褐素（老年斑）是一种棕黄色的，电子致密的，自体荧光材料，随着时间推移逐步沉积于有丝分裂后细胞的溶酶体，如神经元和心肌细胞。此术语适用于脂褐素（也称为自身荧光脂蛋白）的积聚增加是否超过患者预期的年龄。
column5: Lipofuscin (age pigment) is a brown-yellow, electron-dense, autofluorescent material that accumulates progressively over time in lysosomes of postmitotic cells, such as neurons and cardiac myocytes.  This term pertains if there is an increase in the accumulation of lipofuscin (also known as autofluorescent lipoprotein) more than expected for the age of the patient.

column4: 在`urine`（FMA:12274）的`hypoxanthine`水平升高（17368 CHEBI）。
column5: An increased level of `hypoxanthine` (CHEBI:17368) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).

column4: 部分颅内容物通过颅骨先天性畸形从颅骨突起的颅骨先天性缺陷，通常有皮肤或粘膜覆盖。该术语指这些病变中脑组织通过缺陷而突出的亚类。
column5: A congenital defect in the skull, whereby there is a protrusion of part of the cranial contents through a congenital defect in the cranium, usually covered with skin or mucous membrane. The term encephalocele refers to a subclass of these lesions in which brain tissue protrudes through the defect.

column4: 位于前囟和人字缝与矢状缝交界处之间的脑膨出。
column5: An encephalocele located between bregma and lambda.

column4: 基底脑膨出是发生沿筛板或通过蝶骨的膨出。膨出物质可能会出现在鼻腔，鼻咽，鼻旁咽，蝶窦，后眼眶，或翼腭窝。与其他类型的重要区别是除了巨大的膨出物压迫至使从嘴巴或鼻孔突出的罕见情况，没有外部肿块可见。
column5: Basal encephalocele is an encephalocele that occurs along the cribriform plate or through the sphenoid bone. The mass may appear in the nasal cavity, nasopharynx, epipharynx, sphenoid sinus, posterior orbit, or pterygopalatine fossa. The important distinction from other types is that no external tumor is visible except in those rare instances of herniations so large that they protrude through the mouth or nares.

column4: 软腭肌层及粘膜裂开，由中线结构缺失或肌肉组织缺乏为特征。
column5: A cleft of the muscular (soft) portion of the palate that is covered by mucous membrane. Soft-palate submucous clefts are characterized by a midline deficiency or lack of muscle tissue.

column4: 后鼻孔（鼻后孔）缺乏正常开口，由细条状或粗塞状的后鼻孔膜阻挡所致。
column5: Absence of the normal opening of the choana (the posterior nasal aperture) as a result of an obstructing choanal membrane that may be thin and strandlike or thick and pluglike.

column4: 面部骨骼中一块或多块骨头的异常
column5: An abnormality of one or more of the set of bones that make up the `facial skeleton` (FMA:53673).

column4: 下颌骨（心理突起）和上覆的软组织中点的宽度增加。
column5: Increased width of the midpoint of the mandible (mental protuberance) and overlying soft tissue.

column4: 在脸部放松的状态下，位于下唇唇红下方和下巴脂肪垫上方的横向折痕或褶皱
column5: Horizontal crease or fold situated below the vermilion border of the lower lip and above the fatty pad of the chin, with the face at rest.

column4: 下巴脂肪垫H形折痕。
column5: H-shaped crease in the fat pad of the chin.

column4: 从鼻柱至上唇尖的软组织区呈一三角形。
column5: Prominence of a triangular soft tissue area of the philtrum with the apex to the columella.

column4: 窄脊在人中槽的中线。
column5: Narrow ridge in the midline of the philtral groove.

column4: 人中脊偏离正常平行位置。
column5: Absence of the usual parallel position of philtral ridges.

column4: 人中沟中线上的凹陷。
column5: Pit in the midline of the philtral groove.

column4: 人中脊间的距离，主要指高于唇红边缘，低于平均值超过2个标准差。或者人中脊之间距离显得减小。
column5: Distance between the philtral ridges, measured just above the vermilion border, more than 2 standard deviations below the mean. Alternatively, an apparently decreased distance between the ridges of the philtrum.

column4: 口腔黏膜的异常。
column5: Abnormality of the `oral mucosa` (FMA:59660).

column4: 鼻尖位于中线的某一侧。
column5: Nasal tip positioned to one side of the midline.

column4: 鼻尖宽度减少。
column5: Decrease in width of the nasal tip.

column4: 鼻尖位于鼻基之下。
column5: Positioning of the nasal tip inferior to the nasal base.

column4: 颈内动脉非炎性、进行性的闭塞，从而导致Willis环生出很多网状的侧枝动脉。
column5: A noninflammatory, progressive occlusion of the intracranial carotid arteries owing to the formation of netlike collateral arteries arising from the `circle of Willis` (FMA:50454).

column4: 先天性舟骨缺如（FMA:23709）..
column5: Congenital absence of the `scaphoid` (FMA:23709)..

column4: 距骨（FMA:9708）成熟和骨化延迟。
column5: Delayed maturation and calcification of the `talus` (FMA:9708).

column4: 同年龄段正常值水平相比，探测到IgA降低超过2个标准差。
column5: Detectable but decreased IgA levels that are more than 2 standard deviations below normal age-adjusted means.

column4: 指（趾）部位皮肤的局部增厚硬化。
column5: Localized thickening and tightness of the skin of the fingers or toes.

column4: 异常的T细胞（:0000084 CL）计数。
column5: A deviation from the normal count of `T cells` (CL:0000084).

column4: 异常的T细胞（:0000084 CL）计数。
column5: A deviation from the normal count of `T cells` (CL:0000084).

column4: 骨骼系统的形态、结构和大小的异常。
column5: An abnormality of the form, structure, or size of the `skeletal system` (FMA:23881).

column4: 骨骼系统功能的异常。
column5: An abnormality of the function of the `skeletal system` (FMA:23881).

column4: 四肢、肩部和骨盆的肢带骨的骨骼异常。
column5: An abnormality of the `appendicular skeletal system` consisting of the of the limbs, shoulder and pelvic girdles.

column4: 第二跖骨（FMA:24503）短（发育不全）。
column5: Short (hypoplastic) `second metatarsal bone` (FMA:24503).

column4: 一种良性的、疼痛的骨肿瘤，以骨样组织，原始骨和钙化组织的形成为特征。
column5: A benign, painful, tumor of bone characterized by the formation of osteoid tissue, primitive bone and calcified tissue.

column4: 一种由梭形细胞间质及散布其中类似破骨细胞的多核巨细胞组成的骨肿瘤。
column5: A bone tumor composed of cellular spindle-cell stroma containing scattered multinucleated giant cells resembling osteoclasts.

column4: 骨或骨性物质形成中的任何异常，或纤维组织或软骨转化形成骨或骨的物质过程中的任何异常。
column5: Any anomaly in the formation of bone or of a bony substance, or the conversion of fibrous tissue or of cartilage into bone or a bony substance.

column4: 腮腺的炎症。
column5: Inflammation of the parotid gland.

column4: 积血心包腔中。
column5: Accumulation of blood within the pericardial sac.

column4: 心包腔内乳糜液（由小肠乳糜管吸收的白色液体，主要由乳状淋巴液和脂肪组成，能够通过胸导管进入静脉）积累。乳糜心包一般由胸导管的阻塞或外伤引起的。
column5: Accumulation of chyle (the whitish fluid taken up by the lacteals in the intestine, consisting of an emulsion of lymph and triglyceride fat thatpasses into the veins by the thoracic duct) in the pericardium. Chylopericardium is generally caused by obstruction of or trauma to the thoracic duct.

column4: 心包腔浆液性液体（淡黄色透明液体）的积聚。
column5: Accumulation of serous fluid (pale yellow and transparent fluid) in the pericardial sac.

column4: 由于内出血导致腹腔中血液积累。
column5: Accumulation of blood in the peritoneal cavity owing to internal hemorrhage.

column4: 液体异常积聚导致咽肿胀。
column5: Abnormal accumulation of fluid leading to swelling of the pharynx.

column4: 异常且持续的想要进食非实物如黏土的食欲。诊断异食癖必须有这种行为持续一个月以上。
column5: An appetite for and the persistent ingestion of non-food substances such as clay. In order to diagnose pica, this behavior must have persisted over a period of at least one month.

column4: 在骨髓或在髓外组织的单克隆浆细胞性肿瘤。
column5: A discrete mass of neoplastic monoclonal plasma cells either in the bone marrow or in an extramedullary location.

column4: `凝血因子IX`（PR:000007303）的活性降低。凝血因子IX，其本身是通过因子Xa或Ⅶa因子活化后，形成因子IXa，然后激活因子X形成活化的因子Xa。
column5: Decreased activity of `coagulation factor IX` (PR:000007303). Factor IX, which itself is activated by factor Xa or factor VIIa to form factor IXa, activates factor X into factor Xa.

column4: 角膜炎的一种，角膜上皮上发生针尖样的炎症。
column5: A type of keratitis characterized by inflammation in pinpoint areas of the corneal epithelium.

column4: 骨干骺端存在密度异常增加的斑点或圆形斑块。
column5: The presence of spots or rounded patches of abnormally increased density of metaphyseal bone.

column4: 两肺有三个肺叶。通常情况下，左肺有两个肺叶，而右边肺部有三个肺叶。
column5: Both lungs have three lobes. Normally, the left lung has two lobes, whereas the right lung has three lobes.

column4: 骨组织的细胞外基质结缔组织束的任何异常，结缔组织由胶原蛋白组成，在维持组织强度和弹性中发挥作用。
column5: Any structural anomaly of the connective tissue bundles in the extracellular matrix of bone tissue that are composed of collagen, and play a role in tissue strength and elasticity.

column4: 胸骨的异常骨组织形成。
column5: An abnormal formation and mineralization of sternal.

column4: 一个异常升高`二磷酸（4-）`（CHEBI:18361）在`blood`浓度（FMA:9670）。二磷酸（4-），如酯具有两个磷酸基团，也被称为焦磷酸。
column5: An abnormally increased `diphosphate(4-)` (CHEBI:18361)  concentration in the `blood` (FMA:9670). Diphosphate(4-), as ester with two phosphate groups, is also known as pyrophosphate.

column2: Abnormality of the wing of the ilium
column4: 髂骨翼的异常。髂骨翼是髂骨扩展增大的部分，形成大骨盆后侧面。
column5: An anomaly of the `ilium ala` (FMA:42826). This is the large expanded portion of the ilum which bounds the greater pelvis laterally.

column4: 腰部和臀部的疼痛放射至辐射在坐骨神经的分布区域。
column5: Pain in the lower back and hip radiating in the distribution of the sciatic nerve.

column4: 任何异常的血小板的功能。
column5: Any anomaly in the function of thrombocytes.

column3: 花生四烯酸诱导的血小板聚集受损
column4: 花生四烯酸反应异常，在加入花生四烯酸后表现为血小板聚集减少或缺乏。
column5: Abnormal response to arachidonic acid as manifested by reduced or lacking aggregation of platelets upon addition of arachidonic acid.

column3: 瑞斯托菌素诱发的血小板聚集受损
column4: 对瑞斯托霉素异常反应，表现为血小板在加入瑞斯托霉素聚集降低或缺乏。
column5: Abnormal response to ristocetin as manifested by reduced or lacking aggregation of platelets upon addition of ristocetin.

column3: 凝血酶诱导的血小板聚集障碍
column4: 在加入的凝血酶（凝血酶或模拟物）后，血小板聚集减少或缺乏。
column5: Abnormal response to thrombin or thrombin mimetics as manifested by reduced or lacking aggregation of platelets upon addition of thrombin (or thrombin mimetics).

column4: 每升血液中血小板数量异常。健康成年血小板计数为每微升血液15万至45万。
column5: Abnormal number of platelets per volume of blood. In a healthy adult, a normal platelet count is between 150,000 and 450,000 per microliter of blood.

column3: 肝素诱导的血小板减少症
column4: 未分级的或（较不常见）的低分子量肝素应用引起的血小板计数降低。
column5: Low platelet count following administration of unfractionated or (less commonly) low-molecular weight heparin.

column4: 血小板形态、超微结构或细胞内细胞器异常。
column5: An anomaly in platelet form, ultrastructure, or intracellular organelles.
