column4: 血小板大小异常。大多数正常大小的血小板的直径是1.5至3微米。大血小板4至7微米。巨血小板大于7微米，通常为10至20微米。
column5: Anomalous size of platelets. Most normal sized platelets are 1.5 to 3 micrometers in diameter. Large platelets are 4 to 7 micrometers. Giant platelets are larger than 7 micrometers and usually 10 to 20 micrometers.

column4: 平均血小板体积高于正常参考区间的上限。
column5: Average platelet volume above the upper limit of the normal reference interval.

column3: 血小板膜蛋白表达异常
column4: 血小板细胞膜蛋白量减少。此功能通常通过流式细胞术测量。
column5: Presence of reduced amount of a membrane protein on the cell membrane of platelets. This feature is typically measured by flow cytometry.

column4: 血小板糖细胞膜蛋白复合物Ib-IX-V减少。
column5: Decreased cell membrane concentration of the glycoprotein complex Ib-IX-V.

column3: 急性弥散性血管内凝血
column4: 弥散性血管内凝血一种急性型（HP:0005521）凝血功能异常综合征。急性DIC可能由于促凝血剂突然增多，使止血机制不堪代偿而发生。
column5: An acute form of `disseminated intravascular coagulation` (HP:0005521). Acute DIC can occur following sudden exposure of blood to procoagulants, with the compensatory hemostatic mechanisms becoming overwhelmed.

column4: 细胞膜糖蛋白VI浓度降低。
column5: Decreased cell membrane concentration of glycoprotein  VI.

column4: 血小板细胞膜P2Y12受体减少。
column5: Decreased cell membrane concentration of P2Y12 receptor.

column4: α颗粒、致密颗粒或血小板溶酶体的异常。
column5: An anomaly of alpha or dense granules or platelet lysosomes.

column4: 出生后7-10天脐带分离残端异常出血。
column5: Abnormal bleeding of the umbilical stump following separation of the cord at approximately 7-10 days after birth.

column4: 从眼睛的各种组织的血管出血。
column5: Bleeding from vessels of the various tissues of the eye.

column4: 出血在眼睛的前房中。
column5: Bleeding in the anterior chamber of the eye.

column4: 脉络膜血管的出血。
column5: Hemorrhage from the vessels of the choroid.

column4: 出血十分严重，需要接受红细胞输血（WHO 3或4级）。
column5: Bleeding sufficiently severe as to require red cell transfusion (WHO Grade 3 or 4).

column2: Bleeding with minor or no trauma
column4: 没有显著促发因素出血。
column5: Significant bleeding or hemorrhage without significant precipitating factor.

column4: 侵入性手术或介入治疗后的出血延长或长期出血。
column5: Prolonged or protracted bleeding following an invasive procedure or intervention.

column4: 产后严重出血/失血。
column5: Significant maternal haemorrhage/blood loss following deilvery of a child.

column4: 超出正常血液白细胞计数。
column5: Number of leukocytes per volume of blood beyond normal limits.

column2: Impaired thromboxane A2 agonist-induced platelet aggregation
column3: 血栓素A2激动剂诱导的血小板聚集受损
column4: 对血栓素异常响应，表现为血小板在加入血栓烷A2受体激动剂后减少或缺乏聚集。
column5: Abnormal response to thromboxane as manifested by reduced or lacking aggregation of platelets upon addition of thromboxane A2 receptor agonists.

column2: Anemia due to reduced life span of red cells
column3: 红细胞寿命缩短性贫血
column4: 一种与外周循环中红血细胞平均寿命（通常约为120天）降低的贫血。
column5: A type of anemia related to a reduction in the average life span of red blood cells in the peripheral circulation, which is normally around 120 days.

column4: 出血发生于眼结膜下，眼结膜位于眼睑的内表面。
column5: Bleeding beneath the mucous membrane that lines the inner surface of the eyelid.

column4: 血液循环中嗜中性粒细胞的数量增加。
column5: Increased number of neutrophils circulating in blood.

column3: 外周血纤维蛋白原异常
column4: 外周血中纤维蛋白原的活性异常。
column5: An abnormality of the level of activity of circulating fibrinogen.

column4: 血液中的纤维蛋白原浓度增加。
column5: Increased concentration of fibrinogen in the blood.

column4: 血液中纤维蛋白浓度减少。
column5: Decreased concentration of fibrinogen in the blood.

column4: 纤维蛋白原的性质异常。
column5: Qualitatively abnormal fibrinogen.

column4: 红细胞中携氧蛋白——血红蛋白水平或功能异常。
column5: Anomaly in the level or the function of hemoglobin, the oxygen-carrying protein of erythrocytes.

column4: 血红蛋白H（血红蛋白H）包含四个β球蛋白链。正常情况下不会出现，但在血红蛋白H病中（α-地中海贫血的一种亚型）可达约1-40％。
column5: Hemoglobin H (HbH) contains four beta-globin chains. It is normally not present at all in blood, but may make up about 1-40 percent of all hemoglobin in HbH disease, a subform of alpha thalassemia.

column3: 胎儿血红蛋白F持续存在
column4: 血红蛋白F（HbF）含有两条α链球蛋白和两条γ链球蛋白。HbF是胎儿血红蛋白的主要形式，存在于子宫内发育的最后七个月至出生后的半年。在成人中，通常它少于总血红蛋白的百分之一。此术语指HbF的增加超过1%的情况。在重型β地中海贫血中，它可能总占血红蛋白的90％以上；在轻型地中海贫血中，HbF通常在0.5%-4％之间。
column5: Hemoglobin F (HbF) contains two globin alpha chains and two globin gamma chains. It is the main form of hemoglobin in the fetus during the last seven months of intrauterine  development and in the half year of postnatal life. In adults it normally makes up less than one percent of all hemoglobiin. This term refers to an increase in HbF above this limit. In beta thalassemia major, it may represent over 90 percent of all hemoglobin, and in beta thalassemia minor it may make up between 0.5 to 4 percent.

column4: 血红蛋白（HbA）包含两条α链珠蛋白和两条β链珠蛋白。HbA通常是成人血红蛋白的主要成分，约占所有血红蛋白的96-98％左右。这个术语表示的HbA的比例低于96%，常见于各种形式地中海贫血。
column5: Hemoglobin A (HbA) contains two globin alpha chains and two globin beta chains. HbA is normally the main adult hemoglobin, representing about 96-98 percent of all hemoglobin. This term represents a decreased in the proportion of HbA below this limit, and can be seen in various forms of thalassemia.

column4: β/α球蛋白合成比例减少。这是在各种形式的β地中海的主要异常。
column5: A reduction in the ratio of production of beta globin to that of alpha globin. This is the major abnormality in the various forms of beta thalassemia.

column4: α球蛋白的产生少于β球蛋白。这是在各种形式的α地中海贫血的主要异常表型。
column5: A reduction in the ratio of production of alpha globin to that of beta globin. This is the major abnormality in the various forms of alpha thalassemia.

column4: 单侧桡骨缺如，与先天性发育不全有关。
column5: Missing radius bone on one side only associated with congenital failure of development.

column4: 掌骨头异常的扁平状。
column5: Abnormally flat shape of the heads of the metacarpal bones.

column2: Shortening of all phalanges of the finger
column4: 所有指骨的长度异常减小。
column5: Abnormal reduction in length affecting all phalanges.

column4: 掌指关节的结构或形态异常。
column5: An abnormal structure or form  of `metacarpophalangeal joint.

column4: 关节窝（也称关节盂）的异常，它是与肱骨头与肩胛骨的关节面。
column5: An anomaly of the `glenoid fossa` (FMA:23275), also known as the glenoid cavity, which is the articular surface of the scapula that articulates with the head of the humerus.

column4: 腰区局部的毛发生长过度。
column5: Excessive, increased hair growth located in the lumbar region.

column4: 位于胸部毛发的过度生长。
column5: Excessive, increased hair growth located in the thoracic region.

column4: `心血管系统`的异常钙化（FMA:7161）。
column5: Abnormal calcification in the `cardiovascular system` (FMA:7161).

column4: 支配脚趾伸展的趾长伸肌的肌肉萎缩。
column5: Atrophy of the extensor digitorum longus muscles, which mediate extension of the toes.

column4: 第五趾未发育（发育不全）（FMA:25053）。
column5: Underdevelopment (hypoplasia) of the `fifth toe` (FMA:25053).

column4: 第四趾弯曲或在胫骨方向（即朝大脚趾）存在曲度。
column5: Bending or curvature of a `fourth toe` (FMA:25052) in the tibial direction (i.e., towards the big toe).

column4: 脓液在胸腔积聚（FMA:9740）。
column5: Accumulation of pus in the `pleural cavity` (FMA:9740).

column4: 漏出性胸腔积液（具有低蛋白含量和低比重特点）。根据light标准，可将胸腔积液分为漏出液和渗出液，符合以下一项或多项为渗出液:（1）胸水蛋白与血清蛋白的比率大于0.5，（2）胸水乳酸脱氢酶（LDH）与血清LDH比率大于0.6，或（3）胸液LDH水平大于三分之二的正常血清LDH的上限。
column5: A type of pleural effusion with a transudate (extravascular fluid with low protein content and a low specific gravity). Pleural effusions can be classified as transudates or exudates based on Light's criteria, which classify an effusion as exudate if one or more of the following are present: (1) the ratio of pleural fluid protein to serum protein is greater than 0.5, (2) the ratio of pleural fluid lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) to serum LDH is greater than 0.6, or (3) the pleural fluid LDH level is greater than two thirds of the upper limit of normal for serum LDH.

column4: 一种具有渗出液的胸膜腔积液，渗出液为组织或其毛细血管因损伤或炎症而渗出的血管外液。胸腔积液分类基于Light标准，依据该标准，渗出液应符合以下至少一条:（1）胸水白蛋白/血清白蛋白的比值大于0.5，（2）胸水乳酸脱氢酶（LDH）/血清LDH比值大于0.6，或（3）胸液LDH水平大于正常血清LDH上的限三分之二。
column5: A type of pleural effusion with a exudate (extravascular fluid that has exuded out of a tissue or its capillaries due to injury or inflammation). Pleural effusions can be classified as transudates or exudates based on Light's criteria, which classify an effusion as exudate if one or more of the following are present: (1) the ratio of pleural fluid protein to serum protein is greater than 0.5, (2) the ratio of pleural fluid lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) to serum LDH is greater than 0.6, or (3) the pleural fluid LDH level is greater than two thirds of the upper limit of normal for serum LDH.

column2: Abnormal activity of mitochondrial respiratory chain
column3: 线粒体呼吸链活性异常
column4: 线粒体呼吸链的活性增高或降低(GO:0005746)。
column5: An increased or decreased activity of the `mitochondrial respiratory chain` (GO:0005746).

column2: Decreased activity of mitochondrial complex I
column3: 线粒体复合物I活性降低
column4: 在`线粒体呼吸链复合物I`的活性的降低（GO:0005747），这是在线粒体中的电子传递链的一部分。
column5: A reduction in the activity of the `mitochondrial respiratory chain complex I` (GO:0005747), which is part of the electron transport chain in mitochondria.

column2: Decreased activity of mitochondrial complex III
column3: 线粒体复合物III活性降低
column4: 在`线粒体呼吸链复合物III`的活性的降低（GO:0005750），这是在线粒体中的电子传递链的一部分。
column5: A reduction in the activity of the `mitochondrial respiratory chain complex III` (GO:0005750), which is part of the electron transport chain in mitochondria.

column2: Decreased activity of mitochondrial ATP synthase complex
column3: 线粒体ATP合成酶复合物活性降低
column4: 在`线粒体质子转运ATP合酶complex`的活性的降低（GO:0005753），其通过氧化磷酸化使得ATP和有时被描述为电子传递链的复合物V。
column5: A reduction in the activity of the ` mitochondrial proton-transporting ATP synthase complex` (GO:0005753), which makes ATP via oxidative phosphorylation, and is sometimes described as Complex V of the electron transport chain.

column4: 大拇趾从正常位置发生近端异位。
column5: `Proximal mislocalization` (PATO:0002179) of the `big toe` (FMA:25047) from its normal position.

column4: 相比于手/脚，整个手指（脚趾）或一个特定的指（趾）骨发生不成比例的短缩。
column5: One or more digit that appears disproportionately short compared to the hand/foot, whereby either the entire digit or a specific phalanx is shortened.

column4: 近节趾骨发育不全（缩短）（FMA:75828）。
column5: Developmental hypoplasia (shortening) of `proximal phalanx of toe` (FMA:75828).

column2: Hypersegmentation of proximal phalanx of third finger
column3: 无名指近节指骨分节过多
column4: 存在一个额外的指骨状骨，在第三指的近端指骨基底部产生一个额外的楔形骨。
column5: Presence of an additional phalanx-like bone, producing an extra, wedge-shaped bone at the base of the proximal phalanx of the third finger.

column4: 在`小脑脚`的异常（FMA:77791）。脑干与小脑联系的包括上，中，下小脑脚。上小脑脚连接小脑和中脑；中小脑脚连接小脑和桥脑；下小脑脚连接延髓和小脑。
column5: An anomaly of the `cerebellar peduncles` (FMA:77791). The superior, middle, and inferior cerebellar peduncles emerge from the cerebellum. The superior cerebellar penduncles connect the cerebellum to the midbrain, the middle cerebellar peduncles connect the cerebellum to the pons, and the inferior cerebellar peduncle connects the medulla spinalis and medulla oblongata with the cerebellum.

column3: 闭塞性细支气管炎机化性肺炎
column4: 闭塞性细支气管炎机化性肺炎（BOOP）是肺间质疾病的一种，组织病理学特征为肉芽组织阻塞小气道、肺泡管、肺泡，同时伴有肺泡壁的慢性炎细胞浸润。BOOP患者一般表现为亚急性起病，包括呼吸急促、发烧、全身乏力、体重减轻等。
column5: Bronchiolitis obliterans organizing pneumonia (BOOP) is and interstitial lung abnormalitiy characterized  histopathologically by plugs of granulation tissue lying within small airways, alveolar ducts, and alveoli and by chronic inflammatory cell infiltration in alveolar walls. Patients with BOOP generally present with subacute illness, including shortness of breath, fever, malaise, and weight loss.

column4: 细支气管的炎症和纤维化导致这些气道的局部或完全闭塞。
column5: Inflammation and fibrosis of the bronchioles leading to partial or complete obstruction of these airways.

column4: 上或下呼吸道感染。
column5: An infection of the upper or lower respiratory tract.

column4: 上或下呼吸道的急性感染。
column5: An acute infection of the upper or lower respiratory tract.

column4: 由于感染而出现的肺部急性炎症。
column5: Acute inflammation of the lung due to an infection.

column4: 细支气管(FMA:76497)的炎症。

An acute episode of pneumonia due to the aspiration (breathing in) of food, liquid, or gastric contents into the upper respiratory tract.

column4: 淋巴瘤累及肺实质。
column5: Lung parenchymal involvement with lymphoma.

column3: 肝脏结节性再生性增生

column3: 肠道淋巴组织样结节性增生
column4: 肠淋巴组织异常增生，其特征为大量可见的粘膜结节，直径可达或偶尔超过0.5cm。在组织学上，在固有层和粘膜下层浅层可见增生的淋巴滤泡伴有大的生发中心。滤泡中心增生引起粘膜B细胞滤泡增大，由表观正常的套区围绕。该病可累及胃、整个小肠和大肠。
column5: A lymphoproliferative abnormality of the intestine characterized by numerous visible mucosal nodules measuring up to, and rarely exceeding, 0.5 cm in diameter Histologically, hyperplastic lymphoid follicles with large germinal centres are seen in the lamina propria and superficial submucosa. There is enlargement of the mucosal B cell follicles caused by hyperplasia of the follicle centres; surrounded by a normal appearing mantle zone. Disease may involve the stomach, the entire small intestine, and the large intestine.

column4: 胸肌异常，包括胸大肌（前胸部厚且呈扇形的肌肉）和胸小肌（薄且呈三角的肌肉，位于胸大肌的下面）异常。
column5: An abnormality of the `pectoral muscle` (FMA:37349), comprising the pectoralis major, a thick, fan-shaped muscle of the anterior chest and the pectoralis minor, a thin, triangular muscle situated underneath the pectoralis major.

column4: 穿过视网膜全层的小孔。

column2: Unilateral hypoplasia of pectoralis major muscle

column4: 由于睾丸生成精子缺陷导致病人精液中没有任何可测水平的精子，睾丸活检可以将之与梗阻性无精症相鉴别。
column5: Absence of any measurable level of sperm in his semen, resulting from a defect in the production of spermatozoa in the testes. Can be differentiated from obstructive azoospermia on the basis of testicular biopsy.

column4: 一组常见的间充质病变。
column5: A common group of mesenchymal lesions.

column4: 白色或棕色脂肪组织的成脂细胞或脂肪细胞衍生而来的良性肿瘤。可能是血管瘤型或蛰伏脂肪瘤型。
column5: Benign neoplasia derived from lipoblasts or lipocytes of white or brown fat. May be angiomatous or hibernomatous.

column4: 存在于骶骨区的脂肪瘤。
column5: Presence of a lipoma in the region of the sacrum.

column4: 一种恶性肿瘤，可能发生于于原始间充质干细胞群分化为脂肪瘤的过程中。
column5: Malignant neoplasms which probably originate in primitive mesenchymal stem cell populations differentiating down a lipomatous pathway.

column4: 发生于毛囊皮脂腺的多发性、无症状或炎症性皮肤囊肿，局部或广泛分布。皮损可出现在身体的任何部位，但在毛囊皮脂腺分布密集的部位（如腋窝，腹股沟，颈部和四肢近端）更为常见。
column5: Multiple, localized or widespread, asymptomatic or inflammatory dermal cysts involving the pilosebaceous units. Lesions can appear anywhere on the body, but steatocystoma multiplex is more commonly involved with those areas of the skin with a high density of developed pilosebaceous units (e.g., the axilla, groin, neck, and proximal extremities).

column4: 胸锁乳突肌失用，该颈前肌可控制头部活动旋转。
column5: Wasting of the `sternocleidomastoid muscle` (FMA:13407), the muscle in the anterior part of the neck that acts to flex and rotate the head.

column4: 胸肌的萎缩，如胸大肌和胸小肌。
column5: Wasting of the pectoral muscles, i.e., of the pectoralis major and pectoralis minor.

column4: 角膜Descemet膜后表面出现的非带状胶原的微滴状沉积。后弹力膜局灶性增厚，组织学上称为角膜点状变性。角膜点状变性很容易通过体内和离体显微镜装置诊断，因为它的出现使局部内皮细胞缺失呈现暗区。
column5: Corneal guttata are droplet-like accumulations of non-banded collagen on the posterior surface of Descemet's membrane. The presence of focal thickenings of Descemet's membrane histologically named guttae. Cornea guttata can be easily diagnosed in vivo and ex vivo by means of specular microscopy as it gives dark areas where no endothelial cells are visible.

column4: Descement膜出现皱褶。Descement膜是角膜内皮的基底膜， Descement膜褶皱一般是角膜炎症或水肿的表现。
column5: Presence of folds in the Descement membrane, which is the basement membrane of the endothelial (inner) cell layer of the cornea. Descement membrane folds are generally a manifestation of inflammation or edema of the cornea.

column4: 角膜基质层出现的非正常的液体积聚和肿胀（FMA:58306）。
column5: Abnormal accumulation of fluid and swelling of the `stroma of cornea` (FMA:58306).

column4: 哮喘的一种类型。阿司匹林和其他非类固醇抗炎药（NSAID）抑制了环氧化酶-1（COX-1），从而加剧了支气管收缩。
column5: A type of asthma in which aspirin and other nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) that inhibit cyclooxygen-ase 1 (COX-1) exacerbate bronchoconstriction.

column4: 一个或两个眼睛有节奏的，不自主的正弦振荡。摆动性眼球震颤的波形可能发生在任何方向。
column5: Rhythmic, involuntary sinusoidal oscillations of one or both eyes. The waveform of pendular nystagmus may occur in any direction.

column4: 跷跷板眼球震颤是一种摆动眼球震颤，其中一半周期表现为一只眼睛的升高和内旋，同时另一只眼睛下降和外展。在另一半周期中，眼运动反转。
column5: Seesaw nystagmus is a type of pendular nystagmus where a half cycle consists of the elevation and intorsion of one eye, concurrently with the depression and extortion of the fellow eye. In the other half cycle, there is an inversion of the ocular movements.

column4: 视网膜上存在多种尺寸和构象的多个黄白色病变，与血管病变无关。
column5: Presence of multiple yellowish-white lesions of various size and configuration on the retina not related to vascular lesions.

column4: 无法刺激产生上肢腱反射。
column5: Inability to elicit tendon reflexes in the upper limbs.

column4: 视觉缺陷的特点是在光线明亮的地方视力下降，而夜间视力不受到影响，昼盲的字面意思是白天盲。
column5: A visual defect characterized by the inability to see as clearly in bright light as in dim light. The word hemeralopia literally means day blindness.

column4: 一种局限性肌张力障碍，表现为脸，下颌，和/或舌的有力的收缩导致难以打开和关闭嘴部和经常影响咀嚼和讲话。
column5: A kind of focal dystonia characterized by forceful contractions of the face, jaw, and/or tongue causing difficulty in opening and closing the mouth and often affecting chewing and speech.

column4: 一种影响声带的局灶肌张力障碍类型，声带不自主的收缩导致言语中断，影响声音质量，常常导致模式化的反复言语中断。
column5: A form of focal dystonia that affects the vocal cords, associated with involuntary contractions of the vocal cords causing interruptions of speech and affecting the voice quality and often leading to patterned, repeated breaks in speech.

column4: 由于体液渗出进入细胞外间隙，导致极端性的全身广泛大量的水肿。
column5: An extreme form of generalized edema with widespread and massive edema due to effusion of fluid into the extracellular space.

column4: Hypoglycermia以下一餐（或更一般地，摄取葡萄糖后）。
column5: Hypoglycermia following a meal (or more generally, after intake of glucose).

column3: 低血清骨化三醇（1,25-二羟基胆钙化醇）
column4: 血液中的:`calcitriol`（17823 CHEBI）浓度降低。骨化三醇也被称为1,25-二羟或1,25-二羟基维生素D3。
column5: A reduced concentration of `calcitriol` (CHEBI:17823) in the blood. Calcitriol is also known as 1,25-dihydroxycholecalciferol or 1,25-dihydroxyvitamin D3.

column3: 低血清骨化二醇（25-羟基胆钙化醇）
column4: 血液中的:`calcidiol`（17933 CHEBI）浓度降低。骨化二醇也被称为25-羟基胆钙化醇或25-羟基维生素D3。
column5: A reduced concentration of `calcidiol` (CHEBI:17933) in the blood. Calcidiol is also known as 25-hydroxycholecalciferol or 25-Hydroxyvitamin D3.

column4: 脉络膜黑素细胞的恶性肿瘤。脉络膜黑色素瘤经典的外观是一种着色的圆顶形或套环，按钮形状的肿瘤与相应的渗出性视网膜脱离。脉络膜黑色素瘤通常是着色的，但也可以是其他色素着色和甚至无黑色素着色（无色素沉着）。
column5: Malignant tumor of melanocytes of the choroid. The classic appearance of choroidal melanoma is a pigmented dome-shaped or collar button-shaped tumor with an associated exudative retinal detachment. Choroidal melanoma is usually pigmented, but can be variably pigmented and even amelanotic (non-pigmented).

column4: 睫状体黑色素细胞的恶性肿瘤。
column5: Malignant tumor of melanocytes of the ciliary body.

column4: 皮肤来源的黑色素瘤。
column5: The presence of a `melanoma` (MPATH:359) of the `skin` (FMA:7163).

column4: 黑素瘤的一种，主要表现为黑棕色深浅不一的不规则扁平状肿物。
column5: A type of melanoma that is flat and irregular in shape and color, with different shades of black and brown.

column4: 黑素瘤的一种，初起为淡黑蓝或淡蓝红色的隆起皮损，一般无其他颜色。
column5: A type of melanoma that starts as a raised area that is usually dark blackish-blue or bluish-red but may not have any color.

column4: 是黑色素瘤的一种亚型，常发生于日晒后受损的皮肤，开始表现为普通的雀斑（边界清楚的小色素斑 ），之后渐渐发展为较大不规则色素斑。发展成恶性常需20年以上，多数患者以为是皮肤衰老的表现。
column5: A subtype of melanoma in situ that typically develops on sun-damaged skin. The lesion is typically a large, irregularly pigmented macule that has developed from an ordinary lentigo (a small pigmented spot on the skin with a clearly-defined edge). Change to a malignant lentigo typically takes place over 20 years or more, and many patients accept the change as a consequence of aging.

column4: 一种位于掌跖或甲下（甲下黑色素瘤）的皮肤黑色素瘤。肢端雀斑样黑色素瘤往往初起为一褪色扁平斑点，之后缓慢扩大至直径超过6毫米甚至数厘米，此外，包括棕色、蓝灰色、黑色和红色的混合性色素沉着也是特征之一。皮损起初表面光滑，之后慢慢变得粗糙且不规则，甚至可能出现溃疡和出血。
column5: A type of cutaneous melanoma localized to the palm, sole, or beneath the nail (subungual melanoma). Acral lentiginous melanoma starts as a slowly-enlarging flat patch of discoloured skin and usually displays a size above 6 mm and often several centimetres or more in diameter upon diagnosis and variable pigmentation with a mixture of colors including brown, and blue-grey, black and red. The surface of the lesion is initially smooth but later in the course may become thicker and irregular, and may ulcerate or bleed.

column3: 唾液酸化寡聚糖的尿排泄
column4: 的`oligosaccharides`排泄（CHEBI:50699）共轭`唾液酸acid`（CHEBI:26667）在尿液中。
column5: Excretion of `oligosaccharides` (CHEBI:50699) conjugated to `sialic acid` (CHEBI:26667) in the urine.

column4: 骨骼内发展成的一个充满液体的腔体。
column5: A fluid filled cavity that develops with a bone.

column4: 放射学特征包括干骺端可见一个偏心的、扩张的、射线可透过的病灶，磁共振成像上信号相当于液体水平。
column5: Radiographic features include a dilated, radiolucent lesion typically located eccentrically within the metaphyseal portion of the bone, with fluid levels visible on magnetic resonance imaging.

column4: 骨骼的良性囊肿，充满浆液性液体。
column5: A benign fluid filled simple cyst of bone filled with serous fluid.

column4: 存在多个或多块骨骼的多重囊性改变。
column5: Presence of multiple cystic changes in multiple ares or multiple bones.

column4: 尿液中:增加`disaccharide`（36233 CHEBI）的浓度。
column5: Increased concentration of `disaccharide` (CHEBI:36233) in the urine.

column4: 尿液中:增加`glycopeptides`（24396 CHEBI）的排泄。糖肽的肽与碳水化合物部分共价连接到氨基酸残基的侧链。
column5: Increased excretion of `glycopeptides` (CHEBI:24396) in the urine. Glycopeptides are peptides with carbohydrate moieties covalently attached to the side chains of the amino acid residues.

column3: 天冬氨酰葡萄糖胺尿症
column4: 尿液中排泄过量的天冬氨酰葡萄糖胺。
column5: Excretion of excess amounts of aspartylglucosamine in the urine.

column4: 硫酸角质素在尿中排出。
column5: An `increased concentration` (PATO:0001162) of `keratan sulfate` (CHEBI:60924)  in the `urine` (FMA:12274).

column4: 尿中硫酸软骨素排泄增加。
column5: An `increased concentration` (PATO:0001162) of `chondroitin sulfate (CHEBI:37397) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).

column4: 酰基肉碱的异常，这是由肉碱的3-羟基的可逆性酯化过程产生的。
column5: An abnormality of acylcarnitine, which is produced by reversible esterification of the 3-hydroxyl group of carnitine.

column4: 排出的尿为酸性pH值。
column5: Secretion of urine with an acid pH.

column4: 尿液中N-酰基甘氨酸分布异常。有多种不同的N-酰基甘氨酸，此条目特指其含量和分布的病理性改变。
column5: An abnormal distribution of `N-acylglycines (CHEBI:16180) in the urine. There are numerous different N-acylglycines, and this term refers to pathological alterations in their level or distribution.

column4: 瞳孔对光反应异常，特点是一个瞳孔对光反应的显著变慢。瞳孔趋向于相对扩张，并伴有辐凑降低。
column5: An abnormality of the pupillary light reaction characterized by a marked slowing of the light reaction of usually just one pupil. The pupil tends to be relatively dilated, and there is reduced accommodation.

column4: 影响个体人格和行为异常的精神类疾病，主要表现为思考和行为方式不正常。人格疾病的定义主要为异常的原因不是大脑损害导致的。
column5: An abnormality of mental functioning affecting the personality and behavioural tendencies of an individual and characterized by a rigid and unhealthy pattern of thinking and behavior. The definition of a personal disorder implies that the abnormality is not the result of damage or insult to the brain or from another psychiatric disorder.

column4: 主要以冲动行为、不可预测和反复无常的情绪为特征的人格障碍。患者表现为易于情绪爆发并且不能控制行为爆发。
column5: A personality disorder characterized by impulsive behavior and unpredictable and capricious mood. Affected individuals show a liability to outbursts of emotion and an incapacity to control the behavioural explosions.

column4: 是一种以情感肤浅易变，戏剧化的自我表现，夸张，过度表达情绪，易受暗示，自我中心，任性，不考虑他人，感情易受伤害，持续追求欣赏、兴奋和关注为特点的人格障碍。
column5: A personality disorder characterized by shallow and labile affectivity, self-dramatization, theatricality, exaggerated expression of emotions, suggestibility, egocentricity, self-indulgence, lack of consideration for others, easily hurt feelings, and continuous seeking for appreciation, excitement and attention.

column4: 冲动沿着运动轴索在某一部位阻断。
column5: Blockade of impulses at a focal site along the course of a motor axon.

column4: 在中枢神经系统中运动神经冲动传导的任何异常。
column5: Any anomaly of the conduction of motor nerve impulses in the central nervous system.

column4: 小脑萎缩累及主要的颗粒细胞层。
column5: Atrophy of the cerebellum affecting primarily the granular cell layer.

column4: 相对于其他的颅脑结构，小脑的尺寸异常增加。
column5: An abnormally increased size of the cerebellum compared to other brain structures.

column3: 小脑浦肯野细胞层萎缩
column4: 小脑萎缩累及主要的浦肯野细胞层。
column5: Atrophy of the cerebellum affecting primarily the Purkinje cell layer.

column3: 泛素阳性的大脑包涵体
column4: 大脑细胞内细胞核和胞浆聚集并且泛素抗体染色阳性。
column5: Nuclear or cytoplasmic aggregates that show positive staining with antibodies against ubiquitin within cells of the brain.

column2: Abnormality of skeletal muscle fiber size
column3: 骨骼肌纤维的大小异常
column4: “骨骼肌细胞”大小出现异常。
column5: Any abnormality of the size of the `skeletal muscle cell` (FMA:9727).

column4: 尿液中性粒细胞数量增加。
column5: Presence of an increased number of neutrophils in the urine.

column4: 尿液的异常的颜色，正常的颜色为麦草黄色。
column5: An abnormal color of the urine, that is, the color of the urine appears different from the usual straw-yellow color.

column4: 线粒体表面轮廓的异常。
column5: An anomaly in the surface contour of mitochondria.

column4: 尿的气味与正常的不同。
column5: A deviation from the normal odor of the urine.

column4: 动脉炎症。
column5: Arterial inflammation.

column4: 胰腺功能的异常。
column5: An anomaly of the function of the pancreas.

column3: 胰腺外分泌生理功能异常
column4: 分泌消化酶的胰腺腺泡腺体功能性异常。
column5: A functional anomaly of the acinar gland portion of the pancreas that secretes digestive enzymes.

column3: 胰腺内分泌生理功能异常
column4: 内分泌胰腺的功能异常。
column5: A function abnormality of the endocrine pancreas.

column4: 与正常胰脏大小存在偏差。
column5: A deviation from the normal size of the pancreas.

column4: 许多关节错位。
column5: Dislocation of many joints.

column4: 先天性包涵囊肿，起源于正常情况下形成皮肤细胞的外胚层细胞，在发育过程中遗留在神经系统。
column5: A congenital inclusion cysts that arises from ectodermal cells that normally form skin cells being left behind in the nervous system during development.

column4: 先天性包涵囊肿，源于神经管闭合时（胚胎发育的第3-5周）外胚层干细胞的封入。皮样囊肿的囊是由胶原支撑的单层上皮细胞组成。在较厚的部分，内壁辅以含有毛囊，皮脂腺，汗腺的真皮。
column5: A congenital inclusion cysts that arises from the inclusion of ectodermally committed cells at the time of neural tube closure (3rd-5th week of embryogenesis). The capsule of dermoid cysts consists of simple epithelium supported by collagen. In thicker parts, the lining is supplemented with dermis containing hair follicles, sebaceous glands, and apocrine glands.

column2: Edema of the dorsum of feet
column4: 流体的上脚背部的皮肤下的异常积累。
column5: An abnormal accumulation of fluid beneath the skin on the back of the feet.

column4: 血液循环中儿茶酚胺浓度异常。
column5: An abnormal "catecholamine" (CHEBI:33567) concentration in the blood.

column3: 循环系统肌酐水平异常
column4: 血中(FMA:9670)肌酐(CHEBI:16737)浓度的异常。
column5: An abnormal concentration of `creatinine` (CHEBI:16737) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).

column4: 在`blood`（FMA:9670）:中`creatinine`异常减少量（16737 CHEBI）。
column5: An abnormally reduced amount of `creatinine` (CHEBI:16737) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).

column4: 每个细胞中的线粒体数目偏离正常。
column5: A deviation from the normal number of mitochondria per cell.

column4: `线粒体` (FMA:63835),即内部被线粒体嵴所分开的膜状细胞质细胞器，的异常。`线粒体`（GO:0005739）为一种自我复制的细胞器,是组织呼吸的部位。
column5: An anomaly of the `mitochondrion` (FMA:63835), the membranous cytoplasmic organelle the interior of which is subdivided by cristae. The `mitochondrion` (GO:0005739) is a self replicating organelle that is the site of tissue respiration.

column4: 顶叶皮层萎缩
column5: Atrophy of the `parietal cortex` (FMA:61826).

column4: `枕部皮质`（FMA:67325）萎缩。
column5: Atrophy of the `occipital cortex` (FMA:67325).

column4: 腿的近端部分的不成比例缩短（即股骨）。
column5: Disproportionate shortening of the proximal segment of the leg (i.e. the femur).

column4: 腓骨截面直径的增宽。
column5: Increased width of the cross sectional diameter of the fibula.

column4: 青光眼的一种，具有典型视神经损伤，但小梁网未被周边虹膜明显阻塞，称为原发开角型青光眼。
column5: A type of glaucoma with optic nerve damage in an eye with no evidence of significant obstruction of the functional trabecular meshwork by the peripheral iris would be classified as having primary open angle glaucoma.

column4: 具有典型视神经损害的青光眼，房角明显关闭，且无明显继发原因。
column5: A type of glaucoma with optic nerve damage in an eye that  have evidence of angle closure and in which there is no evidence of a secondary cause.

column4: 脑桥发育不完全（FMA:67943）。
column5: Underdevelopment of the `pons` (FMA:67943).

column3: 血糖皮质激素水平异常
column4: 血液循环中糖皮质激素浓度异常。
column5: An abnormality of the concentration of a "glucocorticoid" (CHEBI:24261) in the blood.

column4: 血液循环中皮质酮浓度异常。
column5: An abnormality of the concentration of "corticosterone" (CHEBI:16827) in the blood.

column4: `肌酸 `（CHEBI:16919）的浓度或体内平衡的异常。肌酸为具有甲基和脒基的甘氨酸连接到氮上的衍生物。肌酸主要是在肝脏和肾脏自然产生的，为肌肉细胞的主要能量来源。
column5: An anomaly of the concentration or homeostasis of `creatine`  (CHEBI:16919). Creatine is a derivative of glycine having methyl and amidino groups attached to the nitrogen. Creatine is naturally produced from amino acids, primarily in liver and kidney, and acts as an energy source for cells, primarly for muscle cells.

column4: 子宫内膜的恶性肿瘤。
column5: A carcinoma of the endometrium, the mucous lining of the uterus.

column4: 肝脏的炎症。
column5: Inflammation of the liver.

column4: 血中(FMA:9670)的血清白蛋白水平偏离正常范围。
column5: Deviation from normal concentration of `albumin` (PR:000003918) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).

column4: 海拔在`albumin`（PR:000003918）的浓度在`blood`（FMA:9670）。
column5: Elevation in the concentration of `albumin` (PR:000003918) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).

column4: 喉部癌症。
column5: A carcinoma of the larynx.

column4: 高铁血红蛋白在血液中异常增高的。这种形式的血红蛋白，含有三价铁（Fe 3），而不是在正常血红蛋白中存在的亚铁形式（Fe 2+）。高铁血红蛋白对氧亲和力低，导致释放氧气到组织的能力降低。
column5: Abnormally increased levels of Methemoglobinemia in the blood. In this form of hemoglobin, there is an oxidized ferric iron (Fe +3) rather than the reduced ferrous form (Fe 2+) that is normally found in hemoglobin. Methemoglobin has a reduced affinity for oxygen, resulting in a reduced ability to release oxygen to tissues.

column4: 尿液中甲基丙二酸的浓度增加。
column5: Increased concentration of `methylmalonic acid` (CHEBI:30860) in the urine.

column4: 葡萄膜上发生的炎症，炎症累及前房，玻璃体，视网膜或脉络膜。
column5: Inflammation of the uveal tract in which inflammation affects the anterior chamber, vitreous, retina or choroid.

column4: 葡萄膜的炎症，炎症的原发部位是前房。
column5: Inflammation of the uveal tract in which the primary site of inflammation is the anterior chamber.

column4: 葡萄膜的炎症，炎症的原发部位是视网膜或脉络膜。
column5: Inflammation of the uveal tract in which the primary site of inflammation is the retina or choroid.

column5: Decreased time between the start of the Q wave and the end of the T wave as measured by the electrocardiogram (EKG).

column4: 泄漏的血液进入肌肉组织形成血块。
column5: Blood clot formed within muscle tissue following leakage of blood into the tissue.

column4: 粒细胞（CL:0000094）数目显着降低。
column5: Marked decrease in the number of `granulocytes` (CL:0000094).

column3: 药物引起的粒细胞缺乏症
column4: 一型与特定药物摄取相关的粒细胞缺乏症。
column5: A type of agranulocytosis related to ingestion of a specific medication.

column4: 氯化物在汗液浓度增加。
column5: An increased concentration of chloride in the sweat.

column4: 在尿常规:尿刊`acid`（27248 CHEBI）的浓度增加。
column5: An increased concentration of `urocanic acid` (CHEBI:27248) in the urine.

column4: 乳糜微粒的血浆浓度增加，大的脂滴（100毫米直径）再加工的脂质在小肠中的上皮细胞和含有三酰基甘油，胆甾醇酯，和若干载脂蛋白合成的。
column5: Increased plasma concentrations of chylomicrons, the large lipid droplet (up to 100 mm in diameter) of reprocessed lipid synthesized in epithelial cells of the small intestine and containing triacylglycerols, cholesterol esters, and several apolipoproteins.

column4: 血液中的转铁蛋白，即转运铁的蛋白，缺乏。
column5: Absence of transferrin, a protein that transprot iron, in the blood.

column4: 肌肉细胞内脂滴的异常增加。这些脂滴数量和大小的增加会影响肌肉脂质代谢紊乱。见PMID 20691590组织学图像。
column5: An abnormal increase in intracellular lipid droplets In a muscle. The number and size of these drops can increase with somd disorders of lipid metabolism affecting muscle. See pmid 20691590 for histological images.

column4: 上睑提肌萎缩（FMA:49041），眼外肌可影响上睑睁开。
column5: Atrophy of the `levator palpebrae superioris` (FMA:49041), the extraocular muscle that  elevates the superior eyelid.

column4: 眼上直肌的萎缩（FMA:49035），眼外肌的主要功能是使眼球上转。
column5: Atrophy of the `superior rectus` (FMA:49035), the extraocular muscle whose primary function is to elevate the globe.

column4: 涉及生殖系统任何组织的结构或发育异常。
column5: A structural or developmental anomaly of any of the tissues involved in the genital system.

column4: 原发或继发性的性别发育或性征异常。
column5: Anomaly of primary or secondary sexual development or characteristics.

column4: 生殖系统的发育与染色体性别不一致。
column5: Development of the reproductive system is inconsistent with the chromosomal sex.

column4: 第三脑神经（动眼神经）受损所致的眼睛运动能力下降。
column5: Reduced ability to control the movement of the eye associated with damage to the third cranial nerve (the oculomotor nerve).

column4: 某种特定的嗅觉缺失。
column5: Anosmia for one particular odor.

column4: PR间期延长（P波起始到QRS波群起始）。
column5: Increased time for the  PR interval (beginning of the P wave to the beginning of the QRS complex).

column4: 心电图ST段异常， ST段是指连接QRS复合波和T波的一段。 ST段通常持续80至120毫秒平坦且与PR和TP段在同一等电水平。
column5: An electrocardiographic anomaly of the ST segment, which is the segment that connects the QRS complex and the T wave. The ST segment normally has a duration of 80 to 120 ms, is flat and at the same level (isoelectric) as the PR and TP segment.

column4: 心电图异常，其中观察到ST段低于等电位线位置。
column5: An electrocardiographic anomaly in which the ST segment is observed to be located inferior to the isoelectric line.

column4: 心电图异常，其中观察到ST段高于等电位线位置。
column5: An electrocardiographic anomaly in which the ST segment is observed to be located superior to the isoelectric line.

column4: 呼吸系统结构性异常。
column5: A structural anomaly of the respiratoy system.

column3: 呼吸道上皮的形态异常
column4: 位于鼻腔、喉、气管、支气管等呼吸道传导部分的假复层纤毛上皮结构异常。
column5: Any structural anomaly of the pseudostratified ciliated epithelium that lines much of the conducting portion of the airway, including part of the nasal cavity and larynx, the trachea, and bronchi.

column4: 出现于骨髓组织的恶性肿瘤，多见于柱状骨。
column5: A malignant tumor of the bone which always arises in the medullary tissue, occurring more often in cylindrical bones.

column2: Dynein arm defect of motile cilia
column3: 能动纤毛动力蛋白臂缺陷
column4: 可动纤毛的动力蛋白臂异常，该特征常用电子显微镜评估。
column5: An anomaly of the dynein arms of motile cilia. This feature is usually appreciated by electron microscopy.

column4: 呼吸运动纤毛的外动力蛋白臂通常位于动纤毛的周边微管外，其缺失常通过电子显微镜发现。
column5: Absence of the outer dynein arms of respiratory motile cilia, which normally are situated outside of the peripheral microtubules of motile cilia. This feature is usually appreciated by electron microscopy.

column4: 呼吸运动纤毛的外动力蛋白臂通常位于动纤毛的周边微管外，其缺失常通过电子显微镜发现。
column5: Absence of the outer dynein arms of respiratory motile cilia, which normally are situated within the peripheral microtubules of motile cilia. This feature is usually appreciated by electron microscopy.

column2: Abnormal axonemal organization of motile cilia
column3: 运动纤毛轴丝异常排列
column4: 轴丝结构的异常排列。所谓轴丝指形成运动纤毛内芯的细胞骨架结构，呈现为镶有动力蛋白臂的、典型的9 + 2运动纤毛微管图案。
column5: Abnormal arrangement of the structures of the axoneme, which is the cytoskeletal structure that forms the inner core of the motile cilium and displays a canonical 9 + 2 microtubular pattern of motile cilia studded with dynein arms.

column2: Absent inner and outer dynein arms
column4: 呼吸运动纤毛的动力蛋白臂完全缺失，即内、外动力蛋白臂（通常是位于内部和运动纤毛的外周微管外）缺失。这一特点常通过电子显微镜发现。
column5: Complete absence of the dynein arms of respiratory motile cilia, that is, absence of the inner and the outer dynein arms, which normally are situated inside and outside of the peripheral microtubules of motile cilia. This feature is usually appreciated by electron microscopy.

column2: Abnormal central microtubular pair morphology of motile cilia
column3: 运动纤毛的中央成对微管形态异常
column4: 运动纤毛中央呈对微管结核呈现9 + 2 结构。
column5: A structural anomaly of the two central microtubules of motile cilia with a 9+2 microtubuluar configuration.

column3: 呼吸运动纤毛生理异常
column4: 呼吸运动纤毛细胞的任何功能异常。
column5: Any functional anomaly of the respiratory motile cilia.

column4: 正常运动纤毛的任何异常运动。评价纤毛运动频率和纤毛摆动模式，需活检获得新鲜运动纤毛，使用要高速电视显微镜在特定培养条件下进行观察。
column5: Any anomaly of the normal motility of motile cilia. Evaluation of ciliary beat frequency and ciliary beat pattern requires high-speed videomicroscopy of freshly obtained ciliary biopsies that are maintained in culture media under controlled conditions.

column2: Absent central microtubular pair morphology of motile cilia
column3: 运动纤毛细胞中央成对微管形态缺失
column4: 运动纤毛细胞有9 + 2 微管结构的两个中心微管缺失。
column5: Absence of the two central microtubules of motile cilia with a 9+2 microtubuluar configuration.

column4: 协调良好的可动纤毛细胞内和细胞间同步协调偏差。运动异常的纤毛常常敲击出自相关邻近纤毛。
column5: A deviation from the normally well coordinated pattern of intracellular and intercellular synchrony of motile cilia. Dyskinetic cilia usually beat out of synchrony relative to neighboring cilia.

column4: T波在心电图的振幅或形状呈周期性搏动。
column5: A periodic beat-to-beat variation in the amplitude or shape of the T wave in an EKG.

column3: 纤毛轴丝径向轮辐缺失
column4: 轴丝的放射状辐条缺失。
column5: Absence of the radial spokes of the axoneme.

column4: 含有粘液组织的脂肪肉瘤。
column5: A liposarcoma that contains myxomatous tissue.

column4: 肌肉组织中糖原含量异常。
column5: Any anomaly in the amount of glycogen in muscle tissue.

column4: 肌肉组织中的糖原量减少。
column5: A decreased amount of glycogen in muscle tissue.

column4: 间断发作的上气道空气通过阻力增加。
column5: Intermittent episodes of increased resistance to the passage of air in the upper airway.

column4: J波是发生在QRS波和ST段连接处的正凸偏转。
column5: The J wave is a positive convex deflection that occurs at the junction of the QRS complex and ST segment, the J-point.

column2: Increased carotid artery intimal medial thickness
column3: 颈动脉内膜及中膜增厚
column4: 颈动脉内膜和中膜厚度增加。
column5: An increase in the combined thickness of the intima and media of the carotid artery.

column2: Autosomal dominant inheritance with paternal imprinting
column3: 父源印记基因常染色体显性遗传
column5: A type of autosomal dominant inheritance involving a gene that is imprinted with paternal silencing.

column2: Autosomal dominant inheritance with maternal imprinting
column3: 母源印记基因常染色体显性遗传
column5: A type of autosomal dominant inheritance involving a gene that is imprinted with maternal silencing.

column4: 屈指肌腱的炎症，常表现卡纳夫征: (i) 手指保持轻度屈曲位，(ii) 梭形肿胀，(iii) 沿屈肌腱鞘压痛，（iv）被动伸直时疼痛。
column5: Inflammation of the  flexor digitorum tendon, often associated with the Kanavel signs: (i) finger held in slight flexion, (ii) fusiform swelling, (iii) tenderness along the flexor tendon sheath, and (iv) pain with passive extension of the digit.

column4: 在`blood`（FMA:9670）:'glycine`（15428 CHEBI）的异常浓度降低。
column5: An abnormally reduced concentration of `glycine` (CHEBI:15428) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).

column4: `丝氨酸`（CHEBI:17822）的代谢异常。
column5: An abnormality of a `serine` (CHEBI:17822) metabolism.

column4: 血液中的:减少`serine`（17822 CHEBI）的浓度。
column5: Reduced concentration of `serine` (CHEBI:17822) in the blood.

column4: 一种影响肝脏的“淀粉样病变”形式。
column5: A form of `amyloidosis` (HP:0011034) that affects the liver.

column4: 乳糜外渗进入腹腔。
column5: Extravasation of chyle into the peritoneal cavity.

column4: 皮疹可表现为泛发性粉红色斑疹，扁平，直径2-10mm，或为红色隆起的丘疹，受压变白。斑疹或丘疹数天后可聚集融合成片。
column5: An exanthema consisting of widespread pink-to-red macules (flat spots of 2-10 mm in diameter) or papules (red bumps) that blanch with pressure. The macules and papules may cluster and merge to form sheets over several days.

column4: 股骨远端骨骺变小（FMA:32844）。
column5: Reduced size of the `Distal epiphysis of femur` (FMA:32844).

column4: 胫骨的近端骨骺变小。
column5: Reduced size of the proximal epiphysis of the tibia.

column4: `下丘脑`（FMA:62008）的 `功能性`（0001509 PATO）异常。
column5: An abnormal `functionality` (PATO:0001509) of the `hypothalamus` (FMA:62008).

column4: `下丘脑`（FMA:62008）的任何结构异常。
column5: Any structural anomaly of the `hypothalamus` (FMA:62008).

column3: 下丘脑促黄体生成素释放激素缺乏
column4: 下丘脑促黄体生产素释放激素的分泌减少。
column5: Decreased secretion of luteinizing hormone-releasing hormone by the hypothalamus.

column4: 头颈部肿瘤，源于唇，口腔，鼻腔，鼻窦，咽和喉。
column5: A neoplasm of the head and neck region with origin in the lip, oral cavity, nasal cavity, paranasal sinuses, pharynx, and larynx.

column4: 面部的肿瘤。
column5: A neoplasm of the face.

column4: 口腔的肿瘤。
column5: A neoplasm of the mouth.

column4: 气管的肿瘤。
column5: A neoplasm of the trachea.

column4: 上下颌骨牙龈异常融合的先天性畸形。
column5: A congenital defect with an abnormal joining of the gums of the upper and lower jaw.

column4: 外生殖器的色素沉着模式异常。
column5: An abnormal pigmentation pattern of the external genitalia.

column4: 枕骨的异常
column5: Abnormality of the `occipital bone` (FMA:52735) of the skull.

column4: 中节指骨的直径缩小（FMA:75817）。
column5: Reduced diameter of the `middle phalanx of finger` (FMA:75817).

column4: 末节指骨的直径缩小（FMA:75818）。
column5: Reduced diameter of the `distal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75818).

column4: 近节指骨的直径缩小（FMA:75816）。
column5: Reduced diameter of the `proximal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75816).

column4: 中节指骨的长度增加（FMA:75817）。
column5: Increased length of the `middle phalanx of finger` (FMA:75817).

column4: 手指末节指骨长度增加（FMA:75818）。
column5: Increased length of the `distal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75818).

column4: 输尿管发育失败。
column5: Failure of the ureter to undergo development.

column4: 异常转异构体轮廓与糖基化的II型先天性紊乱一致。
column5: Abnormal transferrin isoform profile consistent with a type II congenital disorder of glycosylation.

column4: 中枢神经系统的严重病毒感染，由单纯疱疹病毒（HSV）引起。
column5: A severe virus infection of the central nervous system by the herpes simplex virus (HSV).

column4: 主动脉弓的异常（FMA:3768）。
column5: An anomaly of the `arch of aorta`(FMA:3768).

column4: 主动脉弓发育低下（FMA:3768）。
column5: Underdevelopment of the `arch of aorta`(FMA:3768).

column2: Coarctation of the descending aortic arch
column4: 主动脉降支的狭窄或收缩。
column5: Narrowing or constriction of the aorta localized to the region of the `descending trunk of arch of aorta`(FMA:13082).

column4: 肋骨的骨形成异常。
column5: An abnormal bony formation of rib bone .

column4: 肋骨前端宽度增加而且逐渐向根部缩窄。
column5: Ribs that are increased in width and taper to the posterior ends.

column4: 出现真皮浅层中的`淀粉样堆积`(MPATH:34)。
column5: The presence of `amyloid deposition` (MPATH:34) in the superficial dermis.

column4: 单核细胞（0000576 CL）的数目异常。单核细胞由髓系细胞分化再循环入外周血，在组织损伤时发挥前体吞噬细胞作用、破骨细胞和某些组织树突细胞的作用。
column5: An anomaly in the number of `monocytes` (CL:0000576), which are myeloid mononuclear recirculating leukocyte that can act as a precursor of tissue macrophages, osteoclasts and some populations of tissue dendritic cells.

column4: 在循环系统中单核细胞的数量增加（CL:0000576）。
column5: An increased number of circulating `monocytes` (CL:0000576).

column4: 在循环系统中单核细胞的数量减少（CL:0000576）。
column5: An decreased number of circulating `monocytes` (CL:0000576).

column4: 影像上可见，与关节软骨骨赘（散在钙化）形成相关的远端指间关节的骨膨胀。
column5: Bony swelling of the distal interphalangeal joint (DIP) associated with the formation of osteophytes (calcific spurs) of the articular (joint) cartilage that are visible radiographically.

column4: 影像上可见，与关节软骨骨赘（散在钙化）形成相关的近端指间关节的骨膨胀。
column5: Bony swelling of the proximal interphalangeal joint (PIP) associated with the formation of osteophytes (calcific spurs) of the articular (joint) cartilage thzat are visible radiographically.

column4: 包含组织细胞的肿瘤
column5: A neoplasm containing histiocytes.

column4: 由纤维组织构成的肿瘤。
column5: Any neoplasm composed of fibrous tissue.

column4: 骶髂关节（FMA:21440）的炎症，一般伴有腰痛。
column5: Inflammation of the `sacroiliac joint` (FMA:21440), generally accompanied by lower back pain.

column4: 一种明显的以尖锐性、抽动性或电击样疼痛为特征的慢性头痛，通常存在于一侧的上颈部、后头部或耳后。
column5: A distinct type of headache characterized by piercing, throbbing, or electric-shock-like chronic pain in the upper neck, back of the head, and behind the ears, usually on one side.

column4: 腹部皮肤色素（着色）的缺失。
column5: Lack of skin pigmentation (coloring) of the abdomen.

column4: 胳膊和腿的皮肤色素（着色）的缺失。
column5: Lack of skin pigmentation (coloring) of the arms and legs.

column4: 尿中D-2-羟基戊二酸浓度增加。
column5: An increased concentration of `2-hydroxyglutaric acid` (CHEBI:17084) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).

column4: 毛囊周围炎症。
column5: Inflammation surrounding hair follicles.

column4: 在睡眠的初始阶段出现的肌阵挛。
column5: Myoclonus that occurs during the initial phases of sleep.

column4: 起源自髓系细胞（CL:0000763）的白血病，髓系细胞即骨髓造血的细胞。
column5: A leukemia that originates from a  `myeloid cell` (CL:0000763), that is the blood forming cells of the bone marrow.

column3: 慢性粒-单核细胞白血病
column4: 骨髓增生异常-骨髓增生性疾病，其特征是骨髓中不同程度发育异常的单核细胞增多，但外周血中幼稚粒细胞无增加。
column5: A myelodysplastic-myeloproliferative disease characterized by monocytosis, increased monocytes in the bone marrow, variable degrees of dysplasia, but an absence of immature granulocytes in the blood.

column4: 腹腔动脉的异常（FMA:50737）。
column5: An anomaly of the `celiac artery` (FMA:50737).

column4: 腹腔动脉被压迫（FMA:50737）。
column5: Compression of the `celiac artery` (FMA:50737).

column4: 牙骨质的牙源性肿瘤
column5: An odontogenic tumor of the `cementum of tooth` (FMA:55630).

column4: 皮肤和皮下组织的血管瘤，呈血管瘤样缓慢增生。
column5: A vascular tumor of the skin and subcutaneous tissues and characterized by slow angiomatous proliferation.

column4: 肾脏(FMA:7203)的炎症，累及肾实质(FMA:15574)、肾盂(FMA:15575)和肾盏。
column5: An inflammation of the  `kidney` (FMA:7203) involving the `parenchyma of kidney` (FMA:15574), the renal pelvis (FMA:15575) and the kidney calices.

column3: 自主神经系统的形态异常
column4: `自主神经系统`（FMA:9905）的结构异常。
column5: A structural abnormality of the `autonomic nervous system` (FMA:9905).

column3: 自主神经系统生理功能异常
column4: `自主神经系统`（FMA:9905）的生理功能异常。
column5: A functional abnormality of the `autonomic nervous system` (FMA:9905).

column4: 与交感神经系统调控相关的汗腺与排汗调节异常。
column5: An abnormal regulation of the sweat glands by the sympathetic nervous system associated with abnormal perspiration.

column4: 由于肝外大型胆管阻塞引起的胆汁流动障碍。
column5: Impairment of bile flow due to obstruction in large bile ducts outside the liver.

column4: `叶酸`（CHEBI:27470）又称为维生素B9的代谢异常。
column5: An abnormality of the metabolism of `folic acid` (CHEBI:27470), which is also known as vitamin B9.

column3: 脑脊液5-甲基四氢叶酸浓度降低
column4: 在'脑fluid`（FMA:20935）的`5 methyltetrahydrofolate`（20612 CHEBI）降低浓度。
column5: A decreased concentration of `5-methyltetrahydrofolate` (CHEBI:20612) in the `cerebrospinal fluid` (FMA:20935).

column4: 涉及体内平衡的维持过程中发生的异常。
column5: An anomaly in the processes involved in the maintenance of an internal equilibrium.

column4: 能量（卡路里）利用的任何异常。
column5: Any anomaly in the utilization of energy (calories).

column4: 增加每单位时间使用的卡路里数。
column5: An increase in the number of calories used per unit time.

column4: 在每单位时间使用的卡路里数的减少。
column5: An reduction in the number of calories used per unit time.

column4: 直径小于10毫米的垂体泌乳素细胞腺瘤。
column5: A pituitary prolactin cell adenoma of less than 10 mm diameter.

column4: 直径超过10毫米的垂体泌乳素细胞腺瘤。
column5: A pituitary prolactin cell adenoma of more than 10 mm diameter.

column4: 异常降低浓度铁蛋白，其存储铁一个无处不在的细胞内的蛋白质，在血液中。
column5: Abnormally reduced concentration of ferritin, a ubiquitous intracellular protein that stores iron, in the blood.

column4: 皮肤呈斑块状硬化（硬皮病）。
column5: Isolated patches of hardened skin (scleroderma).

column4: 异常化的糖基化过程(GO:0070085)，即糖化残基和底物分子的共联过程。
column5: An anomaly of a `glycosylation` (GO:0070085) process, i.e., a process involved in the covalent attachment of a glycosyl residue to a substrate molecule.

column5: Inflammation of the nasal mucosa.

column5: Inflammation of the large airways of the lung with rapid onset and short course usually associated with cough, mucus production, shortness of breath, wheezing, and chest tightness.

column4: 一个或多个肢体肌张力减退。
column5: Muscular hypotonia of one or more limbs.

column4: 下颌腱反射强度减弱。

column5: The presence of atheromas or atherosclerotic plaques in the `aorta` (FMA:3734).

column5: An abnormal accumulation of the accumulation of interstitial fluid in the soft tissues of the limbs.

column4: 一类溃疡，常由长时间受压迫引起，可仅表现为红斑，严重时可形成深达肌肉或骨骼的开放性创面。最常见的发病部位是骶骨、尾骨、脚踝和臀部。
column5: A type of ulcer that is caused when an area of skin is subject to pressure over a prolonged period of time, ranging in range in severity from patches of discolored skin to open wounds that expose the underlying bone or muscle. The most common sites are the sacrum, coccyx, heels and the hips.

column5: A form of gait abnormality characterized by hypertonia and flexion in the legs, hips and pelvis accompanied by extreme adduction leading to the knees and thighs hitting, or sometimes even crossing, in a scissors-like movement. column5: It’s an abnormal kind of amniotic fluid that contains fetal meconium, and that always associates with fetal distress or meconium aspiration syndrome

column5: An ulcer of the colon due to pressure and irritation from retained fecal masses.

column4: 神经元周围髓鞘形成和维持过程的任何异常。

`Delayed` (PATO:0000502) `myelination` (GO:0042552).

column4: 骶髂关节（FMA:21440）的滑膜炎症。
column5: Inflammation of the synovial membrane of the `sacroiliac joint` (FMA:21440).

column4: 超过3个月每周少于3次大便，需用力排便，块状或硬便，伴有肛肠阻塞感或排便不尽感。
column5: Constipation for longer than three months with fewer than 3 bowel movements per week, straining, lumpy or hard stools, and a sensation of anorectal obstruction or incomplete defecation.

column4: 突然发作，且持续时间不超过三个月的便秘。
column5: Constipation of sudden onset and lasting for less than three months.

column4: 睡觉时（有时会造成失眠）双腿一种不舒服和躁动不安的感觉
column5: A feeling of uneasiness and restlessness in the legs after going to bed (sometimes causing insomnia).

column4: 腕关节向右侧和左侧运动的慢性丧失。
column5: A chronic loss of wrist joint motion on the right and left sides.

column4: 单侧腕关节活动的慢性丧失。
column5: A chronic loss of wrist joint motion on one side only.

column4: `钙化`（PATO:0001447）指钙盐病理沉积中，大，动脉导管（主动脉，锁骨，颈动脉，髂，肾，腋窝，股骨，肱）的。
column5: `Calcification` (PATO:0001447), that is, pathological  deposition of calcium salts, of the large, conduit arteries (aorta, subclavian, carotid, iliac, renal, axillary, femoral, brachial).

column4: `钙化`（PATO:0001447）指钙盐在动脉中膜的病理沉积。
column5: `Calcification` (PATO:0001447), that is, pathological deposition of calcium salts in the tunica media of arteries.

column4: 中型动脉中膜的钙化（PATO:0001447），即病理性钙盐沉积。
column5: `Calcification` (PATO:0001447), that is, pathological deposition of calcium salts in the tunica media of medium-sized (muscular or distributive) arteries.

column4: 小动脉中膜的钙化（PATO:0001447），即病理性钙盐沉积。
column5: `Calcification` (PATO:0001447), that is, pathological deposition of calcium salts in the tunica media of small arteries.

column4: 仅仅发生在夜间的头痛，可导致患者痛醒。
column5: A headache disorder that occurs exclusively at night, waking the affected individual from sleep.

column4: `小脑蚓部`(FMA:76928)的结构异常。
column5: A structural anomaly of the inferior portion of the `vermis of cerebellum` (FMA:76928).

column4: 尿液中存在细菌。
column5: The presence of bacteria in the urine.

column4: 下巴不自主和不规则抽动。
column5: Involuntary and irregular twitches of the chin.

column4: 血清转铁蛋白与铁的饱和度高于正常水平。
column5: An above normal level of saturation of serum transferrin with iron.

column4: ，低于血清转​​铁饱和的正常水平。
column5: A below normal level of saturation of serum transferrin with iron.

column4: 肝组织中铁水平增加。
column5: An increased level of iron in liver tissues.

column4: 长期的通气损害，使二氧化碳的分压（PaCO2）升高超过参考范围（大于45毫米汞柱）的正常上限，继发于肾补偿和血清碳酸氢盐水平（高于30毫当量/升），pH值正常或接近正常。
column5: Longstanding impairment in ventilation such that the partial pressure of carbon dioxide (PaCO2) is elevated above the upper limit of the reference range (more than 45 mm Hg), with a normal or near-normal pH secondary to renal compensation and an elevated serum bicarbonate levels (more than30 mEq/L).

column4: 突然发作的通气障碍，使呼吸系统移除的二氧化碳少于组织中产生的二氧化碳在，导致二氧化碳（PaCO2的）分压高于正常值范围（超过45毫米汞柱），并伴发血症（pH值小于7.35）。
column5: Sudden onset of impairment in ventilation such that the removal of carbon dioxide by the respiratory system is less than the production of carbon dioxide in the tissues, leading to an elevation of the partial pressure of carbon dioxide (PaCO2) above the normal limits (more than 45 mm Hg) with an accompanying acidemia (pH less than 7.35).

column4: 长期不正常的酸堆积或碱消耗。
column5: Longstanding abnormal acid accumulation or depletion of base.

column4: 婴儿痉挛代表“癫痫性痉挛”的一个子集。婴儿痉挛是一岁以内（婴儿）起病的癫痫性痉挛。
column5: Infantile spasms represent a subset of "epileptic spasms". Infantile Spasms are epileptic spasms starting in the first year of life (infancy).

column4: 儿童向上凝视麻痹所致的眼现象。在这种情况下，眼睛向下方移动，上眼睑和虹膜间可见巩膜，下部瞳孔可能被下眼睑覆盖。
column5: An ophthalmologic sign in young children resulting from upward-gaze paresis. In this condition, the eyes appear driven downward, the sclera may be seen between the upper eyelid and the iris, and part of the lower pupil may be covered by the lower eyelid.

column4: 上唇唇红区皮肤明显增宽。
column5: Increased width of the "skin of vermilion border region of upper lip" (FMA:312645).

column4: 向外翻出的嘴唇，嘴唇外翻。
column5: A turning outward of the lip or lips, that is, eversion of the lips.

column4: 舌头虚痨。
column5: Wasting of the `tongue` (FMA:54640).

column4: 颈动脉完全性梗阻。
column5: Complete obstruction of a carotid artery.

column4: 总免疫球蛋白水平正常，但针对特定抗原或微生物的特定免疫球蛋白缺乏。
column5: The presence of normal overall immunoglobulin levels with deficiency of specific immunoglobulins directed against a specific antigen or microorganism.

column3: 特定肺炎球菌抗体缺乏症
column4: 总体正常免疫球蛋白水平正常，针对肺炎球菌的特定免疫球蛋白缺乏。
column5: The presence of normal overall immunoglobulin levels with deficiency of specific immunoglobulins directed against pneumococci.

column4: 一个摇摆不定、不稳定的声音，反映喉肌的运动单位不自主的正弦振荡。声音震颤导致声音频率或幅度的低频调制和间歇性的声音不稳定。
column5: A wavering, unsteady voice that reflects involuntary and approximately sinusoidal oscillation of motor unit firings of laryngeal muscles. Vocal tremor results in low frequency modulations of voice frequency or amplitude and intermittent voice instability.

column4: 下颌骨髁突与颅底融合，造成张口受限。
column5: Fusion of the mandibular condyle to the base of the skull, resulting in limitation of jaw opening.

column4: 颞下颌关节在下颌运动（如:咀嚼）所发出的响声。颞下颌关节弹响常常被描述为“卡嗒声”、“砰地一声”或“吱吱声”。
column5: Noises from the temporomandibular joint during mandibular movement (e.g., chewing). Temporomandibular joint crepitus is often described as a clicking,  popping, grating sound.

column4: `脑静脉`异常（FMA:70861）。
column5: An anomaly of `cerebral veins` (FMA:70861).

column4: 先天性畸形的静脉为正常的脑组织提供静脉引流的特征是“水母头”、多个小静脉伞样汇聚成一个静脉或偶见多发髓静脉实质部分扩张，就像树干或伞柄一样。这种扩张的终末静脉穿透皮层引流至（a）浅表型至皮质静脉或窦，（b）深部型至侧脑室室管膜下静脉，然后进入galen’s静脉系统，（c）至第四脑室，然后到脑桥中脑静脉，或（d）到小脑中央前静脉并进入galen’s静脉系统。
column5: A congenital malformation of veins which drain normal brain characterized by a caput medusae or an umbrellalike convergence of multiple venules on a single, or occasionally multiple, enlarged parenchymal or medullary vein, like the trunk of a tree or the shank of an umbrella. This dilated terminal vein penetrates the cortex to drain either (a) superficially to cortical veins or sinuses, (b) deeply to subependymal veins of the lateral ventricle and then into the galenic system, (c) to the fourth ventricle and then to the pontomesencephalic vein, or (d) to the precentral cerebellar vein and into the galenic system.

column4: 大脑额叶的静脉血管瘤。
column5: A venous angioma of the frontal lobe of the brain.
Defective structure, size or content of alpha granules, platelet organelles that contain several growth factors destined for release during platelet activation at sites of vessel wall injury.

column4: 致密颗粒结构、尺寸或内容物的异常。。指血小板细胞器含有的血小板聚集因子（如二磷酸腺苷（ADP），三磷酸腺苷（ATP），离子钙，组胺和血清素）的异常。
column5: Defective structure, size or content of dense granules, platelet organelles that  contain granules proaggregatory factors such as adenosine diphosphate (ADP), adenosine triphosphate (ATP), ionized calcium , histamine and serotonin.

column3: 表面连接开放管道系统异常
column4: 指细胞膜表面开放管道系统（OCS）的功能异常。OCS是血小板活化时α - 颗粒释放和其他物质进出细胞的途径。
column5: An anomaly of the invaginations of the surface membrane that form the open canalicular system (OCS). The OCS serve as the pathway for transport of substances into the cells and as conduits for the discharge of alpha granule products secreted during the platelet release reaction.

column4: 脊髓炎症。
column5: Inflammation of the `spinal cord` (FMA:7647).

column4: 一个位于小脑桥脑边缘的蛛网膜囊肿。
column5: An arachnoid cyst located at the margin of the cerebellum and pons.

column4: 位于脑室系统内的蛛网膜囊肿。
column5: An arachnoid cyst located within the ventricular system.

column4: 一种由Liliequist膜或脚间池内的异常进行性扩大而形成的蛛网膜囊肿，通常由，脑桥前区扩大，导致第三脑室的底板向上移位，垂体柄和视交叉向上和向前移位，乳头体向上和向后移位。
column5: An arachnoid cyst that progressively enlarges from an abnormality in the membrane of Liliequist or in the interpeduncular cistern, and typically, expands from the prepontine space, displacing the floor of the third ventricle upwards, the pituitary stalk and optic chiasm upwards and forwards, and the mammillary bodies upwards and backwards.

column4: 脂肪组织炎症。
column5: Inflammation of `adipose tissue` (FMA:20110).

column4: 被称为致密管系统细胞内的膜复合体的异常。
column5: An anomaly of the intracellular membrane complexes known as the dense tubular system.

column4: 脑动脉内壁（内腔）变窄或缩窄。
column5: Narrowing or constriction of the inner surface (lumen) of a cerebral artery.

column4: 大脑中动脉（FMA:50079）内壁（内腔）收缩或狭窄。
column5: Narrowing or constriction of the inner surface (lumen) of the `middle cerebral artery` (FMA:50079).

column4: 大脑前动脉（FMA:50028）内层的狭窄或阻塞。
column5: Narrowing or constriction of the inner surface (lumen) of the `anterior cerebral artery` (FMA:50028).

column4: 大脑后动脉内径狭窄。
column5: Narrowing or constriction of the inner surface (lumen) of the `posterior cerebral artery` (FMA:50583).

column4: 一个人吸气时所能产生的最大负压降低。
column5: A decrease in the maximum amount of negative pressure a person can generate during an inhalation.

column4: 一个人在完全吸气后最大能力呼出气体的压力降低。
column5: A decrease in the maximum amount of pressure of expired air achieved by a person after a full inspiration.

column4: 脐带绕颈是孕期的一种并发症，是最常见的脐带缠绕类型，指脐带缠绕胎儿颈部一圈或多圈，可通过妊娠中期或晚期超声检查发现。
column5: Nuchal cord is a complication during pregnancy  in which the umbilical cord wraps around the fetal neck once or multiple times.it is the most common type of cord entanglement which can be detected by ultrasound scan in the second or third trimester.

column4: 降主动脉壁内膜层的分离（FMA:3784）。内膜层撕裂，血液进入内膜腔导致夹层的传播（近端或远端）。
column5: A separation of the layers within the wall of the `descending aorta` (FMA:3784). Tears in the intimal layer result in the propagation of dissection (proximally or distally) secondary to blood entering the intima-media space.

column4: 类似于疣状（伴有多个小的隆起）的丘疹。
column5: A wartlike (with multiple small elevated projections) papule.

column2: Abnormality of the brainstem white matter
column4: 脑干的白质的异常（FMA:282112）。
column5: An anomaly of the `white matter of brainstem` (FMA:282112).

column4: `内囊`（61950 FMA）的异常。内囊是白质在分隔尾状核和丘脑，与壳核和苍白球的区域。
column5: An anomaly of the `internal capsule` (FMA:61950), which is an area of white matter in the brain that separates the caudate nucleus and the thalamus from the putamen and the globus pallidus.

column4: 垂体的异常。
column5: An anomaly of the `pituitary gland` (FMA:13889).

column4: 脑垂体偏离正常大小。
column5: A deviation from the normal size of the `pituitary gland` (FMA:13889).

column4: 脑垂体体积异常增大。
column5: An abnormally increased size of the `pituitary gland` (FMA:13889).

column4: 垂体体积异常减小。
column5: An abnormally decreased size of the `pituitary gland` (FMA:13889).

column4: 眼轮匝肌（闭合眼睑）的收缩力度降低。
column5: Reduced strength of the `orbicularis oculi` (FMA:46779), the circumorbital muscle in the face that closes the eyelid.

column4: 图像出现扭曲的视觉异常。直线网格出现波浪状，部分可能出现空白。
column5: A visual anomaly in which images appear distorted. A grid of straight lines appears wavy and parts of the grid may appear blank.

column3: 甲状腺素结合球蛋白降低
column4: 一个异常降低的数额甲状腺素结合球蛋白（TBG）的血液。 TBG负责执行甲状腺激素甲状腺素（T4）和3,5,3'碘甲状腺原氨酸（T3）在血流中。
column5: An abnormally decreased amount of thyroxin-binding globulin (TBG) in blood. TBG is responsible for carrying the thyroid hormones thyroxine (T4) and 3,5,3'-triiodothyronine (T3) in the bloodstream.

column4: 蛛网膜下腔内脑脊液（CSF）量增加。
column5: An increased amount of cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) in the subarachnoid space.

column4: 视盘的颞侧（外侧）部分出现浅黄色的变色。
column5: A pale yellow discoloration of the temporal (lateral) portion of the optic disc.

column3: 弥漫性视神经乳头苍白
column4: 整个视盘呈现淡黄色变色。
column5: A pale yellow discoloration of the entire optic disc.

column4: 没有明确局部病因的手臂疼痛。
column5: Pain in the arm with no clear focal etiology.

column4: 没有明确的局部病因的下肢疼痛。
column5: Pain in the leg with no clear focal etiology.

column4: 屈腿力量即提膝能力减弱。
column5: Reduced ability to flex the femur, that is, to pull the knee upward.

column2: Tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary atresia
column3: 法洛四联症伴肺动脉闭锁
column4: 法洛四联症伴肺动脉闭锁是法洛四联症的一种极端的形式，其特点为右心室的血液无法流入到肺动脉。
column5: An extreme form of tetralogy of Fallot characterized by absence of flow from the right ventricle to the pulmonary arteries.

column4: 一个异常降低的数额`过氧化氢酶activity`的（GO:0004096）。
column5: An abnormally decreased amount of `catalase activity` (GO:0004096).

column4: Willis 环（FMA:50454）的异常，也被称为脑动脉环。
column5: An anomaly of the `circle of Willis` (FMA:50454), also known as the cerebral arterial circle.

column4: 后交通动脉发育不完全（FMA:50084）。
column5: Underdeveloped `posterior communicating artery` (FMA:50084).

column4: Virchow-Robin spaces（又称为血管周围间隙）是指小血管从蛛网膜下腔发起时从脑实质穿过时在血管壁周围形成的腔隙。血管周围间隙多为显微镜下的，一般不能通过传统的神经影像学发现。这条术语是指这些腔隙变大可以从神经影像学上观察到（多为核磁共振），多为包含一条动脉的规则的空腔。
column5: Increased dimensions of the Virchow-Robin spaces (also known as perivascular spaces), which surround the walls of vessels as they course from the subarachnoid space through the brain parenchyma. Perivascular spaces are commonly microscopic, and not visible on conventional neuroimaging. This term refers to an increase of size of these spaces such that they are visible on neuroimaging (usually magnetic resonance imaging). The dilatations are regular cavities that always contain a patent artery.

column4: 先天性的视神经（FMA:50863）缺乏。
column5: Congenital absence of the `optic nerve` (FMA:50863).

column4: 毛细血管扩张的一种类型，以针尖样隆起的红点为中心，，周围辐射性分布较多小动脉，形似蜘蛛腿。典型的特征为按压中央动脉导致整个病变区域发白且松开后又迅速恢复。
column5: A form of telangiectasis characterized by a central elevated red dot the size of a pinhead, representing an arteriole, with numerous small blood vessels that radiate out thereby resembling the legs of a spider. Characteristically, compression of the central arteriole causes the entire lesion to blanch, and the lesion quickly refills once the compression is released.

column4: 儿童拒绝或不情愿被哺乳或者进食，表现为恶心、呕吐、转头远离食物，或口腔或口周任何感觉的触碰（如刷牙或洗脸）。
column5: Reluctance or refusal of a child to be breastfed or eat, manifested as gagging, vomiting, turning head away from food, or avoidance of sensation in or around the mouth (i.e. toothbrushing or face-washing).

column4: 区别于正常的盘状血小板形状的异常。
column5: A deviation from the normal discoid platelet shape.

column4: 血小板α颗粒位置和分布异常。
column5: An anomalous location and arrangement of platelet alpha granules.

column4: 缺乏血小板的α颗粒。
column5: A lack of platelet alpha granules.

column4: 血小板α颗粒通常含有凝血因子如纤维蛋白原、von Willebrand因子和生长因子 (如血小板衍生的生长因子)。此处指这些成分的异常。
column5: A deviation from the normal contents of the platelet alpha granules, which normally contain hemostatic proteins such as fibrinogen, von Willebrand factor, and growth factors such as platelet-derived growth factor.

column4: 血小板α颗粒数量异常。
column5: A deviation from the normal count of alpha granules per thrombocyte.

column4: 正常的血小板α颗粒包括三磷酸腺苷（ATP），腺苷二磷酸（ADP），血清素，钙和焦磷酸盐，血小板被激活后分泌这些成分。
column5: A deviation from the normal contents of the platelet alpha granules, which normally contain adenosine triphosphate (ATP), adenosine diphosphate (ADP), serotonin, calcium, and pyrophosphate, which are secreted when platelets are activated.

column4: 血小板致密颗粒的数量异常。
column5: A deviation from the normal count of dense granules per thrombocyte.

column4: 与实际或潜在的组织损伤相伴随的一种的不愉快的感觉和情绪体验。
column5: An unpleasant sensory and emotional experience associated with actual or potential tissue damage, or described in terms of such damage.

column4: 持续性疼痛，通常定义为持续3至6个月以上的疼痛。
column5: Persistent pain, usually defined as pain that has laster longer than 3 to 6 months.

column4: 由通常情况下不能引发疼痛的刺激导致的疼痛。
column5: Pain due to a stimulus that does not normally provoke pain.

column4: 没有明显物理原因而存在异常的疼痛或不愉快的感觉。
column5: Abnormal sensations with no apparent physical cause that are painful or unpleasant.

column4: 从神经元跨突触到目标靶点联络异常。在这个四步骤的过程中包括:（i）合成和储存神经递质; （ⅱ）神经递质释放; （ⅲ）通过神经递质激活突触后受体;和（iv）神经递质的失活。因此，该术语被定义为'神经递质代谢过程`（GO:0042133）的异常。
column5: An anomaly in the communication from a neuron to a target across a synapse. This is a four step process, comprising (i) synthesis and storage of neurotransmitters; (ii) neurotransmitter release; (iii) activation of postsynaptic receptors by the neurotransmitter; and (iv) inactivation of the neurotransmitter. Thus, this term is defined as an anomaly of `neurotransmitter metabolic process` (GO:0042133).

column3: 母体抗心磷脂抗体阳性
column4: 抗心磷脂抗体阳性常见于SLE及其他自身免疫性疾病。该抗体与血栓形成、血小板减少、自然流产或宫内死胎关系密切。
column5: Anticardiolipin antibody positive is common find in SLE and other autoimmune diseases. The antibody closely related to thrombosis, thrombocytopenia, spontaneous abortion or intrauterine fetal death.

column4: 甲有害反应到食品，饮料，食品添加剂，或化合物中产生的症状中，而并非由免疫反应介导的一个或多个身体器官和系统食品中发现。
column5: A detrimental reaction to a food, beverage, food additive, or compound found in foods that produces symptoms in one or more body organs and systems that is not mediated by an immune reaction.

column4: 甲不利反应，以面筋的食物中存在，其可以包括腹部疼痛，疲劳，头痛和感觉异常，或腹腔疾病。
column5: A detrimental reaction to the presence of gluten in food, which may include abdominal pain, fatigue, headaches and paresthesia, or celiac disease.

column4: 缺乏多核R-S细胞的淋巴瘤。
column5: A typer of lymphoma characterized microscopically by the absence of multinucleated Reed-Sternberg cells.

column4: 位于腋下的表皮样囊肿。
column5: An epidermoid cyst in the armpit.

column4: 新生儿骨膜下血管破裂出血，引起颅骨及骨膜下血肿而形成头颅血肿。
column5: Hemorrhage between the skull and periosteum of a newborn resulting from rupture of blood vessels that cross the periosteum.

column4: 甲增厚不伴畸形。
column5: Thickened nails without deformity.

column4: 尿液中存在含铁血黄素。

column5: Stop of growth at the epiphyseal plate the hyaline cartilage plate in the metaphysis at one or more long bones in the foot, at an earlier than normal age, resulting in growth arrest and shortening of the involved bone.

column4: 胫骨一块或多块长骨干骺端骺板的透明软骨生长停比正常年龄早，导致生长停滞和所涉及的骨的缩短。。
column5: Stop of growth at the epiphyseal plate the hyaline cartilage plate in the metaphysis at one or more long bones in the tibia, at an earlier than normal age, resulting in growth arrest and shortening of the involved bone.

column5: Stop of growth at the epiphyseal plate the hyaline cartilage plate in the metaphysis at one or more long bones in the ulna, at an earlier than normal age, resulting in growth arrest and shortening of the involved bone.

column5: A complete duplication of the ureter such that the duplicated ureters with separate insertions into the bladder.

column4: 一种近端肾小管病，特点是重吸收缺陷，导致糖尿、氨基酸尿、肾小管性蛋白尿、肾性低磷血症、肾小管尿酸盐重吸收降低，致碳酸氢盐丢失和酸中毒。
column5: A type of proximal renal tubulopathy characterized by resorption defects leading to glycosuria, aminoaciduria, tubular proteinuria, renal hypophosphatemia, and urate tubular hyporeabsorption with bicarbonate loss and resulting acidosis.

column4: 每个肾小球的系膜细胞数量增加。

column4: 肾单位的结构异常。

column5: Reduction in thickness of the basal lamina of the glomerulus of the kidney.

column3: 微小病变性肾小球肾炎
column4: 在肾病性蛋白尿病人，光镜下可见微小改变，电子显微镜可见扁平状且融合的足细胞足突。
column5: The presence of minimal changes visible by light microscopy but flattened and fused podocyte foot processes on electron microscopy in a person with nephrotic range proteinuria.

column5: The presence of calcium- and phosphate-containing calculi (stones) in the kidneys.

column4: 肾的双侧发育不良。
column5: Two sided `hypoplasia` (MPATH:133) of the `kidney` (FMA:7203).

column4: 肾的萎缩。

column4: 尿液中含有一定量的红细胞时称为血尿，当肉眼就可以看到尿液为红色时，即为肉眼血尿。
column5: Hematuria that is visible upon inspection of the urine.

column3: 激素耐受性肾病综合征

column5: A form of nephrotic syndrome that does not respond to treatment with steroid medication.

column5: A form of nephrotic syndrome that does not respond to any immunosuppresive treatment.

column4: 尿液生成量异常。
column5: Ab abnormal amount of urine production.

column5: Increased concentration of albumin in the urine.

column5: Severely increased amount of excretion of protein in the urine, defined as 3.5 grams per day or more in adults and 40 mg per meter-squared body surface area per hour in children.

column4: 尿液中白蛋白浓度轻度增加（成人每天30-150毫克）。
column5: The presence of mildly increased concentrations of albumin in the urine (in adults, 30-150 mg per day).

column4: 尿中蛋白质水平轻度增加（成人每天150-500毫克）。
column5: Mildly increased levels of protein in the urine (150-500 mg per day in adults).

column4: 尿中蛋白质水平中度增加（成人每天500-1000毫克）。
column5: Moderately increased levels of protein in the urine (500-1000 mg per day in adults).

column4: 尿液中蛋白质水平大量增加（成人每天正常值为1000-3000毫克）。
column5: Severely increased levels of protein in the urine (1000-3000 mg per day in adults).

column4: 尿液中钾离子的浓度异常。
column5: An abnormal concentration of `potassium(1+)` (CHEBI:29103) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).

column4: 尿液中磷酸盐的浓度异常。
column5: An abnormal `phosphate` (CHEBI:18367) concentration in the urine.

column5: An abnormal concentration of `chloride` (CHEBI:17996) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).

column5: An decreased concentration of `chloride` (CHEBI:17996) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).

column4: 尿液中氯化物浓度高，发生低氯血症。
column5: High urine chloride in the presence of hypochloridemia.

column4: 尿液中钠离子的浓度异常。
column5: An abnormal concentration of sodium in the `urine` (FMA:12274).

column4: 尿液中纳离子浓度的降低。
column5: An abnormally decreased sodium concentration in the urine.

column5: An increased concentration of `sodium(1+)` (CHEBI:29101) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).

column5: Elevanted concentration of `urate` (CHEBI:46819) in the urine.

column5: An anomalous finding in the examination of the urine for cells.

column5: Presence of leukocyte casts (cylindrical structures produced by the kidney in certain disease states) in the urine.
