column5: Presence of erythrocyte casts (cylindrical structures produced by the kidney in certain disease states) in the urine.

column4: 尿囊管部位发生的囊肿。
column5: A cyst located along the allantois canal.

column4: 膀胱壁存在多个憩室（囊或袋）。
column5: Presence of a many `diverticula`  (sac or pouch) in the `wall of the urinary bladder` (FMA:15902).

column4: 一种发育异常，直肠、阴道和膀胱未能分离。
column5: A developmental anomaly associated with the failure of rectum, vagina, and bladder to separate.

column4: 一种发育异常，阴道、膀胱和直肠融合形成公共通道。
column5: Developmental anomaly in which the vagina, bladder, and rectum fuse resulting in a common channel.

column4: 肾脏功能异常持续至少三个月。
column5: Functional anomaly of the kidney persisting for at least three months.

column4: 一种慢性肾脏疾病，表现为肾小球滤过率（GFR）正常或增加（GFR至少达到90毫升/分钟/ 1.73平方米）。
column5: A type of chronic kidney disease with normal or increased glomerular filtration rate (GFR at least 90 mL/min/1.73 m2).

column4: 一种慢性肾脏疾病，表现为肾小球滤过率轻度减少（GFR降到 60-89毫升/分钟/ 1.73平方米）。
column5: A type of chronic kidney disease with mildly reduced glomerular filtration rate (GFR 60-89 mL/min/1.73 m2).

column4: 一种慢性肾脏疾病，表现为肾小球滤过率中度减少（GFR降到 30-59毫升/分钟/ 1.73平方米）。
column5: A type of chronic kidney disease with moderately reduced glomerular filtration rate (GFR 30-59 mL/min/1.73 m2).

column4: 一种慢性肾脏疾病，表现为肾小球滤过率重度减少（GFR降到 15-29毫升/分钟/ 1.73平方米）。
column5: A type of chronic kidney disease with severely reduced glomerular filtration rate (GFR 15-29 mL/min/1.73 m2).

column4: 纤维状物质在任何浸泡在前房房水中的结构上发生沉积。
column5: Deposition of fibrillar material that can be found on all anterior segment structures bathed by aqueous humor.

column2: Abnormality of the suspensory ligament of lens
column4: 晶状体悬韧带的异常（FMA:58838），晶状体悬韧带也被称为睫状小带。这些韧带是连接睫状体和晶状体的纤维，使晶状体维持在适当位置。
column5: An anomaly of the `suspensory ligament of lens` (FMA:58838), also known as the ciliary zonule. These ligaments represent a series of fibers connecting the ciliary body and lens of the eye, holding the lens in place.

column4: 眼睛晶状体的震颤（颤抖）。
column5: Tremulousness (trembling) of the lens of the eye.

column4: 小梁网异常。小梁网是前房周边部的角膜和睫状体间的网眼状结构，负责将房水排入Schlemm管。
column5: An anomaly of the trabecular meshwork, which is the porelike structure surrounding the entire circumference of the anterior chamber at the base of the cornea and near the ciliary body. The trabecular mesh work is responsible for draining the aqueous humor into the canal of Schlemm.

column2: Pigment deposition in the trabecular meshwork
column4: 小梁网内发生的异常色素沉积。
column5: Accumulation of abnormal amounts of pigment within the trabecular meshwork.

column4: 眼内压的异常。眼内压是指眼内流体向单位面积施加的力的大小。
column5: An anomaly in the amount of force per unit area exerted by the intraocular fluid within the eye.

column4: 右眼和左眼的眼内压不同。
column5: A difference in the amount of intraocular pressure in the right and left eye.

column4: 正常情况下粘附在虹膜后侧的色素颗粒脱落进入房水。
column5: Shedding of the pigment granules that normally adhere to the back of the iris into the aqueous humor.

column4: 减少虹膜的血流量。
column5: Reduction in the amount of blood flow to the iris.

column4: 阻塞的视网膜静脉。
column5: Blockage of the retinal vein.

column4: 尿液钙浓度高，发生低钙血症。
column5: High urine calcium in the presence of hypocalcemia.

column3: 神经系统生理功能异常
column4: 在`神经系统`的功能异常（FMA:7157）。
column5: A functional anomaly of the `nervous system` (FMA:7157).

column4: 在`神经系统`（FMA:7157）的结构异常。
column5: A structural anomaly of the `nervous system` (FMA:7157).

column4: 从颅内压偏离正常颅内压范围。
column5: A deviation from the norm of the intracranial pressure.

column4: 颅骨（头盖骨）内的压力下降，并由此，脑组织和脑脊髓液的压力减少。
column5: A reduction of the pressure inside the cranium (skull) and thereby in the brain tissue and cerebrospinal fluid.

column4: 小脑发育不成熟。
column5: Lack of development of the cerebellum.

column4: 黄斑中心凹（FMA:58658）的色素减少。
column5: Decreased amount of pigmentation in the `fovea centralis` (FMA:58658).

column4: 尾状核乳酸的浓度升高。可通过磁共振波谱成像发现这一点。
column5: An elevated concentration of lactate in the caudate nucleus. This finding can be elicited by magnetic resonance spectroscopy imaging.

column4: 周围神经大小增加。可以沿神经轴线触诊发现。
column5: Increase in size of a peripheral nerve. This finding can be appreciated by palpation along the axis of the nerve.

column4: 睾丸位于阴囊上部或腹股沟管下部，通过手法可以无阻力地将其完全回纳入阴囊内，但通过提睾反射又返回到原来位置。
column5: A testis that is located at the upper scrotum or lower inguinal canal and that can be made to descend completely into the scrotum without resistance by manual reduction but returns to its original position by the cremasteric reflex.

column4: 任何`炎症反应`（GO:0006954）的异常。炎症反应指损伤或感染后引起局部血管扩张，血浆外渗进入细胞间隙，以及白血细胞和巨噬细胞积聚的反应。
column5: Any anomaly of the `inflammatory response` (GO:0006954), a response to injury or infection characterized by local vasodilation, extravasation of plasma into intercellular spaces and accumulation of white blood cells and macrophages.

column4: 损伤或感染引起的`炎症反应异常减少（GO:0006954）。
column5: An abnormal reduction in the `inflammatory response` (GO:0006954) to injury or infection.

column4: 损伤或感染后`炎症反应`异常升高（GO:0006954）。
column5: A abnormal increase in the `inflammatory response` (GO:0006954) to injury or infection.

column4: 大脑外侧裂附近的皮层出现过多数量小脑回。
column5: An excessive number of small gyri (convolutions) on the surface of the brain in the region surrounding the sylvian fissures.

column4: 明显的步态共济失调，导致受累者无法行走。
column5: A severe form of gait ataxia such that an affected person cannot walk at all.

column4: 运动后的哮喘发作。
column5: Asthma attacks following exercise.

column4: 严重的哮喘，对反复β-受体激动剂治疗，如吸入沙丁胺醇，左旋沙丁胺醇，或皮下注射肾上腺素无反应。
column5: Severe asthma unresponsive to repeated courses of beta-agonist therapy such as inhaled albuterol, levalbuterol, or subcutaneous epinephrine.

column3: 脑脊液多巴胺水平异常
column4: 脑脊液（CSF）中`多巴胺`（CHEBI:18243）浓度异常。
column5: Abnormal concentration of `dopamine` (CHEBI:18243) in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF).

column3: 脑脊液多巴胺水平增加
column4: 脑脊液（CSF）中的`多巴胺`（CHEBI:18243）浓度增加。
column5: Increased concentration of `dopamine` (CHEBI:18243) in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF).

column3: 脑脊液多巴胺水平降低
column4: 脑脊液中多巴胺浓度的下降。
column5: Decreased concentration of `dopamine` (CHEBI:18243) in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF).

column3: 脑部正电子发射断层扫描异常
column4: 通过正电子发射断层扫描（PET）检测的脑功能性异常。 PET扫描为脑功能成像的方法，其测量结果反映在大脑的不同区域的大脑活跃程度。
column5: A functional brain anomaly detectable by positron emission tomography (PET). PET scanning is a method for functional brain imaging, and its measurements reflect the amount of brain activity in the various regions of the brain.

column2: Abnormal brain FDG positron emission tomography
column3: 脑FDG正电子发射断层扫描异常
column4: [18F]氟脱氧葡萄糖正电子发射断层（PET）脑部扫描。通过检测葡萄糖摄取反映神经代谢活性。
column5: An anomaly detectable in [18F]-fluorodeoxyglucose (FDG) positron emission tomography (PET) brain scans. Glucose uptake measured with FDG-PET is a marker of neuronal metabolic activity.

column4: 如通过正电子发射断层扫描（PET）脑部扫描测定减少[18 F] –脱氧葡萄糖（FDG）在前额皮质的摄取。
column5: Reduced uptake of [18F]-fluorodeoxyglucose  (FDG) in the prefrontal cortex as measured by positron emission tomography (PET) brain scan.

column4: 正电子发射断层扫描（PET）脑部扫描中丘脑[18 F]--脱氧葡萄糖（FDG）摄取减低。
column5: Reduced uptake of [18F]-fluorodeoxyglucose  (FDG) in the thalamus as measured by positron emission tomography (PET) brain scan.

column4: 氟18标记脱氧葡萄糖（FDG）的正电子发射断层扫描（PET）显示下丘脑的摄取减低。
column5: Reduced uptake of [18F]-fluorodeoxyglucose  (FDG) in the hypothalamus as measured by positron emission tomography (PET) brain scan.

column4: 如通过正电子发射断层扫描（PET）脑部扫描测定减少[18 F] -脱氧葡萄糖（FDG）在顶叶皮质摄取。
column5: Reduced uptake of [18F]-fluorodeoxyglucose  (FDG) in the parietal cortex as measured by positron emission tomography (PET) brain scan.

column4: 每个心动周期血液从左心室泵送分数轻微的降低。正常成人范围至少55％，轻微减少在45-54％左右。
column5: A small reduction in the fraction of blood pumped from the left ventricle with each cardiac cycle. The normal range in adults is at least 55 percent, and a mild reduction is defined as 45-54 percent.

column4: 心室在每个心动周期内的射血体积分数的缩减。
column5: A diminution of the volumetric fraction of blood pumped out of the ventricle with each cardiac cycle.

column4: 每个心动周期从左心室泵送的血液分数中度降低。正常成人范围为至少55％，中度减少定义为30-44％左右。
column5: A medium reduction in the fraction of blood pumped from the left ventricle with each cardiac cycle. The normal range in adults is at least 55 percent, and a moderate reduction is defined as 30-44 percent.

column4: 在每个心动周期从左心室泵送的血液的分数大大减少。正常范围的成人为至少55％，射血分数减少被定义为不到30％。
column5: A large reduction in the fraction of blood pumped from the left ventricle with each cardiac cycle. The normal range in adults is at least 55 percent, and a moderate reduction is defined as less than 30 percent.

column2: Regional left ventricular wall motion abnormality
column3: 区域性左室壁运动异常
column4: 部分左心室在心动周期中的异常运动。
column5: An abnormal motion of a segment of the left ventricle during the cardiac cycle.

column4: 由于血压降低伴随的迷走神经张力和周围血管扩张增加从而导致的意识丧失。
column5: Loss of consciousness due to a reduction in blood pressure that is associated with an increase in vagal tone and peripheral vasodilation.

column4: 对颈动脉窦压力感受器的过度反应，导致脑灌注暂时减少，引起晕厥。
column5: An exaggerated response to carotid sinus baroreceptor stimulation resulting in syncope from transient diminished cerebral perfusion.

column4: 从躺着到站起，突然的体位变化引起的晕厥。
column5: Syncope following a quick change in position from lying down to standing.

column4: 行为和语音输出贫乏，缺乏主动性，情绪反应减退，精神运动迟缓，和语言反应延迟。
column5: Poverty of behavior and speech output, lack of initiative, loss of emotional responses, psychomotor slowing, and prolonged speech latency.

column4: 运动不能性缄默症本质特点是在保存视觉跟踪能力的情况下完全缺乏自发的行为和言论。
column5: Akinetic mutism is essentially characterized by a total absence of spontaneous behavior and speech occurring in the presence of preserved visual tracking.

column4: 阴道上段未能发育。
column5: A failure to develop of the upper vagina.

column4: 阴道的下部未能发育。
column5: A failure to develop of the lower part of the vagina.

column4: 脑组织铁（Fe）的异常聚积。
column5: An abnormal build up of iron (Fe) in brain tissue.

column4: 大脑（FMA:50801）内铜（Cu）的异常积聚。
column5: An anomalous build up of copper (Cu) in the `brain` (FMA:50801).

column4: 苍白球（FMA:61835）的铁异常聚积。
column5: An abnormal build up of iron (Fe) in the `globus pallidus` (FMA:61835).

column4: 黑质（FMA:67947）的铁异常聚积。
column5: An anomalous build up of iron (Fe) in the `substantia nigra` (FMA:67947).

column4: 椎弓根之间距离增大，椎弓根是椎体上部从两边向后的两个短而厚的突起，在后侧面联合。
column5: An increase in the distance between vertebral pedicles, which are the two short, thick processes, which project backward, one on either side, from the upper part of the vertebral body, at the junction of its posterior and lateral surfaces.

column4: 松果体异常, 松果体是大脑中产生褪黑素的一个小的内分泌腺。
column5: An anomaly of the "pineal gland" (FMA:62033),a small endocrine gland in the brain that produces melatonin.

column4: 松果体结构异常。
column5: A structural abnormality of the `pineal gland` (FMA:62033).

column4: 松果体中钙盐积累
column5: Accumulation of calcium salts in the `pineal gland` (FMA:62033).

column4: 胶质的单一隔室或多个隔室的充满液体的囊肿，位于松果体内，或完全替换了松果体。
column5: A glial uniloculated or multiloculated fluid-filled sac that either reside within or completely replace the pineal gland.

column4: 松果体占据的三维空间的异常增加或减少。
column5: An abnormal increase or decrease in the quantity of three-dimensional space taken up by the pineal gland.

column4: 松果体占用的三维空间异常减少
column5: An abnormal reduction in the quantity of three-dimensional space taken up by the pineal gland.

column4: 松果体所占据的三维空间出现异常增加。
column5: An abnormal elevation in the quantity of three-dimensional space taken up by the pineal gland.

column4: 松果体发育缺失，临床上定义为没有松果体, 没有迹象显示曾经有过松果体。
column5: Failure to develop of the pineal gland, defined clinically as the absence of the pineal gland with no indication of the pineal gland even having been present.

column4: 松果体功能异常。
column5: A functional abnormality of the `pineal gland` (FMA:62033).

column3: 松果体褪黑素分泌异常
column4: 松果体分泌的褪黑素的数量或时机的异常。注意，褪黑素也由除松果体外的多个组织合成。
column5: An anomaly in the amount or timing of melatonin secretion by the pineal gland. Note that melatonin is also synthesized by multiple tissues outside of the pineal gland.

column4: 丘脑在磁共振成像（MRI）上T2信号比预期暗。这个术语是指一个影响整个丘脑的漫低信号。
column5: A darker than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the thalamus. This term refers to a diffuse hypointensity affecting the entire thalamus.

column3: 丘脑局灶性T2低信号病变
column4: 在MRI T2加权像上，丘脑存在的比通常更低的信号。这个术语指丘脑特定区域的局部低信号。
column5: A darker than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the thalamus. This term refers to a localized hypointensity affecting a particular region of the thalamus.

column3: 丘脑局灶性T2高信号病变
column4: 在MRI T2加权像上，丘脑存在的比通常更亮的信号。这个术语指丘脑特定区域的局部高信号。
column5: A lighter than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the thalamus. This term refers to a localized hyperintensity affecting a particular region of the thalamus.

column4: `丘脑`（FMA:62007）的大小的偏离正常范围内。
column5: Deviation from the normal range of size of the `thalamus` (FMA:62007).

column4: `丘脑` (FMA:62007)体积增大。
column5: An increase in the quantity of space occupied by the `thalamus` (FMA:62007).

column4: 丘脑（FMA:62007）占据的空间体积的减少。
column5: A reduction in the quantity of space occupied by the `thalamus` (FMA:62007).

column3: 丘脑核磁共振信号强度异常
column4: 磁共振成像（MRI）上丘脑的信号偏离正常值。
column5: A deviation from normal signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the thalamus.

column4: 基底神经节体积减小（FMA:84013）。
column5: Decreased size of the `basal ganglia` (FMA:84013).

column4: 在小脑（FMA:67944）出现神经胶质细胞增生(MPATH:182)。
column5: The presence of `gliosis` (MPATH:182) in the `cerebellum` (FMA:67944).

column4: 腿的骨干的结构异常。
column5: A structural abnormality of a diaphysis of the leg.

column4: 大肠功能异常。
column5: A functional anomaly of the large intestine.

column4: 一种突然且不可抗拒的排便需求。
column5: A sudden, irresistible need to have a bowel movement.

column4: 反复发作的、疼痛的、急促排便感，但无排便。
column5: A repeated, painful urge to defecate without excreting stool.

column4: 蛛网膜下腔即蛛网膜下方与软脑膜上方之间的间隙，其中包含脑脊液。
column5: Abnormality in the space in the meninges beneath the arachnoid membrane and above the pia mater that contains the cerebrospinal fluid.

column4: 蛛网膜和软脑膜之间解剖间隙扩大。
column5: An increase in size of the anatomic space between the arachnoid membrane and pia mater.

column2: Abnormal metabolic brain imaging by MRS
column3: 通过MRS发现的脑代谢异常
column4: 通过磁共振波谱（MRS）成像确定的脑代谢的异常。
column5: An anomaly of metabolism in the brain identified by magnetic resonance spectroscopy (MRS).

column2: Elevated brain choline level by MRS
column4: 通过磁共振波谱（MRS）发现脑中胆碱水平增加。
column5: An increase in the level of choline-containing compounds in the brain identified by magnetic resonance spectroscopy (MRS).

column2: Elevated brain lactate level by MRS
column4: 通过磁共振波谱（MRS）发现脑中乳酸水平增加
column5: An increase in the level of lactate in the brain identified by magnetic resonance spectroscopy (MRS).

column2: Reduced brain N-acetyl aspartate level by MRS
column3: 通过MRS发现N-乙酰天门冬氨酸水平降低
column4: 通过MRS发现N-乙酰天门冬氨酸水平降低。
column5: A decrease in the level of N-acetyl aspartate in the brain identified by magnetic resonance spectroscopy (MRS).

column2: Abnormal brain choline/creatine ratio by MRS
column3: 磁共振脑胆碱/肌酐比值异常
column4: 从正常的胆碱的比率A偏离到肌酸在确定了磁共振波谱（MRS）的大脑。
column5: A deviation from normal in the ratio of choline to creatine in the brain identified by magnetic resonance spectroscopy (MRS).

column4: 甲板侧缘长入附近的软组织中。
column5: Excessive growth of a nail laterally into the nail fold.

column4: 一个或多个椎骨骨骺形成和成熟过程延迟。
column5: A delay in the process of formation and maturation of the epiphysis of one or more vertebrae.

column4: 程度轻微的（PATO: 0000394）听力丧失（HP: 0000365）。
column5: Partial or complete loss of hearing following ingestion of aminoglycoside antibiotics.

column4: '中等程度的（PATO: 0000395）听力丧失（HP: 0000365）。
column5: Partial or complete loss of hearing following ingestion of aminoglycoside antibiotics.
Partial or complete loss of hearing following ingestion of aminoglycoside antibiotics.

column4: 极重度的（基本完全丧失的）听力损失（===HP:0000365===）。
column5: Partial or complete loss of hearing following ingestion of aminoglycoside antibiotics.

column4: 中等程度的（PATO: 0000395）传导性听力损失（HP: 0000405）。
column5: Partial or complete loss of hearing following ingestion of aminoglycoside antibiotics.
Partial or complete loss of hearing following ingestion of aminoglycoside antibiotics.

column2: Morphological abnormality of the gastrointestinal tract
column4: 胃肠道的异常结构。
column5: Abnormal structure of the gastrointestinal tract.

column2: Functional abnormality of the gastrointestinal tract
column4: 胃肠道在功能上出现异常。
column5: `Abnormal` (PATO:0000460) `functionality` (PATO:0001509) of the gastrointestinal tract.

column4: 鼻腔的肿瘤。
column5: Cancer of the nasal cavity.

column4: 由扁平内皮和参展周转慢内衬畸形通道组成的静脉组织发育错误造成的血管畸形。
column5: A vascular malformation resulting from a developmental error of venous tissue composed of dysmorphic channels lined by flattened endothelium and exhibiting slow turnover.

column4: 发生在沿传导通路任何地方的心搏动传导受损。
column5: Impaired conduction of cardiac impulse occurring anywhere along the conduction pathway.

column4: 由窦房结到心脏心房引起冲动瞬时传导故障产生的心房激动紊乱。
column5: Disturbance in the atrial activation that is caused by transient failure of impulse conduction from the sinoatrial node to the cardiac atria.

column4: 上眼睑区域水肿。
column5: Edema in the region of the upper eyelid.

column4: 从远侧至近侧指间关节至少延伸一节的、前后轴线上的、软组织的连续，或连续性软组织位于相邻的指（趾）掌指或跖趾关节远端的屈曲折纹内。
column5: A soft tissue continuity in the A/P axis between two digits that extends distally to at least the level of the proximal interphalangeal joints, or a soft tissue continuity in the A/P axis between two digits that lies significantly distal to the flexion crease that overlies the metacarpophalangeal or metatarsophalangeal joint of the adjacent digits.

column4: 一个异常降低`potassium`（CHEBI:29103）的浓度在血液中与返回到正常的发作之间周期性出现。
column5: An abnormally decreased `potassium` (CHEBI:29103) concentration in the blood occurring periodically with a return to normal between the episodes.

column4: 胸主动脉壁薄弱部位向外突出。
column5: A bulging, weakened area in the wall of the thoracic aorta.

column4: 一类在主动脉各方向凸起或鼓起的胸部降主动脉瘤。
column5: A type of descending thoracic aortic aneurysm that bulges or balloons out on all sides of the aorta.

column4: 降主动脉瘤的一种，发生于主动脉的一侧呈凸起状或球状。
column5: A type of descending thoracic aortic aneurysm that bulges or balloons out on only one side of the aorta.

column4: 由于发育异常造成缺乏舌头。
column5: Absence of the tongue owing to a developmental abnormality.

column4: 垂体前叶腺的解剖位置异常。
column5: Abnormal anatomic location of the anterior pituitary gland.

column4: 肛门或直肠的异常。
column5: An abnormality of the anus or rectum.

column4: 只有局部颜色改变，与周围皮肤齐平，皮肤厚度和质地均未发生改变，直径一般小于1厘米。
column5: A flat, distinct, discolored area of skin less than 1 cm wide that does not involve any change in the thickness or texture of the skin.

column4: 低血糖是伴随着在主体酮体水平升高。
column5: Low blood glucose is accompanied by elevated levels of ketone bodies in the body.

column4: 先有吸气，肺部空气经部分关闭的声门突然并出声的排出。
column5: A sudden, audible expulsion of air from the lungs through a partially closed glottis, preceded by inhalation.

column4: 儿童发育过程中运动或精神的严重发育迟缓。
column5: A profound delay in the achievement of motor or mental milestones in the domains of development of a child.

column4: 通过蒂、脚或较大的基底而附着于肠壁、伸出到小肠腔的离散的异常组织块。
column5: A discrete abnormal tissue mass that protrudes into the lumen of the small intestine and is attached to the intestinal wall either by a stalk, pedunculus, or a broad base.

column4: 犬齿发育不全。
column5: `Agenesis` (MPATH:57) of `canine tooth` (FMA:55636).

column4: 小肠未能发育。
column5: Failure to develop of the small intestine.

column4: 皮肤或粘膜表面乳头状突起的肿物。
column5: A tumor of the skin or mucous membrane with finger-like projections.

column4: 由于睾丸未能通过腹股沟管下降到阴囊，造成一侧阴囊扪及不到睾丸。
column5: Absence of a testis  from the scrotum on one side owing to failure of the testis or testes to descend through the inguinal canal to the testis.

column4: 从末端可观察到指甲变薄。
column5: Nail that appears thin when viewed on end.

column4: 胃和腹部周围存在过多的脂肪。
column5: Excessive fat around the stomach and abdomen.

column4: 股骨发育不全。
column5: Failure of the femur to develop.

column4: 内外侧眼角之间的距离小于平均值超过2个标准偏差（客观）；或者，睑裂的长度显著缩短。
column5: Distance between the medial and lateral canthi is more than 2 SD below the mean for age (objective); or, apparently reduced length of the palpebral fissures.

column4: 从末端观察到趾甲变薄。
column5: Toenail that appears thin when viewed on end.

column3: 脑干核磁共振信号强度异常
column4: 脑干的磁共振成像（MIR）信号偏离于正常信号。
column5: A deviation from normal signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MIR) of the brainstem.

column3: 脑干局灶性T2高信号病变
column4: 在MRI T2加权像上，脑干存在的比通常更亮的信号。这个术语指脑干特定区域的局部高信号。
column5: A lighter than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MIR) of the brainstem. This term refers to a localized hyperintensity affecting a particular region of the brainstem.

column3: 脑干局灶性T2低信号病变
column4: 在MRI T2加权像上，脑干存在的比通常更低的信号。这个术语指脑干特定区域的局部低信号。
column5: A darker than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MIR) of the brainstem. This term refers to a localized hypointensity affecting a particular region of the brainstem.

column4: 脑干在磁共振成像（MIR）上T2信号较暗比预期暗。这个术语是指一个影响整个脑干的弥漫低信号。
column5: A darker than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MIR) of the brainstem. This term refers to a diffuse hypointensity affecting the entire brainstem.

column2: Abnormal basal ganglia MRI signal intensity
column3: 核磁共振基底节异常信
column4: 磁共振成像（MRI）显示基底节信号异常。
column5: A deviation from normal signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the basal ganglia.

column2: Focal T2 hypointense basal ganglia lesion
column3: 基底节局灶性T2低信号病变
column4: 在MRI T2加权像上，基底节区存在的比通常更低的信号。这个术语指基底节特定区域的局部低信号。
column5: A darker than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the basal ganglia. This term refers to a localized hypointensity affecting a particular region of the basal ganglia.

column4: 基底神经节在磁共振成像（MRI）上T2信号比预期的暗。这个术语指的是影响整个基底神经节的弥漫性低信号。
column5: A darker than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the basal ganglia. This term refers to a diffuse hypointensity affecting all of the basal ganglia.

column3: 中枢神经系统髓鞘形成增多
column4: 中枢神经系统髓鞘数量增加。
column5: Increased amount of myelin in the central nervous system.

column4: 脑干大小增加。
column5: Abnormal increase in size of the brainstem.

column3: 脑脊液中性粒细胞增多
column4: 脑脊液中性粒细胞计数增加。
column5: An increased polymorphonuclear cell count in the cerebrospinal fluid.

column4: 神经元的结构异常。
column5: A structural anomaly of a neuron.

column4: 儿童神经系统发育的异常，可能包括人格、社会、精细或大体运动，以及认知能力发育的异常。
column5: A deviation from normal of the neurological development of a child, which may include any or all of the aspects of the development of personal, social, gross or fine motor, and cognitive abilities.

column4: 参加互动的社会交往能力下降，其正常特征为一个人的行为影响与之交流的另外一个人的行为。
column5: A reduced ability to participate in the back and forth flow of social interaction, which is normally characterized by an influence of the behavior of one person on the behavior of another person who is in conversation with the first.

column4: 乳突发育的异常，乳突未能形成，并因此发现为先天性缺如。
column5: A developmental anomaly in which the `mastoid process` (FMA:52872) fails to form and is thus found to be congenitally absent.

column4: 大脑白质出现萎缩（缩小）。
column5: The presence of atrophy (wasting) of the cerebral white matter.

column4: 患者在休息状态下突然发生的呼吸困难。
column5: A sudden attack of dyspnea that occurs while the affected person is at rest.

column4: 卧位时感觉呼吸困难，坐位或站立时减轻。
column5: A sensation of breathlessness in the recumbent position, relieved by sitting or standing.

column3: 增宽的小脑蛛网膜下腔
column4: 小脑周围区域蛛网膜和软脑膜之间的解剖学间隙增大。
column5: An increase in size of the anatomic space between the arachnoid membrane and pia mater in the region surrounding the cerebellum.

column4: 围绕大脑的蛛网膜和软脑膜之间的解剖学间隙扩大。
column5: An increase in size of the anatomic space between the arachnoid membrane and pia mater in the region surrounding the cerebrum.

column4: 胎盘大小与正常尺寸的偏差。
column5: A deviation from normal size of the placenta.

column4: 新生儿呼吸衰竭。
column5: Respiratory failure in the newborn.

This subontology is designed to provide terms to characterize and specify the phenotypic abnormalities defined in the Phenotypic abnormality subontology, with respect to severity, laterality, age of onset, and other aspects.
The intensity or degree of a manifestation.
Having a relatively minor degree of severity. For quantitative traits, a deviation of between two and three standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.
Having a medium degree of severity. For quantitative traits, a deviation of between three and four standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.

Having a minor degree of severity that is considered to be on the boundary between the normal and the abnormal ranges. For quantitative traits, a deviation of that is less than two standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.
Having a high degree of severity. For quantitative traits, a deviation of between four and five standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.
Having an extremely high degree of severity. For quantitative traits, a deviation of more than five standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.
The anatomical localization of the specified phenotypic abnormality.
The localization with respect to the side of the body of the specified phenotypic abnormality.
Being present on both sides of the body.
Being present on only the left or only the right side of the body.
Being located on the right side of the body.
Being located on the left side of the body.
The pattern by which a phenotype affects one or more regions of the body.
Affecting all regions without specificity of distribution.
Being confined or restricted to a particular location.
Localized away from the central point of the body.
Localized close to the central point of the body.

MEPs are measured following single-pulse or repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation and can be used for the assessment of the excitability of the motor cortex and the integrity of conduction along the central and peripheral motor pathways.

column3: 上肢运动诱发电位异常
column4: 一种在上肢发现的运动诱发电位（MEPs）的异常。
column5: An anomaly identified by motor evoked potentials (MEPs) in the arm.

column3: 下肢运动诱发电位异常
column4: 一种在下肢发现的运动诱发电位（MEPs）的异常。
column5: An anomaly identified by motor evoked potentials (MEPs) in the leg.

column4: 在一次握紧-放松时间延迟后很难放松。
column5: Difficulty releasing one's grip associated with prolonged first handgrip relaxation times.

column4: 面部肌肉的缓慢松弛。
column5: Slowed relaxation of muscles in the face.

column4: 下颚肌肉的缓慢松弛。
column5: Slowed relaxation of muscles in the jaw.

column4: 下肢肌肉的缓慢松弛。
column5: Slowed relaxation of muscles in the leg.

column4: 上肢肌肉的缓慢松弛。
column5: Slowed relaxation of muscles in the arm.

column4: 在低温环境下，放松的骨骼肌收缩或受电刺激之后不自主地无痛延迟。
column5: An involuntary and painless delay in the relaxation of skeletal muscle following contraction or electrical stimulation that is induced by exposure to cold.

column4: 一种先天性眼睑异常，其特点是水平方向放大的睑裂。与横向尺寸相比，眼睑的垂直尺寸缩短，并且外眦位置异常、横向外翻、眼皮开口异常扩张。
column5: Euryblepharon is a congenital eyelid anomaly characterized by horizontal enlargement of the palpebral fissure. The eyelid is shortened vertically compared with the horizontal dimension, with associated lateral canthal malpositioning and lateral ectropion abnormally wide lid opening.

column4: 睫状体的缺损。
column5: A `coloboma` (HP:0000589) of the ciliary body.
A spatial pattern that is spread out, i.e., not localized.

column4: 第一趾跖趾关节的骨关节炎
column5: Osteoarthritis of the metatarsophalangeal joint of the first toe.

column3: 肾小球毛细血管壁增厚
column4: 肾小球毛细血管壁增厚。这个特征可能是由于一些物质的堆积和其他变化引起，累及上皮下和内皮下区域或肾小球基底膜本身。
column5: Widening of the wall of capillary blood vessels in the glomerulus. This feature may be produced by deposits and other changes affecting either subepithelial and subendothelial regions or the glomerular basement membrane itself.

column3: 肾小球毛细血管形态异常
column4: 肾小球毛细血管的结构性异常。
column5: A structural anomaly of the capillary blood vessels inthe renal glomerulus.

column4: 黄斑中心凹解剖位置的异常，视网膜黄斑中心凹的中央小圆点由紧密聚集的视锥细胞组成。
column5: An abnormal anatomic position of the fovea, the small, central pit composed of closely packed cones that is located in the macula of the retina.

column4: 在吸气过程中，由于气管支气管树向下牵引导致的气管向下运动。
column5: Downward movement of the trachea during inspiration due to downward traction on the tracheobronchial tree.

column4: 上切牙偏离大致平行于脸部表面的正常角度，向外倾斜。
column5: The upper incisors deviate from the normal angle of being roughly parallel to the surface of the face and instead slant outwards.

column4: 曾经存在的中心凹组织部分或全部缺失。
column5: Partial or complete loss of foveal tissue that was once present.

column4: 前鼻孔狭窄（梨形或梨形孔），是形成鼻子骨入口的头骨中的梨形开口。
column5: Narrowing of the anterior nasal aperture (piriform or pyriform aperture), which is a pear-shaped opening in the skull that forms the bony inlet of the nose.

column4: 基底神经节中弥漫性扩张的血管周围空间，特别是纹状体处。筛状脑通常是对称的，血管周围空间显示CSF信号，无扩散限制。“筛状”指有多个穿孔。
column5: Diffusely widened perivascular spaces in the basal ganglia, affecting especially the corpus striatum. Status cribrosum is usually symmetrical, with the perivascular spaces showing CSF signal and without diffusion restriction. The word cribriform means sievelike, with multiple perforations.

column4: 一种表现为四肢夸张伸展姿势的僵硬。
column5: A type of rigidity that is manifested by an exaggerated extensor posture of all extremities.

column4: 小的硬囊样结节，可自由移动在腿和胳膊的骨性突出上的皮下组织中，在X线下可见外有钙化层，内有半透明状内核。
column5: Small, hard cyst-like nodules, freely moveable in the subcutis over the bony prominences of the legs and arms, which have an outer calcified layer with a translucent core on x-ray.

column4: 将小动脉与小静脉连接的小血管的结构异常，它的壁是半透膜，介导血液循环和身体组织之间的流体和气体扩散。
column5: A structural anomaly of the tiny blood vessels that connect arterioles with venules and whose walls act as semipermeable membranes that mediate the diffusion of fluids and gases between the blood circulation and body tissues.

column4: 毛细血管对破裂的抵抗力降低。毛细血管脆性可能表现为具有自发性瘀斑（瘀伤）的出血倾向。
column5: Reduced resistance to rupture of capikllary blood vessels. Capillary fragility may manifest as a bleeding diathesis with spontaneous ecchymoses (bruises).

column4: 毛细血管的功能异常。毛细血管将小动脉与小静脉连接，它的壁是半透膜，介导血液循环和身体组织之间的流体和气体扩散。
column5: A functional anomaly of the tiny blood vessels that connect arterioles with venules and whose walls act as semipermeable membranes that mediate the diffusion of fluids and gases between the blood circulation and body tissues.

column4: 动脉突然断裂，导致血液从循环中漏出。
column5: Sudden breakage of an artery leading to leakage of blood from the circulation.

column3: 前列腺特异抗原水平升高
column5: An increased concentration of prostate specific antigen (PSA) in the circulation.

A deviation from normal range of the erythrocyte sedimentation rate (ESR), a test that measures the distance that erythrocytes have fallen after one hour in a vertical column of anticoagulated blood under the influence of gravity. The ESR is a nonspecific finding. An elevation may indicate inflammation or may be caused by any condition that elevates fibrinogen. A decreased ESR may be seen in polycythemia or in certain blood diseases in which red blood cells have an irregular or smaller shape that causes slower settling.

A reduced erythrocyte sedimentation rate (ESR). The ESR is a test that measures the distance that erythrocytes have fallen after one hour in a vertical column of anticoagulated blood under the influence of gravity. The ESR is a nonspecific finding. A decreased ESR may be seen in polycythemia or in certain blood diseases in which red blood cells have an irregular or smaller shape that causes slower settling.

column4: 导致直肠腔完全闭塞的发育缺陷。即，直肠管状结构存在异常闭合，或闭锁。
column5: A developmental defect resulting in complete obliteration of the lumen of the rectum. That is, there is an abnormal closure, or atresia of the tubular structure of the rectum.

column4: 直肠的异常扩张。因失神经支配或肌肉异常导致的被填充的巨大直肠，解除嵌塞后仍存在。
column5: An abnormal dilation of the rectum. There is a large filled rectum as a result of underlying innervation or mulscular abnormalities, which remains after disimpaction of the rectum.

column4: 以存在于直肠和阴道前庭（阴道开口的较低部分）之间的异常连接（瘘管）为特征的先天性畸形。
column5: A congenital malformation characterized by an abnormal connection (fistula) between the rectum and the vulval vestibule, at the lower aspect of the vaginal opening.

column4: 直肠前庭瘘伴正常肛门，被称为H型瘘管或消化道双重末端。
column5: Rectovestibular fistula with a normal anus is known as H-type fistula or double termination of the alimentary tract.

column4: 皮肤骨瘤是指在表皮和真皮内部异常出现的骨化(骨形成)，真皮或皮下骨形成主要表现为石样硬结 。骨瘤是不规则的硬化小结节，通常界限较清，与皮肤颜色一致。
column5: The term osteoma refers to the anomalous presence of ossification (bone formation) in the interior of the dermis or epidermis. The dermal or subcutaneous bone formation presents as stony hard nodules. The osteomata appear as irregular, hardened small nodules that are well circumscribed and generally of the same color as the skin.

column2: Abnormality of enteric nervous system morphology
column4: 肠神经系统形态的异常。
column5: A structural anomaly of nerves of the enteric nervous system.

column4: 肠神经元退变伴肠神经元结构异常。典型的神经病理所见包括肠神经元的质（如神经元水肿、细胞核内包涵体、轴突退变）和量（如神经元数量减少）的异常。
column5: Deterioration of enteric neurons with impairment of enteric neuronal structure. Typical neuropathological findings include qualitative (e.g., neuronal swelling, intranuclear inclusions, axonal degeneration) and quantitative (e.g., reduction in the number of neurons) abnormalities of the enteric neurons.

column2: Abnormal morphology of erythroid progenitor cell
column5: Abnormal form of the progenitor cells committed to the erythroid lineage.

column4: 成红细胞的异常形式，即在红细胞形成过程中在红系祖细胞形成之后的不成熟、有核的红细胞。该细胞是CD71阳性的，具有核和核仁，并且缺乏造血谱系标记。
column5: Anomalous form of the proerythroblast, i.e., the immature, nucleated erythrocyte occupying the stage of erythropoeisis that follows formation of erythroid progenitor cells. This cell is CD71-positive, has both a nucleus and a nucleolus, and lacks hematopoeitic lineage markers.

column3: 肌电图: 重复性神经电刺激异常
column4: 在2或3赫兹下电刺激6至10次，肌电图显示异常。
column5: Abnormality observed upon electromyography when nerve studied is electrically stimulated six to ten times at 2 or 3 Hertz.

column4: 指眼睑不能完全遮住眼睛的情况。
column5: A condition in which the eyelids do not close to cover the eye completely.

column4: 夜间睡眠时眼睑不能闭合。
column5: The inability to close the eyelids during sleep.

column4: 与面神经麻痹相关的一类眼球炎。
column5: A type of lagophthalmos that occurs in association with facial nerve palsy.

column4: 创伤或手术后发生的一类眼刺激。
column5: A type of lagophthalmos that occurs following trauma or surgery.

column4: 由低血压和全身水肿特征引起的急性现象，由血浆流出到外周组织导致，伴有急性发作期间血管内空间（低白蛋白血症）的血浆体积（血液浓缩）和蛋白质损失减少。
column5: An acute phenomenon characterized by hypotension and anasarca due to the loss of plasma volume into peripheral tissues, with evidence of decreased plasma volume (hemoconcentration) and protein loss from the intravascular space (hypoalbuminemia) during acute episodes.

column4: 单纤维肌电图异常，一种允许从个别肌肉纤维鉴别动作电位（APs）的技术。
column5: Abnormality in single fiber EMG recording, a technique that allows identification of action potentials (APs) from individual muscle fibers.

column4: 由针极刺激受伤的肌纤维引起的自发性放电。针极正向传播，这抑制了波形的负偏转显示。
column5: These are spontaneous firing action potentials stimulated by needle movement of an injured muscle fiber. There is propagation to, but not past, the needle tip. This inhibits the display of the negative deflection of the waveform.

column4: 先天性宫颈缺如
column5: Congenital absence of the cervix.

column4: 子宫颈在怀孕的第二个三个月期间出现无痛性扩张和缩短，导致复发性流产或分娩，这样的子宫颈被认为是功能不全。
column5: A cervix that shows a painless dilation and shortening during the second trimester of pregnancy with resultant recurrent pregnancy loss or delivery is considered incompetent

column4: 子宫阴道积水是子宫和阴道分泌物以及经血在子宫和阴道的积聚。
column5: Hydrometrocolpos is an accumulation of uterine and vaginal secretions as well as menstrual blood in the uterus and vagina.

column4: 一种先天性疾病，处女膜(围绕或部分覆盖阴道外口的膜)没有开口，完全阻塞了阴道。
column5: A congenital disorder where the hymen (a membrane that surrounds or partially covers the external vaginal opening) does not have an opening and completely obstructs the vagina.

column3: 女性生殖系统生理功能异常

column4: 在足够的性刺激和性唤醒之后，经常性地发生难以达到、延迟达到性高潮或无性高。
column5: The persistent of recurrent difficulty, delay in, or absence of attaining orgasm following sufficient sexual stimulation and arousal.

column4: 性交时反复或持续性出现外阴疼痛。
column5: Recurrent or persistent genital pain associated with sexual intercourse.

column4: 反复或持续的阴道外三分之一的肌肉组织发生不自主痉挛，妨碍了阴道插入，导致痛苦。
column5: Recurrent or persistent involuntary spasms of the musculature of the outer third of the vagina that interferes with vaginal penetration, and which causes personal distress.

column4: 女性性需求降低。
column5: Diminished sexual desire in female.

column4: 女性性需求增强
column5: Elevated sexual desire in female

column4: pinna中间的小突起。
column5: Small protrusion within the pinna.

column4: 在耳轮和耳垂之间存在裂隙。
column5: Cleft between the helix and the lobe.

column4: 在耳蜗后侧出现小的软骨隆起。
column5: Small cartilaginous prominence on the posterior concha.

column4: 可变形的软骨组织位于外耳道的前面。
column5: Variably shaped, cartilage-containing tissue anterior to the external auditory meatus.

column4: 在上升耳轮、耳蜗和耳轮脚的下部有小的缺口。
column5: Small indentation in the lower part of the ascending helix, concha, or in the crus helix.

column4: 耳轮上部呈现方形而非卷曲或者圆形，使得耳轮上部边界较正常状态水平。
column5: Flattening instead of curving or rounded superior helix, allowing the superior helix to run more horizontally than usual.

column4: 鼻软骨形态异常。
column5: A morphological anomaly of the nasal cartilage.

column4: 鼻软骨缺如。
column5: Lack of a palpable nasal cartilage.

column4: 手指沿前后轴（位于手掌平面）分叉。
column5: Divergence of digits along the A/P axis (in the plane of the palm).

column4: 一根手指（脚趾）所有的指节（趾节）及相关的掌骨（跖骨）缺失。
column5: The absence of all phalanges of a digit and the associated metacarpal /metatarsal.

column4: 与年龄相匹配的正常尺寸的对侧脚趾相比，脚趾的长度和周径都明显减少。
column5: Significant reduction in both length and girth of the toe compared to the contralateral toe, or alternatively, compared to a typical toe size for an age-matched individual.

column4: 足部不全缺失，跗骨远端骨性结构缺失，但保留部分或全部跗骨。
column5: An incomplete absence of the foot, with no bony elements distal to the tarsals, but with preservation of some or all of the tarsals.

column4: 与年龄相匹配的正常尺寸的对侧手指相比，手指的长度和周径都明显减少
column5: Significant reduction in both length and girth of the finger compared to the contralateral finger, or alternatively, compared to a typical finger size for an age-matched individual.

column3: 弥漫性肾小球基底膜分层
column4: 肾小球基底膜存在异常的额外细胞层。
column5: Presence of abnormal additional layers of the basement membrane of the glomerulus.

column4: 包含鸟粪石样(磷酸镁铵)的结石(肾结石)。
column5: Presence of struvite (magnesium ammonium phosphate) containing calculi (kidney stones).

column4: 肾脏无法浓缩或稀释尿液。
column5: Inability of the kidneys to produce either concentrated or dilute urine.

column4: 输尿管不完整性重复。
column5: Incomplete duplication of the ureter.
A solitary, benign, intramedullary cartilage tumor that is often found in the short tubular bones of the hands and feet, distal femur, and proximal humerus.
A congenital anomaly characterized by a joining (fusion) of two or more thoracic vertebral bodies with one another.
A congenital anomaly characterized by a joining (fusion) of two or more lumbar vertebral bodies with one another.
A Schmorl's node is the herniation of nucleus pulposus through the cartilaginous and bony end plate into the body of the adjacent vertebra.
Failure to complete ossification (maturation and calcification) of the pubic bone.

column4: 髋关节部分错位，由股骨头从髋臼中部分移位所致。
column5: A partial dislocation of the hip joint, whereby the head of the femur is partially displaced from the socket.

A bent (flexed) finger or toe joint that cannot be straightened actively or passively. It is thus a chronic loss of joint motion due to structural changes in muscle, tendons, ligaments, or skin that prevents normal movement of joints.

column4: 细长弯曲（S型）的腓骨。
column5: Elongated curved (S-shaped) fibulae.

column3: α-抗肌萎缩蛋白聚糖糖基化不良
column4: 肌肉组织中的α-肌营养不良蛋白聚糖的糖基化程度降低。
column5: A reduction in the degree of glycosylation of alpha-dystroglycan in muscle tissue.

column4: 侧脑室形态学的异常。
column5: A morphological anomal of the lateral ventricle.

column4: 枕角扩大畸形是一种解剖学发现，脑部表现为枕叶角与侧脑室其他部位相比不成比例地扩大。
column5: Colpocephaly is an anatomic finding in the brain manifested by occipital horns that are disproportionately enlarged in comparison with other parts of the lateral ventricles.

column4: 大脑中脓液，免疫细胞和其他物质的聚集。
column5: A collection of pus, immune cells, and other material in the brain.

column4: 一种异常现象，其有四个经典特征：白天嗜睡伴不可抗拒的睡眠攻击，猝倒（突然双侧失去肌肉紧张），睡眠幻觉和睡眠麻痹。
column5: An abnormal phenomenon characterized by a classic tetrad of excessive daytime sleepiness with irresistible sleep attacks, cataplexy (sudden bilateral loss of muscle tone), hypnagogic hallucination, and sleep paralysis.

column4: 一种步态异常，其特征在于脚后跟在步态开始时与地板接触。
column5: An abnormal gait pattern characterized by the failue of the heel to contact the floor at the onset of stance during gait.

column4: 发生在腹股沟的大量雀斑,由于黑色素的沉积表现出比正常皮肤更深的圆形小斑点。
column5: The presence in the inguinal region (groin) of an increased number of freckles, small circular spots on the skin that are darker than the surrounding skin because of deposits of melanin.

column4: 皮肤的硬化
column5: An induration (hardening) of the skin

column4: 毛囊周围纤维结缔组织过多
column5: Presence of excess fibrous connective tissue surrounding hair follicles.

column4: 从末端观察趾甲（将趾尖指向检查者），可以看见趾甲表面形成了一个高的凸起。
column5: When viewed on end (with the tip of the toe pointing toward the examiner's eye) the curve of the toenail forms a tighter curve of convexity.

column4: 表现为头发无序的站立在头皮上，且不能被梳平。
column5: Hair that is disorderly, stands out from the scalp, and cannot be combed flat.

column4: 存在针对自身组织和细胞的抗体。
column5: The presence of an antibody directed against the organism's own cells or tissues.

column4: 红细胞形态的不可逆变形，使得细胞伸长和弯曲成类似于镰刀的刀片（传统上用于收获谷物的手持农业工具）。
column5: An irreversible distortion of the morphology of an erythrocyte such that the cells are elongated and curved, resembling the blade of a sickle (the hand-held agricultural tool traditionally used to harvest grains).
An abnormal reduction in mitochondrial DNA content of cells.

column4: 源自神经组织的肿瘤（不需要位于神经系统中的肿瘤）。
column5: A neoplasm derived from nervous tissue (not necessarity a neoplasm located in the nervous system).

column4: 在神经外胚层中产生的肿瘤，早期胚胎的外胚层的一部分发育出了中枢和周围神经系统，包括一些神经胶质细胞。
column5: A neoplasm arising in the neuroectoderm, the portion of the ectoderm of the early embryo that gives rise to the central and peripheral nervous systems, including some glial cells.

column4: 良性垂体区域肿瘤，起源于Rathke袋。颅咽管瘤是位于中枢神经系统的鞍区和鞍区内的良性缓慢生长的肿瘤。
column5: A benign pituitary-region neoplasm that originates from Rathke's pouch. Craniopharyngiomas are benign slow growing tumours that are located within the sellar and para sellar region of the central nervous system.

column4: 由神经上皮组成的肿瘤，不一定是位于神经上皮或神经上皮中的肿瘤。
column5: A neoplasm composed of neural epithelium, not necessarily a neoplasm located in the neural epithelium or neuroepithelium.

column4: 由神经元组成的良性脑肿瘤，其最常见于透明隔膜和侧脑室壁。
column5: A benign brain tumor composed of neural elements which most often arise from the septum pellucidum and the walls of the lateral ventricles.

column4: 源自原始神经嵴的细胞的肿瘤。这组肿瘤以存在神经元和/或胶质细胞分化元素的原始细胞为特征。
column5: A tumor that originates in cells from the primitive neural crest. This group of tumors is characteirzed by the presence of primitive cells with elements of neuronal and/or glial differentiation.

column4: 一种高度恶性的婴幼儿胚胎性肿瘤，其特征是以独特的多层花环状的神经外胚层成分。外膜细胞瘤是在幕上的大病变，通常与脑室有着物理连接。
column5: A highly malignant embryonal tumor of infancy and young childhood characterized by neuroectodermal elements organized in distinctive multilayered rosettes. Ependymoblastomas are large lesions that occur in the supratentorial compartment, typically displaying a physical connection to the ventricular system.

column3: 外周原始神经外胚层肿瘤
column4: 在软组织和骨骼中发生的原始神经外胚层肿瘤。
column5: A primitive neuroectodermal neoplasm that occurs extracranially in soft tissue and bone.

column4: 恶性嗅神经母细胞瘤，起源于上鼻腔和筛板的嗅觉上皮。
column5: A malignant olfactory neuroblastoma arising from the olfactory epithelium of the superior nasal cavity and cribriform plate.

column3: 原发性中枢神经系统淋巴瘤
column4: 一种淋巴结外，高级别非霍奇金B细胞肿瘤，通常是大细胞或免疫母细胞型，起源于脑，肉芽肿，脊髓或眼睛，通常局限于中枢神经系统。
column5: A form of extranodal, high-grade non-Hodgkin B-cell neoplasm, usually large cell or immunoblastic type that originates in the brain, leptomeninges, spinal cord, or eyes and typically remains confined to the CNS.

column3: 中枢性原始神经外胚层肿瘤
column4: 发生在中枢神经系统中的原始神经外胚层肿瘤。
column5: A primitive neuroectodermal neoplasm that occurs in the central nervous system.

column4: 源自胚胎髓管细胞的原始神经外胚层肿瘤。
column5: A primitive neuroectodermal tumor that originates from the cells of the embryonic medullary canal.
A tumor that originates in the paranasal sinus.

column4: 通常是良性肿瘤，起源于cartodi体、颈静脉球、鼓室、主动脉体或女性生殖道的化学感受器官组织。
column5: A usually benign neoplasm originating in the chemoreceptor tissue of the cartodi body, glomus jugulare, glomus tympanicum, aortic bodies, or the female genital tract.

column4: 在乳腺管里存在异常细胞，即非侵袭性乳腺癌。导管原位癌被认为是侵袭性乳腺癌的前驱性损伤。
column5: Presence of abnormal cells inside a milk duct, that is, non-invasive breast cancer. Ductal carcinoma in situ is considered to be a precursor lesion to invasive breast cancer.

column4: 起源于支气管的肿瘤。
column5: A tumor originating in a bronchus.

column4: 宫颈的肿瘤。
column5: A tumor of the uterine cervix.

column4: 一种未分化恶性淋巴瘤，通常表现为颌骨中的大溶骨性病变或腹部肿块。
column5: A form of undifferentiated malignant lymphoma commonly manifested as a large osteolytic lesion in the jaw or as an abdominal mass.

column3: 脑室周围白质点状T2高信号灶
column4: 在脑室周围脑白质的磁共振成像时观察到高T2信号的多点状区域。
column5: Multiple pointlike areas of high T2 signal observed upon magnetic resonance imaging of the periventricular cerebral white matter.

column4: 消耗流体过多，或消耗流体不足，或任何其他异常流体消耗模式的流体消耗异常。
column5: Abnormal consumption of fluids with excessive or insufficient consumption of fluid or any other abnormal pattern of fluid consumption.

column4: 吃盐（氯化钠）或咸食的欲望过高。
column5: An excessive desire to eat salt (sodium chloride) or salty foods.

column4: 在手掌（手指）或足部（脚趾）的平面，手指(脚趾)于指（趾）间关节弯曲成角。
column5: An angulation of a digit at an interphalangeal joint in the plane of the palm (finger) or sole (toe).

column4: 脑脊液乳酸水平异常。
column5: Abnormal concentration of lactate in the cerebrospinal fluid.

column4: 脑脊液乳酸水平减少。
column5: Decreased concentration of lactate in the cerebrospinal fluid.

column4: 血清睾酮水平异常。
column5: An anomalous concentration of testosterone in the blood.
An elevated circulating testosterone level in the blood.

column4: 肌纤维内部或表面的蛋白表达量异常，这种特征可能会在肌肉活检组织的免疫组化检查中出现。
column5: An anomalous amount of protein present in or on the surface of muscle fibers. This feature may be appreciate upon immunohistochemical investigation of muscle biopsy tissue.

column3: 肌纤维层粘连蛋白α2表达异常
column4: 肌纤维中的分层蛋白表达量异常。分层蛋白是一种基础的膜结合蛋白，主要分布于胎盘中、横纹肌和末梢神经中。
column5: An anomalous amount of merosin in muscle fibers. Merosin is a basement membrane-associated protein found in placenta, striated muscle, and peripheral nerve.

column3: 肌纤维层粘连蛋白α2缺失
column4: 肌肉活检组织中分层蛋白缺失。
column5: Lack of merosin protein in the muscle biopsy.

column3: 肌纤维层粘连蛋白α2减少
column4: 肌纤维中分层蛋白表达量减少。这种特征经常出现于肌肉活检组织的免疫组化检查中。
column5: A reduced amount of merosin in muscle fibers. This feature is usually assessed by immunohistochemical examination of muscle biopsy tissue.

column3: 肌纤维层粘连蛋白β1异常
column4: 肌纤维组织中层粘连蛋白β1表达量偏差。层粘连蛋白2是一种骨骼肌细胞基膜中主要的组成成分。它是一个异三聚体，由分层蛋白（层粘连蛋白α2链），β1和γ1组成。
column5: A deviation from normal of the amount of laminin beta 1 in muscle fiber tissue. Laminin 2 is a major component of the basal lamina of skeletal muscle cells. It is a heterotrimer composed of 3 chains: merosin (laminin alpha 2 chain), beta 1, and gamma 1.

column3: 肌纤维层粘连蛋白β1减少
column4: 肌纤维组织中层粘连蛋白β1表达量减少。层粘连蛋白2是一种骨骼肌细胞基膜中主要的组成成分。它是一个异三聚体，由分层蛋白（层粘连蛋白α2链），β1和γ1组成。
column5: A reduced amount of laminin beta 1 in muscle fiber tissue. Laminin 2 is a major component of the basal lamina of skeletal muscle cells. It is a heterotrimer composed of 3 chains: merosin (laminin alpha 2 chain), beta 1, and gamma 1.

column4: 肌肉组织中胶原蛋白VI型表达量降低。胶原蛋白VI型与骨骼肌细胞外基质有重要关联。
column5: A decreased amount of collagen VI in muscle tissue. Collagen VI is a primarily associated with the extracellular matrix of skeletal muscle.

column3: 肌肉纤维抗肌萎缩蛋白表达异常
column4: 肌纤维组织中肌营养不良蛋白表达量与正常值的偏差。肌营养不良蛋白位于连接细胞骨架到基底层的跨膜蛋白复合物中的肌纤维膜中。
column5: A deviation from normal in the amount of dystrophin in muscle fiber tissue. Dystrophin is located at the muscle sarcolemma in a membrane-spanning protein complex that connects the cytoskeleton to the basal lamina.

column3: 抗肌萎缩蛋白表达缺失
column4: 肌肉组织中肌营养不良蛋白表达减少。免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中肌营养不良蛋白缺乏。
column5: Lack of dystrophin in muscle tissue. Immunohistochemistry reveals absent dystrophin protein in the muscle biopsy.

column3: 抗肌萎缩蛋白表达减少
column4: 肌纤维组织中肌营养不良蛋白表达减少。
column5: A decreased amount of dystrophin in muscle fiber tissue.

column3: 肌纤维α-肌营养不良蛋白聚糖减少
column4: 免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中α-肌营养不良蛋白减少。α-肌营养不良蛋白是一个重要的外周膜组成成分，由肌营养不良蛋白-糖蛋白的复合体组成，它与β-肌营养不良聚糖来自相同基因，在细胞内与肌营养不良蛋白结合成跨膜蛋白。除了层粘连蛋白α2、基底膜聚糖和细胞外基质中的聚集蛋白。
column5: Immunohistochemistry reveals reduced alpha dystroglycan protein in the muscle biopsy. Alpha-dystroglycan is a heavily glycosylated peripheral-membrane component of the dystrophin-associated glycoprotein complex (DAPC), which, in addition to laminin alpha2, binds perlecan and agrin in the extracellular matrix, whereas beta-dystroglycan, derived from the same gene, is a transmembrane protein that links to dystrophin intracellularly.

column4: 肌肉中α肌糖聚糖表达量与正常值有偏差。 α，β，γ和δ聚糖都是肌营养不良蛋白复合物的组分成分。N-糖基化跨膜蛋白包含一个短的细胞内结构域、一个单个跨膜区和一个大的细胞外结构域含有保守半胱氨酸簇。
column5: Deviation from normal in the amount of alpha sarcoglycan in muscle. The alpha, beta, gamma, and delta sarcoglycans are components of the dystrophin-complex. They are all N-glycosylated transmembrane proteins with a short intra-cellular domain, a single transmembrane region and a large extra-cellular domain containing a cluster of conserved cysteines.

column4: 肌肉中α-肌聚糖缺失。免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中α-肌聚糖蛋白缺乏。
column5: Lack of alpha sarcoglycan in muscle. Immunohistochemistry reveals absent alpha sarcoglycan protein in the muscle biopsy.

column4: 肌肉中α-肌聚糖表达量减少。免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中α-肌聚糖蛋白减少。
column5: A decreased amount of alpha sarcoglycan in muscle. Immunohistochemistry reveals reduced alpha sarcoglycan protein in the muscle biopsy.

column4: 肌肉中β-肌聚糖表达量异于常值。α，β，γ和δ肌聚糖都是肌营养不良蛋白复合物的组分成分。N-糖基化跨膜蛋白包含一个短的细胞内结构域、一个单个跨膜区和一个大的细胞外结构域含有保守半胱氨酸簇。
column5: Deviation from normal in the amount of beta sarcoglycan in muscle. The alpha, beta, gamma, and delta sarcoglycans are components of the dystrophin-complex. They are all N-glycosylated transmembrane proteins with a short intra-cellular domain, a single transmembrane region and a large extra-cellular domain containing a cluster of conserved cysteines.

column4: 肌肉中γ肌糖聚糖表达量异于常值。 α，β，γ和δ肌聚糖都是肌营养不良蛋白复合物的组分成分。N-糖基化跨膜蛋白包含一个短的细胞内结构域、一个单个跨膜区和一个大的细胞外结构域含有保守半胱氨酸簇。
column5: Deviation from normal in the amount of gamma sarcoglycan in muscle. The alpha, beta, gamma, and delta sarcoglycans are components of the dystrophin-complex. They are all N-glycosylated transmembrane proteins with a short intra-cellular domain, a single transmembrane region and a large extra-cellular domain containing a cluster of conserved cysteines.

column4: 肌肉中δ肌糖聚糖表达量异于常值。 α，β，γ和δ肌聚糖都是肌营养不良蛋白复合物的组分成分。N-糖基化跨膜蛋白包含一个短的细胞内结构域、一个单个跨膜区和一个大的细胞外结构域含有保守半胱氨酸簇。
column5: Deviation from normal in the amount of delta sarcoglycan in muscle. The alpha, beta, gamma, and delta sarcoglycans are components of the dystrophin-complex. They are all N-glycosylated transmembrane proteins with a short intra-cellular domain, a single transmembrane region and a large extra-cellular domain containing a cluster of conserved cysteines.

column4: 免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中β-肌聚糖蛋白完全缺乏。
column5: Immunohistochemistry shows complete lack of beta sarcoglycan protein in the muscle biopsy.

column4: 免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中β-肌聚糖蛋白减少。
column5: Immunohistochemistry reveals reduced beta sarcoglycan protein in the muscle biopsy.

column4: 免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中γ-肌聚糖蛋白减少。
column5: Immunohistochemistry reveals reduced gamma sarcoglyan protein in the muscle biopsy.

column4: 免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中γ-肌聚糖蛋白完全缺乏。
column5: Immunohistochemistry shows complete lack of gamma sarcoglycan protein in the muscle biopsy.

column4: 免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中δ-肌聚糖蛋白完全缺乏。
column5: Immunohistochemistry shows complete lack of delta sarcoglycan protein in the muscle biopsy.

column3: 肌纤维α-肌营养不良蛋白聚糖异常
column4: 肌肉组织中α-肌营养不良聚糖的表达异于常值。α-肌营养不良蛋白是一个重要的外周膜组成成分，由肌营养不良蛋白-糖蛋白的复合体组成，它与β-肌营养不良聚糖来自相同基因，在细胞内与肌营养不良蛋白结合成跨膜蛋白。除了层粘连蛋白α2、基底膜聚糖和细胞外基质中的聚集蛋白。
column5: A deviation from normal of muscle alpha-dystroglcan expression. Alpha-dystroglycan is a heavily glycosylated peripheral-membrane component of the dystrophin-associated glycoprotein complex (DAPC), which, in addition to laminin alpha2, binds perlecan and agrin in the extracellular matrix, whereas beta-dystroglycan, derived from the same gene, is a transmembrane protein that links to dystrophin intracellularly.

column3: 肌肉纤维 dysferlin 异常
column4: 肌肉组织中dysferlin表达量异于常值。Dysferlin是一个普遍存在的230-KDa的转运蛋白，涉及肌膜间钙传递。
column5: A deviation from normal in the expression of dysferlin in muscle tissue. Dysferlin is an ubiquitous 230-KDa transmembrane protein involved in calcium-mediated sarcolemma resealing.

column3: 肌肉纤维 dysferlin 缺失
column4: 免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中dysferlin蛋白完全缺失。
column5: Immunohistochemistry shows complete lack of dysferlin protein in the muscle biopsy.

column3: 肌肉纤维 dysferlin 减少
column4: 免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中dysferlin蛋白减少。
column5: Immunohistochemistry reveals reduced dysferlin protein in the muscle biopsy.

column4: 肌肉组织中emerin蛋白表达量异于常值。
column5: A deviation from normal of the amount of the inner nuclear membrane protein emerin in muscle tissue.

column4: 免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中emerin蛋白完全缺失。
column5: Immunohistochemistry shows complete lack of emerin protein in the muscle biopsy.

column4: 免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中emerin蛋白减少。
column5: Immunohistochemistry reveals reduced emerin protein in the muscle biopsy.

column3: 肌肉纤维钙蛋白酶-3异常
column4: 肌肉组织中钙蛋白酶-3表达量异常。钙蛋白酶是由钙离子调节的细胞内非溶酶体半胱氨酸蛋白酶。 典型的钙蛋白酶是由两个不同亚基组成的异源二聚体，一个大的（超过80kDa）和另一个小的（30kDa）。 虽然只有一个编码小亚基的基因已经被证实，但是大亚基有许多基因。 钙蛋白酶-3类似于普遍存在的钙蛋白酶1和2（m-钙蛋白酶和微钙蛋白酶），但包含特定的插入序列（NS，IS1和IS2）。 钙蛋白酶切割靶蛋白以修饰其性质，而不是分解底物。
column5: A deviation from normal in the amount of calpain-3 in muscle tissue. Calpains are intracellular nonlysosomal cysteine proteases modulated by calcium ions. A typical calpain is a heterodimer composed of two distinct subunits, one large (over 80 kDa) and the other small (30 kDa). While only one gene encoding the small subunit has been demonstrated, there are many genes for the large one. CAPN3 is similar to ubiquitous Calpain 1 and 2 (m-calpain and micro-calpain), but contains specific insertion sequences (NS, IS1 and IS2). Calpains cleave target proteins to modify their properties, rather than breaking down the substrates.

column3: 肌肉纤维钙蛋白酶-3缺失
column4: 肌肉活检组织的蛋白质印迹显示钙蛋白酶-3缺失。
column5: Western blot shows complete lack of calpain-3 protein in the muscle biopsy tissue.

column3: 肌肉纤维钙蛋白酶-3减少
column4: 肌肉活检组织的蛋白质印迹显示钙蛋白酶-3减少。
column5: Western blot reveals reduced calpain-3 protein in the muscle biopsy tissue.

column4: 免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中串珠蛋白聚糖减少。基底膜聚糖是基底膜特异性硫酸乙酰肝素蛋白聚糖的核心蛋白（HSPG），也称为硫酸乙酰肝素蛋白聚糖2（HSPG2）。
column5: Immunohistochemistry reveals reduced perlecan protein in the muscle biopsy. Perlecan is a basement membrane-specific heparan sulfate proteoglycan core protein (HSPG) also known as heparan sulfate proteoglycan 2 (HSPG2).

column3: 肌肉纤维核纤层蛋白 A/C 异常
column4: 肌肉组织中核纤层蛋白 A/C表达量异常。LMNA基因调控产生至少3个剪接连接酶，包括2个主要的核纤层蛋白A和C。它们是纤维性核层的重要组成成分且具有不同的功能，从机械核膜修护到基因调控。
column5: A deviation from the normal amount of lamin A/C in muscle tissue. The LMNA gene gives rise to at least three splicing isoforms including the two main isoforms, lamin A and lamin C. These are constitutive components of the fibrous nuclear lamina and have different roles, ranging from mechanical nuclear membrane maintenance to gene regulation.

column3: 肌肉纤维核纤层蛋白 A/C 减少
column4: 肌肉组织中核纤层蛋白 A/C表达量减少。肌肉组织的蛋白质印迹法免疫组化检查中可显示这种特征。
column5: A decreased amount of lamin A/C in muscle tissue. This feature can be shown by immunohistochemistry of Western blotting of muscle tissue.

column2: Sacralization of the fifth lumbar vertebra
column4: 一种先天性异常，最后一个腰椎单侧或双侧的横突与骶椎或髂骨或两者融合。
column5: A congenital anomaly, in which the transverse process of the last lumbar vertebra (L5) fuses to the sacrum on one side or both, or to ilium, or both.

column4: 子宫内层粘膜异常。
column5: An anomaly of the inner mucous membrane of the uterus.

column4: 子宫内膜组织在子宫之外的其他部位生长。
column5: The growth of endometrial tissue outside the uterus.

column3: 瑞斯托辅因子测定活性降低
column4: 对瑞斯托菌素的异常反应，表现为向血小板缺乏的血浆中瑞斯托辅因子后，血小板聚集降低或缺乏。
column5: Abnormal response to ristocetin as manifested by reduced or lacking aggregation of platelets upon addition of ristocetin to platelet-poor plasma.

column2: Impaired von Willibrand factor collagen binding activity
column3: 血管性血友病因子胶原结合活性降低
column4: von Willibrand因子（vWF）结合胶原蛋白的能力降低。 对胶原蛋白的异常反应表现为血浆von WIlelerand因子结合胶原蛋白的能力降低或缺乏。 通常使用基于ELISA的测定法; 该测试对von Willebrand因子高分子量多聚体的损失敏感。
column5: Reduced ability of von Willibrand factor (vWF) to bind collagen. Abnormal response to collagen as manifested by reduced or lacking ability of plasma von WIllebrand Factor to bind collagen. An ELISA-based assay is typically used; the test is sensitive to loss of von Willebrand Factor high molecular weight multimers.

column2: Abnormal von Willebrand Factor multimer distribution
column3: 血管性血友病因子多聚体分布异常
column4: 偏离正常von Willebrand因子多聚体模式。
column5: Deviation from the normal von Willebrand Factor multimer pattern.

column2: Absence of large von Willibrand factor multimers
column3: 大型血管性血友病因子多聚体缺失
column4: 凝胶电泳上缺少大型von Willebrand因子多聚体
column5: Absence of large von Willebrand Factor multimers on gel electrophoresis.

column2: Abnormal presence of ultra-large von Willebrand Factor multimers
column3: 超大型血管性血友病因子多聚体异常存在
column4: 检测到异常的超大型von Willebrand因子多聚体。
column5: Detection of abnormal ultra-large von Willebrand factor multimers.

column2: Total absence von Willebrand Factor multimers
column3: 血管性血友病因子多聚体完全缺失
column4: 所有血管性血友病因子多聚体完全缺失
column5: Complete bsence of all von Willebrand factor multimers.

column2: Absence of intermediate von Willibrand factor multimers
column3: 中型血管性血友病因子多聚体缺失
column4: 凝胶电泳上缺乏中间体von Willebrand因子多聚体
column5: Lack of intermediate von Willebrand Factor multimers on gel electrophoresis.

column3: 瑞斯托辅因子测定活性增加
column4: 瑞斯托菌素的反应异常，表现为向血小板丰富的血浆中加入瑞斯托菌素，血小板聚集增加。
column5: Abnormal response to ristocetin as manifested by increased aggregation of platelets upon addition of low-dose ristocetin to platelet-rich plasma.

column3: 包皮环切术后出血时间延长
column4: 包皮环切术后出血时间比平时延长
column5: Bleeding that persists for a longer than usual time following circumcision.

column4: 皮肤表面浅层受伤后出血程度异常增加
column5: An abnormally increased degree of bleeding following a superfical injury to the surface of the skin.

column4: 取血操作后出血量异常高
column5: An abnormal high amount of bleeding following the procedure of taking a blood sample.

column4: 口腔反复过量出血
column5: Recurrent or excessive bleeding from the mouth.

column4: 头（颈）后发际线形状或位置的异常，发际线即头颈后有发和无发区域之间的分界线。
column5: An anomaly in the placement or shape of the hairline (trichion) on the back of the head (neck), that is, the border between skin on the back of the head that has head hair and that does not.

column4: 肠鸣音的数量和性质的异常。肠鸣音（肠鸣音）因肠道蠕动使内容物通过而产生。
column5: An anomaly of the amount or nature of abdominal sounds. Abdominal sounds (bowel sounds) are made by the movement of the intestines as they promote passage of abdominal contents by peristalsis.

column4: 肠鸣音数量增加。
column5: An increased amount of bowel sounds.
An decreased amount of bowel sounds.

column4: 听诊评估腹部发现肠鸣音完全消失。
column5: Complete lack of abdominal sounds as assayed by examination of the abdomen with a stethoscope.

column4: 躯干在前-后平面以3-4 Hz的频率震颤。
column5: Tremor of the trunk in an anterior-posterior plane at 3-4 Hz.

column4: 在心跳期间听到的额外或不寻常的声音，由血液通过心脏流动的振动引起。
column5: An extra or unusual sound heard during a heartbeat caused vibrations resulting from the flow of blood through the heart.

column4: 在血管内体足够的情况下，严重降低心输出量，伴器官内灌注不足（如组织缺氧）的现象。
column5: Severely decreased cardiac output with evidence of inadequate end-organ perfusion (i.e., tissue hypoxia) in the presence of adequate intravascular volume.

column4: 组织、渗出物或血液中浆细胞数目异常增加
column5: An abnormally increased number of plasma cells in tissues, exudates, or blood

column4: 胆管系统的炎症，累及肝内或肝外部分，或两者均受累。
column5: Inflammation of the biliary ductal system, affecting the intrahepatic or extrahepatic portions, or both.

column4: 胆管癌是起源于肝外或肝内胆管的胆管上皮（即胆管细胞）的原发癌。通常生长缓慢，延胆管纵向扩展，伴有神经、神经周围及上皮下扩散。
column5: Cholangiocarcinoma is a primary cancer originating in the biliary epithelium i.e., the cholangiocytes, of the extrahepatic and intrahepatic biliary ducts. It is extremely invasive, develops rapidly, often metastasizes, and has a very poor prognosis. They are slow growing tumors which spread longitudinally along the bile ducts with neural, perineural and subepithelial extension.

column4: 胆囊壁破裂。
column5: Rupture of the wall of the gallbladder.

column4: 位于阴囊的身体不适（例如刺痛、悸动或疼痛）的令人不愉快的感觉。
column5: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the scrotum.
The presence of free monoclonal immunoglobulin light chains in the urine.

column4: 一种以身体不适（如针刺样、搏动感或疼痛）和感觉源自侧腹为主要特征的不适感。
column5: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) and perceived to originate in the flank.

column4: 子宫颈内膜和中央(子宫)柱状上皮通过子宫颈外口翻转突入阴道中。
column5: Eversion of the endocervix with protrusion of the central (endocervical) columnar epithelium through the external os of the cervix into the vaginal milieu.

column4: 从子宫颈内膜的粘膜凸出来的异常生长的组织。
column5: Abnormal growth of tissue projecting from a mucous membrane of the endocervix.

column4: 子宫颈炎症。
column5: Inflammation of the uterine cervix.

column4: 阴道的瘙痒感
column5: A sensation of itching in the vagina.

column4: 肾小球的大小异常增大。
column5: Abnormally large size of glomeruli.

column4: 血管生理功能异常。
column5: Abnormality of vascular function.

column4: 通过咀嚼或以其他方式移动颌骨引起的下颚或耳朵疼痛。
column5: Pain in the jaw or ear induced by chewing or otherwise moving the jaw.

column4: 视网膜动脉数量、曲折增多。
column5: The presence of an increased number of twists and turns of the retinal artery.

column4: 睡眠期间出汗过度。
column5: Occurence of excessive sweating during sleep.

column4: 血清中存在抗线粒体的自身抗体（免疫球蛋白）
column5: The presence of autoantibodies (immunoglobulins) in the serum that react against mitochondria.

column4: 腹部皮肤下方静脉直径增加。
column5: Increase in diameter of the veins located underneath the skin of the abdomen.

column4: 胃部粘膜下静脉的极度扩张。
column5: Extreme dilation of the submucusoal veins in the stomach.

column4: 供应胆囊及胆囊管血供的动脉存在假性动脉瘤。假性动脉瘤是在血液自动脉壁破口溢出但被外膜或血管周围软组织所局限时形成。
column5: Presence of a pseudoaneurysm in the artery that supplies the gallbladder and cystic duct with blood. A pseudoaneurysm, also known as a false aneurysm, forms when blood leaks through a breach of the arterial wall but is contained by the adventitia or surrounding perivascular soft tissue.

column4: 肾脏周围凝结的血液。
column5: A collection of clotted blood surrounding the kidney.

column4: 先天性神经髓鞘缺失。
column5: Congenital absence of the myelin sheath on a nerve.

column4: 周围神经髓鞘数量增加。
column5: Increased amount of peripheral myelination.

column3: 周围神经髓鞘厚度增加
column4: 以规则和同心的方式提升周围神经髓鞘的厚度。
column5: Elevated thickness of the myelin sheath of peripheral nerves, in a regular and concentric fashion.

column4: 存在髓鞘的多种香肠形状的肿胀（拉丁语tomaculum是指香肠）。
column5: The presence of multiple sausage-shaped swellings of the myelin sheath (The Latin tomaculum means sausage).

column3: 不对称性周围神经脱髓鞘
column4: 外周神经失去髓鞘，且左右不对称。
column5: Loss of myelin from peripheral nerves in a pattern that differs between right and left.

column2: Abnormality of peripheral nervous system electrophysiology
column3: 周围神经系统电生理异常
column4: 周围神经细胞与其相互连通或与肌肉连通的电信号的功能异常。
column5: An abnormality of the function of the electrical signals with which peripheral nerve cells communicate with each other or with muscles.

column2: Abnormality of central nervous system electrophysiology
column3: 中枢神经系统电生理异常
周围神经动作电位波幅异常
column4: 沿着周围神经的动作电位的大小的异常，即神经的电膜电位的急剧上升和下降。
column5: An anomaly in the magnitude of the action potential along a peripheral nerve, that is, of the rapid rise and fall of the electrical membrane potential of the nerve.

column4: 由沿着胫骨内侧抚摸而引起的大脚趾的背屈，有时伴随着其他脚趾的颤动（正常的反应将不会是大脚趾的运动）。
column5: Dorsiflexion of the big toe, sometimes accompanied by fanning of the other toes, elicited by stroking along the medial side of the tibia (the normal response would be no movement of the big toe).
Dorsal extension of the big toe, sometimes accompanied by fanning of the other toes, elicited by compressing the calf muscles (a normal response is no movement of the big toe).

column4: 四肢丧失力量。四肢瘫痪指完全丧失力量，而四肢轻瘫指的是不完全的力量丧失。
column5: Loss of strength in all four limbs. Tetraplegia refers to a complete loss of strength, whereas Tetraparesis refers to an incomplete loss of strength.

column3: 受损的视觉增强的前庭眼反射
column4: 运动过程中视网膜图像的稳定依靠前庭眼反射。视觉VOR或视觉增强VOR是视觉和前庭相互作用的主要组成部分，通过与头部运动相反的代偿性的眼运动来维持眼部的稳定性。疾病特点为该反射受损，表现为三种代偿性的眼运动反射受损，分别是前庭-眼反射（VOR），平稳追踪（SP)和视动反射（OKR）。
column5: The vestibulo-ocular reflex is responsible for the stabilization of the retinal image during movement. The visual vestibular ocular reflex (VVOR) or visual enhanced VOR, maintains ocular stability during head motion by generating compensatory eye movement opposite to head movement, and is a major component of visual vestibularninteraction. This feature is an impairment of this reflex, manifested as the combined impairment of the three compensatory eye movement reflexes, namely the vestibulo-ocular reflex (VOR), smooth pursuit (SP) and optokinetic reflex (OKR).

column4: 对于刚性静止物体（如拳头），肌肉收缩时发生等轴震颤。
column5: An isometric tremor occurs with muscle contraction against a rigid stationary object (e.g., when making a fist).

column4: 在任何随意运动中发生的震颤。它可以包括视觉或非视觉指导的运动。随意运动期间的震颤称为意图震颤。
column5: Tremor that occurs during any voluntary movement. It may include visually or non-visually guided movements. Tremor during target directed movement is called intention tremor.

column4: 头或身体点头样动作。
column5: Nodding movement of the head or body.

column3: 按解剖部位分类的震颤
column4: 按解剖部位分类的震颤。
column5: Tremor classified by the affected body part.

column4: 口腔肌肉的肌张力减小。 在婴儿期，该特征可能与母乳喂养困难相关，并且可能影响闩锁、颌运动、舌放置、闭唇、吸吮/吞咽/呼吸模式和总体喂养行为。
column5: Reduced muscle tone of oral musculature. In infants, this feature may be associated with difficulties in breast feeding, and may affetc the latch, jaw motions, tongue placement, lip seal, suck/swallow/breathe pattern and overall feeding behavior.

column2: Abnormal peripheral nervous system synaptic transmission
column3: 周围神经系统突触传递异常
column4: 在神经元到外周神经系统突触间的通讯异常。
column5: An anomaly in the communication from a neuron to a target across a synapse in the peripheral nervous system.

column3: 口咽部肌肉疲劳性无力
column4: 一种肌群活动之后发生的延髓肌无力（负责言语和吞咽的口腔和喉部肌肉），休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
column5: A type of weakness of the bulbar muscles (muscles of the mouth and throat responsible for speech and swallowing) that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.

column4: 一种发生在肌群运动后影响咀嚼的肌无力，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
column5: A type of weakness of the muscles involved in chewing that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.

column4: 一种发生在肌群运动后影响发音的肌无力，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
column5: A type of weakness of the muscles involved in speech that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.

column4: 一种发生在肌群运动后影响吞咽的肌无力，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
column5: A type of weakness of the muscles involved in swallowing that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.

column4: 一种发生在肌群运动后影响呼吸的肌无力，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
column5: A type of weakness of the muscles involved in breathing (respiration) that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.

column4: 一种发生在肌群运动后的骨骼肌无力，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
column5: A type of weakness of skeletal muscle that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.

column2: Fatigable weakness of distal limb muscles
column3: 远端肢体肌肉疲劳性无力
column4: 一种发生在肌群运动后的远端肢体骨骼肌无力，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
column5: A type of weakness of a skeletal muscle of distal part of a limb that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.

column4: 一种通常发生在肌群运动后的颈部骨骼肌无力，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
column5: A type of weakness of a skeletal muscle in the neck that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.

column2: Fatiguable weakness of proximal limb muscles
column3: 近端肢体肌肉疲劳性无力
column4: 一种通常发生在肌群运动后的近端肢体骨骼肌无力，休息后可以减轻。即肌肉重复运动后力量下降。
column5: A type of weakness of a skeletal muscle of proximal part of a limb that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.

column2: Response to drugs acting on neuromuscular transmission
column3: 对作用于神经肌肉传递过程的药物的反应
column4: 特定药物选择性地干扰神经肌肉传播（神经递质的合成，储存，释放，作用和失活）中涉及的不同细胞机制。因此，患者对特定药物反应的信息可用于鉴别诊断。
column5: Specific drugs interfere selectively with the different cellular mechanisms involved in neuromuscular transmission (synthesis, storage, release, action and inactivation of transmitter). The response of a patient to a specific drug can therefore be useful information for the differential diagnosis.

column2: Favorable response of weakness to acetylcholine esterase inhibitors
column3: 肌无力对乙酰胆碱酯酶抑制剂的反应好
column4: 乙酰胆碱酯酶抑制剂的使用能提升肌肉力量。
column5: Improvement of muscle strength in response to administration of an acetylcholine esterase inhibitor.

column2: Unfavorable response of muscle weakness to acetylcholine esterase inhibitors
column3: 肌无力对乙酰胆碱酯酶抑制剂的反应不佳
column4: 使用乙酰胆碱酯酶抑制剂无法有效提升肌肉力量。
column5: Lack of improvement of muscle strength in response to administration of an acetylcholine esterase inhibitor.

column2: Increased jitter at single fibre EMG
column3: 单纤维肌电图时抖动增加
column4: 同一运动单位的两个动作电位之间的时间间隔变化被称为抖动。因此，该术语适用于通过肌电图（EMG）测量的相同运动单位的连续动作电位之间的时间间隔的变异增加时。
column5: The variation in the time interval between the two action potentials of the same motor unit is called jitter. This term therefore applies to increased variability in the interval between successive action potentials of the same motor unit, which is measured by electromyography (EMG).

column2: EMG: incremental response of compound muscle action potential to repetitive nerve stimulation
column3: 肌电图: 复合肌肉动作电位对于重复神经刺激的反应递增
column4: 复合肌肉动作电位（CMAP）是肌电图（EMG）的一种。 CMAP是指一组来自同一区域的几种肌肉纤维，由运动神经刺激诱发的几乎同时发生的动作电位，并且记录为一个多重加和的总动作电位。这种异常是指在研究过程中振幅的异常增加。
column5: A compound muscle action potential (CMAP) is a type of electromyography (EMG). CMAP refers to a group of almost simultaneous action potentials from several muscle fibers in the same area evoked by stimulation of the supplying motor nerve and are recorded as one multipeaked summated action potential. This abnormality refers to an abnormal increase in the amplitude during the course of the investigation.

column4: 呼吸运动时胸壁在正常的吸气和呼气运动中反向移动。该现象可在任何原因导致的呼吸困难的儿童中出现，从而导致在启发过程中排空肋间。慢性气道阻塞的患者由于受压和扁平隔膜的扭曲作用，在吸气期间也显示出下肋骨的牵引力。粉碎胸部受伤，肋骨骨折和胸骨骨折，可导致严重程度的反常呼吸运动。
column5: Breathing movements in which the chest wall moves in on inspiration and out on expiration, in reverse of the normal movements. It may be seen in children with respiratory distress of any cause, which leads to indrawing of the intercostal spaces during inspiration. Patients with chronic airways obstruction also show indrawing of the lower ribs during inspiration, due to the distorted action of a depressed and flattened diaphragm. Crush injuries of the chest, with fractured ribs and sternum, can lead to a severe degree of paradoxical breathing.

column3: 乙酰胆碱受体抗体阳性
column4: 血清中存在对抗乙酰胆碱受体自身抗体（免疫球蛋白）
column5: The presence of autoantibodies (immunoglobulins) in the serum that react against the acetylcholine receptor.

column4: 血清中存在对抗电压门控钙通道的自身抗体（免疫球蛋白）
column5: The presence of autoantibodies (immunoglobulins) in the serum that react against voltage-gated calcium channels.

column3: 肌肉特异性激酶抗体阳性
column4: 血清中存在对抗肌肉特异性激酶的自身抗体（免疫球蛋白）
column5: The presence of autoantibodies (immunoglobulins) in the serum that react against muscle specific kinase (anti-MuSK Ab).

column4: 瞳孔对光反射的速度降低。
column5: Reduced velocity and acceleration in the pupillary light response.

column4: 过度或病态倾向地储存和收集财产。
column5: Excessive or pathological tendency to save and collect possessions.

column4: 缺乏情绪反应和对情况或个人的同情心，有时包括家庭成员。
column5: Lack of emotional reactivity and empathy for situations or persons, sometime also for family members.

column4: 病理性持续的不受约束的性行为，针对自己或其他人。
column5: Pathological persistent sexual disinhibiting behavior, directed at oneself or to others.

column4: 不受控制地哭泣，没有明显的激励刺激。
column5: Uncontrolled episodes of crying, without apparent motivating stimuli.

column4: 目标导向行为的减少，与额叶执行功能（例如规划行动）障碍有关。
column5: Reduction of goal-directed behaviors linked to the impairment in frontal executive functions (planning of an action for example).

column4: 在没有运动障碍的情况下难以正确进行四肢运动。
column5: Difficulty in performing the correct execution of limbs movements in absence of motor impairment.

column4: 是一种刻板的运动行为，其特征是对重复、过度和非目标导向的处理、对对象检查的强烈迷恋。
column5: Punding is a stereotypical motor behavior characterized by an intense fascination with repetitive, excessive and non-goal oriented handling, and examining of objects.

column4: 记忆词、面和物的意义的能力逐渐丧失。
column5: A progressive loss of the ability to remember the meaning of words, faces and objects.

column4: 社交行为异常。
column5: Behavior that is not in line with social norms.

column4: 食用甜食的欲望过于强烈。
column5: Excessive desire to eat sweet foods.

column4: 在没有感觉视觉障碍的情况下，不能通过视觉输入识别对象。
column5: Difficulty in recognizing objects by visual input in absence of sensorial visual impairment.

column4: 持续症现象可以被定义为反应或行为单位的上下文不适当和无意的重复。换句话说，观察到的行为重复性不适用于当时情况，不是思维或意识的产物。因此，持续症现象可以区别于目标导向和故意的重复，如旨在增强表达或增加诗意而产生的语言冗余。
column5: Perseveration can be defined as the contextually inappropriate and unintentional repetition of a response or behavioral unit. In other words, the observed repetitiveness does not meet the demands of the situation, is not the product of deliberation, and may even unfold despite counterintention. Perseveration can therefore be differentiated from goal-directed and intentional forms of repetition, such as linguistic redundancies designed to enhance communicative or poetic impact.

column4: 肌肉组织中结蛋白表达量异常。结蛋白是一个53-KDa的蛋白质。
column5: A deviation from normal in the expression of desmin in muscle tissue. Desmin is an 53-KDa protein.

column4: 免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中结蛋白蓄积。
column5: Immunohistochemistry shows accumulation of desmin protein in the muscle biopsy.

column3: 肌肉纤维肌收缩蛋白异常
column4: 肌肉组织中肌收缩蛋白表达量异常。肌收缩蛋白是一个57kD的细胞支架蛋白。
column5: A deviation from normal in the expression of myotilin in muscle tissue. Myotilin is a 57kD cytoskeletal protein.

column3: 肌肉纤维肌收缩蛋白蓄积
column4: 免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中肌收缩蛋白蓄积。
column5: Immunohistochemistry shows accumulation of myotilin protein in the muscle biopsy.

column3: 肌肉纤维含缬酪肽蛋白异常
column4: 肌肉组织中含缬酪肽蛋白的表达量异常。含缬酪肽蛋白是一个100-kD的多功能泛表达蛋白，也是AAA+蛋白家族的一员。
column5: A deviation from normal in the expression of valosin-containing protein in muscle tissue. Valosin-containing protein an ubiquitously expressed multifunctional 100-kD protein that is a member of the AAA+ (ATPase associated with various activities) protein family.

column2: Accumulation of muscle fiber valosin-containing protein
column3: 肌肉纤维含缬酪肽蛋白蓄积
column4: 免疫组化检查显示肌肉活检组织中含缬酪肽蛋白蓄积。
column5: Immunohistochemistry shows accumulation of valosin-containing protein in the muscle biopsy.

column2: Central core regions in muscle fibers
column4: 存在的分裂区域也称为轴空区在肌肉纤维中心。在光学显微镜下存在活检的典型外观，其中肌肉细胞具有缺乏线粒体和特异性酶的核心。轴空区通常被良好地划定并且位于中心，但偶尔也是多重的和偏中心的。
column5: The presence of disorganized areas called cores in the center of muscle fibers. There is a typical appearance of the biopsy on light microscopy, where the muscle cells have cores that are devoid of mitochondria and specific enzymes. Cores are typically well demarcated and centrally located, but may occasionally be multiple and of eccentric.

column2: Glycogen accumulation in muscle fiber lysosomes
column3: 肌肉纤维溶酶体糖原蓄积
column4: 肌肉组织中糖原含量增加，尤其是溶酶体中。
column5: An increased amount of glycogen in muscle tissue found specifically in lysosomes.

column4: 肌肉纤维的肌浆中糖原含量增加。
column5: Elevated glycogen content in the sarcoplasm (cytoplasm) of muscle fibers.

column4: 让患者做祈祷样动作时，手腕及手指伸展受限。这是手腕及手指进行性屈曲挛缩所致。
column5: Limitation of wrist and finger extension on asking patient to form a prayer sign. This is a result of progressive wrist and finger flexion contractures.

column3: 肌酸磷酸激酶明显上升
column5: An increased CPK level between 4X and 50X above the upper normal level.

column3: 肌酸磷酸激酶极度上升
column5: An increased CPK level more than 50X above the upper normal level.

column4: 基于临床观察发现的肌肉体积异常。
column5: Abnormalities of the overall muscle bulk based on clinical observation.

column4: 手部肌肉力量减弱。
column5: Reduced strength of the musculature of the hand.

column2: Hypoplasia of the upper arm musculature
column4: 上臂肌肉发育不全，包括三角肌、肱三头肌、肱二头肌、肱桡肌。
column5: Underdevelopment of the musculature of the upper arm, which may include the deltoid, the triceps, the biceps, and the brachioradialis.

column4: 三角肌发育不良
column5: Underdevelopment of the deltoid muscle.

column4: 门静脉和/或其属支的血栓形成，属支包括脾静脉和肠系膜上肠和肠系膜下静脉。
column5: Thrombosis of the portal vein and/or its tributaries, which include the splenic vein and the sup-erior and inferior mesenteric veins.

column4: 由血栓引起的肝静脉阻塞（血栓形成）
column5: An obstruction in the veins of the liver caused by a blood clot (thrombosis).
The occurence of an elevated body temperature of the mother during pregnancy.
The occurence of maternal fever during labor.
The occurence of fever in a mother during the first trimester of pregnancy.

column4: 内脏静脉血栓形成包括Budd-Chiari综合征（肝静脉血栓形成），肝外门静脉阻塞（EHPVO）和肠系膜静脉血栓形成; “内脏”一词用于指内脏器官（腹腔）。
column5: The term splanchnic vein thrombosis encompasses Budd-Chiari syndrome (hepatic vein thrombosis), extrahepatic portal vein obstruction (EHPVO), and mesenteric vein thrombosis; the word splanchnic is used to refer to the visceral organs (of the abdominal cavity).

column4: 阻塞肠系膜静脉血流的血块（肠系膜上、下静脉收集小肠和大肠排出的血液）。
column5: A clot that obstructs blood flow in a mesenteric vein (the superior and the inferior mesenteric vein drain blood from the small and large intestine).

column4: 口腔或咽部粘膜表面突然发疹（皮疹）。
column5: A sudden eruptiion (rash) of the surface of a mucous membrane of the mouth or pharynx.

column4: 在肺中存在多个肉芽肿（含有聚集的单核吞噬细胞的小结节性炎性病变）。
column5: The presence of multiple granulomata (small nodular inflammatory lesions containing grouped mononuclear phagocytes) in the lung.

column3: 记忆 B 细胞缺失
column4: 记忆B细胞完全缺失，记忆B细胞即长寿命的成熟B细胞类型，在重新遇到其抗原决定簇后，容易活化，并且已被选择用于表达较高亲和力的免疫球蛋白。
column5: Complete lack of memory B cells, that is, of mature B cell type that is long-lived, readily activated upon re-encounter of its antigenic determinant, and has been selected for expression of higher affinity immunoglobulin.

column3: 成熟 B 细胞缺失
column4: 成熟B细胞（即已经离开骨髓的B细胞）完全缺乏。
