column5: Complete lack of mature B cells, that is, of B cells that have left the bone marrow.

column4: T细胞活化后细胞分裂能力下降。
column5: A reduced ability of a T cell population to expand by cell division following T cell activation.

column4: 指（趾）甲下的小面积出血。
column5: Small areas of bleeding (hemorrhage) under the fingernail or toenail.

column4: 大肠存在多发息肉。
column5: The presence of multiple polyps in the large intestine.

column4: 小肠存在多发息肉。
column5: The presence of multiple polyps in the small intestine.

column4: 生殖器皮肤一个或多个棕色斑点状斑点。
column5: One or more brown punctate macules on the skin of the genitalia.

column4: 生殖器色素沉着局部或广泛增加。
column5: Localized or generalized increased genital pigmentation.

column4: 生殖器色素沉着局部或广泛性减少。
column5: Localized or generalized decreased genital pigmentation.

column4: 阴茎的长度小于同龄人平均长度的2 SD伴随着尿道下裂。
column5: Length of penis more than 2 SD below the mean for age accompanied by hypospadias.

column4: 没有可辨认的阴茎结构。
column5: Lack of recognizable penile structures.

column4: 阴茎宽度低于同龄人平均宽度2个标准差(SD)。或者，阴茎弛缓时其低于同龄人平均值的2 SD。或依年龄阴茎的宽度明显减少。
column5: Penile width more than 2 standard deviations (SD) below the mean for age. Alternatively circumference of the flaccid penis more than 2 SD below the mean for age. Alternatively, apparently decreased penile width for age.

column4: 龟头单独或与阴茎体一起固定于扭转状态，超过30度或以上。
column5: Rotated position of the glans, with or without the penile shaft, of 30 degrees or more.

column4: 阴茎腹侧皮肤褶一直延伸到阴囊。
column5: Ventral skinfold extending from penis to scrotum.

column4: 弛缓性阴茎在耻骨联合上方皮肤的左右侧之间的距离超过相应年龄平均值的2个标准差以上。
column5: Distance between left and right side of the flaccid penis at the attachment to the skin above the pubic symphysis more than 2 standard deviations above the mean for age.

column2: Calcification of the interosseus membrane of the forearm
column4: 尺骨、桡骨之间的纤维膜出现钙盐沉着
column5: Deposition of calcium salts in the fibrous sheet that connects the radius and the ulna.
Increased growth of callus, the bony and cartilaginous material that forms a connecting bridge across a bone fracture during fracture healing.

column3: 血循环胰岛素样生长因子-1（IGF1）水平增加
column4: 血循环胰岛素样生长因子-1（IGF1）水平增加。
column5: An elevated level of insulin-like growth factor 1 (IGF1) in the blood circulation.

column2: Elevated red cell adenosine deaminase activity
column3: 红细胞腺苷脱氨酶活性增加
column4: 在红细胞内腺苷脱氨酶（ADA）活性增加，一种参与嘌呤代谢的酶。 ADA涉及腺苷的分解代谢。
column5: Increase in the activity of adenosine deaminase (ADA), an enzyme involved in purine metabolism, within erythrocytes. ADA is involved in the catabolism of adenosine.

column3: 红细胞 2，3-二磷酸甘油酸浓度降低
column4: 2,3-二磷酸甘油酸（2,3-DPG）控制氧从红细胞向组织的运动。 为了促进组织氧合，贫血通常伴随着2,3-DPG水平的增加。 该术语是指红细胞中不适当的低2,3-DPG浓度。
column5: 2,3-diphosphoglycerate (2,3-DPG) controls the movement of oxygen from red blood cells to tissues. Anemia is usually accompanied by an increased level of 2,3-DPG in order to promote tissue oxygenation. This term refers to an inappropriate low 2,3-DPG concentration in erythrocytes.

column4: 酶在红细胞中作为催化剂的能力改变。 该术语包括由于酶水平的改变而引起的变化。
column5: An altered ability of any enzyme to act as catalysts within erythrocytes. This term includes changes due to altered levels of an enzyme.

column2: Reduced red cell adenosine deaminase activity
column3: 红细胞腺苷脱氨酶活性降低
column4: 腺苷脱氨酶（ADA）的活性降低，这是一种在红细胞内涉及嘌呤代谢的酶。 ADA涉及腺苷的分解代谢。
column5: Decrease in the activity of adenosine deaminase (ADA), an enzyme involved in purine metabolism, within erythrocytes. ADA is involved in the catabolism of adenosine.

column4: 在异常位置存在额外的阴囊或阴囊的一部分。
column5: Additional scrotum, or part of a scrotum in an abnormal location.

column4: 阴囊的位置不在其通常的阴茎根部位置。
column5: Scrotum in a position other than the usual position inferior to the base of the penis.

column4: 阴囊显然小与相应的年龄。
column5: Apparently small scrotum for age.
Abnormal morphology of a vertebral pedical.
Underdeveloped vertebral pedicle.
Underdeveloped pedicle of the fifth lumbar vertebra.

column3: 肋骨骨干低密度局灶性缺损
column5: Radiolucent focal defect of a rib shaft.
Fusion of cervical vertebrae at C3 and C4, caused by a failure in the normal segmentation or division of the cervical vertebrae during the early weeks of fetal development.

column3: 后肋骨干低密度局灶性缺损
column5: Radiolucent focal defect of the posterior portion of a rib shaft. The 'gaps' may lead to flail chest.

column2: Partial absence of the septum pellucidum
column4: 透明隔（分离脑的侧脑室的薄的，三角形，垂直的膜）仅一部分存在。在脑磁共振断层扫描或计算机断层扫描中可以理解该特征。
column5: Only part of the septum pellucidum (a thin, triangular, vertical membrane separating the lateral ventricles of the brain) is present. This feature can be appreciated on magnetic resonance tomography or computed tomography of the brain.

column4: 一种巨舌形式（舌的尺寸增加），其特征在于舌根宽大，但舌尖小，显示出三角形的外观。
column5: A form of macrogloassia (increased size of the tongue) characterized by a broad based root of the tongue but a small tongue tip, giving the appearance of a triangle.

column4: 小脑上脚异常展开的结构。
column5: Abnormal splayed configuration (spreading out) of the superior cerebellar peduncle.

column4: 小脑上脚的萎缩。
column5: Atrophy of the superior cerebellar peduncle.
An abnormal flattening of an epiphysis of femur.
Lack of ossification of the sacrum.

column3: 下肢干骺端形状不规则
column4: 一个或者多个下肢长骨干骺端光滑面出现不规则改变
column5: Irregularity of the normally smooth surface of one or more metaphyses of a bone of the leg.

column4: 胫骨的干骺端光滑面出现不规则改变
column5: Irregularity of the normally smooth surface of a metaphysis of a tibia.

column4: 腓骨的干骺端光滑面出现不规则改变
column5: Irregularity of the normally smooth surface of a metaphysis of a fibula.

column4: 股骨远侧（近膝关节）的干骺端异常
column5: An anomaly of the metaphysis of the distal femur (close to the knee).

column4: 存在10对肋骨（而非正常的12对）
column5: Presence of only 10 (instead of the usual 12) pairs of ribs.

column4: 前连合的异常。前连合是一束将两个脑半球连接在中线的神经纤维。前连合在疼痛感中起作用，并且包含来自嗅觉束的蜕皮纤维。
column5: An anomaly of the anterior commissure, a bundle of nerve fibers that connect the two cerebral hemispheres across the midline. The anterior commissure plays a role in pain sensation and contains decussating fibers from the olfactory tracts.

column4: 前连合缺如。
column5: Absence of the anterior commissure.

column4: 前连合发育不全。
column5: Underdevelopment of the anterior commissure.

column4: 脊柱的椎骨数量不正常。
column5: A deviation from the normal number of vertebrae in the spinal column.

column4: 存在11块胸椎而非正常的12块胸椎。
column5: The presence of 11 instead of the normal 12 thoracic vertebrae.

column4: 一个或多个下肢长骨干骺端张开成喇叭状
column5: The presence of a splayed (i.e.,flared) metaphyseal segment of one or more long bones of the leg.

column3: 喇叭状胫骨远端干骺端
column4: 胫骨远端干骺端张开成喇叭状
column5: The presence of a splayed (i.e.,flared) metaphyseal segment of the distal tibia.

column3: 喇叭状腓骨远端干骺端
column4: 腓骨远端干骺端张开成喇叭状
column5: The presence of a splayed (i.e.,flared) metaphyseal segment of the distal fibula.

column4: 上肢一个或多个关节移位。
column5: Displacement or malalignment of one or more joints in the upper extremity (arm).

column4: 下肢一个或多个关节移位。
column5: Displacement or malalignment of one or more joints in the lower extremity (leg).

column4: 颅骨（如板障）内海绵状骨结构（或组织）消失。
column5: Absence of the spongy bone structure (or tissue) of the internal part of the skull cap (i.e., of the calvarial diploe).

column4: 骨膜即覆盖在骨外侧面的膜的结构异常。
column5: An anomalous structure of the periosteum, i.e., of the membrane that covers the outer surface of bones.

column4: 骨膜骨异常沉积。
column5: Abnormal deposition of periosteal bone.

column4: 嘴唇发炎的一种类型，涉及口腔的一角或两角。
column5: A type of inflammation of the lips involving one or both of the corners of the mouth.

column4: 一个或多个受脸部神经（第7脑神经）支配的脸部肌肉无力。
column5: Reduced strength of one or more muscles innervated by the facial nerve (the seventh cranial nerve).

column4: 相邻椎体间的间距增大，相应的可观察到椎间盘空间增大。
column5: An increase in the vertical distance between adjacent vertebral bodies, observed as an increase in the intervertebral disc space.

column4: 椎动脉的异常。颈动脉主要来自锁骨下动脉，并合并形成单核中线基底动脉，称为椎基底动脉系统。
column5: An anomaly of the vertebral artery, the major artery of the neck that originates from the subclavian artery and merges to form the single midline basilar artery in a complex called the vertebrobasilar system.

column4: 椎动脉发育不全。
column5: Underdevelopment of the vertebral artery.

column4: 单侧椎动脉发育不全。
column5: Underdevelopment of the vertebral artery on one side.

column4: 双侧椎动脉发育不全。
column5: Underdevelopment of the vertebral artery on both sides.

column4: 颈部颈髓出现裂隙。
column5: Fissure within the spinal cord of the neck.

column4: #####巨噬细胞数量异常
column5: An anomaly in the number of macrophages.

column4: 破骨细胞（由巨噬细胞发育而来，溶解骨）数量异常
column5: An anomaly in the number of osteoclasts, bone-resorbing cells that develop from macrophages.

column4: 破骨细胞数量减少
column5: Decreased number of osteoclasts.

column4: 视网膜前后表面间厚度减少，这一现象可通过OCT观察。
column5: Reduced anteroposterior thickness of the retina. This phenotype can be appreciated by retinal optical coherence tomography (OCT).

column2: Multinucleated giant chondrocytes in epiphyseal cartilage
column3: 骨骺软骨中存在巨大的多核软骨细胞
column4: 骨骺软骨的软骨细胞体积增大且含有超过一个的细胞核。
column5: The presence of cartilage cells (chondrocytes) that are substantially increased in size and contain more than one nucleus and are located within the resting zone of the epiphyseal cartilage.

column3: 刺激诱导性皮肤起皱能力受损
column4: 当指尖被浸在水中或者涂上EMLA乳膏后，其起皱能力大大下降（指尖仍保持平滑）。
column5: A reduced ability of the skin of the fingertips to wrinkle when exposed to stimuli such as soaking in water or application of EMLA cream (the fingertip remains smooth).
A structural T cell anomaly.

column3: α-β T 细胞形态异常
column4: α-β T 细胞形态异常
column5: A structural anomal of T cells that express an alpha-beta T cell receptor.

column2: Abnormal CD4-positive, CD25-positive, alpha-beta regulatory T cell morphology
column3: CD4 阳性、 CD25 阳性、α-β调节性 T 细胞形态异常
column4: CD4 阳性、 CD25 阳性、α-β T 细胞结构异常。这些是调节性T细胞。
column5: A structural anomaly of a CD4-positive, CD25-positive, alpha-beta T cell. These cells are regulatory T cells.

column2: Abnormal CD4-positive, CD25-positive, alpha-beta regulatory T cell count
column3: CD4 阳性、 CD25 阳性、α-β调节性 T 细胞计数异常
column4: CD4 阳性、 CD25 阳性、α-β调节性 T 细胞数量异常。
column5: A deviation from the normal count of CD4-positive, CD25-positive, alpha-beta regulatory T cells.

column2: Absence of CD4-positive, CD25-positive regulatory T cells
column3: CD4 阳性、 CD25阳性 调节性 T 细胞缺失
column4: 缺乏CD4 阳性、 CD25阳性 调节性 T 细胞
column5: Lack of CD4+CD25+ T regulatory cells.

column2: Elevated CD4-positive, CD25-positive regulatory T cell count
column3: CD4 阳性、阳性 CD25 调节性 T 细胞计数增加
column4: CD4 阳性、阳性 CD25 调节性 T 细胞数量增加
column5: An increased number of Absence of CD4-positive, CD25-positive regulatory T cells.

column3: 循环系统促性腺激素水平异常
column4: 循环系统促性腺激素水平异常，即由脊椎动物垂体前叶分泌促性腺激素细胞分泌的蛋白激素水平异常。促性腺激素包括促黄体生成素(LH)与卵泡刺激素(FSH)。
column5: An anomaly of the circulating level of a gonadotropin, that is, of a protein hormone secreted by gonadotrope cells of the anterior pituitary of vertebrates. The primary gonadotropins are luteinizing hormone (LH) and follicle-stimulating hormone (FSH).

column3: 循环系统促性腺激素水平低下
column4: 循环系统促性腺激素水平低下，即，由脊椎动物垂体前叶分泌促性腺激素细胞分泌的蛋白激素水平降低。促性腺激素包括促黄体生成素(LH)与卵泡刺激素(FSH)。
column5: An reduction of the circulating level of a gonadotropin, that is, of a protein hormone secreted by gonadotrope cells of the anterior pituitary of vertebrates. The primary gonadotropins are luteinizing hormone (LH) and follicle-stimulating hormone (FSH).

column2: Decreased circulating follicle stimulating hormone level
column3: 循环系统卵泡刺激素水平低下
column4: 循环系统卵泡刺激素水平降低。
column5: An reduction of the circulating level of follicle-stimulating hormone (FSH).

column3: 循环黄体生成素水平降低
column4: 循环黄体生成素水平降低。
column5: A reduction in the circulating level of luteinizing hormone (LH).

column3: 循环黄体生成素水平异常
column4: 循环黄体生成素水平异常。
column5: An anomaly of the circulating level of luteinizing hormone (LH).

column3: 循环卵泡刺激素水平异常
column4: 循环卵泡刺激素水平异常。
column5: An anomaly of the circulating level of follicle-stimulating hormone (FSH).

column4: 循环系统中雄激素水平异常，雄激素是一种控制男性特征发育与维持的甾醇类激素。雄激素包括睾酮与脱氢表雄酮。
column5: An anomaly in the blood concentration of an androgen, that is, of a steroid hormone that controls development and maintenance of masculine characteristics. The androgens include testosterone and Dehydroepiandrosterone.

column4: 循环系统中雄激素水平增加，雄激素是一种控制男性特征发育与维持的甾醇类激素。雄激素包括睾酮与脱氢表雄酮。
column5: An elevation of the blood concentration of an androgen, that is, of a steroid hormone that controls development and maintenance of masculine characteristics. The androgens include testosterone and Dehydroepiandrosterone.

column4: 循环系统中雄激素水平降低，雄激素是一种控制男性特征发育与维持的甾醇类激素。雄激素包括睾酮与脱氢表雄酮。
column5: A reduction in the blood concentration of an androgen, that is, of a steroid hormone that controls development and maintenance of masculine characteristics. The androgens include testosterone and Dehydroepiandrosterone.

column4: 内无液体的红色局限性的皮肤隆起。
column5: A circumscribed, solid elevation of skin with no visible fluid that is reddish (erythematous) in color.

column4: 境界清楚的隆起性风团（浅表皮肤水肿引起），瘙痒感强烈，直径约1-2cm。
column5: A well-circumscribed, intensely pruritic, raised wheal (edema of the superficial skin) typically 1 to 2 cm in diameter.

column2: Abnormal serum insulin-like growth factor 1 level
column3: 血清胰岛素样生长因子-1（IGF1）水平异常
column4: 血清胰岛素样生长因子-1（IGF1）水平异常。
column5: An anomalous level of insulin-like growth factor 1 (IGF1) in the blood circulation.

column3: 血清胰岛素样生长因子-1（IGF1）水平降低
column4: 血清胰岛素样生长因子-1（IGF1）水平降低。
column5: A reduced level of insulin-like growth factor 1 (IGF1) in the blood circulation.

column4: 循环中干扰素γ浓度的升高。
column5: An elevation in the concentration of interferon gamma measured in the blood circulation.

column4: 小细胞肺癌（SCLC）是一种高度恶性的肺癌，由小卵圆形细胞组成。在过去，SCLC被称为燕麦细胞癌，因为细胞的微观外观被认为类似于燕麦。 SCLC通常起源于支气管附近，并且在许多情况下可能快速生长和转移。
column5: Small cell lung cancer (SCLC) is a type of highly malignant lung cancer that is composed of small ovoid cells. In the past, SCLC was called oat cell carcinoma because the microscopic appearance of the cells was felt to resemble oats. SLCLC usually originates near the bronchi and in many cases may grow and metastasize quickly.

column4: 一种来自分层鳞状上皮细胞的非小细胞肺癌。
column5: A type of non-small cell lung carcinoma that is derived from stratified squamous epithelial cells.

column4: 是一种非小细胞肺癌，是来源于肺中转化上皮细胞的未分化恶性肿瘤，其分化程度较高，细胞质量较大，浆核比较大，染色质缺乏盐和胡椒的外观。
column5: A type of non-small cell lung carcinoma that is derived from undifferentiated malignant neoplasms originating from transformed epithelial cells in the lung, and which is differentiate from small-cell lung carcinoma by the larger size of the anaplastic cells, a higher cytoplasmic-to-nuclear size ratio, and a lack of salt-and-pepper appearance of the chromatin.

An anomaly of the metabolism of an icosanoid (also know as eicosanoids). These are signaling molecules derived from oxidation of 20-carbon fatty acids. Most are produced from arachidonic acid, a 20-carbon polyunsaturated fatty acid (5,8,11,14-eicosatetraenoic acid).

column4: 肌肉组织中肉碱水平降低。
column5: A reduction in the level of carnitine in muscle tissue.
Delivery by Caesarian section representing the first time the mother has delivered by Caesarian section.
Delivery by Caesarian section representing where the mother has already had a previous Cesarean delivery, and this is a repeat Cesarean birth.
Vaginal birth after Caesarian (VBAC) refers to the situation where the mother has had a previous Cesarean delivery but has now delivered vaginally.
The Odon device is an instrument for assisted vaginal deliveries that is applied on the head of the baby and used to apply traction to assist the birth process.

column4: 多指是线性排列的指骨数量增加，即存在与正常指骨线性排列的附加指骨。
column5: Hyperphalangy is a digit morphology in which increased numbers of phalanges are arranged linearly within a digit. That is, there is an accessory phalanx that is arranged linearly with the other phalanges.

column4: 存在与其他指骨线性排列的食指附加指骨。附加指骨是由掌指关节额外骨化中心形成的，位于正常食指指骨的桡侧。注意，该术语仅特指这种类型的多指。
column5: An accessory phalanx of the index (second) finger that is arranged linearly with the other phalanges. Hyperphalangy of the index finger results from an accessory ossification center at the metacarpophalangeal joint, resulting in radial deviation of the index finger. Note that this term refers only to this type of hyperphalangy.
Vaginal delivery following induction of labor, a procedure used to stimulate uterine contractions during pregnancy before labor begins on its own.

column3: 初始B 细胞计数异常
column4: 原始B细胞（CD19 + / CD27- / IgD + / IgM +）的计数偏离正常值。 原始B细胞代表外周血中B细胞亚型之一，也就是未暴露于抗原的B细胞。
column5: A deviation from normal of the count of naive B cells (CD19+/CD27-/IgD+/IgM+). Naive B cells represent one of the subtypes of B cells in the peripheral blood, and are B cells that have not been exposed to antigen.

column3: 初始 B 细胞计数增加
column4: 原始B细胞（CD19 + / CD27- / IgD + / IgM +）的计数比正常值增加。 原始B细胞代表外周血中B细胞亚型之一，也就是未暴露于抗原的B细胞。
column5: An elevation above normal of the count of naive B cells (CD19+/CD27-/IgD+/IgM+). Naive B cells represent one of the subtypes of B cells in the peripheral blood, and are B cells that have not been exposed to antigen.

column3: 初始B 细胞计数降低
column4: 原始B细胞（CD19 + / CD27- / IgD + / IgM +）的计数比正常值降低。 原始B细胞代表外周血中B细胞亚型之一，也就是未暴露于抗原的B细胞。
column5: A reduction below normal of the count of naive B cells (CD19+/CD27-/IgD+/IgM+). Naive B cells represent one of the subtypes of B cells in the peripheral blood, and are B cells that have not been exposed to antigen.

column3: 记忆 B 细胞计数异常
column4: 循环记忆性B细胞（CD19 + / CD27 +）比正常计数有偏差。 记忆B细胞从幼稚B细胞发育而来。 在抗原再激活时，记忆B细胞在记忆Th细胞（IV期）的同源控制下迅速扩张并分化成浆细胞。
column5: A deviation from the normal count in the circulation of memory B cells (CD19+/CD27+). Memory B cells develop from naive B cells. Upon antigen rechallenge, memory B cells rapidly expand and differentiate into plasma cells under the cognate control of memory Th cells (Phase IV).

column3: 记忆 B 细胞计数降低
column4: 循环记忆性B细胞（CD19 + / CD27 +）数量下降。 记忆B细胞从幼稚B细胞发育而来。 在抗原再激活时，记忆B细胞在记忆Th细胞（IV期）的同源控制下迅速扩张并分化成浆细胞。
column5: A reduction from the normal count in the circulation of memory B cells (CD19+/CD27+). Memory B cells develop from naive B cells. Upon antigen rechallenge, memory B cells rapidly expand and differentiate into plasma cells under the cognate control of memory Th cells (Phase IV).

column3: 记忆 B 细胞计数增加
column4: 循环记忆性B细胞（CD19 + / CD27 +）比正常计数增加。 记忆B细胞从幼稚B细胞发育而来。 在抗原再激活时，记忆B细胞在记忆Th细胞（IV期）的同源控制下迅速扩张并分化成浆细胞。
column5: An elevation above the normal count in the circulation of memory B cells (CD19+/CD27+). Memory B cells develop from naive B cells. Upon antigen rechallenge, memory B cells rapidly expand and differentiate into plasma cells under the cognate control of memory Th cells (Phase IV).

column3: 不成熟 B 细胞计数异常
column4: 未成熟B细胞的细胞计数（CD19 + / CD21low）的计数偏离正常值。 未成熟B细胞（IgM +）仍处于骨髓内发育的最后阶段。 初始B细胞是在结合到其特异性抗原（IgM + / IgD +）之前离开骨髓的细胞。
column5: A deviation from normal of the count in the ciculation of immature B cells (CD19+/ CD21low). Immature B cells (IgM+) are still in final stages of development within the bone marrow. Naive B cells are those which have left the bone marrow, before they bind to the antigen for which they're specific (IgM+/IgD+).

column3: 未成熟 B 细胞计数增加
column4: 未成熟B细胞的细胞计数（CD19 + / CD21low）的计数比正常值高。 未成熟B细胞（IgM +）仍处于骨髓内发育的最后阶段。 初始B细胞是在结合到其特异性抗原（IgM + / IgD +）之前离开骨髓的细胞。
column5: An elevation above normal of the count in the ciculation of immature B cells (CD19+/ CD21low). Immature B cells (IgM+) are still in final stages of development within the bone marrow. Naive B cells are those which have left the bone marrow, before they bind to the antigen for which they're specific (IgM+/IgD+).

column3: 未成熟 B 细胞计数减少
column4: 未成熟B细胞的细胞计数（CD19 + / CD21low）的计数比正常值低。 未成熟B细胞（IgM +）仍处于骨髓内发育的最后阶段。 初始B细胞是在结合到其特异性抗原（IgM + / IgD +）之前离开骨髓的细胞。
column5: A reduction from normal of the count in the ciculation of immature B cells (CD19+/ CD21low). Immature B cells (IgM+) are still in final stages of development within the bone marrow. Naive B cells are those which have left the bone marrow, before they bind to the antigen for which they're specific (IgM+/IgD+).

column3: 过渡 B 细胞计数异常
column4: 循环过渡性B细胞（CD19 + / CD38high / IgMhigh）计数偏离正常值。 B细胞起源于骨髓中的前体，首先迁移至外周血的细胞被分类为过渡性B细胞。
column5: A deviation from normal of the count in the circulation of transitional B cells (CD19+/CD38high/IgMhigh). B cells originate from precursors in the bone marrow, and the first cells which migrate to the peripheral blood have been classified as transitional B cells.

column3: 过渡 B 细胞计数减少
column4: 循环过渡性B细胞（CD19 + / CD38high / IgMhigh）计数低于正常值。 B细胞起源于骨髓中的前体，首先迁移至外周血的细胞被分类为过渡性B细胞。
column5: A reduction from normal of the count in the circulation of transitional B cells (CD19+/CD38high/IgMhigh). B cells originate from precursors in the bone marrow, and the first cells which migrate to the peripheral blood have been classified as transitional B cells.

column3: 过渡 B 细胞计数增加
column4: 循环过渡性B细胞（CD19 + / CD38high / IgMhigh）计数高于正常值。 B细胞起源于骨髓中的前体，首先迁移至外周血的细胞被分类为过渡性B细胞。
column5: An elevation above normal of the count in the circulation of transitional B cells (CD19+/CD38high/IgMhigh). B cells originate from precursors in the bone marrow, and the first cells which migrate to the peripheral blood have been classified as transitional B cells.

column2: Abnormal marginal zone B cell count
column3: 边缘区 B 细胞计数异常
column4: 循环边缘区B细胞（CD19 + / CD27 + / IgM + / IgD +）计数偏离正常值。
column5: A deviation from normal of the count in the circulation of marginal zone B cells (CD19+/CD27+/IgM+/IgD+).

column2: Decreased marginal zone B cell count
column3: 边缘区 B 细胞计数降低
column4: 循环边缘区B细胞（CD19 + / CD27 + / IgM + / IgD +）计数低于正常值。
column5: A reduction from normal of the count in the circulation of marginal zone B cells (CD19+/CD27+/IgM+/IgD+).

column2: Increased marginal zone B cell count
column3: 边缘区 B 细胞计数增加
column4: 循环边缘区B细胞（CD19 + / CD27 + / IgM + / IgD +）计数高于正常值。
column5: An elevation from the normal count in the circulation of marginal zone B cells (CD19+/CD27+/IgM+/IgD+).

column2: Abnormal class-switched memory B cell count
column3: 类别转换记忆 B 细胞计数异常
column4: 类别转换记忆B细胞（CD19 + / CD27 + / IgM- / IgD-）计数偏离正常。 边缘区B细胞经历有限的体细胞超突变并产生高亲和力IgM和一些IgG，而分类记忆B细胞合成IgG，IgM和IgA。
column5: A deviation from the normal count of class-switched memory B cells (CD19+/CD27+/IgM-/IgD-). Marginal zone B cells undergo limited somatic hypermutation and produce high-affinity IgM and some IgG, whereas class-switched memory B-cells synthetize IgG, IgM, and IgA.

column2: Increased class-switched memory B cell count
column3: 类别转换记忆 B 细胞计数增加
column4: 类别转换记忆B细胞（CD19 + / CD27 + / IgM- / IgD-）计数高于正常。 边缘区B细胞经历有限的体细胞超突变并产生高亲和力IgM和一些IgG，而分类记忆B细胞合成IgG，IgM和IgA。

column2: Decreased class-switched memory B cell count
column3: 类别转换记忆 B 细胞计数降低
column4: 类别转换记忆B细胞（CD19 + / CD27 + / IgM- / IgD-）计数高于正常。 边缘区B细胞经历有限的体细胞超突变并产生高亲和力IgM和一些IgG，而分类记忆B细胞合成IgG，IgM和IgA。
column5: A reduction from the normal count of class-switched memory B cells (CD19+/CD27+/IgM+/IgD+). Marginal zone B cells undergo limited somatic hypermutation and produce high-affinity IgM and some IgG, whereas class-switched memory B-cells synthetize IgG, IgM, and IgA.

An anomaly of the metabolism of thromboxane (CHEBI:26995). Thromboxanes are derived from prostaglandin precursors in platelets, and stimulate aggregation of platelets and constriction of blood vessels.
An anomaly of the metabolism of leukotriene (CHEBI:25029).

column3: 口语词汇识别能力降低
column4: 词义辨析的能力降低，指的是将刺激词与其他语音相似的词区分开来。词义辨析可以定义为正确识别精神词汇中的单词以匹配刺激的语音输入的过程。
column5: Reduced ability of lexical discrimination, which refers to the process of distinguishing a stimulus word from other phonologically similar words. Lexical discrimination can be defined as the process of correctly identifying words in the mental lexicon to match the phonological input of a stimulus.

column4: 脑室内乳头状肿瘤，源自脉络丛上皮。丛状肿瘤最常见于外侧和第四脑室；而80％的侧脑室肿瘤存在于儿童中，第四脑室肿瘤均匀分布于所有年龄组。临床上，脉络丛肿瘤倾向于引起脑积水和颅内压升高。组织学上，脉络丛乳头状瘤为WHO I级，脉络丛癌为WHO III级。
column5: Intraventricular papillary neoplasm derived from choroid plexus epithelium. Plexus tumors are most common in the lateral and fourth ventricles; while 80% of lateral ventricle tumors present in children, fourth ventricle tumors are evenly distributed in all age groups. Clinically, choroid plexus tumors tend to cause hydrocephalus and increased intracranial pressure. Histologically, choroid plexus papillomas correspond to WHO grade I, choroid plexus carcinomas to WHO grade III.

column4: 具有缓慢生长模式的低级别乳头状上皮肿瘤（腺癌）。内淋巴管从囊内（内耳）的后壁出现，并以盲囊（即内淋巴囊）结束。内淋巴囊肿瘤（ELST）也可被称为Heffner肿瘤、侵袭性乳头状中耳肿瘤、内淋巴囊起源的低度腺癌。
column5: A low-grade papillary epithelial neoplasm (adenocarcinoma) with a slow growth pattern. The endolymphatic duct emerges from the posterior wall of the saccule (of the inner ear) and ends in a blind pouch, the endolymphatic sac. Endolymphatic sac tumors (ELSTs) are known under different names in the literature (Heffner tumor, aggressive papillary middle ear tumor, and low-grade adenocarcinoma of endolymphatic sac origin).

column4: 起源于输卵管的癌。它可以位于壁中或管腔内，作为通过茎附着在壁上的生长。
column5: Carcinoma that originates in the Fallopian tube. It may be located in the wall or within the lumen as a growth attached to the wall by a stalk.

column4: 血小板充满分泌颗粒，对正常血小板功能至关重要。 在三种类型的血小板分泌颗粒--α-颗粒，致密颗粒和溶酶体中，α-颗粒是最丰富的。 颗粒内容物必须从其细胞内储存库中释放，以达到其生理功能，而该术语是指颗粒分泌的功能缺陷。
column5: Platelets are replete with secretory granules, which are critical to normal platelet function. Among the three types of platelet secretory granules - alpha-granules, dense granules, and lysosomes - the alpha-granule is the most abundant. Granule contents must be released from their intracellular repository in order to achieve their physiologic function, and this term refers to a functional defect in granule secretion.

column3: 血小板致密颗粒分泌异常
column4: 从血小板释放致密颗粒异常
column5: Abnormal release of dense granules from platelets.

column2: Abnormal platelet ATP dense granule secretion
column3: 血小板 ATP 致密颗粒分泌异常
column4: 血小板 ATP 致密颗粒分泌异常
column5: Abnormal secretion of the platelet dense-granule content adenosine triphosphate (ATP).

column4: α粒子从血小板异常释放。
column5: Abnormal release of alpha granule contents from platelets.

column3: 血小板溶酶体分泌异常
column4: #####从血小板释放溶酶体内容物异常。
column5: Abnormal release of lysosome contents from platelets.

column2: Abnormal platelet dense granule ATP/ADP ratio
column3: 血小板致密颗粒 ATP/ADP 比例异常
column4: 三磷酸腺苷（ATP）与二磷酸腺苷（ADP）在血小板内的比例偏离正常。
column5: Deviation from normal of the ratio of adenosine triphosphate (ATP) to adenosine diphosphate (ADP) within platelets.

column4: 加入刺激血小板聚集的激动剂后血小板聚集的速率和程度的异常。 使用聚集计测量血小板聚集，以测量富含血小板的血浆的光密度，由此血小板聚集导致等离子体变得更透明。
column5: An abnormality in the rate and degree to which platelets aggregate after the addition of an agonist that stimulates platelet clumping. Platelet aggregation is measured using aggregometer to measure the optical density of platelet-rich plasma, whereby platelet aggregation causes the plasma to become more transparent.

column4: #####在血小板聚集测试中不添加通常用于诱导聚集的试剂而将血小板聚集在一起，。
column5: Clumping together of platelets in the blood in a platelet aggregation test without addition of agents normally used to induce aggregation.

column4: 胰腺内分泌肿瘤，分泌过量的胰高血糖素。
column5: An endocrine tumor of the pancreas that secretes excessive amounts of glucagon.

column4: 源自胰腺激素生成细胞（胰岛细胞）的神经内分泌肿瘤。
column5: A neuroendocrine tumor originating in a hormone-producing cell (islet cell) of the pancreas.

column4: 一种起源于腹膜的癌。区别于腹膜转移癌。腹膜癌可在腹腔任何一处发生，并累及腹膜覆盖的脏器表层。
column5: A type of cancer that originates in the peritoneam. It is to be distinguished from metastatic cancer of the peritoneum. Peritoneal cancer can occur anywhere in the abdominal space, and affects the surface of organs contained inside the peritoneum.

column4: 一种成熟分化良好的肿瘤（WHO I级）的松果体实质细胞瘤。
column5: A type of pineal parenchymal cell neoplasm that is a mature well-differentiated tumour (WHO grade I).

column4: 松果体母细胞瘤是松果体中罕见的原始神经外胚层肿瘤（PNET）。松果体母细胞瘤被分类为WHO IV级肿瘤，占松果体实质肿瘤的四分之一到一半。松果体母细胞瘤是源于松果腺的高度细胞性肿瘤，含有细小分化细胞。
column5: Pineoblastoma is a rare primitive neuroectodermal tumour (PNET) arising in the pineal gland. Pineoblastomas are classified as a WHO grade IV tumour and comprise one-fourth to one-half of pineal parenchymal tumours. Pineoblastoma is a highly cellular tumor originating in the pineal gland and containing small, poorly differentiated cells.

column4: 来自肾穿孔到输尿管口的尿路上的移行上皮（尿路上皮）细胞产生的恶性肿瘤。
column5: A malignant tumor that arises from the transitional (urothelial) epithelial cells lining the urinary tract from the renal calyces to the ureteral orifice.

column4: 是一种发生在皮脂腺（皮肤的外分泌腺，分泌皮脂，一种蜡质的物质）的癌症。
column5: A carcinoma that arises in a sebaseous gland (an exocrine gland of the skin that secretes sebum, a waxy substance.

column4: 起源于空肠的一种恶性上皮肿瘤。
column5: A malignant epithelial tumor with a glandular organization that originates in the jejunum.

column4: 起源于回肠的一种恶性上皮肿瘤
column5: A malignant epithelial tumor with a glandular organization that originates in the ileum.

column2: Squamous cell carcinoma of the tongue
column4: 源自舌头的鳞状上皮细胞癌。
column5: A carcinoma derived from a squamous epithelial cell of the tongue.

column2: Verrucous cell carcinoma of the tongue
column4: 具有疣状外观的舌状鳞状细胞癌的低级别变体。
column5: A low-grade variant of squamous cell carcinoma of the tongue with a warty (verrucous) appearance.

column4: 舌状的肉瘤样（梭形细胞）癌是舌鳞状细胞癌的一种变体，其是单克隆型的，其从具有与肉瘤样变性相关的去分化的常规鳞状细胞癌发展而来
column5: Sarcomatoid (spindle cell) carcinomas of the tongue is a variant of squamous carcinoma of tongue that is monoclonal, having evolved from a conventional squamous carcinoma with dedifferentiation associated with sarcomatoid transformation.

column4: 女性外阴生殖道的肿瘤。
column5: A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the female external genital tract (vulva).

column2: Squamous cell carcinoma of the vulva
column4: 一种起源于外阴表面鳞状细胞的癌症。
column5: A cancer that originates in the sqamous cells that line the surface of the vulva.

column4: 一种来自外阴黑素细胞的外阴癌。
column5: A type of vulvar cancer that originates from melanocytes of the vulva.

column4: 在Bartholin腺细胞中产生的癌症，位于阴道开口稍微后方的葡萄状腺。
column5: A cancer arising in a cell of the Bartholin gland, a racemose gland located slightly posterior to the opening of the vagina.

column4: 源自外阴的腺癌。
column5: An adenocarcinoma arising in the vulva.

column4: 附睾的肿瘤（组织的异常生长）。附睾是将精子从睾丸输送到输精管的导管。
column5: A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the epididymis, an duct that transports spermatozoa from the testis to the vas deferens.

column4: 位于脾的闭合囊腔。
column5: A closed sac located in the spleen.

column4: 附睾头部出现的光滑、睾丸外的球形囊肿。
column5: A smooth, extratesticular, spherical cyst in the head of the epididymis.

column4: 卵巢囊肿，有钙盐的沉积。
column5: A cyst of the ovary that exhibits deposition of calcium salts.

column4: 由纤维结缔组织组成的良性中枢性骨肿瘤，纤维瘤中有骨形成。
column5: A benign central bone tumor composed of fibrous connective tissue within which bone is formed.

column4: 由中心有骨形成的纤维结缔组织组成的下颌的良性中心骨肿瘤。
column5: A benign central bone tumor of the jaw composed of fibrous connective tissue within which bone is formed.

column4: 皮肤粘液瘤。
column5: A myxoma originating in the skin.

column3: 青少年型鼻咽血管纤维瘤
column4: 良性但高血管性鼻咽肿瘤。肿瘤起源于蝶腭孔，并涉及翼腭窝和后鼻腔。
column5: A benign but highly vascular nasopharyngeal neoplasm. The tumor originates from the sphenopalatine foramen and involves both the pterygopalatine fossa and the posterior nasal cavity.

column4: 由神经细胞和神经纤维构成的肿瘤。
column5: A tumor made up of nerve cells and nerve fibers.
A cartilage capped bony outgrowth of a long bone. Osteochondroma arises on the external surface of bone containing a marrow cavity that is continuous with that of the underlying bone.

column4: 通常为一种良性肿瘤，有软骨母细胞或其前体细胞形成。
column5: A usually benign tumor composed of cells which arise from chondroblasts or their precursors and which tend to differentiate into cartilage cells.

column4: 一种良性的骨肿瘤，中央区为非典型的骨组织周围包绕血供丰富基质制和周围反应区。
column5: A bening tumor of bone composed of a central zone named nidus which is an atypical bone completely enclosed within a well vascularized stroma and a peripheral sclerotic reaction zone.

column4: 毛母质瘤是无症状缓慢生长的良性皮肤肿瘤，分化为毛囊的毛发基质。它被正常或充血的皮肤覆盖，大小通常在0.5至3厘米之间变化
column5: Pilomatricoma is an asymptomatic slowly growing benign cutaneous tumor, differentiating towards the hair matrix of the hair follicle. It is covered by normal or hyperemic skin, and usually varies in size from 0.5 to 3 cm.

column4: 纤维肉芽肿是一种临床上无症状的2-4毫米大小、皮肤色、圆顶形的平滑丘疹。它通常以不同区域的成人多灶病变的形式出现，如头皮，前额，面部和颈部。根据组织学，病变是一种纤维性错构瘤，其特征在于漏斗状上皮细胞增生和纤维周围纤维增生。
column5: Fibrofolliculoma is a clinically asymptomatic, 2-4 mm, skin-colored, dome-shaped smooth papule. It usually arises in the form of multiple lesions in adults in different areas such as the scalp, forehead, face, and neck. According to histology, the lesion is a fibrotic hamartoma characterized by infundibular epithelial proliferation and perifollicular fibrous proliferation.

column4: 起源于肛管的一种鳞状上皮癌。
column5: A squamous cell carcinoma that originates in the anal canal.

column4: 起源于肛管的一种腺癌。
column5: An adenoma carcinoma that originates in the anal canal.

column4: 肛缘的肿瘤。
column5: A tumor of the anal margin.

column4: 起源于肛缘的上皮内腺癌，特征为存在典型的Paget细胞（显示为大的圆形空泡细胞）。
column5: An intraepithelial adenocarcinoma originating in the anal margin and characterized by presence of typical Paget's cells, appearing as large rounded vacuolated cells.

column4: 起源于肛源皮肤的鳞状上皮癌。
column5: A squamous cell carcinoma that originates in the skin of the anal margin.

column4: 起源于肛缘的基底细胞癌。
column5: A basal cell carcinoma that originates in the anal margin.

column4: 起源于肛缘的恶性黑色素瘤。
column5: A melanoma that originates in the anal margin.

column4: 肺的恶性神经内分泌肿瘤。根据组织病理学标准（WHO 2004），类癌分为四组，即典型类癌、非典型类癌，大细胞神经内分泌癌和小细胞肺癌。
column5: A malignant neuroendocrine tumor of the lung. According to histopathologic criteria (WHO 2004), carcinoids are divided into four groups i.e. typical and atypical carcinoids, large cell neuroendocrine carcinoma and small cell lung carcinoma.

column4: 发生于老年人的恶性皮肤肿瘤，以具有区域淋巴结转移和远端转移的复发性侵袭性过程为特征。大多数患者呈现快速生长、无痛、坚固、不嫩、红色圆顶状，偶尔溃疡的皮肤结节，在身体的主要阳光下暴露的区域，其红色或蓝色的颜色可达数厘米。上覆皮肤光滑光亮，有时表现为溃疡性，粉刺型或毛细血管扩张性。
column5: A malignant cutaneous tumor of the elderly that is characterized by an aggressive course with regional nodal involvement, distant metastases and a high rate of recurrence. Most patients present with rapidly growing, painless, firm, non-tender, dome-shaped red, occasionally ulcerated skin nodules, which have a red or bluish color, measuring up to several centimeters, on predominantly sun-exposed areas of the body. The overlying skin is smooth and shiny, sometimes exhibiting ulcerative, acneiform or telangiectatic features.

column4: 一种由软组织如脂肪、肌肉、神经、纤维组织、血管或深层皮肤组织形成的肉瘤（由中胚层细胞增殖形成的结缔组织瘤）。
column5: A type of sarcoma (A connective tissue neoplasm formed by proliferation of mesodermal cells) that develops from soft tissues like fat, muscle, nerves, fibrous tissues, blood vessels, or deep skin tissues.

Delivery by means of therapeutic termination of pregnancy. Therapeutic abortion may be done to end a pregnancy if the mother's life is in danger or if the baby has abnormalities involving the major organ systems and is not expected to survive after birth or by choice.

column5: A tumor that arises from an element of the autonomic nervous system.

column4: 源自肠系膜的闭合的充满液体的囊腔。
column5: A closed fluid filled sac originating from the mesentary.

column5: A type of mesenteric cyst that is lined with a thin endothelium or mesothelium and filled with chylous and lymphatic fluid.

column5: The clinical electro-oculogram (EOG) is an electrophysiological test of function of the outer retina and retinal pigment epithelium (RPE) in which changes in electrical potential across the RPE are recorded during successive periods of dark and light adaptation.
