column4: 玻璃体混浊。
column5: Vitreous haze is the obscuration of fundus details by vitreous cells and protein exudation.
Any cystic lesion associated with the umbilical cord.
An entwining of a segment of umbilical cord, usually without obstructing fetal circulation and commonly result from fetal slippage through a loop of the cord.
Focal dilation of the umbilical vein.
Bleeding from the vessels of the cord with extravasation of blood into the Wharton jelly surrounding the umbilical cord vessels.
Insertion of the umbilical cord within 2 cm from the placental edge.
Insertion of the umbilical cord into the chorio-amniotic membranes of the placenta.
Branching of the umbilical cord before its insertion into the placenta.

column4: 黄白色炎性物质在玻璃体腔积聚，常聚集在玻璃体中部或下部周围。
column5: Yellow-white inflammatory aggregates in the vitreous that are found in the midvitreous and inferior periphery.

column4: 玻璃体中出现淋巴细胞、巨噬细胞等炎性细胞聚集。
column5: The presence of inflammatory cells such as lymphocytes and macrophages in the vitreous.

column4: 光空型玻璃体。
column5: Vestigial vitreous gel occupying the immediate retrolental space and minimal to no discernable gel in the central vitreous cavity, giving the appearance of an empty vitreous cavity.

column4: 腹直肌下段的无力，临床上按如下方式确认：当病人自卧位坐起或抬头时，脐部向头侧移动。这是腹直肌下部麻痹的结果，使得上部肌纤维占主导地位、向上牵引脐部。
column5: Weakness of the inferior portion of the rectus abdominal muscle, which is ascertained clinically as follows. When a patient sits up or raises the head from a recumbent position, the umbilicus is displaced toward the head. This is the result of paralysis of the inferior portion of the rectus abdominal muscle, so that the upper fibres predominate pulling upwards the umbilicus.

column4: 红核震颤的特征是休息时缓慢的粗糙震颤，姿势调整和自主运动会导致震颤加剧。
column5: Rubral tremor is characterized by a slow coarse tremor at rest that is exacerbated by postural adjustments and by guided voluntary movements.

column4: 在伤口修复中，新血管形成（NV）包括从先前存在的血管发出新血管，以修复或替换损坏的血管。在视网膜中，NV是对局部缺血的反应。NV附着在视网膜的内表面和玻璃体的外表面上。NV缺乏紧密连接，因此将血浆泄漏到包括玻璃体的周围组织中。血浆导致玻璃体凝胶退化，收缩，并最终崩溃，拉动视网膜。由于视网膜NV附着在视网膜和玻璃体上，因为玻璃体收缩，NV可能被剪切，导致玻璃体出血，或NV可能保持完整，并且通过玻璃体拉动视网膜，导致视网膜抬高，称为牵引性视网膜脱离。
column5: In wound repair, neovascularization (NV) involves the sprouting of new vessels from pre-existent vessels to repair or replace damaged vessels. In the retina, NV is a response to ischemia. The NV adheres to the inner surface of the retina and outer surface of the vitreous. NV are deficient in tight junctions and hence leak plasma into surrounding tissue including the vitreous. Plasma causes the vitreous gel to degenerate, contract, and eventually collapse which pulls on the retina. Since retinal NV is adherent to both retina and vitreous, as the vitreous contracts the NV may be sheared resulting in vitreous hemorrhage or the NV may remain intact and pull the retina with the vitreous resulting in retinal elevation referred to as traction retinal detachment.

column3: 周边视网膜新生血管形成
column4: 一种视网膜新生血管形成，影响视网膜外周。
column5: A type of retinal neovascularization that affects the periphery of the retina.

column4: 位于眼眶区域的囊肿，并呈现出角质填充内腔的上皮衬里。毛囊是皮肤囊肿壁常见的附属结构之一。
column5: A cyst that is localized in the region of the orbit and exhibits an epithelial lining with a keratin-filled lumen. Hair follicles are one of the adnexal structures that are commonly found in walls of dermoid cysts.

column2: Abnormal morphology of the ocular adnexa
column4: 定义为泪液装置、眼外肌、眼睑、睫毛、眉毛和结膜的相邻结构（即附件）的异常。
column5: An anomaly of the adjacent structures (i.e., adnexa) of the eye, defined as the lacrimal apparatus, the extraocular muscles and the eyelids, eyelashes, eyebrows and the conjunctiva.

column4: 错构瘤（成熟组织的无序增殖），其可以源于眶区的任何组织。
column5: A hamartoma (disordered proliferation of mature tissues) which can originate from any tissue of the orbital region.

column2: Abnormality of the common tendinous ring
column4: 在眶入口的顶部包围视神经的纤维组织环的任何异常。常见的腱环也称为Zinn环或环状肌腱。七个眼外肌中有五个的起源于此。
column5: Any anomaly of the ring of fibrous tissue that surrounds the optic nerve at its entrance at the apex of the orbit. The common tendinous ring, also know as the annulus of Zinn or annular tendon, is the origin for five of the seven extraocular muscles.

column4: 细小白色钙磷酸磷酸盐和复杂的层状脂质在玻璃体腔沉积，导致细小白色的玻璃体不透明。
column5: The presence of small, white vitreous opacities consisting of calcium phosphate and complex, layered lipid deposits.

column3: 侵蚀性玻璃体视网膜病变
column4: 玻璃体视网膜病变的一种，由于RPE细胞变薄所致，导致脉络膜血管可见。
column5: A form of vitreoretinopathy characterized by thinning (erosion) of the retinal pigment epithelium that permits increased visualization of the choroidal vessels.
Onset prior to birth.

column2: Contracture of proximal interphalangeal joints of 2nd-5th fingers
column3: 第二至第五指的近端指间关节挛缩
column4: 由于非骨性组织的结构改变，导致第二至第五指的近端指间关节活动的慢性丧失。
column5: Chronic loss of joint motion of the proximal interphalangeal joint of the 2nd, 3rd, 4th, and 5th fingers due to structural changes in non-bony tissue.

column4: 耳朵上部呈现尖角状，耳轮有不同程度的过度卷曲。
column5: Sharp pointed superior portion of the ear, with variable overfolding of the helix.

column4: 先天性的耳朵异形，其特征为耳廓的前上部有折皱样外观，耳甲腔中央突起，外耳道口出现裂缝样狭窄。
column5: A congenital auricular deformity, which is mainly characterized by a bulging appearance of the anterosuperior portion of the auricle, a convexly protruded cavum conchae, and a slit-like narrowing of the orifice of the external auditory meatus.

column4: 像花楸树上叶子形状的色素脱失斑
column5: A hypopigmented spot in the shape of a leaf from the mountain ash tree.

column4: 心脏和大血管的任何结构异常。
column5: Any structural anomaly of the heart and great vessels.

column4: 从心脏右心室和左心室的内表面突出的肌肉柱的结构异常（心脏小梁，肉柱）。
column5: Any structural anomaly of the muscular columns which project from the inner surface of the right and left ventricles of the heart (cardiac trabeculae, trabeculae carneae).

column3: 左心室心肌致密化不全
column4: 左心室心肌致密化不全（LVNC）由3个标记定义：左心室（LV）小梁突出，深间小梁凹陷，压实层变薄。
column5: Left ventricular noncompaction (LVNC) is defined by 3 markers: prominent left ventricular (LV) trabeculae, deep intertrabecular recesses, and the thin compacted layer.

column4: 阴道的炎症，可以导致溢液、瘙痒和疼痛。
column5: An inflammation of the vagina that can result in discharge, itching and pain.

column4: 脂联素水平降低，脂联素是一种大小为30kDa的主要由脂肪组织表达的分泌性补体C1相关蛋白，在调节胰岛素敏感性与糖代谢中发挥关键作用。
column5: A reduced circulating concentration of adiponectin, a 30-kDa complement C1-related protein that is the most abundant secreted protein expressed in adipose tissue.

column4: 脂联素水平增加，脂联素是一种大小为30kDa的主要由脂肪组织表达的分泌性补体C1相关蛋白，在调节胰岛素敏感性与糖代谢中发挥关键作用。
column5: An elevated circulating concentration of adiponectin, a 30-kDa complement C1-related protein that is the most abundant secreted protein expressed in adipose tissue.

column4: 胰高血糖素水平异常。
column5: A deviation from the normal concentration of glucagon in the blood circulation.

column4: 胰高血糖素水平增加。
column5: An elevated concentration of glucagon in the blood circulation.

column4: 胰高血糖素水平降低。
column5: A reduced concentration of glucagon in the blood circulation.

column4: 牙龈（牙龈）中的裂缝，如位于下颌骨和上颌骨上的粘膜组织的裂缝。
column5: A fissure in the gingiva (gums), i.e., the mucosal tissue that lies over the mandible and maxilla.

column4: 散开性眼震。
column5: Divergence nystagmus

column4: 由脑产生或转移的良性或恶性肿瘤。
column5: A benign or malignant neoplasm that arises from or metastasizes to the brain.

column4: 发生在小脑幕上方的颅内良性或恶性肿瘤。
column5: A benign or malignant neoplasm that occurs within the intracranial cavity above the tentorium cerebelli.

column4: 舌下囊肿是位于口底的黏液囊肿，常涉及大唾液腺。具体来说，舌下囊肿起源于舌下腺体、舌下腺管、下颌下腺的Wharton’s管，偶然也起源于小唾液腺。
column5: A ranula is a mucocele that occurs in the floor of the mouth and usually involve the major salivary glands. Specifically, the ranula originates in the body of the sublingual gland, in the ducts of the sublingual gland, in the Wharton's duct of the submandibular gland or infrequently from the minor salivary glands at this location.

column4: 单侧肺未发育。
column5: Lack of development of one lung.

column4: 神经管严重缺陷，其中开放神经管呈现为没有上覆膜的扁平板状神经组织。
column5: The severe form of a neural tube defect where the open neural tube appears as a flattened, plate-like mass of nervous tissue with no overlying membrane.

column4: 骨髓囊肿的特征在于脊髓中央管的尾端大的内膜囊性扩张；它通过椎板缺损进行背侧运动，覆盖不同量的脂肪膜皮下组织。骨髓间充质干细胞与脊髓蛛网膜下腔连通，但与中枢管囊肿无关。
column5: Myelocystocele is characterized by a large, ependyma-lined, cystic dilation of the caudal end of the central canal of the spinal cord; it projects dorsally through a lamina defect, with overlying varying amounts of lipomatous subcutaneous tissue. Myelocystoceles are associated with a tethered cord and meningocele, which communicates with the spinal subarachnoid space, but not with the central canal cyst.

column4: 一种闭合的神经管缺损，其中脊髓组织位于具有脊髓和脂肪瘤之间的连接处的脊髓内。完整的皮肤覆盖缺陷。这种现象常出现在生命的第二年。
column5: A form of closed neural tube defect in which the spinal tissue lies within the spinal cord having a junction between the spinal cord and the lipoma. Intact skin covers the defect. Neurologic findings first appear during the second year of life.

column4: 由于先天性阴道梗阻，引起液体积聚，而使阴道扩张。
column5: Distention of the vagina caused by accumulation of fluid due to congenital vaginal obstruction.

column4: 子宫腔内粘连或疤痕组织形成。
column5: Adhesions or scar tissue that form inside the cavity of the uterus.

column4: Galen静脉粗大扩张，由大血管异常或颈动脉/基底循环血管异常引起。
column5: Gross dilatation of the vein of Galen, being fed by large anomalous vessel or vessels arising from the carotid or basilar circulation.
A large maternal clot that separates the chorionic place from the villous chorion.

column4: 一种以支气管近端段的局部闭塞为特征的发育异常。支气管在狭窄部位的远端完全正常。
column5: A developmental anomaly characterised by focal obliteration of the proximal segment of a bronchus. The bronchial pattern is entirely normal distal to the site of stenosis.

column4: 颅顶部分或全部扁骨缺如。这种情况常被认为与无脑畸形相关。
column5: Partial or complete absence of the flat bones of the cranial vault. The condition is frequently, though not always, associated with anencephaly.

column4: 因子宫内肠破裂、胎粪溢至胎儿腹腔内导致的腹膜炎。腹腔内胎粪经常钙化，有时在24小时内发生。超声所见可能包括腹腔内钙化。
column5: peritonitis caused by intrauterine intestinal rupture and spillage of fetal meconium into the fetal peritoneal cavity. Intra-peritoneal meconium usually calcifies, sometimes within 24 hours. Ultrasound findings may include intraabdominal calcifications.

column4: 右心房体积增大。
column5: Increase in size of the right atrium.

column4: 三尖瓣发育不良的一种形式，虽然存在右心房和右心室之间正常的孔，但没有三尖瓣瓣膜组织。
column5: A form of agenesis of the tricuspid valve in which (although thennormal orifice between the right atrium and right ventricle exists)nthere is no tricuspid valvular tissue.
Cyst on the surface of the placenta consisting of amnion and chorion.

column4: 累及全部四肢的短肢畸形
column5: Phocomelia involving all four extremities.

column4: 异位肝是一种罕见的发育异常，肝组织位于肝脏之外。因此，异位肝指位于肝脏之外的独立岛状的正常肝实质。异位肝亦包括与肝脏完全分离但仍以细蒂附着于正常肝脏的“阑尾肝”。
column5: Ectopic liver is a rare developmental anomaly in which liver tissue is situated outside the liver. Thus, ectopic liver refers to autonomous islands of normal liver parenchyma located outside the liver. The term ectopic liver is also used, to include liver appendices attached to the native liver by a thin stalk although being fully separated from the latter.

column4: 扩张和伸长的阴茎尿道缺失或发育不良的全集松质和阴茎海绵体。
column5: Dilation and elongation of the penile urethra associated with absence or hypoplasia of the corpora spongiosa and cavernosa.

column4: 位于中枢神经系统内的充满液体的囊（囊肿）。
column5: A fluid-filled sac (cyst) located within the central nervous system.

column4: 神经性囊肿是由异位内胚层组织组成的罕见病变。在人类胚胎发生的第三个星期，当神经肠管穿过原始脊髓板时，神经肠管和羊膜腔结合。持续存在正常的神经管可防止内胚层和脊索的适当分离。这导致神经和肠上皮之间的可变程度的交流。
column5: The neurenteric cyst is a rare lesion composed of heterotopic endodermal tissue. During the third week of human embryogenesis, the neurenteric canal unites the yolk sac and the amniotic cavity as it traverses the primitive notochordal plate. Persistence of the normally transient neurenteric canal prevents appropriate separation of endoderm and notochord. This results in a variable degree of communication between neural and enteric epithelium.

column4: 位于脊柱的神经管原肠囊肿。
column5: A neurenteric cyst located in the spine.

column4: 位于颅内的神经管原肠囊肿。
column5: A neurenteric cyst located within the skull.

column4: 自由肢(不含肢带骨)的部分缺如。它可以指上下肢近端、中间或远端部分。缺如可以是横向或纵向。因此，残肢畸形是缺少单个或多个肢体的一部分，但不是全部，因此仍然具有手脚。
column5: Partial absence of a free limb (excluding girdle). It can refer to the proximal, middle or distal segment of the upper or lower limb. The deficiency may be transverse or longitudinal. Thus, meromelia is a lack of a part, but not all, of one or more limbs with the presence of a hand or foot.

column4: 通过先天性发生在颅骨与前额骨和骨骼的交界处的骨缺损而形成的脑疝。
column5: A herniation of meninges through a congenital bone defect in the skull at the junction of the frontal and ethmoidal bones.

column4: 通过先天性发生在颅骨顶部的骨缺损而形成的脑疝。
column5: A herniation of meninges through a congenital bone defect in the skull in the parietal region.

column4: 由上皮细胞发展而来的恶性肿瘤。由腺体上皮引起的癌称为腺癌，由鳞状上皮引起的癌称为鳞状细胞癌，而由过渡性上皮引起的癌称为过渡性细胞癌（NCI词典）。
column5: A malignant tumor arising from epithelial cells. Carcinomas that arise from glandular epithelium are called adenocarcinomas, those that arise from squamous epithelium are called squamous cell carcinomas, and those that arise from transitional epithelium are called transitional cell carcinomas (NCI Thesaurus).

column4: 三尖瓣先天性畸形，其特征在于小叶变形。
column5: A congenital malformation of the tricuspid valve characterized by leaflet deformation.

column4: 腹壁的缺损，与尿囊的发育异常有关，尿囊是一个胚胎结构，大约受精后16天由卵黄囊发展成的一个憩室。在进一步发育过程中，尿囊与胚胎合并形成一体，连接着腹侧的泌尿生殖窦(发展成膀胱的上部)与脐的外部。进一步发展后，尿囊腔闭塞形成一个粗大的纤维索即脐尿管，连接的膀胱顶点和脐。到成年，脐尿管被称为脐正中韧带。尿囊腔若不能消退，导致四个后果之一：1)先天性脐尿管开放(膀胱与脐之间的一个完全开放的通道)；2)膀胱脐尿管憩室(膀胱的一个憩室，但不与脐相通)；3)脐带囊肿和窦(与膀胱不相通)；4)脐尿管窦。腹壁缺陷可以伴脐尿管囊肿。
column5: An abdominal wall defected related to a developmental anomaly of the allantois, which is an embryonic structure that develops as a diverticulum off the yolk sac at about 16 days post fertilization. During further development, the allantois becomes incorporated into the body of the embryo, connecting the ventral aspect of the urogenital sinus (which will develop into the upper pole of the urinary bladder) to the external portion of the umbilicus. Upon further development, the lumen of the allantois becomes obliterated and forms a thick fibrous cord called the urachus, which connects the apex of the bladder to the umbilicus. In adults, the urachus is known as the median umbilical ligament. Failure of the allantoic cavity to obliterate can result of one of four conditions: 1) congenital patent urachus (a completely open connection between bladder and umbilicus); 2) vesicourachal diverticulum (a diverticulum off the bladder but not communicating with the umbilicus); umbilical cyst and sinus (not communicating with the bladder); and 4) alternating urachal sinus. An abdominal wall defect can be associated with a urachal cyst.

column3: 膀胱输尿管交界处梗阻
column4: 于膀胱和输尿管水平发生的堵塞，由以下两种因素引起：输尿管瓣膜的狭窄或由于节段性纤维化或局部缺乏肌肉导致的接近膀胱的输尿管段不能舒张。
column5: Blockage at the level of the bladder and the ureter caused by stenosis of the ureteral valves or failure of a narrow juxtavesical ureteral segment to dilate due to segmented fibrosis or localized absence of muscle.

column4: 骶尾部区域发生的畸胎瘤。
column5: A teratoma arising in the sacro-coccygeal region.

column3: 奥特曼 I 型骶尾部畸胎瘤
column4: 骶尾部畸胎瘤的一种类型，主要位于外部，从骶尾区域伸出并呈现臀部的扭曲。
column5: A type of sacrococcygeal teratoma that is predominantly external and projects from the sacrococcygeal region and presents with distortion of the buttocks.

column3: 奥特曼 II 型骶尾部畸胎瘤
column4: 骶尾部畸胎瘤的一种类型，主要位于内部，含有巨大的盆腔内肿物。
column5: A type of sacrococcygeal teratoma that is predominantly external but has a large intrapelvic component.

column3: 奥特曼 III 型骶尾部畸胎瘤
column4: 骶尾部畸胎瘤的一种类型，主要为盆腔内肿物，伴小型的外臀部肿物。
column5: A type of sacrococcygeal teratoma that is predominantly intrapelvic with a small external, buttock mass.

column2: Anomalous muscle bundle of the right ventricle
column4: 右心室中的辅助（通常不存在）肌束阻塞右心室流出道。
column5: An accessory (not normally present) muscle bundle in the right ventricle which obstructs the right ventricular outflow tract.

column4: 一个位于纵隔的畸胎瘤（纵膈包含心脏的胸膜和除肺外的所有胸部内脏之间的腔）。
column5: A teratoma located with the mediastinum (the cavity between the pleural sacs that contains the heart and all of the thoracic viscera except the lungs).

column4: 这种异常又称Mittendorf点，是一种良性、非进展性、可识别的病变，不引起视力损伤。但它类似一种先天性病理性或获得性的白内障病变，导致视力损伤出现和加重。点呈现黑色斑点状，大小从尖锐的铅笔点到罂粟籽不等。通常界限清晰，偶有不规则的放射状线条从点向外辐射。
column5: This anomaly, also known as Mittendorf dot, is a benign, nonprogressive recognizable lesion that does not cause visual impairment. However, it can resemble a pathological congenital or acquired cataract lesion which may enlarge and cause visual impairment. The dot appears as a black speck that ranges in size from the dot made by a sharp pencil point to the size of a poppy seed. It is usually well defined, although occasionally there may be irregular, fine lines radiating outward from the dot.

column2: Glial remnants anterior to the optic disc
column3: 视神经盘前方胶质残余
column4: 视盘前方原始玻璃体的血管残留。
column5: Persistanced of a posterior remnant of the hyaloid artery located at the optic disc.

column2: Hyaloid vascular remnant and retrolental mass
column3: 玻璃体血管残余和晶体后团块
column4: 玻璃体血管残余和晶体后团块，可致先天性白内障
column5: A type of persistance of the hyaloid vascular system associated with a retrolental mass that may lead to fetal cataract.

column4: 导管动脉导管的囊状或梭形扩张和伸长。
column5: A saccular or fusiform dilation and elongation of the ductus arteriosus.

column4: 血液流至脑室内。
column5: Bleeding into the ventricles of the brain.

column4: 早产儿的脑室内出血。
column5: Intraventricular hemorrhage that occurs in a premature infant.

column3: 早产儿脑室内出血 I 级
column4: 发生在早产儿的脑室内出血，仅限于在丘脑丘沟中看到的室管膜下区/生发基质。
column5: Intraventricular hemorrhage that occurs in a preterm infant and that is restricted to subependymal region/germline matrix which is seen in the caudothalamic groove.

column3: 早产儿脑室内出血 II 级
column4: 在早产儿发生的脑室内出血，并且已经延伸到正常大小的脑室，并且通常填充小于脑室体积的50％。
column5: Intraventricular hemorrhage that occurs in a preterm infant and that has extension into normal-sized ventricles and typically fills less than 50% of the volume of the ventricle.

column3: 早产儿脑室内出血 III 级
column4: 在早产儿发生的脑室内出血，并延伸到扩张的脑室。
column5: Intraventricular hemorrhage that occurs in a preterm infant and that has extension into dilated ventricles.

column3: 早产儿脑室内出血 IV 级
column4: 在早产儿发生的脑室内出血，并延伸到脑实质。
column5: Intraventricular hemorrhage that occurs in a preterm infant and that shows parenchymal extension.

column4: 鼻泪管阻塞，表现为内侧凹陷正下方的灰蓝色囊肿肿胀。泪囊突出被认为是Rosenmuller瓣上部阻塞伴Hasner瓣下部阻塞的结果。
column5: A nasolacrimal duct obstruction presenting as a grey-blue cystic swelling just below the medial canthus. Believed to be a result of concomitant upper obstruction of the Rosenmuller valve and lower obstruction of the Hasner valve.

column2: Intrauterine fetal demise of one twin after midgestation
column3: 妊娠中期之后双胞胎之一宫内胎儿死亡
column5: Loss of one twin occurring after midgestation (17 weeks gestation).

column4: 尿囊囊肿是脐[此条以下进行了修改，但没有存入。以上还有需要修改的。待开放之后再说。]的底部的肿胀和开放性脐尿管（它缘于尿囊遗迹）。脐尿管是尿囊的纤维状残余，尿囊沟通膀胱的顶点与脐。脐尿管闭合失败可导致许多种异常:脐尿管囊肿、脐尿管憩室、窦或开放性脐尿管，后者是最常见的类型。由于将尿液引入脐带，或在罕见情况下,将低渗的尿液泄漏到华通氏胶，婴儿会形成尿囊囊肿伴开放性脐尿管。
column5: A swelling formed at the base of umbilicus associated with a patent urachus which results from an allantoic remnant. The urachus is a fibrous remnant of the allantois which communicates from the apex of the urinary bladder to the umbilicus. Failed obliteration of the urachus can lead to various abnormalities: urachal cyst, urachal diverticulum, sinus or patent urachus - the most common type. Allantoic cysts in infants with patent urachus can be formed due to the drainage of urine into the umbilical cord, or in uncommon situations, after leakage of hypo-osmotic urine into the Wharton's jelly.

column4: 位于颅面部的畸胎瘤。
column5: A teratoma located in the craniofacial region.

column4: 在正常光线下，牙齿出现棕色乳白色变色。
column5: reddish, brown opalescent discoloration of teeth in normal light.

column4: 位于牙齿区域内的脓袋。
column5: A pocket of pus located within a region of a tooth.

column4: 发生在牙齿根尖（尖端）尖端的牙脓肿。
column5: A tooth abscess that occurs at the tip of the root (apex) of a tooth.

column4: 脂肪细胞平均体积增大。这种特性可以通过活检脂肪组织在显微镜下测量脂肪细胞的平均直径确定。
column5: An increase in mean adipocyte cell size. This feature can be measured by determining the average cell diameter of adipocytes microscopically using abdominal subcutaneous adipose tissue obtained by biopsy.

column4: 肾纤维化是细胞外基质的过度积累的结果,发生在几乎所有类型的慢性肾脏疾病。
column5: Renal fibrosis is the consequence of an excessive accumulation of extracellular matrix that occurs in virtually every type of chronic kidney disease.

column4: 肾小球系膜基质分解或衰减及系膜细胞的退化。从本质上讲,肾小球系膜的溶解是一个有害的过程，影响了肾小球系膜，但没有造成明显的毛细血管基底膜损害。基质膨胀、松懈,最终溶解,系膜细胞可能只显示出水肿和液泡化,也可能经历严重的变性和坏死。
column5: Dissolution or attenuation of mesangial matrix and degeneration of mesangial cells. In essence, mesangiolysis is an injurious process which affects the glomerular mesangium without causing obvious damage to the capillary basement membranes. The matrix swells, loosens, and eventually dissolves; the mesangial cells may show only edema and vacuolization, or may undergo severe degeneration and necrosis.
A sheet like projection that can result from uterine synechiae that has been encompassed by the expanding chorion and amnion.

column4: 发生在腋窝、腹股沟、面部以及掌跖部位的皮肤褐色或灰色样变。此外，在软骨区域，如耳朵，可出现皮肤深蓝色样变。这是黑尿酸尿症的特征表现，这是一种常染色体隐性遗传缺陷导致的尿黑酸氧化酶的尿黑酸胶原结构的沉积。巩膜也可累及。
column5: Brown or blue-gray discoloration of the skin that can present on the axillary and inguinal areas, face, palms or soles. In addition, blue-black discoloration can be apparent on skin overlying cartilage in which the pigment is deposited, such as the ears. This is a characteristic manifestation of alkaptonuria, which is an autosomal recessively inherited deficiency of homogentisic acid oxidase that results in accumulation of homogentisic acid in collagenous structures. The sclerae are also typically involved.

column4: 强烈的恐惧，尖叫和鞭打中仍能入睡。
column5: Episodes of intense fear, screaming and flailing although affected individuals are still asleep.

column4: 上颌寄生胎畸胎是源于上颚的畸胎瘤，通常与蝶骨或硬腭相连。
column5: Epignathus is a teratoma originating from the upper jaw, usually connected with the sphenoid bone or hard palate.

column4: 神经管的畸形具有大量突出的脑组织和颅顶缺如。
column5: A malformation of the neural tube with a large amount of protruding brain tissue and absence of calvarium.

column4: 神经管缺陷，其中脑和脊髓保持不同程度的开放。
column5: A neural tube defect in which both the brain and spinal cord remain open to varying degrees.

column4: 槌状指是指手指末节指骨弯曲不能伸直。在这种情况下，关节可以被推直但无法自行保持伸直状态。
column5: Mallet finger refers to a condition in which the end joint of a finger bends but will not straighten by itself. In this situation, the joint can be pushed straight but will not hold that position on its own.

column4: 股骨近端局灶性缺损是一种以伴随整个肢体短缩而股骨可变部分发育不全为表现的畸形
column5: Proximal femoral focal deficiency is a deformity manifested by hypoplasia of a variable portion of the femur with shortening of the entire limb.

column4: 一种共轭外侧凝视异常，受累眼出现内收障碍。特征性的临床症状为内收受损，可以通过同侧身体内侧纵行区域病变侧的水平扫视检查显示。
column5: An abnormality of conjugate lateral gaze in which the affected eye shows impairment of adduction. The pathognomonic clinical sign of internuclear ophthalmoplegia is an impaired adduction while testing horizontal saccades on the side of the lesion in the ipsilateral medial longitudinal fascicule.

The mitochondrial matrix refers to the substance occupying the space enclosed by the inner membrane of a mitochondrion, which contains enzymes, DNA, granules, and inclusions of protein crystals, glycogen, and lipid. Mitochondrial swelling refers to an increase in size of the mitochondrial matrix. This phenomenon is thought to be related to a permeabilized inner membrane that originates a large swelling in the mitochondrial matrix. Mitochondrial swelling may distend the outer membrane until it ruptures.

column3: Modic 类型椎体终板改变
column4: 由Michael Modic博士提出的以磁共振成像对椎体终板进行分类的方式。
column5: An abnormal magnetic resonance tomography signal from a vertebral endplate according to a widely used classification published by Dr. Michael Modic.

column2: Modic type I vertebral endplate changes
column3: Modic I 型椎体终板改变
column4: 椎体终板的磁共振断层成像信号异常，其具有T1加权序列上的低信号和T2加权序列上的高信号。Modic I型改变被认为代表骨髓水肿和炎症。
column5: An abnormal magnetic resonance tomography signal from a vertebral endplate with a low signal on T1-weighted sequences and high signal on T2-weighted sequences. Modic type I changes are thought to represent bone marrow edema and inflammation.

column2: Modic type II vertebral endplate changes
column3: Modic II 型椎体终板改变
column4: 椎体终板的磁共振断层成像信号异常，其具有T1加权序列上的高信号和T2加权序列上的高或中等信号。Modic II型改变被认为代表脂肪组织取代骨髓。
column5: An abnormal magnetic resonance tomography signal from a vertebral endplate with a high signal on T1-weighted sequences and high- or isointense signal on T2 sequences. Modic type II signals are thought to indicate fatty replacement in the bone marrow.

column2: Modic type III vertebral endplate changes
column3: Modic III 型椎体终板改变
column4: 椎体终板的磁共振断层成像信号异常，其具有T1加权序列和T2加权序列上的低信号。Modic III型改变被认为是对软骨下硬化的反应。
column5: An abnormal magnetic resonance tomography signal from a vertebral endplate with a low signal on T1 and T2-weighted sequences. Modif type III signals are thought to correspond to subchondral sclerosis seen on plain radiographs.

column4: 猿头畸形是脑缺血发育的罕见形式，由于前脑不完全分裂而发生。临床上，这种疾病呈现长鼻，偏倚，小眼睛和畸形的耳朵。
column5: Ethmocephaly is the rarest form of holoprosencephaly, which occurs due to an incomplete cleavage of the forebrain. Clinically, the disease presents with a proboscis, hypotelorism, microphthalmos and malformed ears.

column2: Abnormality of the protein C anticoagulant pathway
column3: 蛋白 C 抗凝途径异常
column4: 蛋白C抗凝血途径的异常，其作为控制血栓形成的主要系统，限制炎症反应，以及潜在地减少内皮细胞凋亡以响应炎性细胞因子和缺血。 表示蛋白C途径的天然抗凝剂体系通过调节FVIIIa和FVa的活性来发挥其抗凝血作用。 维生素K依赖蛋白C是途径的关键组成部分。 活化蛋白C（APC）切割并抑制凝血辅助因子FVIIIa和FVa，这导致凝血系统活性的下调。 内皮蛋白C受体刺激T-TM介导的蛋白C在内皮细胞表面的活化。 两种辅因子蛋白S和完整形式的FV增强了APC的抗凝血活性。
column5: An anomaly of the protein C anticoagulant pathway, which serves as a major system for controlling thrombosis, limiting inflammatory responses, and potentially decreasing endothelial cell apoptosis in response to inflammatory cytokines and ischemia. A natural anticoagulant system denoted the protein C pathway exerts its anticoagulant effect by regulating the activity of FVIIIa and FVa. The vitamin K-dependent protein C is the key component of the pathway. Activated protein C (APC) cleaves and inhibits coagulation cofactors FVIIIa and FVa, which result in downregulation of the activity of the coagulation system. The endothelial protein C receptor stimulates the T-TM-mediated activation of protein C on the endothelial cell surface. The two cofactors, protein S and the intact form of FV, enhance the anticoagulant activity of APC.

column2: Increased circulating free fatty acid level
column3: 循环系统内游离脂肪酸水平增高
column5: A higher than normal levels of the fatty acids which can occur in plasma as a result of lipolysis in adipose tissue or when plasma triacyglycerols are taken into tissues.

column4: 循环中任何白介素（一类细胞因子）的量异常。
column5: An abnormal amount of any of the interleukins, a class of cytokines, in the circulation.

column4: 循环中白细胞介素-6浓度增加。
column5: An increased concentration of interleukin-6 in the circulation.

column4: 无法命名正确感知的人物和物体。个人能够描述有问题的对象，但不能提供名称。
column5: An inability to name people and objects that are correctly perceived. The individual is able to describe the object in question, but cannot provide the name.

column4: 淋巴管瘤（先天性畸形，由多囊性或海绵状结构中的分化良好的淋巴组织的局限性增生组成）位于纵隔内，即由松散结缔组织包围的胸腔的中央隔室。纵隔淋巴管瘤是一种缓慢生长的肿块，具有良性特征，占纵隔肿瘤的1％。
column5: A lymphangioma (congenital malformation consisting of focal proliferations of well-differentiated lymphatic tissue in multi cystic or sponge like structures) located within the mediastinum, i.e., the central compartment of the thoracic cavity that is surrounded by loose connective tissue. Mediastinal lymphangioma is a slow growing mass with benign features, and accounts for 1% of all mediastinal tumors.

column4: 感觉闪光存在。
column5: Perceived flashes of light.

column4: 耵聍（耳垢）的任何异常，耵聍是耳道分泌的黄色腊样物质。
column5: Any anomaly of the cerumen (ear wax), the yellowish waxy substance secreted in the ear canal.

column4: 外耳道由于耵聍堆积发生堵塞。
column5: Blockage of the external auditory canal by a buildup of earwax.

column4: 耵聍数量增多。
column5: An increased quantity of earwax.

column4: 耳垢颜色异常。耳垢（耵聍）通常为浅棕色到深棕色，或为橘黄色。
column5: An anomolous earwax color. Earwax (cerumen) is usually light to dark brown or orange in color.

column4: 颌部结构异常，其骨性结构包括上颌骨和下颌骨。
column5: A structural anomaly of the jaw, the bony structure of the mouth that consists of the mandible and the maxilla.

column4: 颌部（上颌或下颌）来源的肿瘤。
column5: A tumor originating in the jaw (mandible or maxilla).

column4: 上颌或下颌异常肿大。
column5: Abnormal enlargement in the upper jaw (maxilla) or in the lower jaw (mandible).

An anomolous circulating concentration of the connecting (C) peptide, which links the insulin A and B chains in proinsulin, providing thereby a means to promote their efficient folding and assembly in the endoplasmic reticulum during insulin biosynthesis. After cleavage of proinsulin, C-peptide is stored with insulin in the soluble phase of the secretory granules and is subsequently released in equimolar amounts with insulin, providing a useful independent indicator of insulin secretion.
A decreased concentration of C-peptide in the circulation. Since C-peptide is secreted in equimolar amounts to insulin, this feature correlates with reduced insulin secretion.
An elevated concentration of C-peptide in the circulation. Since C-peptide is secreted in equimolar amounts to insulin, this feature correlates with increased insulin secretion.

column2: Reduced volume of central subdivision of bed nucleus of stria terminalis
column3: 终纹床核中央区体积减少
column4: 终纹床核中央区体积的减少。
column5: A diminished volume of the central part of the bed nucleus of the stria terminalis.

column2: Abnormality of the bed nucleus of stria terminalis
column4: 终纹是细长的，紧密的纤维束，将杏仁核（杏仁体）与下丘脑和其他基底前脑区域连接起来。终纹的床核是一种边缘前脑结构，从其他区域接受基底外侧杏仁核的重度突出，并依次向下丘脑和脑干目标区域进行调节，这些区域介导了对厌恶或威胁性刺激的许多自主和行为反应。这个术语是指床核的异常。
column5: The stria terminalis is a slender, compact fiber bundle that connects the amygdala (amygdaloid body) with the hypothalamus and other basal forebrain regions. The bed nucleus of the stria terminalis is a limbic forebrain structure that receives heavy projections from, among other areas, the basolateral amygdala, and projects in turn to hypothalamic and brainstem target areas that mediate many of the autonomic and behavioral responses to aversive or threatening stimuli. This term refers to an anomaly of the bed nucleus.

column4: 舟状头是头颅的一个亚型，其颅顶的前部和后部是尖的（船形）。 舟状头是由矢状缝合的过早融合而其他颅缝未闭合引起的。
column5: Scaphocephaly is a subtype of dolichocephaly where the anterior and posterior aspects of the cranial vault are pointed (boat-shaped). Scaphocephaly is caused by a precocious fusion of sagittal suture without other associated synostosis.

column4: 视觉调节功能异常，调节功能使人们看不同距离的物体均有清晰的图像。调节通过睫状肌的收缩进行调控，从而改变晶状体的凸度和折射能力。
column5: An anomaly in the process of visual accommodation, which is the process of adjustment of the eye to enable sharp vision of objects at different distances. Accommodation is mediated by contraction of the ciliary muscles, which alter the convexity of the lens and, consequently, its refractive power.

column4: 视觉调节能力下降
column5: A decreased ability of the eye to adjust and thereby enable sharp vision of objects at different distances.

column4: 下眼睑边缘的下垂错位，无眼皮外翻。
column5: Inferior malposition of the lower eyelid margin without eyelid eversion.

column4: 甲异常扁平。
column5: Abnormal flat nail.

column4: 甲纵脊过度突出使得甲床表面看上去较为粗糙。由甲基质近端的多个异常角化所致。
column5: Excessive longitudinal ridging that gives the surface of the nail plate a rough appearance. It results from multiple foci of defective keratinization of the proximal nail matrix.

column4: 甲底部的半月痕缺失。甲半月是指（趾）甲床的半月形白色区域。
column5: Lack of the lunula at the base of a nail. The lunula is the crescent-shaped whitish area of the bed of a fingernail or toenail.

column4: 甲生长速度比正常情况下快。
column5: Nails whose growth is quicker than normal.

column4: 甲生长的方式和速度偏离正常。
column5: Nail whose growth pattern or speed deviates from normal.

column4: 甲表皮(称为甲上皮或内侧甲襞或近端甲襞),是指（趾）甲周围的厚层皮肤。它的功能是保护甲和表皮之间区域，避免接触细菌。这个术语是指甲表皮的不规则的边缘或轮廓。
column5: The cuticle (properly known as the eponychium, or the medial nail fold or the proximal nail fold), is the thickened layer of skin surrounding fingernails and toenails. Its function is to protect the area between the nail and epidermis from exposure to bacteria. This term refers to the presence of and irregular edge or outline of the cuticle.

column4: 舌头形态的异常。
column5: Any structural anomaly of the tongue.

column4: 舌头生理的异常。
column5: Any functional anomaly of the tongue.

column4: 令人不快的感觉，其特征在于局部于舌头的身体不适（例如刺痛，悸动或疼痛）。
column5: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the tongue.

column4: 扁桃体的大小增加，淋巴组织的小集合面向喉部后部两侧的呼吸消化道。
column5: Increase in size of the tonsils, small collections of lymphoid tissue facing into the aerodigestive tract on either side of the back part of the throat.

column4: 缺乏可见的扁桃体组织
column5: Lack of observable tonsillar tissue.

column4: 橙色口腔扁桃体现象。 该特征是丹吉尔病的特征，图1所示为PMID：19470903。
column5: A phenomenon of orange colored oral tonsils. This feature is characteristic of Tangier disease and illustrated will by Figure 1 of PMID:19470903.

column4: 脂肪瘤局限于舌头，是一种不变的，柔软的，球形的舌头肿物。
column5: A lipoma localized to the tongue. May present as a nontender, soft, spherical mass of the tongue.
The loss of gum tissue. The result is that gum tissue is recessed and its position on the tooth is lowered, exposing the roots of the teeth.

column4: 严重的甲弯曲，引起甲尖向下指向手指的轴心。喙状甲常常由远端指吸收所致。
column5: Severe nail curvature, causing the tip of the nail to point downwards with respect to the axis of the finger. Beaked nails are caused by resorption of the distal digit.

column4: 在甲中间出现的一条深在的中线。
column5: The presense of a depressed line ("canal") in the center of the nail.

column4: 甲前缘上方呈倾斜状。
column5: Nails that slope upward at the free edge.

column4: 牙龈组织损失。结果是牙龈组织凹陷并且其在牙齿上的位置降低，暴露牙齿的根部
column5: Eyelid partly covered by skin when eyes are open.

column4: 眼睛睁开时，下眼睑被皮肤部分遮盖。
column5: Lower eyelid partly covered by skin when eyes are open.

column4: 眼睛睁开时，上眼睑被皮肤部分遮盖。
column5: Upper eyelid partly covered by skin when eyes are open.

column4: 巩膜增厚
column5: Increased dimension of the sclera in the anterior-posterior axis.

column4: 指眼底颜色的变化，黑暗中为红色，光照后迅速变为金黄色。光照后的眼底颜色被描述为金黄色，灰白色和黄白色。这一反射可以在眼底中均匀出现或者成条排列。相较于辐射状的背景，视网膜血管相对突出。暗适应使得异常的眼底颜色消失。
column5: Change in the color of the fundus from red in the dark-adapted state to golden immediately or shortly after the onset of the light. The color of the fundus reflex in the light adapted state has also been described as golden-yellow, gray-white, and yellow-white. This reflex can appear either homogeneous or in streaks in the fundus. The retinal vessels appear to be protruding in contrast to the radiant background. Dark adaptation leads to disappearance of the unusual fundus coloration [Digital Journal of Ophthalmology 2008; Volume 14, Number 14].

column4: 黄斑中心凹反光缺失，这一反射通常是检眼镜对中心凹进行检查中出现。中心凹反射是一个明亮的光点，可以根据检眼镜的移动向侧边或者上下移动。
column5: Lack of the foveal reflex, which normally occurs as a result of the reflection of light from the ophthalmoscope in the foveal pit upon examination. The foveal reflex is a bright pinpoint of light that is observed to move sideways or up and down in response to movement of the opthalmoscope.

column4: 眼睑轻微的、重复的肌肉收缩，引起抽搐。
column5: Tiny, repetitive muscle contractions in the eyelids, causing the appearance of twitching.

column4: 呼吸产生的尖锐声音。
column5: A high-pitched whistling sound associated with labored breathing.

column4: 呼吸产生的异常声音。
column5: An anomalous (adventitious) sound produced by the breathing process.

column4: 以不连续点击或咔嗒声为特征的异常呼吸音。
column5: Abnormal breath sounds characterized by discontinuous clicking or rattling.

column4: 以低沉的，打鼾或拨浪鼓般的声音为特征的异常呼吸音。
column5: Abnormal breath sounds characterized by low-pitched, snoring or rattle-like sounds.

column4: 玻璃体中纤维状或绳状浑浊。
column5: Fiber- or rope-like opacities located within the vitreous humor.

column4: 令人不愉快的感觉，其特征在于定位于颈部的身体不适（例如刺痛，悸动或疼痛）。
column5: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the neck.

column4: 以身体不适（例如刺痛，悸动或疼痛）为特征的令人不愉快的感觉，局限于肩部。
column5: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the shoulder.

column4: 以身体不适（例如刺痛，悸动或疼痛）为特征的令人不愉快的感觉，局限于手肘部。
column5: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the elbow.神经系统的异常

column4: 以身体不适（例如刺痛，悸动或疼痛）为特征的令人不愉快的感觉，局限于手腕关节。
column5: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the wrist.神经系统的异常

column4: 以身体不适（例如刺痛，悸动或疼痛）为特征的令人不愉快的感觉，局限于手指。
column5: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the finger.

column4: 以身体不适（例如刺痛，悸动或疼痛）为特征的令人不愉快的感觉，局限于髋部。
column5: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the hip.

column4: 以身体不适（例如刺痛，悸动或疼痛）为特征的令人不愉快的感觉，局限于膝部。
column5: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the knee.

column4: 以身体不适（例如刺痛，悸动或疼痛）为特征的令人不愉快的感觉，局限于脚踝。
column5: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the ankle.神经系统的异常

column4: 以身体不适（例如刺痛，悸动或疼痛）为特征的令人不愉快的感觉，局限于脚趾。
column5: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the toe.

column4: 食物或其他物品卡在上呼吸道中，引起咳嗽，呕吐，不能说话和呼吸困难的事件。
column5: Incidents in which a piece of food or other objects get stuck in the upper airway and provoke coughing, gagging, inability to talk, and difficulty breathing.

Extracellular deposition in cardiac tissue of a proteinaceous material that, when stained with Congo red, demonstrates apple-green birefringence under polarized light and that has a distinct color when stained with sulfated Alcian blue. Viewed with electron microscopy, the amyloid deposits are seen to be composed of a beta-sheet fibrillar material. These nonbranching fibrils have a diameter of 7.5 to 10 nm and are the result of protein misfolding.

column3: 图形视网膜电图检测不到波形
column4: 图形视网膜电图（RFG)检测不到波形。
column5: Absent response to a pattern electroretinogram (PERG).

column4: 向阳性皮疹是与眶周水肿相关的眼睑的一种紫色变色。
column5: Heliotrope rash is a violaceous discoloration of the eyelids associated with periorbital edema.

column4: 静脉生理异常。
column5: An anomaly of venous function.

column4: 颈静脉压力异常。与上腔静脉连续的颈内静脉提供了系统性静脉血管充填程度的测量方法。在右心房扩张并且高于被测折叠部位的垂直高度，提供了右心房压力的不完全反映。
column5: An anomaly of the jugular venous pressure. The internal jugular veins, being continuous with the superior vena cava, provide a visible measure of the degree to which the systemic venous reservoir is filled. The vertical height above the right atrium to which they are distended and above which they are in a collapsed state provides an imperfect reflection of the right atrial pressure.

column4: 颈静脉压升高。
column5: Increased jugular venous pressure.

column4: 检查者在观察平均颈静脉压力的同时对肝脏施加坚固但持续的压力10秒。通常情况下，平均静脉压平均值不会上升或仅有暂时性（即2〜3秒）升高。直到腹部压迫释放的平均静脉压持续增加是异常，表明右心功能受损。这种异常反应称为肝炎回流。
column5: The examiner applies firm but persistent pressure over the liver for 10 seconds while observing the mean jugular venous pressure. Normally there is either no rise or only a transient (i.e., 2 to 3 sec) rise in mean jugular venous pressure. A sustained increase in the mean venous pressure until abdominal compression is released is abnormal and indicates impaired right heart function. This abnormal response is called hepatojugular reflux.

column4: 脉压的异常。脉压被定义为收缩压减去舒张压。
column5: An anomaly of the pulse pressure, which is defined as the systolic pressured minus the diastolic pressure.

column4: 脉压（收缩压减去舒张压）降低。
column5: Reduced amplitude of the pulse pressure (systolic blood pressure minus diastolic blood pressure).

column4: 脉压（收缩压减去舒张压）升高。
column5: Increased amplitude of the pulse pressure (systolic blood pressure minus diastolic blood pressure).

column4: 胸腹部内脏器官的左右位置异常。
column5: An abnormality in which the internal thoraco-abdominal organs demonstrate abnormal arrangement across the left-right axis of the body.

column4: 巩膜葡萄肿是由于巩膜厚度或结构的改变导致葡萄膜组织向眼球外突出的局灶性病变。
column5: A staphyloma is a localized defect in the eye wall with protrusion of uveal tissue due to alterations in scleral thickness and structure.
A localized defect in the anterior eye wall with protrusion of uveal tissue due to alterations in scleral thickness and structure.

column4: 后巩膜葡萄肿是由于后巩膜厚度或结构的改变导致葡萄膜组织向眼球后壁外突出的局灶性病变。
column5: A localized defect in the posterior eye wall with protrusion of uveal tissue due to alterations in scleral thickness and structure.

column4: 一种令人不愉快的感觉，其特征在于局限于眼睛的某些方向的凝视和长时间注视持续期间的身体不适（例如刺痛，悸动或疼痛）。
column5: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the eye that is worse in certain directions of gaze and during prolonged gaze holding.

column4: 一种反复的行为模式，由于没有抵制冲动、驱动或诱惑来执行对人或其他人有害的行为。这些行为的重复参与最终会干扰其他领域的运作。
column5: A recurrent pattern of behavior that is characeterized by the failure to resist an impulse, drive, or temptation to perform an act that is harmful to the person or to others. The repetitive engagement in these behaviors ultimately interferes with functioning in other domains.

column4: 血清中存在抗拓扑异构酶I的自身抗体
column5: The presence of autoantibodies (immunoglobulins) in the serum that react against topoisomerase I.

column3: 脑脊液淀粉样蛋白水平异常
column4: 脑脊液淀粉样蛋白的浓度异常。
column5: Abnormal concentration of amyloid in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF).

column3: 脑脊液淀粉样蛋白水平降低
column4: 脑脊液淀粉样蛋白的浓度降低。
column5: Reduced concentration of amyloid in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF).

column3: 脑脊液淀粉样蛋白水平升高
column4: 脑脊液淀粉样蛋白的浓度升高。
column5: Increased concentration of amyloid in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF).

column4: 吸气时鼻孔扩大，是呼吸窘迫的表现。
column5: Widening of the nostrils upon inhalation as a manifestation of respiratory distress.

column4: 吸气时在肋骨之间向内拉动软组织。 这是增加胸部肌肉用于呼的迹象，并且是呼吸窘迫的表现。
column5: A pulling inward of the soft tissues between the ribs upon inhalation. This is a sign of increased use of the chest muscles for breathing and is a manifestation of respiratory distress.

column4: 肘关节异常增大。
column5: Abnormal increased size of the elbow joint.

column4: 膝关节异常增大
column5: Abnormally increased size of the knee joint.

column4: 两只眼球不在同一水平面上，即一只眼球高，一只眼球低。
column5: The orbits do not lie on the same horizontal plane, that is, one eye is lower than the other.

column4: 阴囊中只有一个睾丸。
column5: Having only one testis in the scrotum.

column4: XY个体性别发育异常，特征是出生时两侧都没有睾丸。
column5: An abnormality of XY sexual development characterized by the absence of both testes at birth.

column4: 椎体后方的小关节异常。
column5: An anomaly of the small joints located between and behind adjacent vertebrae.

column4: 脊柱小关节的炎症。在X线上表现为小关节间的软骨退行性改变导致骨摩擦增加和反应性新骨形成。
column5: Osteoarthritis of facet joints in the spine. Degeneration of cartilage in the facet joints results in bone rubbing on bone and reactive new bone formation visible on X-ray.

column4: 心室功能的异常。
column5: An abnormality of the cardiac ventricular function.

column4: #####血清中存在抗着丝点的自身抗体
column5: The presence of autoantibodies (immunoglobulins) in the serum that react against the centromeres or centromere components.

column3: 用力时血氧饱和度下降
column4: 氧气饱和度小于95％，运动或氧气的动脉分压下降超过1kPa。
column5: Oxygen saturation less than 95% on exertion or arterial partial pressure of oxygen falling by more than 1kPa.呼吸系统异常

column4: 心脏血管系统部分的功能异常。该部分心血管系统指将脱氧血液从心脏携带到肺部，并将氧合血液回送到心脏。
column5: A functional anomaly of that portion of the cardiosvascular system that carries deoxygenated blood from the heart to the lungs and rturns oxygenated blood back to the heart.

column4: 肺毛细血管楔压（PCWP）高于15mmHg。
column5: Pulmonary capillary wedge pressure (PCWP) above 15mmHg.

column2: Obstructive deficit on pulmonary function testing
column3: 肺功能检测中呈阻塞性病变
column4: FEV1 / FVC小于0.7（FEV1-1秒内用力呼气量；FVC-强制肺活量）。
column5: FEV1/FVC less than 0.7 (FEV1 - forced expiratory volume in 1 second; FVC forced vital capacity).

column4: 肺功能检查的任何异常测量，包括肺量计、扩散能力测量和体积描记法。
column5: Any anomaly measure by pulmonary function testing, which includes spirometry, measures of diffusing capacity, and plethysmography.

column4: 在CT扫描中看到肺部小叶间隔的增厚。
column5: Presence of thickening of the interlobular septa of the lungs as seen on a CT scan.

column4: 在肩运动时压迫肩肌腱袖。
column5: Trapping and compression of the rotator cuff tendons during shoulder movements.

column4: 股骨髋臼撞击症由于一个或多个骨异常，导致髋臼和股骨头或股骨颈之间的异常联系所致。股骨的异常可能会导致在上唇和软骨之间产生前上的压缩和剪切力。这些压力导致与上唇唇状组织和软骨外推分离，软骨被挤压一起。这导致关节退化,最终导致全髋关节的骨关节炎。
column5: Femoroacetabular impingement (FAI) results from one or more bony abnormalities that lead to abnormal contact between the acetabulum and the femoral head or neck. The femoral abnormality is proposed to cause compression and shear stresses in the region between the labrum and cartilage, anterosuperiorly. These stresses cause a separation between the labrum and cartilage as the labrum is pushed outwards and the cartilage is pushed centrally. This eventually leads to articular degeneration and eventually global hip osteoarthritis.

column4: （婴儿期）喂养问题所需的胃空肠管饲。
column5: Feeding problem necessitating gastrojejunal tube feeding.

column4: 淋巴细胞凋亡率异常
column5: A anomaly in the rate of apoptosis in lymphocytes.

column4: 淋巴细胞凋亡率升高。
column5: A elevation in the rate of apoptosis in lymphocytes.

column4: 在血清中存在与C3转化酶（C3bBb）反应的自身抗体（免疫球蛋白）。
column5: The presence of autoantibodies (immunoglobulins) in the serum that react against C3 convertase (C3bBb).

column4: 因发育缺陷造成的小肠长度明显缩短。
column5: Substantially shortened length of the small intestine as a result of a developmental defect.

column2: Hyperintensity of cerebral white matter on MRI
column4: 脑白质磁共振成像比预期的信号更亮。
column5: A brighter than expected signal on magnetic resonance imaging emanating from the cerebral white matter.

column4: 比围绕脑室的脑白质发出的磁共振成像亮度高于预期的区域。
column5: Areas of brighter than expected signal on magnetic resonance imaging emanating from the cerebral white matter that surrounds the cerebral ventricles.

column4: 深部脑白质磁共振成像的亮度比预期的要高。
column5: Areas of brighter than expected signal on magnetic resonance imaging emanating from the deep cerebral white matter.

column2: Abnormal response to short acting pulmonary vasodilator
column3: 对短效肺血管扩张剂反应异常
column4: 肺血管扩张剂测试在右心导管术期间进行，并且涉及短效血管活性剂如腺苷，依前列醇或吸入的一氧化氮。 正常（正）反应的当前定义是平均肺动脉压至少出现10 mm Hg（或20％）至绝对值小于40 mm Hg的下降。
column5: Pulmonary vasodilator testing is performed during right-heart catheterization and involves a short-acting vasoactive agent such as adenosine, epoprostenol, or inhaled nitric oxide. The current definition of a normal (positive) response is a drop in mean pulmonary artery pressure of at least 10 mm Hg (or 20 percent) to below 40 mm Hg.

column2: Insufficient response to short acting pulmonary vasodilator
column3: 对短效肺血管扩张剂反应不足
column4: 平均肺动脉压（mPAP）的下降至少为10mmHg至绝对值小于40mmHg，而对于短效血管活性剂（如腺苷，依前列醇或吸入一氧化氮），心输出量（CO）没有降低。
column5: No fall in mean pulmonary arterial pressure (mPAP) falls by at least 10 mmHg to an absolute value less than 40 mmHg without a degradation in cardiac output (CO) in response to a short-acting vasoactive agent such as adenosine, epoprostenol, or inhaled nitric oxide.

column4: 推动食物通过胃肠道的肌肉收缩的异常。
column5: An anomaly of the muscular contractions that propel food though the gastrointestinal tract.

column4: 食物通过肠道所需的时间缩短。
column5: A reduction in the length of time required for food to pass through the intestines.

column4: 瘙痒是一种让人忍不住想要去搔抓的主观感觉。该术语指的是腹部皮肤瘙痒感的异常增加。
column5: Pruritus is an itch or a sensation that makes a person want to scratch. This term refers to an abnormally increased sensation of itching over the skin of the abdomen.

column4: 瘙痒是一种让人忍不住想要去搔抓的主观感觉。该术语指的是手部皮肤瘙痒感的异常增加。
column5: Pruritus is an itch or a sensation that makes a person want to scratch. This term refers to an abnormally increased sensation of itching over the skin of the hand.

column5: Pruritus is an itch or a sensation that makes a person want to scratch. This term refers to an abnormally increased sensation of itching over the skin of the foot.

column4: 瘙痒是一种让人忍不住想要去搔抓的主观感觉。该术语指的是乳房皮肤瘙痒感的异常增加。
column5: Pruritus is an itch or a sensation that makes a person want to scratch. This term refers to an abnormally increased sensation of itching over the skin of the breast.

column4: 一种原始反射，其特征在于通过刺激手掌的尖锐隆隆而引起的下巴的精神肌肉的不自主收缩。
column5: A type of primitive reflex characterized by an involuntary contraction of the mentalis muscle of the chin caused by stimulation of the thenar eminence of the palm.

column4: 当检查者的手轻轻插入患者手掌时，可以引发一种原始反射。手掌表面被抚摸或简单地触动。手指的屈肌表面也可以由检查者的手指刺激。刺激应在远端方向。有了积极的回应，患者抓住检查员手中的力量不变，并随着检查者的手移动而继续掌握。自主释放的能力取决于反射的活动；有些患者可以这样做，而有些甚至可以从床上抬起，因为抓握有这样的力量[NCBI Books：NBK395]。
column5: A type of primitive reflex that can be elicated when the hand of the examiner is gently inserted into the palm of the patient's hand. The palmar surface is stroked or simply touched. The flexor surfaces of the fingers may be stimulated also by the examiner's fingers. The stimulus should be in a distal direction. With a positive response, the patient grasps the examiner's hand with variable strength and continues to grasp as the examiner's hand is moved. Ability to release the grip voluntarily depends on the activity of the reflex; some patients can do so readily, while others can even be lifted off the bed, since the grasp has such power [NCBI Books:NBK395].

column4: 通过重复敲击前额引起的一种原始反射。正常情况下通常会在前几次敲击中眨眼，但如果持续眨眼，则是异常的标志。持续眨眼也被称为Myerson's标志。
column5: A type of primitive reflex that is elicited by repetitive tapping on the forehead. Normal subjects usually blink in response to the first several taps, but if blinking persists, the response is abnormal and considered to be a sign of frontal release. Persistent blinking is also known as Myerson's sign.

column4: 通过轻轻敲击上唇引起的一种原始反射。肌肉收缩导致噘嘴反射[NCBI Books：NBK395]。
column5: A type of primitive reflex that is elicited by tapping the upper lip lightly. The contraction of the muscles causes the mouth to resemble a snout [NCBI Books:NBK395].

column4: 一种原始反射，通过用诸如压舌板，反射锤或检查者的手指的物体轻轻地触摸或敲击嘴唇而引起。有时只能通过用物体接近嘴唇来获得反射。阳性吸反射包括嘴唇吸吮或抚摸时的动作[NCBI Books：NBK395]。
column5: A type of primitive reflex that is elicited by lightly touching or tapping on the lips with an object such as a tongue blade, reflex hammer, or the examiner's finger. At times the reflex is obtained merely by approaching the lips with an object. A positive suck reflex consists of sucking movements by the lips when they are stroked or touched [NCBI Books:NBK395].

column4: 严重头痛突然发作，在不到一分钟内达到最大强度，持续1小时至10天。
column5: Severe head pain with sudden onset, reaching its maximum intensity in less than one minute and lasting from one hour to ten days.

column5: Inappropriate sinus tachycardia is a nonparoxysmal tachyarrhythmia characterized by an increased resting heart rate (HR) and/or an exaggerated HR response to minimal exertion or a change in body posture. HR is constantly above the physiological range with no appropriate relation to metabolic or physiological demands.
Abnormal growth ossification centers in children. Initially a degeneration/ necrosis followed by regeneration or recalcification.

column4: 指表皮最外层大面积的鳞屑样脱落。
column5: Refers to the loss of the outer layer of the epidermis in large, scale-like flakes.

column4: 起源于APUD细胞的内分泌肿瘤。
column5: An endocrine tumor arising from an APUD cell.

column4: 枕-额间周径（OFC）减小。小头畸形的OFC要求小于同龄人群平均值2-3个标准差。
脑软化症是脑梗死、脑缺血、感染、颅脑创伤或其他损伤后出现的脑组织的软化或丧失。
column5: Encephalomalacia is the softening or loss of brain tissue after cerebral infarction, cerebral ischemia, infection, craniocerebral trauma, or other injury.

column4: 没有重复的提示时，不能保持姿势或姿势（例如保持闭眼，伸出舌头，保持共鸣注视稳定在固定方向，或延长“啊”声）。
column5: The inability to maintain postures or positions (such as keeping eyes closed, protruding the tongue, maintaining conjugate gaze steadily in a fixed direction, or making a prolonged 'ah' sound) without repeated prompts.

column4: 动作无力症的一种，被定义为不能同时执行两个以上的简单自愿行为，例如闭上眼睛并伸出舌头。
column5: A subset of motor impersistence, defined as the inability to perform more than two of the simple voluntary acts simultaneously, such as closing the eyes and protruding the tongue.

column4: 手掌皮肤异常，即手掌掌心面皮肤异常。

column4: 固定讽刺的鬼脸和焦虑的表情。由咬肌和其他面部肌肉的痉挛引起。
column5: Fixed sarcastic grimace and anxious expression. Caused by spasms of the masseter and other facial muscles.

column4: 呼吸浅慢是指异常较浅和/或缓慢的呼吸
column5: Hypopnea is referring to breathing that is abnormally shallower and/or slow.

column4: 胰岛素水平异常。
column5: An abnormal concentration of insulin in the body.

column4: 血液中胰岛素水平异常。
column5: An abnormal concentration of insulin in the blood.

column4: 血液中胰岛素水平降低。
column5: A decreased concentration of insulin in the blood.

column3: 糖化血红蛋白水平升高
自然杀伤细胞数目减少
column4: 自然杀伤细胞数量少于正常数量。自然杀伤细胞是先天免疫系统中含有细胞质颗粒酶的淋巴细胞，即具有穿孔素和蛋白酶的小颗粒，其允许自然杀伤细胞在靶细胞的细胞膜中形成孔 颗粒酶和相关分子可以进入，诱导细胞凋亡。
column5: Less than normal number of natural killer cells, a type of lymphocyte in the innate immune system that contains cytoplasmic granzymes, i.e., small granules with perforin and proteases that allow natural killer cells to form pores in the cell membrane of the target cell through which the granzymes and associated molecules can enter, inducing apoptosis.

column4: 自然杀伤细胞缺失。自然杀伤细胞是先天免疫系统中含有细胞质颗粒酶的淋巴细胞，即具有穿孔素和蛋白酶的小颗粒，其允许自然杀伤细胞在靶细胞的细胞膜中形成孔 颗粒酶和相关分子可以进入，诱导细胞凋亡。
column5: Lack of natural killer cells, a type of lymphocyte in the innate immune system that contains cytoplasmic granzymes, i.e., small granules with perforin and proteases that allow natural killer cells to form pores in the cell membrane of the target cell through which the granzymes and associated molecules can enter, inducing apoptosis.

column3: 妊娠期高凝状态，妊娠期血栓形成倾向
column5: An increased tendency towards thrombosis in the mother during a pregnancy.

column4: 肺内出血。
column5: A hemorrhage occurring within the lung.

column4: 以延迟出血为特征的临床表现加速血块（纤维蛋白溶解）的分解
column5: Clincial phenotype characterized by delayed bleeding accelerated break down of blood clot (fibrinolysis)

column2: Decrease in High molecular weight von Willebrand Factor Multimers
column3: 高分子量血管性血友病因子多聚体减少
column4: 高分子量血管性血友病因子多聚体降低
column5: A decrease in High molecular weight von Willebrand Factor Multimers

column2: Decreased level of heparin co-factor II
column4: 凝血异常与肝素辅因子II的浓度降低有关
column5: An abnormality of coagulation related to a decreased concentration of heparin co-factor II

column3: 富含组氨酸糖蛋白水平下降
column4: 富含组氨酸糖蛋白水平下降导致纤维蛋白溶解抑制和凝血抑制下降
column5: Decrease of these levels result in increased inhibition of fibrinolysis and reduced inhibition of coagulation

column4: 纤溶酶原水平降低
column5: A decreased level of Plasminogen

column3: 血栓调节蛋白水平下降
column4: 血栓调节蛋白是凝血酶诱导的蛋白C活化的辅因子。在缺乏的情况下，蛋白C凝结的倾向将较少
column5: Thrombomodulin is a cofactor in the thrombin induced activation of Protein C. In the case of deficiency there will be less Protein C and tendency to clot

column2: Decreased level of tissue plasminogen activator
column3: 组织纤溶酶原激活物水平下降
column4: tPA催化血浆纤维蛋白原转化为纤溶酶，从而分解凝块。当tPA有不足时会出现血栓形成增加
column5: tPA catalyzes the conversion of plasiminogen to plasmin, and thus break down of clots. When there is a deficiency there will be an increase of thrombosis

column4: 异常出血与手术或创伤有关，不能在初次损害时开始，但延迟至少24小时后。
column5: Abnormal bleeding related to a procedure or trauma which does not start at the time of the initial insult, but after delay by at least 24 hours.

column3: 凝血因子XIII A亚基缺陷
column4: 因子XIII亚基A缺乏，导致XIII因子活性降低。 活化因子XIII交联凝固凝块的纤维蛋白聚合物。
column5: Deficiency of factor XIII subunit A, leading to a reduced factor XIII activity. Activated Factor XIII cross-links fibrin polymers solidifying the clot.

column3: 凝血因子XIII B亚基缺陷
column4: 因子XIII亚基B缺乏，导致XIII因子活性降低。 活化因子XIII交联凝固凝块的纤维蛋白聚合物。
column5: Deficiency of factor XIII subunit B, leading to a reduced factor XIII activity. Activated Factor XIII cross-links fibrin polymers solidifying the clot.

column4: 白细胞内存在包涵体（可染色物质的聚集体，通常是蛋白质）
column5: The presence of intraceullar inclusion bodies (aggregates of stainable substances, usually proteins) in leukocytes.

column4: 纤维蛋白降解增加，与血栓不稳定和出血有关
column5: Increased degradation of fibrin, associated with clot instability and bleeding

column2: Impaired binding of factor VIII to VWF
column5: Impaired binding of factor VIII to von Willebrand Factor. This is determined using a modified ELISA assay.

column3: 中性粒细胞趋化功能受损
column4: 因子VIII与血管性血友病因子受损的结合。 这是使用修饰的ELISA测定来确定的。
column5: An impairment of the migration of neutrophils towards chemoattractants as part of the innate immune response

column2: Increased plasma vitamin K epoxide after vitamin K supplementation
column3: 补充维生素K后，血浆维生素K环氧化物增加
column4: 补充维生素K补充后VKCFD（维生素K依赖性凝血因子缺乏症）2型会出现血浆维生素K环氧化物的增加，但VKCFD 1型没有。
column5: Increased plasma vitamin K epoxide after vitamin K supplementation is present in VKCFD (vitamin K-dependent clotting factor deficiency) type 2, but not in VKCFD type 1.

column2: Increased ratio of VWF propeptide to VWF antigen
column4: VWF抗原与VWF前肽比例增加表明VWF的缺乏不是由于合成受损，而是由于快速清除。 通过ELISA测量VWF前肽。
column5: An increased VWF propeptide to VWF antigen indicates that deficiency of VWF is not due to impaired synthesis but due to rapid clearance. The VWF propeptide is measured by ELISA.

column3: 利托菌素诱导血小板凝集反应增加
column4: #####响应低剂量瑞斯他汀的血小板凝集增加
column5: Increased platelet agglutination in response to low-dose ristocetin

column4: 肌肉出血。
column5: Haemorrhage occurring within a muscle

column3: 优球蛋白凝块溶解时间延长
column4: 用于测量纤维蛋白溶解的临床测定。 沉淀血浆的球蛋白部分，通过加入凝血酶形成凝块; 凝块形成后可以监测凝块分解（纤维蛋白溶解）的速度。
column5: Clinical assay used to measure fibrinolysis. The euglobulin fraction of plasma is precipitated and used to form clot by addition of thrombin; after clot forms the rate of clot breakdown (fibrinolysis) can be monitored.

column3: 拉塞尔蝰蛇毒时间（RVVT）延长
column4: 拉塞尔蝰蛇毒时间（RVVT）延长
column5: Increased time to coagulation in the Russell's viper venom assay

column4: alpha-2-抗纤溶酶的活性降低。 该蛋白质使驱动纤维蛋白溶解的蛋白酶纤溶酶失活。
column5: Reduced activity of alpha-2-antiplasmin. This protein inactivates the protease plasmin that drives fibrinolysis.

column4: 抗凝血酶原抗原降低。抗凝血酶水平降低可能导致血栓形成的风险增加。
column5: Reduced antithrombin antigen. A reduced level of antithrombin may lead to an increased risk of thrombus formation.

column3: 优球蛋白凝块溶解时间减少
column4: 用于测量纤维蛋白溶解的临床测定。 沉淀血浆的球蛋白部分，通过加入凝血酶形成凝块; 凝块形成后可以监测凝块分解（纤维蛋白溶解）的速度。
column5: Clinical assay used to measure fibrinolysis. The euglobulin fraction of plasma is precipitated and used to form clot by addition of thrombin; after clot forms the rate of clot breakdown (fibrinolysis) can be monitored.

column3: 纤溶酶原激活物抑制剂1活性降低
column4: 纤维蛋白溶酶原激活物抑制剂1的活性降低。通过抑制两种主要的纤溶酶原激活剂：组织纤溶酶原激活物和尿激酶 - 纤溶酶原激活物，该蛋白质下调循环中的纤维蛋白溶解。
column5: Reduced activity of plasminogen activator inhibitor 1. This protein down-regulates fibrinolysis in the circulation by inhibiting the two major plasminogen activators: tissue-plasminogen activator and urokinase-plasminogen activator.

column3: 纤溶酶原激活物抑制剂1抗原减少
column4: 纤溶酶原激活物抑制剂1抗原水平减少
column5: Reduced level of plasminogen activator inhibitor 1 antigen.

column4: 通过ELISA测量的凝血酶原抗原的降低。 凝血酶原是维生素K依赖性凝血因子，其被蛋白水解切割以形成凝血酶。
column5: Reduced prothrombin antigen as measured by ELISA assay. Prothrombin is a vitamin K-dependent coagulation factor that is proteolytically cleaved to form thrombin.

column4: 发生在手部的皮肤酒窝征亚型。
column5: A subtype of skin dimples occurring on the hands.

column5: Middle ear is filled with glue-like fluid instead of air.

column2: Recurrent infections of the middle ear

column5: An abnormal resistance to glucose, i.e., a reduction in the ability to maintain glucose levels in the blood stream within normal limits following oral or intravenous administration of glucose.

column2: Hyperintensity of MRI T2 signal of the spinal cord
column4: 脊髓MRI扫描可见高信号（明亮）区。
column5: A region of high intensity (brightness) observed upon magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) scans of the spinal cord.

column4: 起源于肠道的以腺体形式组织的恶性上皮肿瘤
column5: A malignant epithelial tumor with a glandular organization that originates in the intestines.

column4: 起源于小肠的以腺体形式组织的恶性上皮肿瘤。
column5: A malignant epithelial tumor with a glandular organization that originates in the small intestine.

column4: 起源于大肠的以腺体形式组织的恶性上皮肿瘤。
column5: A malignant epithelial tumor with a glandular organization that originates in the large intestine.

column2: Abnormal ossification of the trapezoid bone

column4: 当神经管，脑和脊髓的胚胎前体在神经胚期不能闭合时，出现神经管缺陷。 颅区（脑畸形）或低脊柱（开放性脊柱裂，骨髓性脑膜炎）是最常见的受影响部位，尽管在严重的神经管缺损颅脊柱裂，几乎整个神经管保持开放，从中脑到低脊柱。
column5: A neural tube defect arises when the neural tube, the embryonic precursor of the brain and spinal cord, fails to close during neurulation. The cranial region (anencephaly) or the low spine (open spina bifida; myelomeningocele) are most commonly affected although, in the severe NTD craniorachischisis, almost the entire neural tube remains open, from midbrain to low spine.

column3: 尿中碳酸氢盐浓度降低
尿中儿茶酚胺浓度降低

column2: Congenital malformation of the left heart

column5: An increased amount of 3-aminoisobutyric acid in the urine.

column4: 起源于胃本身的淋巴瘤
column5: Llymphoma that originates in the stomach itself.

column2: Osteolysis involving bones of the upper limbs

column3: 血浆酰基肉碱水平升高
酸性不稳定亚基水平降低

column4: 存在异常类型的血红蛋白，其特征在于通过缬氨酸（镰状细胞病的突变致病）在起始甲硫氨酸残基之后第7位置换谷氨酸残基。 该突变在低氧浓度的条件下促进HbS的聚合。 HbS可以通过多种方法鉴定，包括血红蛋白电泳和高效液相色谱。
column5: Presence of an abnormal type of hemoglobin characterized by the subsitution of a glutamic acid residue at position 7 following the initial methionine residue by a valine (the mutation causative of sickle cell disease). The mutation promotes the polymerization of the HbS under conditions of low oxygen concentration. HbS can be identified by multiple methodologies including hemoglobin electrophoresis and high-performance liquid chromatography.

column4: 血红蛋白A2（HbA2）的血液浓度升高，血红蛋白A2是由两个α和两个δ链组成的血红蛋白A的正常变体，通常在成人中以低水平存在，但可能在β地中海贫血中增加。
column5: An elevated concentration in the blood of hemoglobin A2 (HbA2), which is a normal variant of hemoglobin A that consists of two alpha and two delta chains and is normally present at low levels in adults but may be increased in beta thalassemia.

column4: 异常量的氧气由肺进入血和/或异常量的二氧化碳从血液进入肺。
column5: An abnormal amount of oxygen passes into the blood from the lungs and/or an abnormal amount of carbon dioxide passes from the blood into the lungs.

column2: Abnormality of the brachial nerve plexus
column4: 臂神经丛异常。
column5: Any abnormality of the brachial nerve plexus.

column2: Abnormality of the lumbosacral nerve plexus
column4: 腰骶神经丛异常。
column5: Any abnormality of the lumbosacral nerve plexus.

column4: 具有诊断性的偏光显微镜下明暗相间的区带。
column5: A diagnostic alternating light and dark banding pattern under polarizing microscopy.

column4: 睾丸（男性性器官）大小异常。
column5: An anomaly of the size of the testicle (the male gonad).

column4: 境界清楚、内无液体的实性隆起性皮损，从针尖大小到直径10毫米不等，其组织病理特征为局限性角化过度。
column5: A circumscribed, solid elevation of skin with no visible fluid, varying in size from a pinhead to less than 10mm in diameter at the widest point that is composed of localized hyperkeratosis (the latter may be demonstrated histopathologically).

column2: Aplasia/hypoplasia involving bones of the extremities
column3: 四肢骨不发育/发育不全

column5: Des-gamma carboxyprothrombin (DCP) or pro-thrombin induced by vitamin K absence-II (PIVKA-II) is an abnormal prothrombin protein that is increased in the serum of patients with HCC. Generation of DCP is thought to be a result of an acquired defect in the post- translational carboxylation of the prothrombin precursor in malignant cells.
Inflammation in any serous cavity.

column4: 眉毛直径变小。
column5: Decreased diameter of eyebrow hairs.

column4: 眉毛的密度/数量减少。
column5: Decreased density/number of eyebrow hairs.

column4: 青春期开始得早，在这里早发不是指早熟。
column5: An early onset of puberty, in this case early does not refer to precocious.

column4: 恶性间皮瘤起源于间皮细胞，即一层包绕人体内脏的薄层组织。恶性间皮瘤的发生几乎都与石棉的暴露接触有关，胸膜间皮瘤是最常见的形式，发生于胸膜组织。其他还有发生于腹膜、心包以及睾丸的间皮瘤，后者更为少见。
column5: Malignant mesothelioma is a form of cancer that originates from the cells of the mesothelium, a thin tissue layer surrounding the body's internal organs. Malignant mesothelioma is almost exclusively caused by asbestos exposure, pleural mesothelioma being the most common form, affecting the lining of the lungs called the pleura. Other forms such as perioneal-, percardial- or testicular- mesothelioma are much rarer.

column4: 起源于胸膜细胞的恶性间皮瘤（胸膜是衬于肺外围的薄层间皮）。胸膜间皮瘤是间皮瘤的最常见形式。
column5: A `Malignant mesothelioma` (HP:0100001) originating from cells of the pleura (the thin layer of mesothelium lining the lungs). Pleural mesothelioma is the most common form of mesothelioma.

column4: 一种起源于腹膜细胞（腹部的薄层间皮）的恶性间皮瘤。是仅次于胸膜间皮瘤的第二常见的间皮瘤形式。
column5: A `Malignant mesothelioma` (HP:0100001) originating from cells of the peritoneum (the thin layer of mesothelium lining the abdomen). Peritoneal mesothelioma is the second most common form of mesothelioma after pleural mesothelioma.

column4: 源于心包细胞（间皮薄层衬的心脏）的“恶性间皮瘤”（HP:0100001）。
column5: A `Malignant mesothelioma` (HP:0100001) originating from cells of the pericardium (the thin layer of mesothelium lining the heart).

column4: 睾丸形成恶性间皮瘤。
column5: A `Malignant mesothelioma` (HP:0100001) of the `testis` (FMA:7210).

column2: Neoplasm of the central nervous system
column4: 中枢神经系统（FMA:55675）的肿瘤（MPATH:218)。
column5: A `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the `central nervous system` (FMA:55675).

column2: Neoplasm of the peripheral nervous system
column4: 在周围神经系统（FMA:9903）的良性或恶性肿瘤（MPATH:218）。
column5: A benign or malignant `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) (tumour) of the `peripheral nervous system` (FMA:9903).

column4: 由雪旺细胞形成的良性神经鞘瘤。
column5: A benign nerve sheath tumor composed of Schwann cells.

column4: 巩膜上发生的神经鞘瘤
column5: schwannoma on the Scleral

column4: 眼睛的一个异常新生物（MPATH:218）。
column5: The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the eye.

column4: 在乳房（FMA:9601）发生的肿瘤（MPATH：218）。
column5: A `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the `breast` (FMA:9601).

column4: 视网膜前膜是一种薄片状的纤维组织，可以发生在视网膜黄斑部表面，并引起视力下降。视网膜前膜可发生于黄斑区小范围内。前膜有时也被称为黄斑皱褶，黄斑前纤维化，表面起皱性视网膜病或黄斑病玻璃纸。
column5: An epiretinal membrane is a thin sheet of fibrous tissue that can develop on the surface of the macular area of the retina and cause a disturbance in vision. An epiretinal membrane area can develop on the thin macular area of the retin. An epiretinal membrane is also sometimes called a macular pucker, premacular fibrosis, surface wrinkling retinopathy or cellophane maculopathy.

column4: 出现“额外”(PATO:0002002)的耳轮脚(FMA:61024，即第三个耳轮脚，位于对耳轮正常分岔处或分岔处上方。
column5: The presence of a `supernumerary` (PATO:0002002), i.e. third, `crus of the helix (FMA:61024) in the `helix` (FMA:60992), arising at or above the normal bifurcation of the antihelix.

column4: 附着于腹壁及其包裹的内脏之间的膜状组织（腹膜，间皮）的反折。包括小肠肠系膜、连接横结肠和腹后壁的结肠系膜、包裹结肠乙状弯曲部分的乙状结肠系膜。相同胚胎起源的细胞也环绕身体的其他器官，如肺（胸膜）或心脏（心包膜）。
column5: Folds of membranous tissue (peritoneum, mesothelium) attached to the wall of the abdomen and enclosing viscera. Examples include the mesentery for the small intestine; the transverse mesocolon, which attaches the transverse portion of the colon to the back wall of the abdomen; and the mesosigmoid, which enfolds the sigmoid portion of the colon. Cells of the same embryologic origin also surround the other organs of the body such as the lungs (pleura) or the heart (pericardium).

column4: 白内障的一种，主要影响晶状体的（FMA:58881）囊膜。
column5: A cataract that affects the `capsule of the lens` (FMA:58881).

column4: 核性白内障是指晶状体核的混浊。也就是说，核性白内障发生于晶状体的中心。细胞核变暗，由清晰变为黄色，有时变为棕褐色。
column5: A nuclear cataract is an opacity or clouding that develops in the `lens nucleus` (FMA:58971). That is, a nuclear cataract is one that is located in the center of the lens. The nucleus tends to darken changing from clear to yellow and sometimes brown.

column4: 白内障的一种，主要影响晶状体核周围的核皮质（FMA:58970）。通常形成独特的楔形或辐条的外观。
column5: A cataract which affects the layer of the lens surrounding the nucleus, i.e., the `lens cortex` (FMA:58970). It is identified by its unique wedge or spoke appearance.

column4: 在晶状体后囊部发生的一种白内障。这种类型病程进展更快。
column5: A cataract which is found in the back outer layer of the lens. This type often develops more rapidly.

column4: 脑瘫是指一组持久的运动和姿势发育障碍,造成活动受限,被认为是胎儿或婴儿的大脑发育尚未成熟阶段遭受非进行性脑损伤所致。脑瘫的运动障碍常伴有感觉、知觉、认知、交流和行为障碍，癫痫及继发性骨骼肌系统的问题。
column5: Cerebral palsy describes a group of permanent disorders of the development of movement and posture, causing activity limitation, that are attributed to nonprogressive disturbances that occurred in the developing fetal or infant brain. The motor disorders of cerebral palsy are often accompanied by disturbances of sensation, perception, cognition, communication, and behaviour, by epilepsy, and by secondary musculoskeletal problems.

column4: 有神经疾病基础的运动异常，以随意运动的协调和速度的改变为特征。
column5: An abnormality of movement with a neurological basis characterized by changes in coordination and speed of voluntary movements.

column4: 一种刻板的行为表现为受累个体重复双手不停的上和下。
column5: A type of stereotypic behavior in which the affected individual repeatedly waves the hands up and down.

column4: 异常快乐的面貌，久而久之，甚至在不恰当的情况下（例如悲痛，恐惧或愤怒）仍然可以观察到异常快乐的表情。
column5: An unusually happy aspect over time which can also may be observed during inappropriate situations that should be causing for example distress, fear or anger.

column4: 过度友善是表现为不恰当的、不合时宜的对他人过度友善，这有可能导致危险的行为，如幼儿可能会不受任何约束的与陌生人离开
column5: A form of hypersociability that presents as mostly inappropriate people-orientation and friendliness towards others on an inadequate level which might go as far as being dangerous considering for example young children following strangers without restriction.

column4: 血管结构异常造成动脉血不经毛细血管直接进入静脉。
column5: An anomalous configuration of blood vessels that shunts arterial blood directly into veins without passing through the capillaries.

column4: 复发形式的胰腺炎。
column5: A `recurrent` (PATO:0000427) form of `pancreatitis` (HP:0001733).

column4: 甲状腺位置异常。
column5: Mislocalised (PATO:0000628) "thyroid gland" (FMA:9603).

column4: 异位的甲状腺(HP:0100028)，位于舌根，在舌盲孔的后面，是由于发育过程中甲状腺未能下降导致。
column5: An aberrant thyroid gland or "Ectopic thyroid" (HP:0100028) located at the base of the tongue (FMA:54645), just posterior to the foramen cecum as a result of a failure of the thyroid to descend.

column4: 异位的副甲状腺组织可来自于沿甲状舌管路径的任何地方的甲状舌管残余。
column5: Accessory ectopic thyroid tissue arising from remnants of the thyroglossal duct anywhere along the path of the thyroglossal duct tract.

column4: 甲状腺肿瘤
column5: The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the `thyroid gland` (FMA:9603).

column4: 抽搐是突然的，重复的，非节律性，刻板的运动或发声，常累及不同的肌群。
column5: A tic is a sudden, repetitive, nonrhythmic, stereotyped motor movement or vocalization involving discrete muscle groups.

column4: 影响个别肌群的运动抽动。
column5: Movement-based tics affecting discrete muscle groups.

column4: 产经鼻腔，口腔或咽喉空气流动时的非自主的声音。声带不参与的发声抽动。
column5: Involuntary sounds produced by moving air through the nose, mouth, or throat. The vocal cords are not involved in all tics that produce sound.

column4: 骨上一条密度降低的带，沿着表面骨膜增厚的皮质骨形成。受影响的区域是常形成胼胝（老茧），并表现出假骨折的外观。
column5: A band of bone material of decreased density forming alongside the surface of the cortical bone with thickening of the periosteum. Callus formation in the affected area is common and gives the appearance of a false fracture.

column4: 头皮的毛发异常。
column5: An abnormality of the `hair of head` (FMA:54241).

column4: 头皮毛发的生长比正常情况下慢。
column5: Scalp hair whose growth is slower than normal.

column4: 骨皮质异常，导致受累的骨皮质的异常增厚。
column5: An `Abnormality of cortical bone` (HP:0003103) leading to an abnormal thickness of the cortex of affected bones.

column4: 第二趾变宽的表现。
column5: A broad appearance of the second toe.

column4: 第三趾变宽的表现（FMA:25051）。
column5: A broad appearance of the `third toe`(FMA:25051).

column4: 第四趾变宽的表现。
column5: A broad appearance of the fourth toe.

column4: 第五趾变宽的表现。
column5: A broad appearance of the fifth toe.

column4: 第二趾骨骺硬而致密，像象牙一样。这样的骨骺在X光片具有均匀高密度。
column5: Epiphyses of the 2nd toe are hard and dense like ivory. Such an epiphysis has a uniformly dense appearance on radiographs.
