column2: Synostosis involving bones of the toes
Synostosis involving bones of the upper limbs
column3: 累及上肢骨骼的骨性连合
column4: 上肢骨骼或骨骼的一部分之间的不正常连合。
column5: An abnormal union between bones or parts of bones of the upper limbs.

column4: 关节间相邻骨骼的异常融合。
column5: The abnormal fusion of neighboring bones across a joint.

column4: 呼吸道上皮异位表现为皮肤上的浅层病变，通常位于单侧前臂的皮肤，与同侧手畸形相关。
column5: Ectopic respiratory epithelium presenting as a superficial lesion in the skin usually localised unilateral in the skin of the forearm and associated with ipsilateral hand malformations.

column4: 一个`肉瘤`（MPATH:551）。
column5: The presence of a `sarcoma` (MPATH:551).

column4: 平滑肌结缔组织肿瘤，是一种少见的发生于平滑肌的恶性肿瘤，当这种肿瘤为良性时则称为平滑肌瘤。
column5: A smooth muscle connective tissue tumor, which is rare type of cancer that is a malignant neoplasm of smooth muscle. When such a neoplasm is benign, it is called a leiomyoma.

column4: 纤维母细胞肉瘤是起源于纤维结缔组织增生的恶性肿瘤，以未成熟或未分化的梭形细胞增生的成纤维细胞为特征。
column5: A fibroblastic sarcoma is a malignant tumor derived from fibrous connective tissue and characterized by immature proliferating fibroblasts or undifferentiated anaplastic spindle cells.

column4: 良性的，生长缓慢的肿瘤，没有任何转移潜能。尽管具有良性属性，它们能损害周围结构从而引起器官功能障碍。组织学上，它们与低度恶性纤维肉瘤类似，但它们仅限于原位侵袭且即使是完全切除后也易于复发。这些肿瘤在经过手术的情况下亦有复发的趋势，最常见于腹内肠道平滑肌细胞。
column5: Benign, slow-growing tumors without any metastatic potential. Despite their benign nature, they can damage nearby structures causing organ dysfunction. Histologically they resemble low-grade fibrosarcomas, but they are very locally aggressive and tend to recur even after complete resection. There is a tendency for recurrence in the setting of prior surgery and the most common localisation of these tumors is intraabdominal from smooth muscle cells of the instestine.

column4: 骨瘤是最常见于头骨和下颌骨的骨生长;然而，它们可能发生在身体的任何骨。骨瘤通常不会引起临床问题，不要变成恶性的。
column5: Osteomas are bony growths found most commonly on the skull and mandible; however, they may occur in any bone of the body. Osteomas do not usually cause clinical problems and do not become malignant.

column4: 每分钟重复几次的横膈膜挛缩。在人类，空气突然冲入肺中引起会厌关闭，发出打嗝的声音。也称为同步膈膜颤振，或呃逆，来自拉丁语singult（抽泣时喘气的行为）。打嗝是反射弧参与的不自主动作。
column5: A contraction of the diaphragm that repeats several times per minute. In humans, the abrupt rush of air into the lungs causes the epiglottis to close, creating a hic sound. Also known as synchronous diaphragmatic flutter (SDF), or singultus, from the Latin singult, the act of catching one's breath while sobbing. The hiccup is an involuntary action involving a reflex arc.

column4: 偏身投掷是主一种基底节不同区域损害（FMA:84013）造成的罕见的运动障碍。 偏身投掷的特点通常是肢体不自主的投掷样运动。这些运动往往是大幅度的、剧烈的。它们可以是连续的，随机的，累及一侧身体的近端和/或远端，某些情况下甚至累及面部肌肉。患者越是活动，运动越是明显；随着放松，运动减弱。
column5: Hemiballismus is a rare movement disorder that is caused primarily by damage to various areas in the `basal ganglia` (FMA:84013). Hemiballismus is usually characterized by involuntary flinging motions of the extremities. The movements are often violent and have wide amplitudes of motion. They are continuous and random and can involve proximal and/or distal muscles on one side of the body, while some cases even include the facial muscles. The more a patient is active, the more the movements increase. With relaxation comes a decrease in movements.

column4: 钙盐肌肉组织中沉积。
column5: Deposition of calcium salts in muscle tissue.

column4: 累及脑膜（FMA:231572）的钙沉积(MPATH:36)。
column5: `Calcium deposition` (MPATH:36) affecting the `Meninges` (FMA:231572).

column2: Lipomas of the central neryous system
Abnormality of the medullary cavity of the long bones
column4: 髓腔（髓质，最内部分）异常，髓腔是骨轴的中央腔，其中充满红骨髓和/或黄色的骨髓（脂肪组织）。
column5: An abnormality of the medullary cavity (medulla, innermost part), which is the central cavity of bone shafts where red bone marrow and/or yellow bone marrow (adipose tissue) is stored.

column2: Stenosis of the medullary cavity of the long bones

column4: 干骺端骨存在发育不良的区域。
column5: The presence of dysplastic regions in metaphyseal bones.

column4: 老年斑是大脑灰质内的细胞外类淀粉样蛋白沉积。
column5: Senile plaques are extracellular deposits of amyloid in the gray matter of the brain.

column4: 一种手和/或脚（指/趾、掌骨和跗骨）之间部分缺失裂开的表现。其严重程度具有可变性，从第三趾/指轻微发育不全，到第二或第三趾/指缺如，甚至寡爪或单爪的手和/或脚。
column5: A condition in which middle parts of the hands and/or feet (digits and meta-carpals and -tarsals) are missing giving a cleft appearance. The severity is very variable ranging from slightly hypoplastic 3rd toe/fingers over absent 2nd or 3rd toes/fingers as far as oligo- or monodactyl hands and/or feet.

column4: 多指（趾）的一种形式，其中额外的指（趾）位于拇指或大脚趾的一侧。
column5: A form of polydactyly in which the extra digit or digits are localized on the side of the thumb or great toe.

column4: 多指（趾）的一种形式，其中额外的指（趾）位于第五指/趾的一侧。
column5: A form of polydactyly in which the extra digit or digits are localized on the side of the fifth finger or fifth toe.

column4: 一个额外手指或脚趾（非拇指或拇趾），累及相关骨性并指的第三或第四掌骨。
column5: The presence of a supernumerary finger or toe (not a thumb or hallux) involving the third or fourth metacarpal/tarsal with associated osseous syndactyly.

column4: 肌腱结构或形式的异常。
column5: An abnormal structure or form of any tendon.

column4: 腕骨由舟状骨、月骨、三角骨、豆状骨、头状骨、钩骨、小多角骨和大多角骨构成。跗骨包括距骨、跟骨、舟状骨、骰骨、楔状骨和舟形骨。如果腕骨和跗骨间发生任何骨融合的，应用此术语。
column5: The carpus consists of the scaphoid, lunate, triquetal, pisiform, captitate, hamate, trapezoid, and trapezium bones. The tarsus consists of the talus, calcaneus, navicular, cuboid, cuneiform, and navicular bones. This term applies if there is any fusion among the bones of the carpus or tarsus.

column4: 嘴唇上的小凹陷。
column5: A depression located on a lip.

column4: 上唇唇红中线处两旁形成的凹陷。
column5: Depression located on the vermilion of the upper lip, usually paramedian.

column4: 上嘴唇的唇红正中旁的凹陷。
column5: Depression located paramedially on the vermilion of a lip.

column2: Abnormality of dorsoventral patterning of the limbs
column4: 因四肢早期发育过程中形成背腹模式发生缺陷或破坏造成的异常。背腹轴的正常发展的破坏可能导致不同表型异常，可能影响指甲和/或手掌、手和/或脚的背侧，最终导致受累肢体正常背腹侧外观的改变。
column5: An abnormality resulting from a defect or disruption of dorsoventral patterning that normally happens during early development of the limbs. A disruption of the normal development of the dorsoventral axis may lead to a variable spectrum of different phenotypic abnormalities that may affect the nails and or palmar and dorsal side of the hands and/or feet, ultimately changing the normal dorsoventral appearance of the affected limbs.

column4: 讲话时通过鼻腔的气流减弱，这种异常发音通常是由于各种原因所致的鼻腔梗塞，气流受阻。
column5: Hyponasal speech is when there is an abnormally reduced nasal airflow during speech often in a setting of nasal obstruction or congestion.

column4: 先天性腮窦是胚胎鳃弓及其中间开裂和口袋未能完全消退的残余。窦外口一般有低于下颌骨升支。他们可能会穿遍腮腺，并在外耳道里紧挨面神经并行。
column5: A congenital branchial sinus is a remnant of the embryonic branchial arches and their intervening clefts and pouches that has failed to regress completely. Sinuses typically have their external orifice inferior to the ramus of the mandible. They may traverse the parotid gland, and run in close vicinity to the facial nerve in the external auditory canal.

column4: 味觉流泪源于第七对脑神经原先支配颌下神经节的纤维异位支配翼腭神经节。这种异常的神经支配导致吃饭时或想到美餐时无法控制的流泪。
column5: Gustatory lacrimation results from an aberrant innervation of fibres from the seventh cranial nerve to the pterygopalatine ganglion which are destined originally for the submandibular ganglion. This aberrant innervation leads to uncontrollable tearing while eating or in anticipation of a meal.

column4: 小脑弥漫非局灶性萎缩。
column5: Diffuse unlocalised atrophy affecting the cerebellum.

column4: 耳周软组织的良性先天性病变，包括狭窄的盲管或凹陷。
column5: Benign congenital lesions of the periauricular soft tissue consisting of a blind-ending narrow tube or pit.

column4: 一种慢性炎性肠病，包括结肠部位特征性的溃疡或破损。活动性疾病的主要症状通常包括带血的腹泻，与无症状期相比症状渐进性发作，周期性加重。与克罗恩病相比，这种特殊形式的结肠炎始于直肠的远端，连续向上扩展，且只累及结肠的粘膜层和粘膜下层组织。
column5: A chronic inflammatory bowel disease that includes characteristic ulcers, or open sores, in the colon. The main symptom of active disease is usually constant diarrhea mixed with blood, of gradual onset and intermittent periods of exacerbated symptoms contrasting with periods that are relatively symptom-free. In contrast to Crohn's disease this special form of colitis begins in the distal parts of the rectum, spreads continually upwards and affects only mucose and submucose tissue of the colon.

column4: 肠道的一种慢性肉芽肿炎症疾病，可能累及从口到肛门的消化道的任何部分，引起多种症状。该病主要引起腹痛、腹泻（可能是血性）、呕吐或体重减轻，但也可能引起肠道外的并发症，如皮疹、关节炎、眼部炎症、疲倦、注意力不集中。克罗恩病被认为是一种自身免疫性疾病，由身体的免疫系统攻击胃肠道而引起炎症。
column5: A chronic granulomatous inflammatory disease of the intestines that may affect any part of the gastrointestinal tract from mouth to anus, causing a wide variety of symptoms. It primarily causes abdominal pain, diarrhea which may be bloody, vomiting, or weight loss, but may also cause complications outside of the gastrointestinal tract such as skin rashes, arthritis, inflammation of the eye, tiredness, and lack of concentration. Crohn's disease is thought to be an autoimmune disease, in which the body's immune system attacks the gastrointestinal tract, causing inflammation.

column4: 大肠（结肠、盲肠和直肠）的一种慢性炎症性疾病。
column5: A chronic inflammatory disease of the large intestine (colon, cecum and rectum).

column4: 大肠（包括结肠，盲肠和直肠）的一种急性和自限性的炎症性疾病。
column5: An acute and self-limited inflammatory disease of the large intestine (colon, cecum and rectum).

column2: EMG: continuous motor unit activity at rest
column3: EMG:休息中持续的运动单位活动
column4: 在休息中，运动单位持续的肌电活动，即无意识的肌肉运动。
column5: Continuous electromyographic activity of motor units at rest, i.e., without voluntary movement of the muscles.

column4: 肌电图出现不同振幅和频率的高频放电，产生150/s至20/s的频率波动，并会产生俯冲轰炸机样声音。
column5: High frequency discharges in electromyography (EMG) that vary in amplitude and frequency, waxing and waning continuously with firing frequencies ranging from 150/second down to 20/second and producing a sound that has been referred to as a dive bomber sound.

column3: 肌电图:神经肌肉接头传递受损
column4: 肌电图提示不稳定或无神经肌肉传递伴不稳定的、形状时刻变化的运动单位电位（MUP）。
column5: An electromyographic finding associated with erratic or absent neuromuscular transmission with erratic, moment-to-moment changes in the shape of the motor unit potential (MUP).

column4: 肌电图提示运动神经上肌电传导速度减小。
column5: The presence of reduced conduction velocity of motor nerves on electromyography.

column3: 肌电图:肌纤维颤搐放电
column4: 肌电图（EMG）显示以2-10次/秒的频率快速重复出现的自发性放电，不受意识控制。
column5: The presence of spontaneous bursts of rapidly firing potentials that recur at regular intervals of 2-10 per second and are unaffected by voluntary effort. This is an electromyographic (EMG) finding.

column2: Abnormality of pattern reversal visual evoked potentials
column3: 图形翻转视觉诱发电位异常
column4: 图形翻转视觉诱发电位异常。
column5: Abnormality of pattern reversal visual evoked potentials

column2: Abnormality of peripheral somatosensory evoked potentials
column3: 周围体感诱发电位异常

column2: Abnormality of central somatosensory evoked potentials
column3: 异常的中枢体感诱发电位
周围神经的淀粉样变性病
column4: 周围神经系统（FMA:9903）出现`淀粉样蛋白沉积`（mpath:34）。
column5: The presence of `amyloid deposition` (MPATH:34) in the nerves of the `peripheral nervous system` (FMA:9903).

column4: 紧密包裹的膜性管状区域，表现为膜性包涵体的管状聚集。这些膜性包涵体来源于肌浆网和线粒体膜，含有多种具有酶活性的蛋白。
column5: Unusual regions of densely packed membranous tubules known as tubular aggregates which present as membranous inclusions, derived from membranes of sarcoplasmic reticulum and mitochondria, containing miscellaneous proteins with a variety of enzymatic activities.

column4: 肌细胞的细胞质内存在包涵体。包涵体是聚集物（沉积物）或可着色物质，通常是错误折叠的蛋白质。
column5: The presence of inclusion bodies within the cytoplasm of muscle cells. Inclusion bodies are aggregates (deposits) or stainable material, usually misfolded proteins.

column4: 肌细胞的细胞核内存在包涵体。包涵体是聚集物（沉积物）或可着色物质，通常是错误折叠的蛋白质。
column5: The presence of inclusion bodies within the nucleus of muscle cells. Inclusion bodies are aggregates (deposits) or stainable material, usually misfolded proteins.

column4: 环状肌纤维由周围肌纤维环化成束，并定向环绕，使得它们的肌质内部包围结构和定向正常。
column5: Ring fibers are formed by a bundle of peripheral myofibrils which are circumferentially oriented such that they encircle the internal portion of the sarcoplasm which is normal in structure and orientation.

column4: 大脑一侧的萎缩，其特征包括大脑皮层变薄，髓鞘形成异常的脑白质体积缩小，并且同侧脑室扩大。
column5: Atrophy of one side of the brain, characterized by findings including   thinning of the cerebral cortex, reduced volume of the cerebral white matter with r abnormal myelination, and enlargement of the ipsilateral fourth ventricle.

column4: 发生在硬脑膜（FMA:9592）和蛛网膜（FMA:9591）之间的出血（MPATH:119）。
column5: `Hemorrhage` (MPATH:119) occurring between the `dura mater` (FMA:9592) and the `arachnoid mater` (FMA:9591).

column4: 存在于`硬脑膜`(FMA:9592)和`颅骨` (FMA:46565)之间的`出血` (MPATH:119)
column5: `Hemorrhage` (MPATH:119) occurring between the `dura mater` (FMA:9592) and the `skull` (FMA:46565).

column4: 脑中发生源自生殖细胞的肿瘤。
column5: The presence of a `germ cell tumor` (MPATH:310) of the `cerebrum` (FMA:62000).

column4: 脑部涉及肉芽肿反应的炎症，即涉及肉芽肿的非特异性炎症反应，定义为成熟单核吞噬细胞紧密、有序聚集，包括上皮样细胞和巨细胞。
column5: Cerebral inflammation involving a granulomatous response, i.e., a non-specific inflammatory response involving granulomas, defined as a compact organized collection of mature mononuclear phagocytes including epithelioid and giant cells.

column4: 脑细胞质或细胞核内的可染色物质聚集体。
column5: Nuclear or cytoplasmic aggregates of stainable substances within cells of the brain.

column4: 神经细胞内聚集的肌动蛋白和肌动蛋白相关蛋白。
column5: Intracellular aggregates of actin and actin-associated proteins within nerve cells.

column4: 脑组织的显微镜检查中出现的大量的嗜银颗粒和螺旋体。
column5: Presence of abundant argyrophilic grains and coiled bodies on microscopic examination of brain tissue.

column4: 酸性粘多糖组成的神经元内包涵体。
column5: An intraneuronal inclusion body composed of acid mucopolysaccharides.

column4: 脑嗜酸性、分散的、细胞浆内包含物，意义不明。
column5: Cerebral eosinophilic, discrete, intracytoplasmatic inclusions of unknown significance.

column4: 存在于长期胶质增生，某些肿瘤和一些代谢性疾病的大脑中，HE染色上表现为厚，细长的，蠕虫状或螺旋形的嗜酸性包被
column5: Thick, elongated, worm-like or corkscrew eosinophilic bundle that are found on H&E staining of the brain in the presence of long standing gliosis, occasional tumors, and some metabolic disorders.

column4: 齿状核`的异常（FMA:72260）。
column5: An abnormality of the `dentate nucleus` (FMA:72260).

column4: 青少年无菌性坏死包括一组以为骨的血液供应中断为特征的骨科疾病，青少年最多发的估计病史骨骺局现象骨坏死接着局部骨坏死最多的儿童或青少年的骨的骨骺。
column5: Juvenile aseptic necrosis comprises a group of orthopedic diseases characterized by interruption of the blood supply of a bone, followed by localized bony necrosis most often of the epiphyses of bones of children or teenagers.

column4: 一种慢性自身免疫性疾病，主要特征为皮肤纤维化（或硬化）和血管改变。
column5: A chronic autoimmune phenomenon characterized by fibrosis (or hardening) and vascular alterations of the skin.

column4: 对牛乳蛋白产生不良免疫反应的超敏反应。
column5: Hypersensitivity in form of an adverse immune reaction against cow milk protein.

column4: 涉及到腕骨和掌骨的融合。
column5: Fusion involving carpal and metacarpal bones.

column4: 一侧硬腭非中线裂开。
column5: A non-midline cleft of the palate  on one side only.

column4: 影响上唇侧旁部分而非正中线区域的上唇唇裂。
column5: Clefting of the upper lip affecting the lateral portions of the upper lip rather than the midline/median region.

column4: 在左侧和右侧的即非中线的上唇裂。
column5: A non-midline cleft of the upper lip on the left and right sides.

column4: 在左侧和右侧的即非中线的腭裂。
column5: Nonmidline cleft palate on the left and right sides.

column4: 远端指间关节和/或手指的近端指间关节无法主动或被动的伸展到180度。
column5: The distal interphalangeal joint and/or the proximal interphalangeal joint of the fingers cannot be extended to 180 degrees by either active or passive extension.

column2: Abnormality of the joints of the lower limbs
Joint contractures involving the joints of the feet
column4: 由于一个或多个关节长期缺乏运动，导致关节非骨性组织结构改变以致关节挛缩。
column5: Contractures of one ore more joints of the feet meaning chronic loss of joint motion due to structural changes in non-bony tissue.

column4: 在`blood`:`ammonia`（16134 CHEBI）的浓度降低（FMA:9670）。
column5: A decreased concentration of `ammonia` (CHEBI:16134) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).

column4: 肥大细胞（:0000097 CL）的异常。
column5: An abnormality of `mast cells` (CL:0000097).

column4: 肥大细胞和CD34 +肥大细胞前体细胞数量增加。
column5: The presence of an increased number of `mast cells` (CL:0000097) and CD34+ mast cell precursors in the body.

column2: Abnormality of the vitamin B3 metabolism

column4: 易感性增加导致的毛细支气管炎反复发作。
column5: An increased susceptibility to bronchiolitis as manifested by a history of recurrent bronchiolitis.

column4: 的`叶酸acid`减小的浓度（CHEBI:27470），其也被称为维生素B9中。
column5: A reduced concentration of `folic acid` (CHEBI:27470), which is also known as vitamin B9.

column4: 排尿频率增加。
column5: Increased frequency of urination.

column4: 输尿管（FMA:9704）的一种肿瘤(MPATH:218)。
column5: The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the `ureter` (FMA:9704).

column4: 尿道的一种肿瘤。
column5: The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the `urethra` (FMA:19667).

column4: 排尿疼痛或排尿困难。
column5: Painful or difficult `urination` (GO:0060073).

column4: 临床上把尿量小于50毫升/天定义为无尿。
column5: Absence of urine, clinically classified as below 50ml/day.

column4: 尿液减少，临床上低于300-500 ml/天排尿量定义为少尿症。
column5: Low output of urine, clinically classified as an output below 300-500ml/day.

column4: 起源于胸腺的良或恶性肿瘤（FMA:9607）。
column5: A benign or malignant `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) (tumour) originating in the `thymus` (FMA:9607).

column4: 胸腺上皮细胞起源的肿瘤（FMA:9607）。
column5: A tumor originating from the epithelial cells of the `thymus` (FMA:9607).

column4: 存在于肝脏的脓肿。
column5: The presence of an `abscess` (MPATH:608) of the `liver` (FMA:7197).

column4: 尿囊管未闭，形成膀胱至脐部的持久性脐尿管，尿液经过这个管道从膀胱渗出。
column5: Persistence of the urachal canal with drainage of urine from the bladder through the persistent allantois canal to the umbilicus.

column4: 肺部的肿瘤。
column5: Tumor of the lung.

column4: 一种起源于肺或胸膜腔的罕见恶性肿瘤，最常发生于婴幼儿，成人也有报道。胸膜肺母细胞瘤被认为是恶性的。

column5: Thin (2-3mm) membranes of normal esophageal tissue consisting of mucosa and submucosa that can be congenital or acquired. Congenital webs commonly appear in the middle and inferior third of the esophagus, and they are more likely to be circumferential with a central or eccentric orifice. Acquired webs are much more common than congenital webs and typically appear in the cervical area (postcricoid). Clinical symptoms of this condition are selective (solid more than liquids) dysphagia, thoracic pain, nasopharyngeal reflux, aspiration, perforation and food impaction (the last two are very rare).

column5: An autoimmune disease where the thyroid is overactive, producing an excessive amount of thyroid hormones (a serious metabolic imbalance known as hyperthyroidism and thyrotoxicosis). This is caused by autoantibodies to the TSH-receptor (TSHR-Ab) that activate that TSH-receptor (TSHR), thereby stimulating thyroid hormone synthesis and secretion, and thyroid growth (causing a diffusely enlarged goiter). The resulting state of hyperthyroidism can cause a dramatic constellation of neuropsychological and physical signs and symptoms, which can severely compromise the patients.
